story:
WetSeat: Protect Your Active Lifestyle

WetSeat was born to solve a simple problem: give everyone an easy way to keep their active lifestyle clean. With muddy cleats from soccer games, sandy run off from the surf, grabbing a last minute snack or drink between road trip milestones- let’s face it, your car can rapidly sink to being a biological experiment in no time.

WetSeat is an innovative seat cover that absorbs water and liquids and keeps your seat dry. It quickly slips on and off, making it easy to use and convenient to clean.  Simply rinse it off and let it dry before using again. WetSeat comes in two styles: a single bucket seat for front seats and our WetSeat Bench for back seats in both SUV's and Minivans. So whether you're flying solo or on a family adventure, your seats are covered, 

What We Need & What You Get

We need cash to get this product launched, and you need more than just the feeling that you helped out some random who made a cool video... 

So we sat down and hashed out what we really need to get this thing going.  Right now we have the design, the patent, the logo, the manufacturer and the passion behind our product. We have no problem stoking people out about our product, but we hit a wall every time they ask us "so where can I buy one?" 

         We need to:

- launch a website

- Gain Ecommerce functionality

- Shoot a cool promo video for our home page

- Incorporate our business 

- Pay our graphic designers, web developers, and videographer

- cover some of our raw product costs to be able to offer you some rad perks for your     donations. 

Ok, no B.S., so we need $18,000 by the end of January. 

The Bottom Line

We live an active lifestyle just like you. WetSeat makes what you are already doing that much more enjoyable and easier to do. 

It's that simple. 

We saw a gap in the market and are trying to fill it for you. 

Become a Brand Ambassador

We get that some people just can’t contribute, but if you think our product is rad:

  • Show your friends you support entrepreneurs - share our campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter.... or some new platform that's the next big thing no one over 25 has ever heard about  
  • Endorse us on Facebook- write us a simple post on WetSeat's Facebook saying you like what we're trying to do and think it's a cool product

And that’s all there is to it.

WetSeat comes in two styles: a single bucket seat for front seats and our WetSeat Bench for back seats in both SUV's and Minivans. So whether you're flying solo or on a family adventure, your seats are covered, What We Need & What You GetWe need cash to get this product launched, and you need more than just the feeling that you helped out some random who made a cool video... So we sat down and hashed out what we really need to get this thing going.  Right now we have the design, the patent, the logo, the manufacturer and the passion behind our product. We have no problem stoking people out about our product, but we hit a wall every time they ask us "so where can I buy one?"          We need to:- launch a website- Gain Ecommerce functionality- Shoot a cool promo video for our home page- Incorporate our business - Pay our graphic designers, web developers, and videographer- cover some of our raw product costs to be able to offer you some rad perks for your     donations. Ok, no B.S., so we need $18,000 by the end of January. The Bottom LineWe live an active lifestyle just like you. WetSeat makes what you are already doing that much more enjoyable and easier to do. It's that simple. We saw a gap in the market and are trying to fill it for you. Become a Brand AmbassadorWe get that some people just can’t contribute, but if you think our product is rad:
Show your friends you support entrepreneurs - share our campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter.... or some new platform that's the next big thing no one over 25 has ever heard about  
Endorse us on Facebook- write us a simple post on WetSeat's Facebook saying you like what we're trying to do and think it's a cool product
And that’s all there is to it.

story:
NEWEST UPDATE

 

SAM SUNG Galaxy S4 will be available in 7th of June!!

 

A lert

While Cookie is out of range (10~20m) from Smartphone, both iCookie and Smartphone will bealerted with Sound.

[Alert on Smartphone is based on its setting of sound or vibration or both]

 

 

 

Radar

Radar displays strength of Bluetooth Radio Signal.

The signal strength is proportional to the distance between iCookie and Smartphone.

 

 

Bleep (Call out)

User can bleep the Cookie from Smartphone or bleep Smartphone from Cookie via pressing Alert button.

 

 

 

Find on M A P

Last location of the lost item is displayed on MAP. So, user can track the last location ,that iCookie is apart from smartphone, so that user can find the lost item.

[location information is from Smartphone location data, such as GPS or network]

 

 

 

Tiny

Icookie is size of US quarter and bottle cap. With its strap, you can place icookie on your suitcase, handbag and key Fob.  One Special thing will be alerting you when your child is out of reach in crowded area, such as shopping mall, Amusement park and etc, with putting your icookie on the cloth of your child. 

 

Stylish

Icookie could be placed with Key Fob of your car, luxury goods or your child. Due to the stylish design of icookie, it will be the best match with your car key, luxury goods and even with your child. Also, it will come with multiple colors for your best match.

 

 

Smart & Easy App

You can use simple icon for each cookie, you want to track.  It can be Child, Key Fob, Bag and any belongs of yours. Connect and name your cookie!!! Not only name, you can also put icon with cookie to find cookie easily on cookie view. 

Find your cookie or find your iphone (bi-directional) 

 

You have to go,, but you don’t know where is car key,,, On icookie App, just touch Key icon to beep the cookie with your keys. Follow the beeping sound, you can easily find your keys.

Also, if you forget to bring out your iphone from your home, you will be alerted via cookie you bring in the range of 10~20m from iphone. 

 

Specification 

Dimension : 33.94 x 31.2 x 7.7

Connectivity : Bluetooth 4.0

Frequency Range : 2402~ 2480 MHz

Distance :  approximate 20m with line of sight

Battery : CR2032 (Coin type battery)

Standby time :  ~ 1 year 

 

Our target

No more missing Child in the world.  First idea of icookie was based on stolen baggage. But during the progress of development, our target becomes more concrete than ever. If icookie and its app are common in the real world, missing child could be alerted and found by anonymous icookie app user.  As a first step, we developed this 1st generation of icookie based on our concept of Tiny (easy-to-carry), Simple and smart.  We did develop proto-type and assess the demand via indiegogo.  Furthermore, we will get tight relationship with early supporter of icookie via indiegogo and share out vision with these supporters.

With initial fund, we will make production working and improve icookie more and more.

story:
!!!UPDATE!!!

We have secured an investor to supplement the funds required for our first order of FreezeFrames from the manufacture. This means no matter what amount we raise   you will receive your FreezeFrame as promised. Please share and tell a freind about FreezeFrame!

UPDATE 2 Please see our launch party testimonials from people that have seen FreezeFrame in action!

FreezeFrame Utilizes SmartFrame Push/Pull Technology 

With our patent pending SmartFrame Technology you can Push Pictures to your FreezeFrame from your Facebook app on your mobile device via your normal Facebook posts and updates.

FreezeFrame can also Pull Pictures from Facebook and surprise you throughout the day with new photos of your favorite friends, loved ones and even pictures from your favorite fan pages! After you complete the simple setup (2-3 min) FreezeFrame now does all the work of keeping your photos up to date! No more excuses for old out dated pictures on your Digital Picture Frame!

FreezeFrame displays photos in either landscape or portrait modes and has several picture layouts to choose from. (showing standard on the left and collage 1 on the right)

FreezeFrame Works With Your Facebook App On Your Mobile Device! See it in Action Below


Gone are the days of copying pictures to a disc or plugging in your digital photo frame to add new pictures! With FreezeFrame you can push pictures directly to the frame right from your Facebook App on your mobile device! No additional software or apps to install. Photos are pushed from Facebook status updates and picture posts to your FreezeFrame automatically. You can even send photos to your FreezeFrame(s) discreetly so only you and your FreezeFrame will have access to them.  

How FreezeFrame Works


FreezeFrame is brought to you by PictureCrazy and is an extension of their cutting edge Facebook photo streaming and screensaver apps. PictureCrazy works dynamically with Facebook letting you create your own custom photo albums from your Facebook pictures,  your friend’s Facebook pictures and even your favorite fan page pictures then turns them into a beautiful collage or slide show. Once your album(s) are created you can enjoy and share your album(s) via your social channels, email, browser and PictureCrazy custom screensaver apps for Mac and PC. Oh and did we mention that PictureCrazy.com is free :) To see a sample of a streaming album created by PictureCrazy from the Facebook pictures from the Indiegogo Facebook page click here, or better yet to create your own album for free go to PictureCrazy.com and login with Facebook and then click "Create Album".

FreezeFrame will take it a step further and allow you to seamlessly push your favorite Facebook memories to your very own Freezeframe and automatically display your favorite photos anyplace you would a normal picture frame.  Then imagine you and your friends and family reminiscing over your photos on your very own FreezeFrame.

Using your FreezeFrame couldn't be easier. Plug it in, log onto your Wi-Fi connection, register your frame with PictureCrazy.com , choose your pictures and albums. Then watch the magic happen as your pictures start appearing before your eyes on your FreezeFrame. That’s all there is to it, no clunky set up, no special apps or software, no cards or cables to plug into your computer. Just Set it and Forget it. From now on FreezeFrame does all the work of keeping your pictures updated.

So who’s a FreezeFrame Fanatic?

Everybody of course!  FreezeFrame is perfect for your friends, family, and yes, even grandma. Whether or not your grandma has a Facebook account or not, you can still get her a FreezeFrame and push your family photos to it for her to enjoy via WiFi. 

Grandparents Love FreezeFrame

Or imagine you go on vacation and leave the kids at home. You can have a Freezeframe for them that you can push all of your pictures to from your vacation destination. It's almost like they are there with you... Almost!

Kids Love FreezeFrame

The Bells and Whistles

Okay, now we get to the fun stuff: Specifications and Functions.

FreezeFrame Technical Specifications:

  • ARM Cortex-A9 DUAL-CORE 1.5GProcessor
  • Android Operating System
  • Custom FreezeFrame Firmware (Fully Upgradable)
  • 1GB RAM Memory
  • 2GB Internal Flash Memory (up to 15,000 pictures)
  • SD Memory slot (to hold even more pictures)
  • Built-in 802.11b/g/n WiFi
  • Large 8” Full Color Display Screen
  • 800 x 600 Screen Resolution
  • Speakers (for music and alarm clock features)
  • Wireless Remote Control (manual buttons on back of FreezeFrame also)
  • Wall mountable

Functions:

  • Exrtremely Simple Setup
  • Push Pictures from Facebook Mobile App
  • Automatically Pulls Pictures From Facebook
  • New Picture Notification (FreezeFrame alerts you when new pictures have been added)
  • Control Pictures and albums via the remote control
  • Multiple Photo Layouts
  • Multiple Transition Effects
  • Portrait / Landscape Sensor to adjust orientation on the fly
  • SmartAlbums
  • Alarm Clock functions
  • Energy Saving Settings
  • Manage FreezeFrame Remotely. Great for Grandparents or family overseas 


About Us


 PictureCrazy and FreezeFrame started as one of those “wouldn't it be nice if” moments. Our family was on vacation and were all posting our pictures to Facebook and Dad says, wouldn't it be nice if our vacation pictures could automatically be sent to a picture frame for us to enjoy back home. Well when we got home Dad went to all of our Facebook accounts. He tried to track down all the vacation pictures on our Facebook pages so he could download and add them manually to a picture frame. After about an hour of that Dad’s veins were popping out of his head with frustration. Surely he thought there must be an app for this as this process was tedious and anything but fun. To his surprise there were no apps out there for creating dynamic albums from multiple Facebook user’s accounts. Dad being a seasoned entrepreneur saw this not only as a family business opportunity but also as an opportunity to teach his kids hands on about the entrepreneurial process. Our family has worked together on PictureCrazy and FreezeFrame from conception, to product design and functionality to writing the technical specifications, working with the developers and R&D.  

Open Source Technology

FreezeFrame is built on Android, an open source operating system technology and we want to keep this spirit alive. We know that untied we can offer a better product and welcome the communities input on how we can make PictureCrazy and FreezeFrame even better! We will be offering an API for users and partners to plug into our SmartFrame aggregation engine as well as being able to integrate with our FreezeFrame firmware. If you have ideas how to make PictureCrazy and FreezeFrame even better, or if you’re interested in working with us on developing this open source API please Click Here  and let us know about your idea. We will then let users vote on the best ideas and will address the ideas in the order of popularity. If you do not want to wait for this process or you have an idea on a partnership and you would like to get started ASAP. We will have a Partners Backers Pledge to secure your position for this. Please  email us at info@picturecrazy.com first before pledging on this to make sure your idea is feasible both economically and functionality wise. We look forward to hearing all of your ideas!

Beyond The $150,000 Goal

Reaching our goal of $150K is just the beginning! With your help in spreading the word about our Indiegogo project we would like to make FreezeFrame even cooler than it already is, with more options and functions listed below. The cool thing is that these additional options and features will not affect delivery time of the FreezeFrames as our FreezeFrame firmware is fully upgradable! So please share the FreezeFrame project with everybody you know and let’s make these dreams a reality!

250K  Instagram!!

We know there are a bunch of Instagram lovers out there. We want to make your FreezeFrame work with Instagram like it already does with Facebook. We have already researched the API and this can be done. You will be able to add pictures just like you can now with Facebook with some added features like display the most popular and recent photos etc.  Being that Instgrams pictures are square we will also be adding special layouts and effects just for Instagram pictures! So let's make it happen!

$300K 10 Inch FreezeFrame is here!

Once we reach 300K the 10.1 Inch FreezeFrame will be a reality! This larger 1024x600 pixel full color display will display your memories like never before! This larger size screen will also have some special album layout designed especially for this larger screen!
Indiegogo Price $169 Expected Retail $225

Already ordered one of our 8 inch FreezeFrames? Well not to worry. We will adding upgrade pledge's for $20(per frame) to be able to upgrade from the 8” to the 10.1” Or you can get one of each!

$450K  HUGE 12 Inch FreezeFrame!

Once we reach 450K we will bring on the huge 12” FreezeFrame. This giant full color display with 800x600 resolution will blow your socks off and will surely be your centerpiece display.

Indiegogo Price $199 Expected Retail $269

Already ordered one of our 8”or 10” FreezeFrames? Well not to worry. We will add upgrade pledges (8” to 12” upgrade for $50) and (10” to 12” upgrade for $30)(per frame). Or rather then upgrade you can even buy one of each!

Risks and challenges

We want everybody out there on Indiegogo to be 100% confident that we will deliver on our promises. This is not a pipe dream or some quirky idea we just dreamt up and thought we would post to see if anybody was interested in backing. We have proven our concept with fully functional prototypes and have manufacturers standing by to start production immediately.  We have our web portal fully launched and ready to connect to the FreezeFrames you can see it for yourself at www.picturecrazy.com. We have done our homework and know what our costs are down to the postage stamp to send you your FreezeFrame including the sales tax we will need to pay . Every penny we raise will be put towards honoring our commitment to you our backers. Not some fancy office to show off, or a bunch of nonsense like that. So please back our project so we can send you your very own FreezeFrame!

TESTIMONIALS:

story:
June 8th update:

Hey Everyone! We are testing our final SW candidate and waiting on our final version of mechanics to arrive. Stay tuned. Will provide another update late next week. 

Thanks, 

LTS

 

Weekend UPDATE!

Come see us at the World Beer Festival hosted by All About Beer in Columbia, SC! This Saturday!!! Get there, have some beers, get our TV TAP! 

Who's talking about us

 

     

 

 

TV Tap - Revolutionary Tap Handle with Colorful Display

 

Get Your Beer the Attention it Deserves with TV Tap

 

                        

 

Overview

TV Tap is kicking off a revolution in the custom beer branding!

An exciting new opportunity to communicate your message to bar patrons with every pour!

Get your beer noticed with the TV Tap!

Display your own vibrant video and images right at the tap with the TV Tap's colorful, integrated LCD. Tell the story of your beer and make your beer a topic of conversation!

Get your beer the attention it deserves with TV Tap!

TV Tap's revolutionary tap handle design is an industry first, offering bar owners and home brewers the opportunity to easily upload and display personalized video and images to beer drinkers right at the tap! Use TV Tap's integrated display to enhance your beer's brand.

 

How TV Tap Works:

            

Picture/Video Upload:

Simply upload your photos or video to our website from any smartphone, tablet or PC and your content will be quickly formatted and delivered to your tap handle's integrated SD memory card.

Supported File Formats: 

.avi, .mov, mp4, .jpeg

For customers who prefer, we can provide instructions for saving video directly to the TV Tap without using our website. 

                         

             

TV Tap Handle Specs:

  • 5200mAH Li-Ion
  • 15 - 18 hours run time
  • 15 frame per second video capability

               

 

TV Tap Handle Includes:

  • 4GB SD Card included
  • Charge with USB micro cable
  • Kitted with USB cable and USB wall charger 

                                               

Perks:

                                   

Project Timeline:

      

FAQ:

                       

The Team:  

We love electronics and we wanted a tap handle capable of having some extra bling that could describe our brew with more flare than a traditional handle.

Recommendations:

“When we first displayed these LCD Tap Handles at HomebrewCon 2016 the response was tremendous.  People LOVED them and were trying to purchase our demo units that day during the entire conference.  Well made with beautiful picture quality, these are a must-have for any home brewer!”  -Ron Rivers, President at Love2Brew.

"During a trial of the beer tap handle in our Detroit tap room we experienced great results.  On one of our popular brands we experienced a lift of nearly 50% during the trial period.  The tap handle generated significant "buzz" with our guests and drew immediate curiosity."  Bob, Atwater Brewery

 

Help get the word out about our amazing TV Tap Handle!

15 frame per second video capability


               
 
TV Tap Handle Includes:

4GB SD Card included
Charge with USB micro cable
Kitted with USB cable and USB wall charger 

                                                
Perks:
                                    
Project Timeline:
       
FAQ:
                        
The Team:  
We love electronics and we wanted a tap handle capable of having some extra bling that could describe our brew with more flare than a traditional handle.
Recommendations:
“When we first displayed these LCD Tap Handles at HomebrewCon 2016 the response was tremendous.  People LOVED them and were trying to purchase our demo units that day during the entire conference.  Well made with beautiful picture quality, these are a must-have for any home brewer!”  -Ron Rivers, President at Love2Brew.
"During a trial of the beer tap handle in our Detroit tap room we experienced great results.  On one of our popular brands we experienced a lift of nearly 50% during the trial period.  The tap handle generated significant "buzz" with our guests and drew immediate curiosity."  Bob, Atwater Brewery
 
Help get the word out about our amazing TV Tap Handle!

story:
Do you like to meet new people?

Everyone does right! but the real question is"how to meet new people of your choice?"

Not possible right... Well now it is !!

You have up till now discovered people based on their name. location, school, college or workplace.

Introducing DIKY (Do I Know You), where you can discover and connect with people basis their personality. 


Try DIKY now


How do we ensure these tags are justified for every person... 

Simple, DIKY is built on a proprietary algorithm which asks your personality traits (loving, kind, trustworthy etc) and the activities you like to do (Travel, foodie, Sports etc) from your friends and family in a very unique way - the reverse social network effect. 

Why FRIENDS AND FAMILY?

Because they are the ones who know you the best !!

Thus making it super easy for you to discover people around you, authentically and with just a single swipe, for the activity of your choice.


Why is it a Reverse Social Network?

We call DIKY reverse because here your profile depends on the kind of social perception you have among your friends and family and is crowd sourced from them. With DIKY you can "Be Known" for who you are, and "Be Discovered" for the same, where ever you go.


5 awesome things you can do on DIKY




Try DIKY now






Try DIKY now


Bonus 1 - DIKY.me - Your own crowd sourced webpage which can be unlocked as soon as you reach the Explorer badge. Get your DIKY.me and share what your friends and family think about your personality with the world.


Bonus 2 - DIKY BudZ - DIKY BudZ are special characters created by us which help you in understanding the questions about your friends better. They come in different shapes and sizes and all doing different activities which help make answering the questions more FUN !!

What support we need ?

We are team of 12 people - 5 co founders and 6 employees who are building DIKY since May. We need $5000 more to test and release the full version i.e. "Discover new people around you of your choice".

Where does the $5000 go?


"Since we are a social network being built with love in India, we thought why not give an authentic Indian flavour to our Indiegogo supporters :) when you choose to back us"

Lal10

Thus we decided to line up some cool stuff for you with our rewards partner Lal10




Try DIKY now

If you can't contribute with money, no sweat!  There are still a few great ways you can really help us make DIKY big:

  • Get the word out!  Use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends and family about the project.
  • Give us feedback.  We LOVE feedback because we constantly strive to improve for our amazing users.  So tell us what you think of the campaign, the perks, or anything!

Thank you for your support!

story:
Laptop has almost become an essential tool in modern life. For the purposes of work and entertainment, we often need to carry it around. However, while the laptop itself is getting thinner and lighter, its power adapter still remains heavy and bulky, inconvenient for carrying. Even if the laptop comes with a built-in battery, users seldom leave the adapter home.

Now, we present you the Laptop mate, a compact laptop adapter which can easily solve this problem. Most importantly, its price is very low, allowing you to enjoy an extremely convenient product at an affordable price.

What is Laptop mate？

Laptop mate 65W Tiny Adapter is really the classic example of what the generation potable adapter could get. The small and light machine can power your ultrabook/notebook, tablet PC or camera or mobile phone at the same time with 18V/21V output.


If our sales can reach $50000, we will provide you with more color options.

Features:

· Potable design

· Dimensions  69x49x24 mm

· Weight (w/o DC wire)  93g

· Weight (w/ DC wire)  146g

· 8 DC tips for 90% brand laptop

· Universal AC input 100-240V

· Flipping AC plug with flexible 180cm DC wire

· Complies with Energy Star level V

· Complies with EN60950; EN55022: 1998, +A1: 2000, +A2: 2003, Class B; CISPR   22: 2003, Class B

· MTBF  100,000 hours

Bring you a mobile lifestyle

You can leave your original adapter home, while carrying this one around for work, business trip and travel. You can put it easily into your bag and even your pocket!

Isn’t it a perfect mate for your laptop?

Laptop mate is designed to work with all major laptop brands and a majority of today's laptops. 

Laptop mate works with laptops that have a voltage of 18 - 21V* AND a power level of ≤65 watts.

Please note: Make sure to use the INPUT voltage/current on the laptop label and/or the OUTPUT voltage/current on the adapter label.

We’re a bit sorry that this adapter is not yet compatible with MacBook, but we will bring you a real universal adapter in the near future. We hope you can help us to achieve this goal, and we’re confident of offering you with better products!

How to confirm whether the Laptop mate is compatible with your laptop? Please refer to the picture below, take out your laptop adapter, and check the underlining data in red color. If your output data is: 18V-21V 65W, then you will be able to use our product. If you cannot confirm whether this product is good for you, please tell us your laptop brand and model.


How the Funds will be Used

The funds raised will go towards tooling, purchasing of raw materials, production, and shipping. We have finalized the design, qualified and selected our manufacturer, and have even completed basic tooling. Production will begin in October.

Production Plan

Our product has passed most of the quality certifications, so the delivery time will be greatly shortened, allowing you to receive this product as soon as possible.

We've also completed a small production run in order to plan and prepare for every possible delay and problem that may occur throughout the manufacturing process. However with any project, unanticipated obstacles may arise and we will be transparent and open about any hurdles that come up and constantly keep our backers updated.

story:
eCozy officially started shipping to our Indiegogo community from Sept, 22!

Here you can see the process in details: 

Be sure to check out the completely new website and follow eCozy on Instagram!

eCozy received the Red Dot Award 2015!

_________________________________________________________________________

_________________________________________________________________________

eCozy is a water-radiator thermostat that is practical in everyday-usage and beautiful. The only heating solution that can finally become a visual improvement of your home.

A thermostat you don't want to hide.

We shaped the forms and worked with different materials, so that it fits perfectly in every environment: from a modern, contemporary studio or office, to a cozy cabin, somewhere in the Norwegian woods.

 

 

 

What’s behind the form? 

eCozy was created to help you save. Period.

 

  • cut your heating bill by almost 30%
  • save worlds resources (consume less energy)
  • optimize heating patterns & costs

 

 

 

We said it: with eCozy we aim to be part of the global initiative for energy saving.

There is no need to heat an empty home! eCozy will prevent you from doing that. 

Thanks to special energy-saving heating algorithms you will not only save almost 30% of your annual heating bill*, but also forget the pain of adjusting your thermostat each time you want to leave the house: eCozy will know that you’re away as soon as you left your apartment!

*according to International Energy Agency (IEA): an average yearly heating bill in Germany amounted to 1800 EUR for a 90-100 m² apartment in 2013.

 

In October 2014, eCozy’s heating algorithms were recognized as innovative by the Bavarian Ministry of Economic Affairs and Media, Energy and Technology.

 

Smart algorithms that were developed to serve one purpose: to help you save.

 

 

eCozy Heating Solution consists of three components: Thermostat, App & Central Unit (CU), that serves as a control hub for all eCozy thermostats in your home.

 

 

We want to highlight the simplicity and usefulness of eCozy. And if people share our passion for the product – we will receive feedback for further product attributes.

 

The benefits of an eCozy Smart Heating Solution:

 

  • empowers you with advanced smart home features
  • greatly improves your energy saving
  • looks modern and is extremely easy to use

 

Let's take a look at some of the features: remote control at first.

 

You can access your home heating with the eCozy App - no matter where you are!
No need to freeze - heat up your rooms, before coming home from a winter’s walk.

Pssst! We want to share it with you: Apple Watch support will be provided as well.

Effective heating algorhythms - a feature that you will love! Choose a heating option for each of your rooms - eCozy already knows the perfect temperature.

Oh! The Central Unit can easily serve as a cozy lighting solution for your room.

 

 

Place it vertically or horizontally - it will suit your apartment perfectly.

Currently one Central Unit supports up to 15 thermostats.
 
And there is only one rule to remember: one eCozy thermostat per each water radiator. If you have 3 water radiators at home - you need the eCozy Comfort Kit (3T+CU). You can always buy as many additional thermostats as you need!

 

 

In this campaign we introduce the product with all its attributes and potential savings. We want to show that behind eCozy stands a passionate team.

The team behind eCozy

 

 


“In the past 15 years as an engineer in continuous optimization of systems, increasing efficiencies and decreasing waste, working among others with Linde Engineering and Munich Re, I strived to apply my expertise in engineering & information technology and build a product that would enhance people's live"
 
Andre Kholodov | CEO, eCozy
 
eCozy is designed to suit your life and ease your daily routine. We went through many prototypes (both on the Thermostat and the Central Unit):

 

 

And presented our product at IFA 2014 in Berlin

We created a product you would desire. eCozy is designed with care. For you!

 

Why we need your support

We only can make it forward with you. We know that you can give us important feedback. And we want to listen to you, before placing the first production order.

eCozy is currently in the pre-production phase and with your help we aim to raise an amount of 30.000 USD, as we need this funding to launch the production.

With every additional contribution, our team will be able to:

 

  • Speed up the production process & reduce the time to market
  • Increase efficiency of production & reduce the overall costs

The more supporters we get – the faster we can ship eCozy to you!

     

     

     

     

     

    With your help, we can manufacture the product and roll it out to the markets worldwide much faster. With eCozy we aim to contribute to overall reduction of energy wasting and reduce global warming. Help us bring eCozy to the world!

    And we prepared some great prizes for your support. Take a look and pick yours!

     

     

     

     

    We provide 24-month warranty for each eCozy product.

    You will get the product before anyone else and before the official sales will start (a higher retail price). And before you will make a decision - we want to thank you!

     

    Media inquiries: press@ecozy.de — Press Kit.

     

    Hey! If you can't back us, you can still help just by:

    • spreading the campaign link among your friends
    • get rid of your old thermostat
    • save money, be in control of heating expenses
    • heat your home only if you need to!

    If you really like what we do, consider backing our campaign — the eCozy team.

     

    Tech Specs

     

    - eCozy Thermostat

     

    • Range of the indoor temperature – from +8°C to +30˚C
    • Number of measurement channels – 1
    • Number of control channels – 1
    • Temperature measurement accuracy – ± 1˚C
    • Accuracy of temperature maintenance – ± 1°C
    • Temperature setting step – 1°C
    • Power supply – 4 AA Batteries

    - Thermostat Hardware

     

    • Texas Instruments MSP430 Ultra-low power microcontroller
    • Touch panel control based on AT42QT2100 by Atmel
    • OLED Display color 64x96 pixels
    • Frequency signal – 2.4 GHz. ZigBee
    • ZigBee Home Automation Profile 1.2
    • Valve control – stepper motor (noiseless)
    • Size – 74х74х107 mm

    - Central Unit Hardware

     

    • 32-bit ARM processor AT91SAM9G25 by Atmel
    • Power supply voltage – 220-240 V AC 50/60 Hz
    • Consumption in standby mode Max. – 0.75 W
    • Signal frequency upper level – 2.4 GHz (WiFi)
    • Frequency signal lower level – 2.4 GHz (ZigBee)
    • ZigBee Home Automation Profile 1.2
    • Distance to the device – up to 100 meters
    • Max number of devices – up to 15 thermostats now (later up to 255)
    • Power of the radio signal – <1 mW
    • Size – 125х125х25 mm

    - Package (eCozy Kit)

     

    • eCozy Central Unit
    • eCozy thermostat(s)
    • Adapter set for different water radiator types
    • User’s manual

     

    FAQ

     

    How many thermostats do I need for my home?

    Depends on how many rooms you would like to equip with eCozy, however no more than one thermostat per each water heating radiator.

    Does the eCozy heating solution work without the Central Unit?

    You need to have at least one Central Unit in your apartment/house.

    Where do you deliver?

    We are delivering worldwide. Please note the shipping rates in each perk.

    Will the eCozy App support Android/iOS?

    The eCozy App supports Android and iOS devices.

    What energy savings can I expect from eCozy?

    With eCozy you are able to save up to 30% on heating costs.

    How do eCozy smart algorithms work?

    Depending on factors, like room's size, the outside temperature, time in which heating was not previously used, personal habits  - due to repetitive manual settings, eCozy creates a mathematical model of the environment, whereupon the temperature curve with each cycle gets more and more accurate, and thus reduces heating costs and increases energy saving. eCozy automatically downloads information regarding the current outdoor temperature and weather forecast  from the Internet.

    How do I install eCozy?

    First of all you have to connect your Central Unit with power supply and after that - connect it with your Wi-Fi. When the Central Unit is connected with your Wi-Fi network, you can install your thermostats (one per water heating radiator). You have to dismantle your old thermostat, and install the eCozy thermostat. Switch it on - it will find the Central Unit automatically. When the eCozy Thermostat(s) is/are connected with the eCozy Central Unit - the system is ready to use.

    With which home automation systems is eCozy compatible?

    eCozy is fully compatible with Home Automation Profile 1.2 therefore with such platforms like Qivicon, Almond and others. 

    Can I schedule eCozy to work fully automatically?

    Yes. You can easily schedule eCozy to work fully automatically - just set a heating option in the eCozy App.

    In which countries is eCozy supported?

    eCozy will work in every country with water heating radiations (In Europe 97% of households are equipped with water heating radiations). An adapter set for different water radiator types will come with your package (eCozy Kit).

    Which water heating radiators are compatible with eCozy?

    It is possible to mount eCozy on valves fitting the type M30x1.5. Also various adapters for RA, RA/VL, RA/V Danfoss valves are included.

    Do I need to drain radiators to install eCozy or it clips to the existing valve?

    You don't need to drain your water heating radiators, since you don't have to remove any valves. You just dismantle the old thermostat and install eCozy. 
    Look for the installation video (HOW-TO) in our Gallery.
    Risks & Challenges
    We have the engineering and IT background to overcome challenges in sourcing, development and production, as proven in previous projects. Possible challenges we overcome through flat hierarchies, which enable us to have fast communication and from the start - a lean hardware approach.

With which home automation systems is eCozy compatible?
eCozy is fully compatible with Home Automation Profile 1.2 therefore with such platforms like Qivicon, Almond and others. 
Can I schedule eCozy to work fully automatically?
Yes. You can easily schedule eCozy to work fully automatically - just set a heating option in the eCozy App.
In which countries is eCozy supported?
eCozy will work in every country with water heating radiations (In Europe 97% of households are equipped with water heating radiations). An adapter set for different water radiator types will come with your package (eCozy Kit).
Which water heating radiators are compatible with eCozy?
It is possible to mount eCozy on valves fitting the type M30x1.5. Also various adapters for RA, RA/VL, RA/V Danfoss valves are included.
Do I need to drain radiators to install eCozy or it clips to the existing valve?You don't need to drain your water heating radiators, since you don't have to remove any valves. You just dismantle the old thermostat and install eCozy. Look for the installation video (HOW-TO) in our Gallery.Risks & ChallengesWe have the engineering and IT background to overcome challenges in sourcing, development and production, as proven in previous projects. Possible challenges we overcome through flat hierarchies, which enable us to have fast communication and from the start - a lean hardware approach.

story: I'm raising this money so I'm able to play on the TUVA club volleyball. I'm hoping that if I play for them until I am eighteen that I will get a full ride to the college of my choice. It has always been my dream to play college volleyball, and I hope that by playing for TUVA and practicing very hard everyday. With the money you graciously donate I can get a college scholarship.

story:
INHALE Presents the World’s First Smartphone Air Quality Sensor!

Making Air Visible, Personal, and Healthy

 

INHALE takes real-time air quality data from your immediate environment and turns it into actionable recommendations to keep you healthy.

 

 

 

 

 

Need Fresh Air?

For an adult, he/she breathes about 26,000 times and 11,520 liters of air per day. Today’s environment is filled with all kinds of pollution, and with air pollution being one of the most detrimental.

 

Facts

1. Air pollution is the No.1 global health problem1 with 5.5 million premature deaths annually.

2. The risk of an asthma attack increases by more than 50% on polluted days2. 

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC46...

3. The air can be worse inside your home than it is outside3. You spend the majority of your life in your indoors and we all have the right to know if it's a safe environment.

 

 

 

 

 

This is what INHALE does for YOU

 

INHALE works this way

INHALE Sensor measures PM 2.5, Ozone, CO2, humidity, and the temperature of your environment. Then it sends air quality data directly to the INHALE App. The INHALE App presents real-time air quality data + pollen predictions [*All the data is validated by the government], city-wide mapping, and a daily review.  Therefore, it reads air quality wherever you and your phone are.

 

INHALE Sensor

1. INHALE Sensor is a mod for the Moto Z phone, it attaches to the back of the phone and can give you air quality measurements wherever you are.

2. The sensor gives you hyperlocal real-time air quality measurements. Air quality can change from one block to another due to local air pollution sources, such as highways. Therefore its important to have an INHALE sensor to track these changes.

3. Update: optional, extra battery pack built in (1000mAh). The update also includes a temperature and humidity sensor.

 

INHALE App 

INHALE App is in beta testing and will be released soon!

 

1. Visualize Air Quality

Real-time data:

INHALE app, present real-time air quality data within a 1 mile (1.6 km) radius. Functional without the sensor, though lower accuracy

INHALE app in combination with sensor present hyperlocal, real-time air quality data. 
 

Predictions:  
The app cal also predict the outdoor air quality up to 48 hours ahead. For Europe it also include pollen predictions.

 

INHALE takes data from your environment in and turns it into actionable recommendations. Such as when to go outside, which route to take, or when to open your windows for ventilation.

 

2. Investigate Your Daily Exposure

Open up the INHALE app at the end of the day to see your daily exposure levels. The app calculates the exposure level by using the average air quality in areas you have been in and how much time you spent there. This information allows you to investigate what happened throughout the day, and helps future behavioral change.

 

3. Crowdsourced Maps

INHALE empowers you to become a citizen scientist. You will play an important role in building air quality maps of entire cities and countries, all the way down to your local neighborhood. With family, friends and fellow INHALE users, we can all come together and build something that makes a difference.

You can use these maps to plan your route to work, avoid areas with reported allergens, decide where to have a picnic with your family, as well as using the data to promote social change and influence decision makers for better air quality.

INHALE goes everywhere.

 

 

 

 

 

I Need INHALE (hands up!)

1. If you suffer from asthma or allergies, don’t let polluted air make it worse. With INHALE, plan a time to enjoy fresher air and help improve your health.  

2. Biking to work, jogging around your city, or just getting in shape. INHALE helps you avoid exposure to polluted outdoor air and maximize your workout efficiency.

3. Working in the office, studying in school, or spending quality family time at home. Use INHALE to know when to open your windows to let fresh air in, or maybe it’s time to clean up your room!

 

 

 

 

 

Our Mission

 

"Be active, live peacefully and feel the freedom within" - CEO Fredrik Krafft

 

Air pollution is and will still affect you, your family, and your community. Become an advocate of change today. You are a signal to the world.

Our mission is to create a social movement for environmental change. We believe awareness leads to advocacy, which leads to action - helping perpetuate innovation and green technology.

With INHALE, we’re reaching a goal: bring air quality data to every person on Earth. 

 

Do not be overcome with air pollution, but overcome air pollution with INHALE.

 

 

 

 

 

Press

 

 

  

                

           

 

Our Team

 

  • Fredrik Krafft, CEO of INHALE, Masters degree in Mechanical Engineering from USC. Fredrik is a serial entrepreneur with extensive technical expertise in product design. Fredrik has been working on solving this problem for nearly two years and his past experience and network within the startup community helps us better navigate obstacles.

 

  • Patrick Carmody, Business dev, is a senior studying entrepreneurship at USC. Patrick is in charge of the business development and operations. Patrick Carmody is a USC student with access to mentors and University pitch competitions.

 

  • Daniel Silva, CTO, and an expert in Computer Science. Daniel Silva is a full stack developer with experience doing web development for Disney.

 

  • Tudor Iovan, Marketing, is a junior studying Accounting and Finance at the University of the Pacific. He is leading our marketing and data analysis.

 

  • Ben Ma, advisor, is a seasoned strategic planning executive with expertise in both hardware and software solutions.

 

  • Kurt Doelling, advisor, is a veteran supply chain executive with a consistent track record of success in high technology. Also former VP Supply chain on one of the biggest tech companies in the world.

 

Our diverse knowledge, social, and culture make us a strong team.

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

Question: Are Motorola phones the only ones that can use the monitor?

Answer: As of now, we are developing the monitor only for the MOTO Z. However, we are planning to develop a mod for iPhones, and other Android phones in the near future as well.

 

Question: What air quality elements does Inhale detect?

Answer: Inhale is one of the smartest air quality monitors. Not only does the INHALE sensor detect PM2.5, but the INHALE app also tracks pollen and other harmful pollutants, making it ideal for people with allergies. In addition to the pollutants the updated version of the sensor also measure temperature and humidity.

 

Question: When is Inhale coming out for MOTO Z? For other phones?

Answer: Inhale is planning to be out for the MOTO Z as soon as the end of the third quarter of this year. As far as the development for other smartphones, we will release information regarding this before the end of March.

 

Question: Is the App out?

Answer: Not yet. We are still in beta testing.

 

 

 

 

 

Engineering Timeline

 

Current status
We have a functional and validated air quality sensor that can give data to the phone.


3 months
Injection mold tool
Updated PCB layout

5 months
Testing

6 months
Shipping

story:
Introducing the Lundas Tablet Sleeve and Holder

The Lundas Tablet Sleeve and Holder was designed from the ground up and meticulously engineered, offering as a sleeve a good protection for your tablet on the go while being lightweight, and as a holder, easy to turn it into a holder while letting you adjust the best viewing angle for vertical and horizontal use.

Lundas Tablet Sleeve and Holder overcomes the limitation found on almost every holder by giving you more flexibility on the desire viewing angle you want.

A creative, innovative, elegant and trendy designed sleeve, with durability, temperature isolation and every day use conditions in mind makes Lundas Tablet Sleeve and Holder a great option for your tablet. Available in four sizes: 6", 7",  8" and 10" (inches) and 10 different colors in two different fabrics.

Available for pre-order exclusively on Indiegogo.

 

 

Features

Lundas Sleeve turns into a Tablet Holder which can be adjusted to meet different viewing angles and hold your tablet on vertical and horizontal position.

Key Features:

  • Vertical and Horizontal Tablet Holder
  • Use it on your lap as well as any flat surface
  • Slick design
  • Selected fabrics and colors on the outside and plush fabric on the inside for screen protection
  • Easy to use, easy to open and close (snaps)
  • Lightweight to carry

Filled with a custom made foam which turns into:

  • Tablet Protection
  • Increased Temperature isolation 
  • Flexible as well as adjustable
  • Lightweight
  • Longlasting

IMPORTANT NOTICE: It will securely hold your tablet on your lap or other flat surfaces provided that the tablet is on balance, having been tested that -5 to 5 degrees are safe side angles.

 

How it works?

 

Models and Sizes

Our sleeves will fit the major tablets available on the market are listed below.

Lundas 6”

  • nook Glow
  • Kindle White

Lundas 7”

  • Amazon Fire HD 7
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab 4
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab E Lite 7
  • Google Nexus 7
  • Lenovo Tab 3 A7
  • Huawei MediaPad X2 7.0
  • nook 7 HD

Lundas 8”

  • Apple iPad Mini (all models),
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 NOOK 8, 8.0 and Tab 4
  • Amazon Fire 
  • Dell Venue 8 
  • Toshiba Encore 2 Write WT8PE-B264
  • Lenovo Yoga Tab 3 8
  • NVIDIA Shield K1 
  • ASUS ZenPad 8.0
  • Acer Iconia Tab 8 
  • LG G Pad II 8.0 

Lundas 10”

  • Apple iPad (1, 2, 3, Air and Pro 9.7)
  • Microsoft Surface 2, 3, Pro 3 and Pro 4
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 9.7
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab E NOOK 9.6
  • Kindle Fire HD 10
  • Google Pixel C
  • Google Nexus 9 
  • Sony Xperia Z4 
  • LG G Pad II 10”
  • Lenovo Yoga Tab 2 and 3 10”
  • ASUS Zenpad 10 
  • HP TouchPad 9.7"
  • Nokia Lumia 2520 4G LTE

 

How to get them

Just become a backer of this project by clicking on the Perk you want, select the size and color you desire and enter your payment info when asked. 

If you want multiple sleeves in different sizes or colors, simply repeat those steps for each additional item you want. All your orders will ship together and delivered on the date stated on each Perk.

 

What We Need & What You Get

With the funds we will start production. Is hard to know if your product will be liked and loved by others as we do, as well as the production quantities both in color and sizes, so you'll be who will show us the way to go! 

All products to be delivered on the North Hemisphere will be produced in the USA, and those corresponding to the South Hemisphere, in Argentina.

You can get this versatile, comfortable, lightweight and protective Table Sleeve and Holder and start enjoying some basic things as using your tablet in your lap and in vertical position! No matter if the goal is met, we will produce the quantities contributors asked for!

 

Our Story

We are a party of two technology lovers who've been heavy users for more than 30 years and passionate about design and gadgets. As a hobby we met on weekends to build gadgets that ended up as gifts to family, friends and sometimes ourselves.

Last year we designed this protective, lightweight and very easy to use Tablet Sleeve and Holder which we've used and tested extensively  and It was this particular gadget that made our small pack of fans to convince us to get it to the market.

We teamed up with a group of industrial designers and manufacturers that gave us the experience and advise we needed to succeed.

We are actually selling our products in Argentina and the success we had on our hometown encouraged us to sell it abroad.

 We hope you like Lundas Tablet Sleeve and Holder and enjoy it as we do!

story:
Smart Loyalty Programs

Automatic rebates applied instantly at the register  .. fast, fun, Free and Easy.

 

Build a community of relationships where "Thank-You" makes cents.

No Cards, and just one account to rule them all … Now That’s Smart.

Smart takes care of everything … Nice and Easy.

 

NO Silly Point Tracking and Redeeming, NO Emails to printout.

You just get the reward amount applied directly to your purchase instantly.

 

Get Smart Today !

www.SmartLoyaltyPrograms.com

 

MERCHANTS:

Merchants start their membership and receive a shiny new tablet in a handsome stand to place at their register.  There are several SMART Loyalty Programs from which to choose.  Offer as many as you like ... touch a button and enter the terms.  Customers pick their favorite offer, make purchases, and cash out as usual.  SMART tracks it all and shows the status of everything along the way.  It shows how much more to spend before the rebate is awarded to the purchase, and even applies the reward amount leftover to spend at your store.  Review performance criteria and make changes as often you like to find what works best for Your customers.

 

CUSTOMERS:

Your SMART Customer account is FREE and applies across all SMART Merchants.  Easily find them on the SMART phone app, website, or through the SMART Social Community.  Pick your favorite programs offered at the SMART Terminal and continue making purchases.  Your rewards are applied to your purchase automatically...SMART takes care of everything.  It is fun to check your programs status at each merchant through the SMART phone app to make purchase towards the rewards you "want next".  

 

Get SMART Today !

www.SmartLoyaltyPrograms.com

 

 

Let's get social ....

www.twitter.com/SmartLoyalty

www.facebook.com/SmartLoyaltyPrograms.com

story:
Introduction

There is nothing worse that discovering that there is no place to change your baby at a restaurant or other business.  Most municipalities in the United States do not require any sort of changing accommodation to be provided for children in restrooms.  We want to change that, not through increased regulation but instead through social pressure on businesses that do not provide essential services for families.  Our website and soon to be integrated phone app allow for parents to make informed decisions about where they choose to eat or shop.  They can also find the closest place to change their child in a pinch. 

We're excited about our campaign site for changingtablelocator.com and hope you will consider a donation.  We are two parents who noticed the same problem and came together to help parents be proactive about a solution.  As parents, this issue is important to us as is keeping this information available to everyone.  So far, this entire project has been one of pure love, work and personal contribution.  Ideally, we’d love the site to pay for itself and maybe one day make a few dollars.

What We Need & What You Get

Where the money will go:

We need about $6000 to fully integrate our website with a phone application.  This will make it easier for parents to find and submit locations on the go!  (We do plan on a minimal charge for the app in order to help pay for ongoing updates and maintenance.)  All of our funding will go to these causes and if we don’t reach our goal, we’ll get as much work done as we can afford.

Perks you can get:

  • We have awesome keychain size containers of wet wipes with our logo that can clip to your diaper bag that you can get for a small $15 donation.

  • For $30, you can get an awesome bumper sticker. 

  • For $50, we have some great Medibuddy first aid kits to share with you along with a bumper sticker.

  • For $100 and $250 donations, which are limited, you have the option of receiving a hand knit item from one of our founders as a thank you gift. Pictures will be put up soon.
  • For $250 donations, also receive a diaper cover from our cafepress store. 

  • For large donations, you get exclusive sponsorship on our website or application.  Your name or company name will appear as the sponsor of the website or application for 6 months exclusively.

The Impact

Your donation has the potential to impact parents everywhere, increasing their quality of life and helping convince corporations that their customers, even the tiniest ones, are important. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Spread the word about our campaign and website.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share the campaign.
  • Purchase a product on our online store (see www.changingtablelocator.com coming soon)
  • Submit a location or two to the website to help us increase the accuracy of our database. 

Thank you so much for your support!
story_txt:
Introduction
There is
nothing worse that discovering that there is no place to change your baby at a
restaurant or other business.  Most municipalities in the United States do
not require any sort of changing accommodation to be provided for children in
restrooms.  We want to change that, not through increased regulation but
instead through social pressure on businesses that do not provide essential
services for families.  Our website and soon to be integrated phone app
allow for parents to make informed decisions about where they choose to eat or
shop.  They can also find the closest
place to change their child in a pinch.  
We're
excited about our campaign site for changingtablelocator.com and hope you will
consider a donation.  We are two parents who noticed the same problem and
came together to help parents be proactive about a solution.  As parents,
this issue is important to us as is keeping this information available to
everyone.  So far, this entire project
has been one of pure love, work and personal contribution.  Ideally, we’d love the site to pay for itself
and maybe one day make a few dollars.
What We Need & What You Get
Where the
money will go:We need about $6000 to fully
     integrate our website with a phone application.  This will make it
     easier for parents to find and submit locations on the go!  (We do plan on a minimal charge for the
     app in order to help pay for ongoing updates and maintenance.)  All of our funding will go to these
     causes and if we don’t reach our goal, we’ll get as much work done as we
     can afford.Perks you
can get:

We have awesome keychain size containers of
     wet wipes with our logo that can clip to your diaper bag that you can get
     for a small $15 donation.

For $30, you can get an
     awesome bumper sticker.  

For $50, we have some great
     Medibuddy first aid kits to share with you along with a bumper sticker.

For $100 and $250 donations,
     which are limited, you have the option of receiving a hand knit item from
     one of our founders as a thank you gift. Pictures will be put up soon.

For $250 donations, also receive a diaper cover from our cafepress store.  
For large donations, you get
     exclusive sponsorship on our website or application.  Your name or company name will appear as
     the sponsor of the website or application for 6 months exclusively. 

The Impact
Your
donation has the potential to impact parents everywhere, increasing their
quality of life and helping convince corporations that their customers, even
the tiniest ones, are important.  
Other Ways You Can Help
Some
people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Spread the word about our
     campaign and website.
Use the Indiegogo share
     tools to share the campaign.
Purchase a product on our
     online store (see www.changingtablelocator.com coming soon)
Submit a location or two to
     the website to help us increase the accuracy of our database.  
Thank you
so much for your support!

story:
Campaign Fully Funded !!

Dear campaign followers and contributors. I am happy to say that the campaign was Fully Funded and exceeded any expectations i had for it. Many perks (orders) were made for the machine as well as partial systems. Additionally i received great support for smaller perks which shall help a lot with with the 3D printer as well as the OSRC project.

A News post shall be made with a more detailed report on the plan ahead on the Ilios website www.ilios3d.com, where i shall describe all steps and time frames for all activities and final shipments.

I would like to thank once again everyone for their support and belief in me and the work i do. It is a great honor and pleasure to be able to help out others through out my own creations, which is what i intend to to for many years to come.

Since all future activity of both projects (Ilios 3D printer and OSRC) shall be made on the official Ilios 3D website i welcome you all to make your selves comfortable there and begin writing Blogs on your own builds, discuss topics in the Forum and comment on anything you see fit. Also please don't forget about the Facebook page and Twitter.

Once again i thank everyone for your support. If you have an inquiry which you need to send personally to me then don't hesitate to do so through the "Contact Us" link on the website (top right corner) and i shall reply and help out as soon as possible.

About the project

This campaign and the project it self was created out of a necessity. I designed and prototyped a system called OSRC which is an Open Source Remote Control for UAV, Helicopter, Airplane and many other models. However, due to the complexity of the system and a pretty low budget left after its creation, manufacturing parts for the project through 3D printing was the only solution realistic enough. I never thought that i would be building my own 3D printer since there are many solutions already available that create 3D models out of extruded plastic or even SLA printers that can produce amazing results.

After many days of research and quote requests from suppliers of these amazing systems it became clear that the equipment i need to do my own production was too expensive based on my specs and the ones already available, low cost DLP printers were although great in their own right, build small areas and are far from the accuracy i needed.

If you want to contribute to the cause directly or make a large contribution, please contact me directly though the www.ilios3d.com website.

Since my end goal is to actually use my 3D printer and build models on a daily basis, with end dimensions and results just as accurate as it appears on the design software, creating yet another copy with parts that are commonly used for DIY applications was not the way to go. I need something that can be as rigid as possible, use the most accurate and reliable hardware available and produce the same result every time. Imagine if you design a PCB and the clearance is even 0.1mm off when you try to fit it inside an enclosure. In a complex mechanical design, accuracy and reliability means everything. It is far cheaper to build something reliable rather than trying to tweak it for days and days, loosing time energy and not working on your original idea.

Please note that there is no additional pricing to parts for any order since if i at least get 3 orders for the machine i can build the system for my self from spare parts and save on shipping for getting all required electronics and additional hardware.

If you are interested in the OSRC system and claim the €20 or more perk, you get to be among the first to get the system when it is shipped since initial quantities shall be limited.

Additionally, for those who get the Frame, Frame and mechanics or the full set shall NOT be charged for the OSRC system enclosure costs if they wish to purchase it once the product is released. Just don't forget to mention it once purchasing the system and the price shall be added the relative discount. I will also keep a record of all contributors for this purpose.

What is different about this?

There are 4 main aspects that the Ilios 3D printer takes into account. Large Build Area, Rigid Construction, High Precision Components, Versatile & Customizable Design.

The main consideration for any low budget project is the price. Since i am an engineer, i can say with certainty that for the same price as an already available system i can build something better and fit it to my own purpose with parts and techniques which would allow for a reliable end result.

In reality i am not reinventing the wheel here. DLP 3D printers have been around for a long time and there are great communities and even instructions on how to make your very own 3D printer. However, using parts that are as accurate as possible and outsourcing all the small details as well as putting it all together is quite different, especially if your specifications need to exceed what is available for a low budget.

 

The specifications which i require my self for day to day manufacturing and what the 3D printer can do are as follows:

  • Z axis completely Ball Screw driven on 2 separate slides
  • Z axis based on High Accuracy linear slides
  • Z axis driven on both ends for greater reliability
  • Z axis Repeat accuracy(not actual accuracy which is greater) less than 0.01mm on a length of 300mm
  • Maximum Build Area of 230mm(x) x 260mm(y) x 300mm(z)
  • Layer Thickness 12 microns (with a basic 200 step per revolution motor)
  • Movable Material VAT on a separate slide for tilt and removal
  • Room for up to 2 x 1080p DLP projectors for a Split-Screen result
  • All Aluminum frame and metal support construction

In a system like this, the most important parts are the Z axis and the actual projection of the image. Since there are no more moving parts these two factors need to be as reliable and accurate as possible.

There are many ways to actually make a sliding actuator and the most common is to use brass bearings and a shaft which in most cases is enough. In our case however the best solution is needed and ball bearing slides with a high accuracy shaft is the way to go. There are 3 slides in total on the machine. 2 slides are raising the platform for the Z axis and a third is actuating the material vat. The container with the material needs to slightly tilt every layer since the resin it self tends to stick after each curing cycle.

Besides the actual sliding mechanism you also need to move the platform. The common way to do this with accuracy is to use a screw spindle. However, basic spindles commonly used are just metal on plastic and even with a spring tensioned backlash assembly it is only accurate enough to a point. The spindles and their nuts i am using are Ball Bearing screw nuts with an internal greased assembly and can achieve a repeatability of 0.01mm with a pitch of 2.5mm.

I live in Cyprus, an island in the Mediterranean. In a city like Larnaca which is by the sea, humidity is a killer. Building machinery with wooden parts although is cheap, is not very reliable since the last thing i need is to worry about warping and general degradation. The entire frame of the printer is built with Aluminum extrusions and connected with steel screws and fittings specific for the extrusions them selves. The body is mainly constructed with 50mm x 50mm profiles and some smaller 25mm x 25mm parts for details of the construction.

Electronics

There are many stepper motor drivers and control boards out there but the ones i am using are high torque and have a high step count per revolution. Here are the specs of the elctronics in detail.

  • 3 x NEMA 23, Dual Shaft, 1.8° /200 Steps Per Rev motors
  • 3 x Unipolar Stepper motor driver boards
  • 1 x Parallel Port Control board
  • 1 x 24Volt 6.5Amp Switching Power Supply

 

Materials

I've made some good connections with manufacturers of UV and Light curing resins with properties such as Rubber, hard plastic and ABS. Below you shall find the materials that you can choose for your own application.

Clear Resin for General Purposes

  • High Resolution
  • Low viscosity
  • Low irritation
  • Low odor
  • No Volatile Organic Compounds
  • Clear
  • High cure speed
  • High Hardness
  • Low Cost

Hard Resin for Durable applications

  • High resolution
  • Low viscosity
  • Low irritation
  • Low odor
  • No Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs)
  • High cure speed    
  • Opalescent
  • Extra high hardness
  • Extra high stiffness
  • Extra dimensional stability

Hard & Tough Resin for Mechanical Parts

  • High resolution
  • Low viscosity
  • Low irritation
  • Low odor
  • No Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs)
  • High cure speed
  • High Hardness    
  • Extra toughness
  • Extra impact resistance
  • Extra abrasion resistance
  • Extra durability
  • Clear
  • Extra dimensional stability
  • Extra flexing ability

Elastic Resin for Rubber Like Parts

  • High resolution
  • Low viscosity
  • Low irritation
  • No Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs)
  • High cure speed
  • Clear    
  • Elastic
  • Soft and Rubbery
  • Good surface cure

All the above materials can be died into the following colors and produce opaque or transparent end results.

  • Black
  • Blue
  • Green
  • Red
  • White (Only for opaque)
  • Yellow
  • Orange (only for transparent)

Projectors

The TurnKey Solution perk includes a 1024x768 DLP projector, tested and ready for use. Since every one has their own specifications, it would be unreasonable to attach a high resolution projector to the machine. You can find projectors for about $200 - $300 on Ebay, which would be suited for 90% of all your applications. With comprehensive instructions and good support it shouldn't be hard to use any DLP projector with the 3D printer since the Base which is included with the frame can support most of them.

Summary

No matter which perk you choose, whatever earnings i make are mainly concentrated on building a reliable machine for my self and use it for my own project while sharing the result with anyone who needs the same equipment. Since there may be a chance that more orders are made than my required budget, i shall be integrating a shop into the OSRC website with the equipment and options listed here as well as support the project (since i shall be working with it a lot).

Feel free to ask your questions in the Forum, based on the Ilios 3D website or just send your queries through the campaign it self. I shall be more than happy to explain any details.

Please have in mind that the prices listed in this campaign include only the parts cost and a small percentage to cover the expenses fees for the campaign it self as well as shipping and other details. These prices may change when the project becomes available in the shop so you are really getting a good deal as my initial goal is to actually make the system and use it and not to make profit from it.

Help me get my own project off the ground and start manufacturing parts for it as well as get a reliable piece of machinery in return.
