story:
Deutsche Übersetzung         русский перевод

Yes, the whole internet!

Once upon a time, the internet was a free place, where you could escape the burdens of real life and emerge yourself in your own little virtual world. Until one day, when censorship took over all of it, turning this safe haven into a space full of restrictions. All but one little firm located in Bucharest, Romania, which decided to fight against censorship and reboot the internet back to the safe place we all know and love.

And here we are: A start-up VPN firm called CyberGhost, and we were first founded because we wanted to give people an alternative. We wanted them to be able to free themselves of all internet restrictions, access blocked data and feel secure while doing it. Our company is already established and our product is used by many people, but unfortunately, we have a 1 GB traffic limitation in our free service. Why? Because we already pay for hundreds of terabytes of data and we have no ads or other annoying things there to get some money back. Right now the free service is co-financed by the subscribers of our paid premium network. But we think that there are a lot of people out there who need access to a free, fast and reliable VPN network. Our goal is to offer a free service without ads and with unlimited traffic and to provide more options to choose from when it comes to servers’ locations and the amount of IP addresses available for people who can’t afford a subscription in our paid network.

 

Help us Help you!

We need your help to raise $100.000 in order to achieve one of our highest dreams: A free VPN service with Unlimited Traffic for you!

With this amount of money we’ll be able to rent new servers in India, Singapore, Panama, Brazil, Cyprus, Iceland, South Africa and many more countries so that you can have access to more countries and more information, even if it’s blocked by geo-location restrictions.

Also, we’ll gain up to 2000 IP’s (instead of the 100 we have now) so that we can become harder to block for censors, dictators and other potential threats, and offer you the best of our service.




Check out our awesome perks!


By donating, you are not only helping us save the internet, but you also get lots of awesome perks, from t-shirts, posters, stickers and certificates to free lifetime subscriptions, dedicated servers and having a server named after you! Also, you get to be in our hall of fame and adopt one of our ghosties so that we are reminded every single day of your generous contribution. But wait, it gets even better! For a $2,500 donation you get to visit our Headquarters in Bucharest, Romania and experience life next to our very own CyberGhosties!

 

The ultimate merchandise package!




Let’s reboot the internet!


At the moment, we have approximately 1,6 million users. We have this dream that we can help many more take back what rightfully belongs to them. We need to get our freedom back. As the internet started, people didn’t have to be concerned about things like privacy or freedom, it was more than anything a promise of freedom, a supreme source of knowledge and a mass communication tool which seemed to erase all the boundaries. Through this project, we want to reboot the internet. We must be able to protect our privacy and be safe in our virtual lives, be free to explore our social platforms safely, and surpass cultural differences. And with your help, we can make that happen.


Can’t contribute financially? Don’t worry, we care about every little gesture you can make to help save the internet. Don’t hesitate to use our Indiegogo share tools.

Don’t just tweet this, shout it out on Twitter!
Don’t just like this, share it with your friends on Facebook!
Add yourself to our Google+ supporters by clicking +1!
Share our campaign on Skype, Y!Messenger and G-talk and be part of the change!

Spread the news, make some noise about our campaign and help us achieve our –and your- dream of making the internet a free place again!

 

FAQ

If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?

Just email us – support@cyberghost.ro

When will my Perks be delivered?

We will ship everything latest on the 31st January 2013. The perks consisting in e-mails and listing you on our Supported by page will be accomplished by the end of December. The 1 year CyberGhost subscription and also the lifetime CyberGhost subcriptions will each be delivered as soon as possible, which means immediatly after we got your donation and one of our colleagues has the time to send you the serial code (give us 24h to do that).

Is there a charge for shipping outside the European Union?

Only for the $50 perk an additional charge to ship outside the European Union is needed. Please add 10 $ for delivery outside the European Union. Please include that in the checkout price. If you forget, we'll contact you prior to shipping to finalize those details.

For all the perks over $50 we will ship your Ultimate Merchandise Package to the end of January 2013.

If you don’t hit your goal, will this mean that you won’t improve your Free VPN?

If we don’t hit our goal, we will still improve what we can, by using the raised money. Have a look at our stretch-goals here:

  • If we reach $25.000 we add servers in 3 countries (UK, France, USA)
  • If we reach $50.000 we add servers in 3 more countries (Brazil, India, Canada)
  • If we reach $75.000 we add servers in 3 more countries (Japan, Vietnam, Mexico)
  • If we reach $100.000 we offer our Free VPN without traffic limitation and add more servers (2.000 IPs) in more countries than the ones that were mentioned above

Will this mean that CyberGhost VPN Free will have more servers?

If we raise the money, we will be able to pay for around 2.000 IP’s for a year. And we will make that pool available for both our Free and Paid service. We will rotate that IP-address pool, so that it takes around 6 months to run through the whole server pool. So some of them will be active to choose from, some of them will be in a waiting queue to “recover”. This will make it way harder for censors, content restrictors and other evil guys to block our IP range.

Why Indiegogo? Why are you going with the Gogos?

CyberGhost VPN is right now available all over the world –just like Indiegogo. We have users in America, Europe, Africa, Asia and Australia. Our company is founded by some Germans, but we are located in Bucharest, Romania. Right now, we speak eight different languages in our company and we are fans of that international family thing. So we decided for a platform that is available all over the world and supports PayPal and regular Credit Cards payments to make the audience for that campaign as wide as possible.

One hundred thousand dollars seems to be a lot of money. Where is it all going?

On  one side, we pay a lot of money for the traffic you guys generate. We don’t know what you’re doing there, but we pay for hundreds of Terabytes every month. Then we pay for the rent of our server park and our IP-address pool. And we also need to pay rent, wages, health insurance, utilities and all the normal stuff that you pay for when you have twenty Ghosties working together. You see, that money seems to be a lot but it is finally just keeping the lights on while we do the things people expect from us: offer the best possible and fastest VPN service in the world.

What kind of timeline can we expect on these stretch goals regarding adding new servers?

For the things we can fulfill immediately, like adding new countries to our server list, we try to do that during the campaign. But everything should be achieved by the end of January 2013. For the stretch goals  above 100.000 $, we'll try to sprinkle them through the next year so that there's always something to look forward to.

What happens after a year? Are you going to make another Crowdfunding campaign?

This is valid for a period of 1 year. From January 2013 to December 2013. We will run the crowdfunding campaign again, next year around this time.

What happens if you raise more money than you asked?

Even better because then we can directly work for you and improve CyberGhost VPN. Look at our stretch goals above 100.000 $:

  • If we reach $150.000 we offer our Free VPN without bandwidth-limitations for 1 month (right now we have a bandwidth-limitation of 2 Mbit/s)
  • If we reach $200.000 we add 1.000 IPs more, so we have 3.000 IPs
  • If we reach $250.000 we offer our Free VPN without bandwidth-limitations for 3 month (right now we have a bandwidth-limitation of 2 Mbit/s)
  • If we reach $300.000 we add 1.000 IPs more, so we have 4.000 IPs
  • If we reach $350.000 we offer our Free VPN without bandwidth-limitations for 6 month (right now we have a bandwidth-limitation of 2 Mbit/s)
  • If we reach $400.000 we add 1.000 IPs more, so we have 5.000 IPs
  • If we reach $450.000 we offer our Free VPN without bandwidth-limitations for 1 year (right now we have a bandwidth-limitation of 2 Mbit/s)
  • If we reach $500.000 we will spread the word and organize a free open conference about privacy, security and freedom in Bucharest

Aren’t you all a bit crazy with your “save the whole internet” thingie?

There is a good argument for that.

Is your CEO Robert really wearing a St. Pauli T-Shirt every day?

Um, yes. Kind of.  And we are all happy that he has dozens of it, so he is really wearing  a new one every day. And with your help, we are going to see if he is also wearing St. Pauli underwear because in a weak moment he promised to show us, so we can post it on Facebook, if we make more then $100.000!

What sizes do you offer on your t-shirt related rewards?

For men, S (small) to XL (extra large). For women, XS (extra small) to XL (extra large).

Do the upper perks include all previous rewards?

Unless the description of the reward says "you get all from $... perk," or it is a standalone reward.

The perks over $25 have a CyberGhost subscription included. Which one exactly?

These perks contain the best subscription available. At the moment, that is CyberGhost Premium Plus VPN with a worth of 159,99 USD. The duration is 1 year after activation. If we have a better subscription in our range by the end of January 2013, when we'll ship our perks, we will for sure, deliver that subscription.

The $1000 and $2500 perks contain a lifetime subscription. Please read therefor the FAQ "Can I really get a lifetime subscription for CyberGhost? What does that mean?" mentioned below.

What’s with that CEO call that is available from the $250 perk up?

You should give us your Skype account or landline number and Robert, our CEO will call you to make sure that we show our gratitude to what you did for us and the whole internet.

I want to claim the perk that allows me to adopt a Ghostie. How does that work?

Check out our cuties on Ghosties Gallery.

These are all the Ghosties that were ever born in our laboratories. And they all search for a bit of love and affection. So you can adopt one of them and we will write your name under your Ghostie.

First come, first served. So we will ask you which Ghostie you like the most in the chronological order of your donation. If you donate later, it might be that the Ghostie of your dreams is gone – but don’t worry. There are dozens of tiny little Ghosties that need your love…

I want to claim the perk that allows me to name a server. What names can I go for?

You can choose for the name of your company, your wife, your pet or your favorite heavy metal band. But we will keep the right to refuse names when they are connected to things we hate at CyberGhost VPN like racist, homophobic, xenophobic or any other chauvinistic remarks.

Can I really get a lifetime subscription for CyberGhost? What does that mean?

We will provide you with a magic serial code. This code will run for 99 years and will always contain the highest subscription level we offer. Like magic…

I want to have that place in your hall of fame. What does that mean?

You send us a picture of you and we will put that picture on a DIN A1 Poster together with all other “Lionheart of the Internet” and “Captain of the Flying Ghostman” and these will be hung-up in the office of our CEO, Robert. So he will always be reminded who helped him out.

I want to visit your HQ. How does that work?

Claim the $2.500 perk, buy a flight ticket and come over to Bucharest for a week or a couple of days. We accommodate you in the same Hotel we use for all our business guests and give you a desk in our HQ, so you can be a Ghostie for a while. We take care about you and show you the advantages of the Romanian capital Bucharest.

What do I get when I claim a dedicated server?

You get your very own private VPN server, together with all other servers in our server park. But this server is your precious; your very special place to be and you can share it with up to 49 or 99 friends. That means that you receive either 50 or 100 subscription serials from us.
story_txt:
Deutsche Übersetzung         русский перевод
Yes, the whole internet!
Once upon a time, the internet was a free place, where you could escape the burdens of real life and emerge yourself in your own little virtual world. Until one day, when censorship took over all of it, turning this safe haven into a space full of restrictions. All but one little firm located in Bucharest, Romania, which decided to fight against censorship and reboot the internet back to the safe place we all know and love.And here we are: A start-up VPN firm called CyberGhost, and we were first founded because we wanted to give people an alternative. We wanted them to be able to free themselves of all internet restrictions, access blocked data and feel secure while doing it. Our company is already established and our product is used by many people, but unfortunately, we have a 1 GB traffic limitation in our free service. Why? Because we already pay for hundreds of terabytes of data and we have no ads or other annoying things there to get some money back. Right now the free service is co-financed by the subscribers of our paid premium network. But we think that there are a lot of people out there who need access to a free, fast and reliable VPN network. Our goal is to offer a free service without ads and with unlimited traffic and to provide more options to choose from when it comes to servers’ locations and the amount of IP addresses available for people who can’t afford a subscription in our paid network.

 
Help us Help you!

We need your help to raise $100.000 in order to achieve one of our highest dreams: A free VPN service with Unlimited Traffic for you! 
With this amount of money we’ll be able to rent new servers in India, Singapore, Panama, Brazil, Cyprus, Iceland, South Africa and many more countries so that you can have access to more countries and more information, even if it’s blocked by geo-location restrictions. 
Also, we’ll gain up to 2000 IP’s (instead of the 100 we have now) so that we can become harder to block for censors, dictators and other potential threats, and offer you the best of our service.


Check out our awesome perks!
By donating, you are not only helping us save the internet, but you also get lots of awesome perks, from t-shirts, posters, stickers and certificates to free lifetime subscriptions, dedicated servers and having a server named after you! Also, you get to be in our hall of fame and adopt one of our ghosties so that we are reminded every single day of your generous contribution. But wait, it gets even better! For a $2,500 donation you get to visit our Headquarters in Bucharest, Romania and experience life next to our very own CyberGhosties!
 
The ultimate merchandise package!



Let’s reboot the internet!
At the moment, we have approximately 1,6 million users. We have this dream that we can help many more take back what rightfully belongs to them. We need to get our freedom back. As the internet started, people didn’t have to be concerned about things like privacy or freedom, it was more than anything a promise of freedom, a supreme source of knowledge and a mass communication tool which seemed to erase all the boundaries. Through this project, we want to reboot the internet. We must be able to protect our privacy and be safe in our virtual lives, be free to explore our social platforms safely, and surpass cultural differences. And with your help, we can make that happen.Can’t contribute financially? Don’t worry, we care about every little gesture you can make to help save the internet. Don’t hesitate to use our Indiegogo share tools. Don’t just tweet this, shout it out on Twitter!Don’t just like this, share it with your friends on Facebook!Add yourself to our Google+ supporters by clicking +1!Share our campaign on Skype, Y!Messenger and G-talk and be part of the change!Spread the news, make some noise about our campaign and help us achieve our –and your- dream of making the internet a free place again!
 
FAQ
If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?
Just email us – support@cyberghost.ro
When will my Perks be delivered?
We will ship everything latest on the 31st January 2013. The perks consisting in e-mails and listing you on our Supported by page will be accomplished by the end of December. The 1 year CyberGhost subscription and also the lifetime CyberGhost subcriptions will each be delivered as soon as possible, which means immediatly after we got your donation and one of our colleagues has the time to send you the serial code (give us 24h to do that).
Is there a charge for shipping outside the European Union?
Only for the $50 perk an additional charge to ship outside the European Union is needed. Please add 10 $ for delivery outside the European Union. Please include that in the checkout price. If you forget, we'll contact you prior to shipping to finalize those details.
For all the perks over $50 we will ship your Ultimate Merchandise Package to the end of January 2013.
If you don’t hit your goal, will this mean that you won’t improve your Free VPN?
If we don’t hit our goal, we will still improve what we can, by using the raised money. Have a look at our stretch-goals here:

If we reach $25.000 we add servers in 3 countries (UK, France, USA)
If we reach $50.000 we add servers in 3 more countries (Brazil, India, Canada)
If we reach $75.000 we add servers in 3 more countries (Japan, Vietnam, Mexico)
If we reach $100.000 we offer our Free VPN without traffic limitation and add more servers (2.000 IPs) in more countries than the ones that were mentioned above
Will this mean that CyberGhost VPN Free will have more servers?
If we raise the money, we will be able to pay for around 2.000 IP’s for a year. And we will make that pool available for both our Free and Paid service. We will rotate that IP-address pool, so that it takes around 6 months to run through the whole server pool. So some of them will be active to choose from, some of them will be in a waiting queue to “recover”. This will make it way harder for censors, content restrictors and other evil guys to block our IP range.
Why Indiegogo? Why are you going with the Gogos?
CyberGhost VPN is right now available all over the world –just like Indiegogo. We have users in America, Europe, Africa, Asia and Australia. Our company is founded by some Germans, but we are located in Bucharest, Romania. Right now, we speak eight different languages in our company and we are fans of that international family thing. So we decided for a platform that is available all over the world and supports PayPal and regular Credit Cards payments to make the audience for that campaign as wide as possible.
One hundred thousand dollars seems to be a lot of money. Where is it all going?
On  one side, we pay a lot of money for the traffic you guys generate. We don’t know what you’re doing there, but we pay for hundreds of Terabytes every month. Then we pay for the rent of our server park and our IP-address pool. And we also need to pay rent, wages, health insurance, utilities and all the normal stuff that you pay for when you have twenty Ghosties working together. You see, that money seems to be a lot but it is finally just keeping the lights on while we do the things people expect from us: offer the best possible and fastest VPN service in the world.
What kind of timeline can we expect on these stretch goals regarding adding new servers?
For the things we can fulfill immediately, like adding new countries to our server list, we try to do that during the campaign. But everything should be achieved by the end of January 2013. For the stretch goals  above 100.000 $, we'll try to sprinkle them through the next year so that there's always something to look forward to.
What happens after a year? Are you going to make another Crowdfunding campaign?
This is valid for a period of 1 year. From January 2013 to December 2013. We will run the crowdfunding campaign again, next year around this time.
What happens if you raise more money than you asked?
Even better because then we can directly work for you and improve CyberGhost VPN. Look at our stretch goals above 100.000 $:

If we reach $150.000 we offer our Free VPN without bandwidth-limitations for 1 month (right now we have a bandwidth-limitation of 2 Mbit/s)
If we reach $200.000 we add 1.000 IPs more, so we have 3.000 IPs
If we reach $250.000 we offer our Free VPN without bandwidth-limitations for 3 month (right now we have a bandwidth-limitation of 2 Mbit/s)
If we reach $300.000 we add 1.000 IPs more, so we have 4.000 IPs
If we reach $350.000 we offer our Free VPN without bandwidth-limitations for 6 month (right now we have a bandwidth-limitation of 2 Mbit/s)
If we reach $400.000 we add 1.000 IPs more, so we have 5.000 IPs
If we reach $450.000 we offer our Free VPN without bandwidth-limitations for 1 year (right now we have a bandwidth-limitation of 2 Mbit/s)
If we reach $500.000 we will spread the word and organize a free open conference about privacy, security and freedom in Bucharest

There is a good argument for that.
Is your CEO Robert really wearing a St. Pauli T-Shirt every day?
Um, yes. Kind of.  And we are all happy that he has dozens of it, so he is really wearing  a new one every day. And with your help, we are going to see if he is also wearing St. Pauli underwear because in a weak moment he promised to show us, so we can post it on Facebook, if we make more then $100.000!

For men, S (small) to XL (extra large). For women, XS (extra small) to XL (extra large).

Unless the description of the reward says "you get all from $... perk," or it is a standalone reward.

These perks contain the best subscription available. At the moment, that is CyberGhost Premium Plus VPN with a worth of 159,99 USD. The duration is 1 year after activation. If we have a better subscription in our range by the end of January 2013, when we'll ship our perks, we will for sure, deliver that subscription.

You should give us your Skype account or landline number and Robert, our CEO will call you to make sure that we show our gratitude to what you did for us and the whole internet.

Check out our cuties on Ghosties Gallery.
These are all the Ghosties that were ever born in our laboratories. And they all search for a bit of love and affection. So you can adopt one of them and we will write your name under your Ghostie.

You can choose for the name of your company, your wife, your pet or your favorite heavy metal band. But we will keep the right to refuse names when they are connected to things we hate at CyberGhost VPN like racist, homophobic, xenophobic or any other chauvinistic remarks.

Claim the $2.500 perk, buy a flight ticket and come over to Bucharest for a week or a couple of days. We accommodate you in the same Hotel we use for all our business guests and give you a desk in our HQ, so you can be a Ghostie for a while. We take care about you and show you the advantages of the Romanian capital Bucharest.

story:
What is Graphene?

Graphene is a kind of honeycomb planar thin film formed by SP2 hybridization of carbon atoms. It is a kind of quasi-two-dimensional material with only one atomic layer thickness. It is also called mono-atomic graphite. It is known as the thinnest kind of material in the world - most powerful and most conductive type of nano-material.

 

Why ULTRON?

It is 6-20 times superior than your regular power banks, below chart clearly show case how powerful and long lasting ULTRON Power bank is, its a lifetime investment which keeps your devices charge. 

Below is the comparison of life cycles of different power banks (highest is better)

 

Below is the comparison of charging time of different power banks (lowest is better)

 

Product Specifications

Superior specs with long lasting battery life and super fast charging, it is for the people who hate to wait. Just 10 minutes charging for 10 hrs talk time, 6 hrs music listening, 2 hrs video playback and 1 hr video gaming.

Note: Charging time depends on multiple factors, during our testing so far 120 minutes is the maximum time taken, in our tests best result we got is 75 minutes, whereas average time is 90 minutes.

 

Compatibility

ULTRON supports the PD3 protocol. You don't need separate adapter, because it is compatible with USB C power adapters of Nintendo Switch, Apple MacBook, Lenovo laptop, etc. Also you can use ULTRON compact power adapter to charge compatible laptops.

 

 

 

Appearance

Elegant classic design with simple push on/off button and battery indicators.

  1. Switch and status indicator
  2. Indicator light ••••
  3. USB-A Output (supports QC 2.0/3.0 Quick Charge)
  4. USB-C input/output (supports PD 2.0 Quick Charge)
  5. USB-A output
  6. QI wireless charging

 

Charge Multiple Devices at a time

You can charge multiple devices at a time including android phones, apple phones, apple macbook and various other electronic gadgets.

 

Wireless Charging

Place your mobile at any angle for wireless charging

 

How Fast It Is?

Charging it 5 minutes > it can charge your:

  • Apple Iphone 8 up by 40%
  • Apple Iphone 8 Plus up by 30%
  • Apple Iphone X up by 35%
  • Samsung Galaxy 8 up by 25%

Charging it 10 minutes means:

  • Calling > 12 hrs
  • Music listening > 6 hrs
  • Video playback > 2 hrs
  • Gaming > 1 hr

 

Charging time?

Gets fully charged from 0% to 100% in less than 85 minutes.

 

Dimensions

Easily fits in your pocket or bag to carry anywhere 176 mm x 83 mm x 25 mm, weighs 498 gm

 

Quick Compact Charger 65W

The most compact mini adapter with PD+QC 65W - provides super fast charging

 

 

Comparison with Normal Power banks

 

Safety

  • Overcharge protection, auto cut off
  • Short circuit protection
  • Never gets super heated because of Graphene

 

 

Place Your Orders Now

We are looking forward for your support, order your ULTRON Wireless Power bank now at discounted price!

 

Stretch Goal

Note: Only applicable if we reach $20,000 goal (400%) by 6th August 2018 (before end of campaign)

 

 

Timelines

Looking forward to get your product at your doorstep:

 

About us

 

We are start ups from Singapore trying to launch new futuristic products and deliver to consumers across the globe. We need your support to achieve our goals, thanks.

Contact us: pureReflexions@gmail.com

story:
Ever mess up a bolt or screw size, bringing a project to a halt?  Give me a few minutes and I promise that will never happen again. 

Hey Indiegogo’ers!  My name is Josh Koerpel and here's an embarrassing photo to kick off my pitch...

Yup.  Me at 14 in the Tetons. My voice cracks were the only thing higher than the altitude.  It may be funny to look back, but those types of experiences teach us the most.  Then, I was just a kid improvising a shelter, but improvising taught me a lot about the satisfaction of building stuff with my hands.  Not to mention the importance of having the right tools to use the first time around.  Fast forward 20 years, and I've created an app that helps millions of iPhone users do (and have) just that. 
I've called it Wonderbolt. 

The Bottom Line: Wonderbolt is currently available only for iPhone.  With your contributions, we can build a version that also introduces Android users to the world of pixel-perfect bolt and screw measurement. 

All grown up, I am a mechanical engineer and an app developer.  Wonderbolt is something I've been working on for the past year, all on my own dime, because it works.  It is seriously useful.  It is the ultimate tool to help measure, identify, and work with bolts and screws for any type of project.  Think about that.  Other than mechanics who work with fasteners day in and day out, who else is familiar with the differences between an M6 and a 1/4 - 20 screw?  Nobody.  But that's the point!  That yard sale vintage desk you just bought, the one with the old rusty bolts?   What size do you need to replace them?  Or was the screw that just rattled loose from your motorcycle frame a US or a metric size?  Wonderbolt has these answers, and more.  This simple and effective tool can save time, money, and frustrations for the novice and professional alike.  And speaking from personal experience, this is a tool everyone on this list should keep in their toolkit.  



Wonderbolt has been available for free in the App Store for the past few months and has received fantastic reviews from a variety of sources.  Here's a quick sample:


"The app helped us get the right bolt without having to spend 30 mins wandering through the fastener aisle."

"...Used app, got size on spot, and called for quick delivery to job site.  Great, practical idea!"

"Has saved me many trips back to the store..."

People who have used Wonderbolt, love it.  But there has been one comment I've heard more than any other:

We want Wonderbolt for Android!

And I would imagine this is why...
The Details:  So what is Wonderbolt?  Wonderbolt is hardware store help right in your pocket.  It allows you to measure either US or metric bolts or screws, including the length, diameter, and the thread count, from anywhere.  Whether in your garage wrenching on that classic car or out in the field doing inspection work, you can say goodbye to carrying around awkwardly-shaped gauges.  The information Wonderbolt provides is enough to make hardware store purchases like a pro, or since we're in the 21st century, make a confident, affordable online purchase.  The days of multi-trip, hardware store trial and error are over. 

Wonderbolt is not simply a measuring tool, however.  It also provides related information from five different reference charts for any selected fastener. Use Wonderbolt to determine the required socket or Allen wrench sizes, key dimensions in decimal form, or which drill bit to use for a clearance hole. There is a “search size” function for a handy project reference, and it has even been designed for use in either hand (yeah lefties!). 



Your Backing: I'm asking for $7500, which is inexpensive in the world of app development.  That's because I have spent quite a bit of time trying to understand the development process and take steps that keep costs way down.  These include formulating a criteria for hiring quality developers, designing my own marketing materials, and personally doing a whole lot of leg work.  But there remains a lot I can not do on my own, so here is a breakdown of where your generous contributions will be allocated:

  • $4000 in development costs.  Not only are apps written for Android in another programming language, but there are many more devices and resolutions to contend with. 
  • $1000 in re-design costs.  Since Androids phones have different button schemes and functions, new layouts for user interaction will have to be developed.
  • $600 in maintenance and updates for the first few months after launch, simply to deal with the inevitable bug fixes bound to occur.  These updates will also incorporate valuable initial Android user feedback.
  • $600 in marketing fees.  This will most likely be in the form of press releases and the production of another video highlighting the app's functionality.  In addition, I will be initializing social media campaigns, generating my own marketing material in photoshop (much like the photos you see in this campaign), and contacting as many DIY celebrities as possible for endorsement.   

How about the remaining contributions?  I've structured my rewards so that hopefully my donation amount is roughly 10-12x my anticipated rewards cost.  I'm making most of the rewards myself, meaning I can repay your kind donations with really cool stuff while simultaneously putting more money towards the end goal!

** Rest assured that whatever contribution amount I receive will go straight towards funding this app.  I truly believe that Wonderbolt can and will help a lot of people.

What you get in return! (other than a wink from the Gods):  Okay lets talk rewards!

Of course all backers will be entitled to a free copy of Wonderbolt on either iPhone or Android (when available).

There will be shop rags and decals that have a design logo similar to the one below.  Perfect for slapping on the side of the toolbox or wiping that nervous forehead sweat after your rebuilt engine kicks over on the first try. 

There are also custom-made shop bottle openers, Video thank-yous, and one-of-a-kind shop phone caddies just waiting to be claimed.  I know it's not a set of Snap On socket wrenches, but these unique rewards will grab some serious attention. 

If you can't afford to back the campaign right now, don't worry.  I've been there for sure.  That doesn't mean you still can't help the cause though.  Here are some ways you can help me get Wonderbolt's name out there and into the hands of those who need it: 
  • Social Media.  People take advice from friends.  Take a second a share this campaign with your friends on Facebook, your followers on Twitter, or anyone else you feel could benefit from knowing about this project. 
  • Word of Mouth.  Know someone with an iPhone who could use Wonderbolt?  Let 'em know!  I promise they will thank you for it. 
  • Able to Provide Any of the Services Above.  Are you familiar with both Objective C and Java?  A Photoshop genius?  A social media marketing guru?  I could use all the help I can find!  Contact me at hey_josh@bryteworkapps.com

FAQS

Looks like Wonderbolt is a paid app on the app store!  Why do you need OUR money again?!

Truth is, Wonderbolt has been free until very recently.  I haven't charged a dime until this point.  The money generated now from the iPhone version is going straight to iPhone improvements such as development for the iPhone 6 and 6+. 

How long will Wonderbolt take to develop for Android? 

My estimate is a few months, given all the anticipated bugs with various screen sizes and dimensions.  I promise to work as fast as possible!  

It seems like there are a few engineering apps out there that deal with bolts and screws.  What makes Wonderbolt better? 

Wonderbolt has been designed for the end user in mind.  One way we have done this is by taking the realities of measuring with a phone and making them work to your advantage.  For instance, using the inherent back-light of the screen and high-contrasting colors to create sharp, crisp silhouettes for accurate measuring.  The end user experience is a simple and clear method that takes the hard out of hardware measurement.  

Have a question?  Feel free to email me at hey_josh@bryteworkapps.com

In conclusion, Wonderbolt is becoming an iPhone measurement tool of choice.  Its transition to an Android platform can be quickly and easily accomplished with your help.  Spread the word about this Campaign!  Like Wonderbolt.  Tweet about it.  Pin it and forward this email to all your friends and coworkers. They’ll thank you for it because sooner or later Wonderbolt is going to solve a fastener problem for them!
story_txt:
Ever mess up a bolt or screw size, bringing a project to a halt?  Give me a few minutes and I promise that will never happen again.  Hey Indiegogo’ers!  My name is Josh Koerpel and here's an embarrassing photo to kick off my pitch... Yup.  Me at 14 in the Tetons. My voice cracks were the only thing higher than the altitude.  It may be funny to look back, but those types of experiences teach us the most.  Then, I was just a kid improvising a shelter, but improvising taught me a lot about the satisfaction of building stuff with my hands.  Not to mention the importance of having the right tools to use the first time around.  Fast forward 20 years, and I've created an app that helps millions of iPhone users do (and have) just that. I've called it Wonderbolt. 

The Bottom Line: Wonderbolt is currently available only for iPhone.  With your contributions, we can build a version that also introduces Android users to the world of pixel-perfect bolt and screw measurement.  

All grown up, I am a mechanical engineer and an app developer.  Wonderbolt is something I've been working on for the past year, all on my own dime, because it works.  It is seriously useful.  It is the ultimate tool to help measure, identify, and work with bolts and screws for any type of project.  Think about that.  Other than mechanics who work with fasteners day in and day out, who else is familiar with the differences between an M6 and a 1/4 - 20 screw?  Nobody.  But that's the point!  That yard sale vintage desk you just bought, the one with the old rusty bolts?   What size do you need to replace them?  Or was the screw that just rattled loose from your motorcycle frame a US or a metric size?  Wonderbolt has these answers, and more.  This simple and effective tool can save time, money, and frustrations for the novice and professional alike.  And speaking from personal experience, this is a tool everyone on this list should keep in their toolkit.   

Wonderbolt has been available for free in the App Store for the past few months and has received fantastic reviews from a variety of sources.  Here's a quick sample:

"The app helped us get the right bolt without having to spend 30 mins wandering through the fastener aisle.""...Used app, got size on spot, and called for quick delivery to job site.  Great, practical idea!""Has saved me many trips back to the store..."People who have used Wonderbolt, love it.  But there has been one comment I've heard more than any other:






We want Wonderbolt for Android!

And I would imagine this is why...

The Details:  So what is Wonderbolt?  Wonderbolt is hardware store help right in your pocket.  It allows you to measure either US or metric bolts or screws, including the length, diameter, and the thread count, from anywhere.  Whether in your garage wrenching on that classic car or out in the field doing inspection work, you can say goodbye to carrying around awkwardly-shaped gauges.  The information Wonderbolt provides is enough to make hardware store purchases like a pro, or since we're in the 21st century, make a confident, affordable online purchase.  The days of multi-trip, hardware store trial and error are over.  Wonderbolt is not simply a measuring tool, however.  It also provides related information from five different 
reference charts for any selected fastener.  Use Wonderbolt to determine
 the required socket or Allen wrench sizes, key dimensions in decimal 
form, or which drill bit to use for a clearance hole.  There is a 
“search size” function for a handy project reference, and it has even been designed for use in either hand (yeah lefties!).  




Your Backing: I'm asking for $7500, which is inexpensive in the world of app development.  That's because I have spent quite a bit of time trying to understand the development process and take steps that keep costs way down.  These include formulating a criteria for hiring quality developers, designing my own marketing materials, and personally doing a whole lot of leg work.  But there remains a lot I can not do on my own, so here is a breakdown of where your generous contributions will be allocated:


$4000 in development costs.  Not only are apps written for Android in another programming language, but there are many more devices and resolutions to contend with.  


$1000 in re-design costs.  Since Androids phones have different button schemes and functions, new layouts for user interaction will have to be developed.

$600 in maintenance and updates for the first few months after launch, simply to deal with the inevitable bug fixes bound to occur.  These updates will also incorporate valuable initial Android user feedback.

$600 in marketing fees.  This will most likely be in the form of press releases and the production of another video highlighting the app's functionality.  In addition, I will be initializing social media campaigns, generating my own marketing material in photoshop (much like the photos you see in this campaign), and contacting as many DIY celebrities as possible for endorsement.    


How about the remaining contributions?  I've structured my rewards so that hopefully my donation amount is roughly 10-12x my anticipated rewards cost.  I'm making most of the rewards myself, meaning I can repay your kind donations with really cool stuff while simultaneously putting more money towards the end goal!
** Rest assured that whatever contribution amount I receive will go straight towards funding this app.  I truly believe that Wonderbolt can and will help a lot of people.


What you get in return! (other than a wink from the Gods):  Okay lets talk rewards!
Of course all backers will be entitled to a free copy of Wonderbolt on either iPhone or Android (when available).
There will be shop rags and decals that have a design logo similar to the one below.  Perfect for slapping on the side of the toolbox or wiping that nervous forehead sweat after your rebuilt engine kicks over on the first try.  


There are also custom-made shop bottle openers, Video thank-yous, and one-of-a-kind shop phone caddies just waiting to be claimed.  I know it's not a set of Snap On socket wrenches, but these unique rewards will grab some serious attention.  If you can't afford to back the campaign right now, don't worry.  I've been there for sure.  That doesn't mean you still can't help the cause though.  Here are some ways you can help me get Wonderbolt's name out there and into the hands of those who need it:  

Social Media.  People take advice from friends.  Take a second a share this campaign with your friends on Facebook, your followers on Twitter, or anyone else you feel could benefit from knowing about this project.  


Word of Mouth.  Know someone with an iPhone who could use Wonderbolt?  Let 'em know!  I promise they will thank you for it.  

Able to Provide Any of the Services Above.  Are you familiar with both Objective C and Java?  A Photoshop genius?  A social media marketing guru?  I could use all the help I can find!  Contact me at hey_josh@bryteworkapps.com




FAQS
Looks like Wonderbolt is a paid app on the app store!  Why do you need OUR money again?!
Truth is, Wonderbolt has been free until very recently.  I haven't charged a dime until this point.  The money generated now from the iPhone version is going straight to iPhone improvements such as development for the iPhone 6 and 6+.  
How long will Wonderbolt take to develop for Android?  
My estimate is a few months, given all the anticipated bugs with various screen sizes and dimensions.  I promise to work as fast as possible!  
It seems like there are a few engineering apps out there that deal with bolts and screws.  What makes Wonderbolt better?  
Wonderbolt has been designed for the end user in mind.  One way we have done this is by taking the realities of measuring with a phone and making them work to your advantage.  For instance, using the inherent back-light of the screen and high-contrasting colors to create sharp, crisp silhouettes for accurate measuring.  The end user experience is a simple and clear method that takes the hard out of hardware measurement.  
Have a question?  Feel free to email me at hey_josh@bryteworkapps.com


In conclusion, Wonderbolt is becoming an iPhone measurement tool of 
choice.  Its transition to an Android platform can be quickly and easily
 accomplished with your help.  Spread the word about this Campaign!  Like Wonderbolt.  Tweet about it.  Pin it and forward this email to all
 your friends and coworkers. They’ll thank you for it because sooner or 
later Wonderbolt is going to solve a fastener problem for them!

story:
About Us

Hello everyone, we are Ormondi and Mashaun  Terry-Seda.  My wife Mashaun and I are the founders and Co CEO's of Elecktro Gaming Bazaar. I've spent most of my working life in Finance working for fortune 500 companies like Merrill Lynch while my wife was the President of Terry Learning Center, a tutoring company that at the time operated in five states. In 2009 we couldn't escape the effects of the market crash and were both laid off from our jobs, to make matters worse, we allowed a trusted family member to use our home as collateral for a business loan that went bad. Leaving us homeless.

We didn't have much money but we knew we needed to start a business. The concept of our company although not new, was conceived while we were homeless living in a hotel with our two children, Dominick and Skylar. We knew that if we were going to make it out of that hotel room, we were going to have to broaden our view, get busy and believe (BBB).

We saw that there was a need not just in the US but throughout the world for pre-owned cell phones , laptops and gaming systems. Seeing this void in the market that needed to be filled, my wife and I quickly got busy locating and procuring as many items as our initial $50 investment would buy us.  It wasn't long after that initial investment that we knew this was something that was scalable once we started getting buyers from all parts of the US and around the world.

What We Need 

Our contribution goal is $15,000, the money will be used as followed:

Website development

Inventory

Marketing & Promotions

Upgrade our merchant services to accept other forms of payments

Purchase an inexpensive reliable vehicle for local pick-ups

The Impact

When you contribute to Elecktro Gaming Bazaar, you are not only helping us to see our goals to fruition but you are also helping to reduce the number of devices that will end up in landfill. You're also helping those individuals in rural USA and abroad who are not connected, get connected. We understand that not everyone can afford the latest 4G phone but they may be able to afford a less expensive 3G model that serves the same purpose.

In addition, a portion of the proceeds will be set aside and go in a fund that helps parents with children that have autism pay for the costly, specialized schooling that is needed. As parents of an autistic child, our Dominick, who didn't have the money for specialized schooling, we understand how important it is for parents to get their autistic child care and treatment early.  

Connecting the world one person at a time and helping those that need it most has become our mission.

Risk and Challenges

As with any business, be it new or seasoned, there are risk and challenges that must be overcome in order to have success. Ours is no different, we  have companies that operate in a similar space but what separates us from our competition is our ability to be local in a market and our ability to come to the customer. Our experience has taught us that some people don't mind mailing in their device and waiting a couple days to get paid but the majority would much rather sell their device and get paid cash as quickly as possible. We address that need by combining the dependability of a courier service with the convenience of a delivery service. This, allows us to get to the product quickly, examine it's condition, authenticity and rightful ownership. The advantage of this is we get the items sold very quickly by reasonably pricing. Often the same day we purchase the items.

Other Ways You Can Help

For those individuals who can't make a monatary contribution but still would like to help, we would welcome donations of your old electronic devices. We will donate 90% of the profits from the sale of your device to The Marcus Autism Center and The Community School in Atlanta. 

Even if you can't contribute or donate, just getting the word out about what we're doing on Indiegogo is good enough.

story:
Imagine...

An alternative universe where brands respect your attention and don't spam, and entice you with prizes & offers to attract your voluntary interest. 

 

Welcome to Dipsta.

 

Win or Buy

 “One touch” free prize draws & special offers – simply “dip” to the right for things you like!

Discover fantastic brands - mostly independents & boutiques - by category or on-the-go location.

 

Enticement, not spam

We bring you exciting free prizes & offers from brands that respect you and don’t want to spam you. Browse in your own time, on your own terms. We don’t waste your time with expired or unqualified deals.

One time sign up. 

No spam. No hassle. No obligations.

 

One screen per campaign, for all you need to know. 

 

Just "one touch" for your desired action:

 

"Dip it": enter a prize draw & save down a special offer

"Boost it": earn boosters from referrals & reviews, use it to double your chances of winning in a prize draw

"Get it":  buy or book from the merchant's site by clicking on "GET IT NOW!"

"Share it": share with friends if you see something they'll appreciate

"Like it": let us know if you want to see more from this merchant or similar offers

"Skip it": carry on browsing without action

 

Browse by category or use geo-location for nearby deals

 

 

 

 

Pledge to be an early bird - here are some amazing things you could "dip to win" in 2017!

 

 

 

 

Premium food & beverages 

 

Love discovering new music or a budding artist yourself?  We have plans to partner with one of the largest UK indie music festivals, and career planning that help aspiring artists to launch, including mentoring from music industry insiders, studio recording, music video production & live performance opportunities...

 

 

Who are our Indiegogo perks providers?

 

Suzanne Walker Pet Portrait:  Sue loves animals & is often praised for capturing the personality of a pet in her drawings. Be it pencils or pastels, dogs, cats, horses, birds... just provide your favourite pet photographs, and she will return something to adorn your wall with pride & joy!

 

Moonraker House: one of the best regarded B&Bs in Stratford-upon-Avon (Booking.com rated Superb: 9/10, AA 4-Star guesthouse), particularly noted for a delicious, cooked to order breakfast using local produce. The picturesque home town of Shakespeare is a top choice short break destination, with over 800 years of history as a quintessential market town by the river Avon, and home of the world famous Royal Shakespeare Company offering year-round performances for theatre lovers. Stratford is also a good base to explore the heart of England, with the Cotswolds, Oxford, Bicester Village, Warwick, Silverstone & Birmingham all within easy reach.(moonrakerhouse.com,  +44 (0) 1789 268774, info@moonrakerhouse.com)

 

 

Wondersocks: Bold & quirky Korean designed socks to get you well heeled and noticed! Fabulous range of socks for fun-loving guys & gals, plus head-turning knee highs for the trend-setting lady!

A peek at some more of our

"seed" merchants

For our initial launch phase we have concentrated on signing up independent boutiques, designers, innovative businesses & startups. Here are just some of our seed merchants, collaborating with us behind the scenes to bring incredible offers to our Early Bird backers!

 

 

And finally, we can't wait to collaborate with some truly innovative businesses...

 

 

Big Help Music is the UK’s leading Artist Development Record Label with almost 30 years proven ability at helping undiscovered artists establish their media and audience credibility and move forward in their music career. Member of the Association of Independent Record Labels (AIM) –  an official Chart Registered Label, members of the BRIT Awards Voting Academy and the Royal Society of Arts, founder Dutch Van Spall is a Fellow of the RSA since 2014 in recognition of his support for young artists. 

Dipsta is excited to collaborate with Big Help Music in 2017 to launch a series of exclusive opportunities for aspiring artists, from insider advice,  studio recording, music video shoot & production, to live performance & festivals... watch this space for some truly exciting campaigns on Dipsta. 

 

Espritia is a dynamic UK start-up that brings real-time, true pricing to on-demand private jet & helicopter charters, without the conventional mark up you'd expect with exclusive, luxury air travel. 

Dipsta is looking forward to collaborating with Espritia in 2017 to open up exciting possibilities where sky is no limit to your appetite for adventure & style. 

 

 

Please get behind us to…

...bring this alternative universe to the main stream!  Please back our campaign and spread the word so that our collective voice would be louder: let's try a new way of brand & consumer interaction – one that is based on win-win, on mutual and consented attraction!

Dipsta has secured seed funding to see through its initial stage of market research & development. Your pledge now will help  towards our launch and realizing our vision. So please become a Dipsta pioneer today & join us! Your backing will in turn persuade more merchants to sign up to this concept of "enticement marketing" rather than "bombardment marketing".  Together, we can build a healthy & diverse eco-system that give consumers more choice and the joy of discovery and fairer visibility for businesses of all sizes. 

 

 

YOU are the ROCKET FUEL for our mission!
Be a Dipsta Pioneer today. 

 

Please back us  & spread the word!

 

Dipsta is a member of the Barclays Eagle Labs incubator for innovation. 

 

If you have any questions or would like to get in touch, please contact us at hello@dipsta.com

We are always happy to hear from you!

Your backing will in turn persuade more merchants to sign up to this concept of "enticement marketing" rather than "bombardment marketing".  Together, we can build a healthy & diverse eco-system that give consumers more choice and the joy of discovery and fairer visibility for businesses of all sizes.

story:
The 13.3 and 6.8 are both available to order directly from the Good e-Reader Online Store.

 

   Quite useful and versatile.

   Nice for reading PDFs and technical documentation.

  Suitable for sketching and drawing.

  If you’re a teacher, lawyer, legislator, researcher, etc, you would probably want a 13.3 screen that’s less strenuous on the eyes.

A Large Screen 13.3 e-Reader

Every day thousands of people are in need of a large screen e-reader to consume e-books, manga, technical documents, PDF files and sheet music.  The standard six inch e-reader simply does not provide enough screen real estate do this and there are few alternatives that are available.

Good e-Reader is proud to launch our new crowd funding campaign for a 13.3 inch e-reader. This product will be utterly perfect to read any type of e-book you own, from EPUB to PDF.  You can make notes, highlights and annotations the an accompanied Stylus. The WACOM supported screen will ensure pin-point precision

The most compelling aspect of our 13.3 inch e-reader is you can install your own apps via Google Android Market.

Specs

 

The 13.3 is the Perfect Size Screen for e-books

The vast majority of e-readers on the market provide six inches to read your favorite e-books. The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite 3, Kobo Touch 2.0 and Barnes and Noble Nook Glowlight + do not give you a great experience. As you can see from the picture above, our 13.3 inch e-reader completely dwarfs the Kindle Voyage.

If you are a consumer this 13.3 inch e-reader will give you a tremendous e-reading experience. The extra large screen will let you read comics, e-books, manga, magazines, newspapers and technical documents.  If you have an existing collection you can easily copy them right to the e-reader or put them on an SD card.

Our e-reader is running Google Android, which will let you install apps like Moon + Reader, Aldiko, Marvel Comics, Comixology, Manga Box and thousands of others.

A truly large screen e-reader will be perfect for people who are overwhelmed by paper in their office.  Beneficiaries of Good e-Reader 13.3 inch E-Reader  include lawyers, governmental agencies, policymakers and legislators, professors and researchers in higher education, and executives. Easy to use right out of the box and optimized to accommodate 8.5" by 11" documents, our device achieves a breakthrough in handwriting. Once all of your notes are saved you can email them to a business college or just upload them to the cloud.

One of the big advantages of our e-reader is that the battery lasts for over a month and the e-paper display allows you to take it outside, without the sun obfuscating the screen.
 

Download Over a Million Apps

There have been only a few companies that offer Android e-readers, but never a 13.3 inch Android e-Reader.  The Good e-Reader 13.3 Inch has full support for Google Android Market, which has over a million apps. 

Android on our 13.3 inch e-reader allows you to craft your own experience. Want to download both Kindle and Kobo to read past purchases? You can do that.  Want to take a break from reading and play Words with Friends? You can do that too.  Do you want to install Moon+ Reader, Aldiko, Manga Box, or Comixology? Google Android Market will be loaded on our 13.3 inch e-reader as your online destination to download and install paid and free apps.

The Good e-Reader 6.8

Good e-Reader is please to launch a slimmed down version  of the Good e-Reader 13.3! Introducing the Good e-Reader 6.8! It is pocket friendly, comes with a free case and stylus. You can read in the dark with the built in front-light, that has 8 LED lights.

The Good e-Reader 6.8 is unique and innovative. It features an E-Ink Carta display and has the same resolution as the Kindle Voyage and Kobo Aura H2O. Unlike these two digital readers, our device has a touchscreen and a WACOM layer, so you can use a stylus or your fingers.

The Best Note Taking Device

 

Just like writing with pen on paper, use the stylus to write fluidly and directly on the panel, easily highlight text and erase notes. You have the same ease of movement, plus the surface rejects your palm, so functionality is never disrupted.

The stylus has over a thousand degrees of pressure sensitivity and there are hundreds of different pen types you can customize. There are over a dozen different backgrounds you can select, depending on your specific task.

Beneficiaries of Good e-Reader 6.8 include lawyers, governmental agencies, policymakers and legislators, professors and researchers in higher education, and executives. Students and consumers will also benefit from the native note taking functionality, which is 100% optimized for an E Ink display.

Spending time with the Good e-Reader 6.8 is like living in a possible post-physical paper world.

The Good e-Reader 6.8 runs Google Android

One of the most exciting things about the Good e-Reader 6.8 is that it runs Google Android! You can install Onenote, Evernote, Kindle, Nook or your favorite comic apps.

You can order the Good e-Reader 6.8 right now as a perk and you can get the special early bird price of $199! It also comes with a free case and stylus.  We intend on shipping these units out to backers this October.

Support the 13.3 and 6.8 inch e-reader

We are really proud to  have two of the only dedicated note taking e-readers in the world! We have two devices that will suit all budgets and two different screen sizes for your professional needs.

All of our units will ship from Vancouver, BC Canada, so once we send them out, you will get them quickly. If you live in Canada or the US you will pay less for shipping.  Our two e-readers are available internationally, so you can order it from any country in the world.

The Good e-Reader 13.3  and 6.8 are FCC certified and has additional certification for Canada and Europe. 

We could also really use your social media support, by clicking on the Twitter/Facebook buttons. Alternatively, please let your favorite tech blog know about our campaign.

Risks & Challenges

We have shipped out hundreds of Good e-Reader 13.3  units to customers all over the world!  We have raised over $340,000 so far and we are really excited about out new 6.8!  The Good e-Reader 6.8 hardware is finalized and we have improved the software so it is tremendously robust. 

Please read our terms and conditions, it is essential for ordering a 13.3 or 6.8.
story_txt:
The 13.3 and 6.8 are both available to order directly from the Good e-Reader Online Store.
    Quite useful and versatile.   Nice for reading PDFs and technical documentation.  Suitable for sketching and drawing.  If you’re a teacher, lawyer, legislator, researcher, etc, you would probably want a 13.3 screen that’s less strenuous on the eyes.A Large Screen 13.3 e-Reader

Every day thousands of people are in need of a large screen e-reader to consume e-books, manga, technical documents, PDF files and sheet music.  The standard six inch e-reader simply does not provide enough screen real estate do this and there are few alternatives that are available.
Good e-Reader is proud to launch our new crowd funding campaign for a 13.3 inch e-reader. This product will be utterly perfect to read any type of e-book you own, from EPUB to PDF.  You can make notes, highlights and annotations the an accompanied Stylus. The WACOM supported screen will ensure pin-point precision
The most compelling aspect of our 13.3 inch e-reader is you can install your own apps via Google Android Market.

Specs
 The 13.3 is the Perfect Size Screen for e-books
The vast majority of e-readers on the market provide six inches to read your favorite e-books. The Amazon Kindle Paperwhite 3, Kobo Touch 2.0 and Barnes and Noble Nook Glowlight + do not give you a great experience. As you can see from the picture above, our 13.3 inch e-reader completely dwarfs the Kindle Voyage.If you are a consumer this 13.3 inch e-reader will give you a tremendous e-reading experience. The extra large screen will let you read comics, e-books, manga, magazines, newspapers and technical documents.  If you have an existing collection you can easily copy them right to the e-reader or put them on an SD card.Our e-reader is running Google Android, which will let you install apps like Moon + Reader, Aldiko, Marvel Comics, Comixology, Manga Box and thousands of others.A truly large screen e-reader will be perfect for people who are overwhelmed by paper in their office.  Beneficiaries of Good e-Reader 13.3 inch E-Reader  include lawyers, governmental agencies, policymakers and legislators, professors and researchers in higher education, and executives. Easy to use right out of the box and optimized to accommodate 8.5" by 11" documents, our device achieves a breakthrough in handwriting. Once all of your notes are saved you can email them to a business college or just upload them to the cloud.One of the big advantages of our e-reader is that the battery lasts for over a month and the e-paper display allows you to take it outside, without the sun obfuscating the screen. Download Over a Million Apps

There have been only a few companies that offer Android e-readers, but never a 13.3 inch Android e-Reader.  The Good e-Reader 13.3 Inch has full support for Google Android Market, which has over a million apps. 
Android on our 13.3 inch e-reader allows you to craft your own experience. Want to download both Kindle and Kobo to read past purchases? You can do that.  Want to take a break from reading and play Words with Friends? You can do that too.  Do you want to install Moon+ Reader, Aldiko, Manga Box, or Comixology? Google Android Market will be loaded on our 13.3 inch e-reader as your online destination to download and install paid and free apps.

The Good e-Reader 6.8

Good e-Reader is please to launch a slimmed down version  of the Good e-Reader 13.3! Introducing the Good e-Reader 6.8! It is pocket friendly, comes with a free case and stylus. You can read in the dark with the built in front-light, that has 8 LED lights.

The Good e-Reader 6.8 is unique and innovative. It features an E-Ink Carta display and has the same resolution as the Kindle Voyage and Kobo Aura H2O. Unlike these two digital readers, our device has a touchscreen and a WACOM layer, so you can use a stylus or your fingers.
The Best Note Taking Device

 

Just like writing with pen on paper, use the stylus to write fluidly and directly on the panel, easily highlight text and erase notes. You have the same ease of movement, plus the surface rejects your palm, so functionality is never disrupted.
The stylus has over a thousand degrees of pressure sensitivity and there are hundreds of different pen types you can customize. There are over a dozen different backgrounds you can select, depending on your specific task.
Beneficiaries of Good e-Reader 6.8 include lawyers, governmental agencies, policymakers and legislators, professors and researchers in higher education, and executives. Students and consumers will also benefit from the native note taking functionality, which is 100% optimized for an E Ink display.
Spending time with the Good e-Reader 6.8 is like living in a possible post-physical paper world.
The Good e-Reader 6.8 runs Google Android

One of the most exciting things about the Good e-Reader 6.8 is that it runs Google Android! You can install Onenote, Evernote, Kindle, Nook or your favorite comic apps.

You can order the Good e-Reader 6.8 right now as a perk and you can get the special early bird price of $199! It also comes with a free case and stylus.  We intend on shipping these units out to backers this October.
Support the 13.3 and 6.8 inch e-reader

We are really proud to  have two of the only dedicated note taking e-readers in the world! We have two devices that will suit all budgets and two different screen sizes for your professional needs.
All of our units will ship from Vancouver, BC Canada, so once we send them out, you will get them quickly. If you live in Canada or the US you will pay less for shipping.  Our two e-readers are available internationally, so you can order it from any country in the world.
The Good e-Reader 13.3  and 6.8 are FCC certified and has additional certification for Canada and Europe. 
We could also really use your social media support, by clicking on the Twitter/Facebook buttons. Alternatively, please let your favorite tech blog know about our campaign.
Risks & Challenges

We have shipped out hundreds of Good e-Reader 13.3  units to customers all over the world!  We have raised over $340,000 so far and we are really excited about out new 6.8!  The Good e-Reader 6.8 hardware is finalized and we have improved the software so it is tremendously robust. 
Please read our terms and conditions, it is essential for ordering a 13.3 or 6.8.

story:
A phone case you can wear IN your hand or ON your arm!

• Wear it in your hand:

Our unique design will allow you to relax your hand because your phone will be nestled in the palm of your hand. 


OR

• Wear it on your arm:

Our super stretchy and comfortable armband strap allows you to wear your phone on your arm without feeling like a blood pressure cuff. 


_____________________________________________________________________________

Why is our phone case for running?



The HB Tune phone case is made for runners, by  runners. We know how annoying it can be to grip your phone and worry about dropping it when you are also worried about finishing a 10K. Every detail about our design has been proven by miles of actual use.

We run, we sweat, it's kind of what we do. That's why our pouch is made with materials designed to keep your phone dry from sweaty hands. 

Not only will you have an easy view of your screen, but you will have complete control of it as well. We even include a pouch to hold your keys, cash & credit cards. 

Our unique shim design means that 2 sizes will fit every phone. Just choose the Large or Plus size & go for a run. BTW, that means that if you get a new phone down the road, you probably WON'T need a new phone case - yeah! :)

When you go for a run, you shouldn't have to worry about taking off your protective case, then figure out how to put it back on when you are done. We designed the pouch so that you can leave your case on, even if you have an industrial strength protective case. It will also work great with a case that has a battery pack on the back! BTW, it works just as well with NO case at all - we are totally OK with running naked (your phone that is!)

We hope you love using your new phone case as much as we have loved designing it, but...If you are unhappy with it for any reason within 90 days of receiving it, we will be happy to refund your money or exchange your unit. We will even pay the postage! BTW, we will still do an exchange or refund your money if it has been longer than 90 days but only if you are nice about it:)

You might say - hey, it's just a phone case, how complex can it be to design one? 

Believe it or not, a crazy amount of time, passion and sweat went into the overall design - take a look below at just a few of the highlights:

Why HB Tune?

You may be familiar with our current design - in fact, you or one of your friends may even be using one now. Since 2011, we have sold almost 50,000 units and have been seen in Runner's world, Outside magazine, etc. 

Please check us out at:

www.hbtune.com
Our Facebook page
There are also plenty of reviews of our current design on Amazon:
Amazon reviews

Why are we on Indiegogo?

One problem we keep hearing with our current design is that you have to choose between a left and a right handed unit, which is kind of a pain...... :(

& vice versa

We wanted to stop the pain and launch an Indiegogo campaign! We have a great new design that is just as comfortable being worn on the LEFT hand as it is on the RIGHT hand which means no more choosing hands. 

Not only that, but you can easily switch hands while running.

Where we are at now:

We have already made a great prototype that I have taken on test runs. You can see a picture of it on both my left and right hand:



It works great and feels super comfortable. We have already received pricing from our vendor for an order volume of 5,000 units. We have also received in some units from a small production run that looks great. We need to fine tune it and then approve one final unit that will be the model they will use to compare against for quality - something known as a golden sample. All of the field testing has been completed and the final design is by my own accounts - pretty amazing!
We are now at the stage of taking pre-orders on Indiegogo and placing the production order with our vendor. Once we get them in, you will be one of the first to use them before we begin to sell them through our already established sales channels.

Timeline

Our Story

Way back in 2010, I was running through a heavily wooded trail with an iPod strapped to my arm. I wanted to take a look at the screen and almost ran into a tree because I was looking at my arm rather than looking at what was ahead. I looked up literally at the last minute! 

It would have really hurt if I hit the tree!

After narrowly dodging the tree, I realized it is better to run with your phone in your hand rather than on your arm!

Once I had the idea in my head as well as in my hand, our team spent some time working on the patent, making prototypes, etc. We officially sold our first unit in 2011, after our first patent was issued. We have been growing ever since. The new ambidextrous design will be a great leap forward in addressing the last issue with our current design.

We are really looking forward to a successful project and getting our product literally in your hands as quick as possible...

Thanks in advance for your support! :)

----------------

FAQ's

Is it water proof?
- It is NOT waterproof in the sense that you can't go swimming or take a shower with it. However, it is water resistant, so you will have no worries about the sweatiest of hands or running in a light rain. If in doubt, or when running in a heavy rainstorm, we recommend putting your phone in a plastic baggy to be safe.
Can I wash it?
- Yes, we recommend hand washing and air drying. The heat of the dryer may melt the plastic screen.
Will my phone fit?
- Once the project closes, we will be sending a survey asking you what size pouch you will need. It will list the max device dimensions for both pouch sizes, and it is pretty easy to determine what will work best for you. If you are unsure, please just reply back to the survey with your phone/protective case combination and we will be happy to send you the correctly sized pouch.
What about my earbud cord?
- Glad you asked! We have designed it so that your earbud cord will easily fit through the pouch no matter where your cord jack is. Since you will probably have a bit of extra cord, we recomend you feed the cord through your shirtsleeve.

If in doubt, or when running in a heavy rainstorm, we recommend putting your phone in a plastic baggy to be safe.

If you are unsure, please just reply back to the survey with your phone/protective case combination and we will be happy to send you the correctly sized pouch.

- Glad you asked! We have designed it so that your earbud cord will easily fit through the pouch no matter where your cord jack is. Since you will probably have a bit of extra cord, we recomend you feed the cord through your shirtsleeve.

story:
We aim to deliver on our promises and today we introduce our 
                                           CulCharge 100% satisfaction guarantee. 
     If for any reason You are not 100% happy with the CulCharge PowerBank you                                               receive, You can return it to us for a full refund.












StartItUp Podmol Brothers Wakelake          

FAQs

What are the risks and challenges in making CulCharge?

Since we already went successfully through one Indiegogo campaign 2 years ago, we know all the processes from prototyping, through time & money management, setting up manufacturing line, MFi licensing, to the successful shipping of final products to all our Indiegogo backers. We learned a lot during this exciting project, and since then have improved all the processes to much higher level. We are cooperating with very experienced MFi certified manufacturer, and we are following all the rules in order to reduce the risks to the minimum.


Why is there a $10 shipping fee?

The fee reflects current costs to reliably ship CulCharge PowerBank to you in most regions around the world.

I asked for my Perk to be sent to the wrong address, what should I do?

Please contact us at hello@culcharge.com.

When will you ship the CulCharge Power Bank?

We aim to ship the first CulCharge PowerBank pre-orders in December 2015.

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

Does CulCharge Powerbank works with iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus, iPhone 5/5S/5C?

Yes. The MFi lightning connector works for all mentioned types.

I had challenge making a contribution, please help!

If you had trouble making a contribution, please check Indiegogo's common contribution errors. 

Can I sync and transfer data as well?

Yes, of course, CulCharge PowerBank provides both charging/syncing ability. 

Can I charge just CulCharge PowerBank without a phone connected?

Yes, of course.

Why CulCharge PowerBank has 1000 mAh capacity?

1000 mAh is enough in order to charge smartphone by 30-40%, and in order to get MFi from Apple. At the same time, 1000 mAh is small enough to fit on keychain including inbuilt USB charge and data cable.

Want to become a Reseller or purchase in Wholesale quantities?

Looking for corporate promotional gifts? Please e-mail hello@culcharge.com.

Why did not You use magnetic lock like some other keychain cables or chargers?

We had prototyped it and found that there are 2 major concerns with magnetic lock: it can fall off the keychain when you take it out of pocket and it’s just a matter of time until product stops working because of magnetic field. It can also easily erase data on your credit card magnetic stripe. More info:

http://www.creditcards.com/credit-card-news/magnets-wipe-out-credit-card-data-cell-phones-1272.php

Lightning or microUSB connector looks vulnerable as it sticks out of the power bank. How long will it work for?

We did extreme tests on it with prototypes and also have experience from our previous campaign. We are confident it will work reliably. All CulCharge PowerBanks are also covered by our extensive warranty and will be replaced free of charge in case of failure.




*Indiegogo Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.
