story:
Introducing SHARGE

SHARGE is a revolutionary 65W GaN quick wall charger that's small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, yet powerful enough to fast charge three devices at the same time.

And with it, you’ll never need another wall charger for your laptop, tablet, smartphone, or devices again.

Why SHARGE?

We all know how inconvenient it is to carry separate bulky chargers for each laptop, tablet, and mobile phone to keep them powered through the day.

Even though laptops are getting thinner and lighter year by year, manufacturers continue to ship huge, heavy chargers with them.

As avid travelers ourselves, we knew there must be a better way.

That's why we decided to dive deep into R&D, exploring how we could make the smallest possible one-stop solution for powering every smart device on the market.

The result of this R&D — and over a year of sweat and tears — is SHARGE: the world’s smallest and lightest 3-port 65W quick charger, powered by GaN.

 

Palm Sized, Pocket Friendly

Smaller than a credit card and lighter than the lightest iPhone, SHARGE boasts a full 65W power output. That's enough to fast-charge a 2019 13" MacBook Pro.

No, really — SHARGE is so small that it will even fit into the coin pocket of your jeans!

 

One Charger for All

We designed SHARGE to completely replace every laptop/device charger you’ve ever owned.

SHARGE is universally compatible with virtually every laptop, tablet, smartphone, and smart device on the market today — and can charge up to three devices simultaneously!

Designed for Travel Pros

SHARGE’s compact size makes it perfect for travelers and digital nomads.

SHARGE accepts worldwide universal 100-240V voltage, meaning you’ll never need a voltage converter when you travel abroad.

And since SHARGE has no internal battery, it is completely safe for air travel and for use on airplanes.

Further, SHARGE also features fold-in electrical pins for optimal compactness and convenience.

 

Half the Size, Twice the Speed

Don't let SHARGE's size fool you. It’s small, but mighty. SHARGE It is compatible with a wide range of fast-charging protocols, including QC4+, PD3.0, QC3.0, PPS, SCP, FCP, AFC, and PE+. 

This means you can fully charge a 2019 13" MacBook Pro in just 1.7 hours!

And you can charge your iPhone X in 1.6 hours — that’s 2.5x faster than with the 5W charger that came with it.

 

Smart Power Splitting (SPS)

SHARGE uses a patent-pending technology called Smart Power Splitting (SPS), which intelligently determines how much power to feed to each device attached.

SHARGE is capable of providing a total of 65W to all devices plugged into it. If only one laptop/device is plugged in, that device can use the entire 65 Watts if it is able to.

If more than one device is plugged in, the 65W will be intelligently split among the devices, to ensure all of them charge as quickly as possible.

For example, if you plug in a 13" MacBook Pro, an 11" iPad Pro, and an iPhone X at the same time, the wattage will be split as follows: 

Note: Please ensure that your laptop needs no more than a 65W charger. If your device typically feeds off more than 65W SHARGE will likely still charge it, but it will charge it more slowly than a higher-wattage charger would. 

 

Goodbye Silicon, Hello GaN!

GaN. You've probably seen this word floating around the internet recently. But what is it exactly?

GaN stands for Gallium Nitride, and it is the heart of what makes SHARGE so groundbreaking. With this technology, SHARGE delivers a revolutionary level of performance and efficiency compared to traditional power adapters. 

Most microchips, like the one inside your computer, are made of silicon. Silicon is relatively inexpensive and easy to manufacture.

However, SHARGE’s chips are made of GaN, which produces less heat during operation — 40% less actually — meaning it can run more efficiently and can be significantly smaller than other silicon-based chargers.

To put it in a nutshell, GaN allows SHARGE to be smaller, lighter, and more efficient than any other 65W charger out there.

 

Safety First
We have obsessed over every detail of SHARGE to ensure it is as safe as possible.

We carefully engineered an internal chipset that protects your devices in the event of a power surge or short circuit, and also provides over-temperature protection.

SHARGE also has a state-of-the-art fireproof casing, and has passed all required certifications (FCC, ETL, DoE, CEC etc.).  

 

Complimentary Premium Braided Non-Tangle USB-C Cable Included

Not every USB-C cable is created equally.

Almost any USB-C cable can charge a smartphone, as most phones only need around 5W to juice up.

However, not every USB-C cable can charge a laptop. A special type of USB-C cable is needed in order to transmit the full 65W needed to charge some notebook computers.

This might seem confusing, but fear not — SHARGE has your back. We will throw in a professional-grade, thickly braided, 1.5 meter USB-C to USB-C cable for any and all of your USB-C charging needs. With it’s integrated eMark chip, it can charge anything from your wireless headphones to your MacBook Pro.

 

What if I live outside the US?
SHARGE's interchangeable plug heads AU/EU/UK easily slide-in ‘over’ the folded US plug and securely clicks into place.

Non-US backers receive one free interchangeable plug with each SHARGE, based on the shipping destination (i.e. Germany = EU plug, New Zealand = AU plug etc.). 

All backers will have the option to add-on interchangeable plugs as part of the final shipping confirmation survey.

 

But what if my laptop does NOT charge with USB-C?
No worries! You're good. 

Any laptop, so long as it requires no more than 65W, can be charged with SHARGE. All you need is a small USB-C adapter. We offer USB-C to laptop adapters for 18 laptop tips, including Apple Magsafe 1/2 and Microsoft Surface.

All laptop to USB-C adapters (18 variations) will be made available to backers as part of the final shipping confirmation survey.

 

Proof of Concept Video

 

Project Timeline

We have already completed the final stage of product design and testing, and are now entering the volume production phase. The plastic molds are just about to be completed.

Once the plastic molds pass the Engineering Validation Test (EVT), we will proceed into final sample confirmation, Production Validation Testing (PVT), and finally Final Acceptance Testing (FAT) and volume production. By the end of April 2020, you’ll have SHARGE in your own hands!

 

About Us

Tobe Xu and Zach Bielak first met in Shenzhen, during Zach’s first trip to China. It was love at first sight — the brotherly kind ♥️

They bonded over two important things they had in common: they were both engineers and avid travelers.

During their many treks together in southern China, they always had to lug around their laptops and devices with them just in case projects popped up. Often times, they found that the chargers took up more space than the devices themselves! They knew there must be a better way.

In early 2019, Tobe and Zach met William and Pan at an event in Shenzhen. William and Pan together shared years of experience in producing state-of-the-art chargers.

And with that, the idea for SHARGE was born.

Zach and Tobe brought on board two other people they had met in their prior travels: Jelena, an expert marketer, and Sivash, a graphic design god. Together, the six formed SHARGE, a world-class team with the dream of reinventing how we juice up our digital lives on the go.

 

Over a Year in the Making

Our team — based out of both New York City and Shenzhen, China — have dedicated countless nights to perfecting every detail of this product.

We have put together a world-class team of engineers to design this charger to be as small and safe as technologically possible. We have obsessed over every detail, from the exact GaN chipset to the plastic resins used throughout the product. And thanks to all of this hard work, we now have the smallest 3-port fast charger of its kind.

 Thank you for your support and backing, and for being part of the charger that will change the way we all juice up our digital lives.
story_txt:
Introducing SHARGESHARGE is a revolutionary 65W GaN quick wall charger that's small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, yet powerful enough to fast charge three devices at the same time.And with it, you’ll never need another wall charger for your laptop, tablet, smartphone, or devices again.Why SHARGE?We all know how inconvenient it is to carry separate bulky chargers for each laptop, tablet, and mobile phone to keep them powered through the day.Even though laptops are getting thinner and lighter year by year, manufacturers continue to ship huge, heavy chargers with them.As avid travelers ourselves, we knew there must be a better way.That's why we decided to dive deep into R&D, exploring how we could make the smallest possible one-stop solution for powering every smart device on the market.The result of this R&D — and over a year of sweat and tears — is SHARGE: the world’s smallest and lightest 3-port 65W quick charger, powered by GaN. Palm Sized, Pocket FriendlySmaller than a credit card and lighter than the lightest iPhone, SHARGE boasts a full 65W power output. That's enough to fast-charge a 2019 13" MacBook Pro.No, really — SHARGE is so small that it will even fit into the coin pocket of your jeans! One Charger for AllWe designed SHARGE to completely replace every laptop/device charger you’ve ever owned.SHARGE is universally compatible with virtually every laptop, tablet, smartphone, and smart device on the market today — and can charge up to three devices simultaneously!Designed for Travel ProsSHARGE’s compact size makes it perfect for travelers and digital nomads.SHARGE accepts worldwide universal 100-240V voltage, meaning you’ll never need a voltage converter when you travel abroad.And since SHARGE has no internal battery, it is completely safe for air travel and for use on airplanes.Further, SHARGE also features fold-in electrical pins for optimal compactness and convenience. Half the Size, Twice the SpeedDon't let SHARGE's size fool you. It’s small, but mighty. SHARGE It is compatible with a wide range of fast-charging protocols, including QC4+, PD3.0, QC3.0, PPS, SCP, FCP, AFC, and PE+. This means you can fully charge a 2019 13" MacBook Pro in just 1.7 hours!And you can charge your iPhone X in 1.6 hours — that’s 2.5x faster than with the 5W charger that came with it. Smart Power Splitting (SPS)SHARGE uses a patent-pending technology called Smart Power Splitting (SPS), which intelligently determines how much power to feed to each device attached.SHARGE is capable of providing a total of 65W to all devices plugged into it. If only one laptop/device is plugged in, that device can use the entire 65 Watts if it is able to.If more than one device is plugged in, the 65W will be intelligently split among the devices, to ensure all of them charge as quickly as possible.For example, if you plug in a 13" MacBook Pro, an 11" iPad Pro, and an iPhone X at the same time, the wattage will be split as follows: Note: Please ensure that your laptop needs no more than a 65W charger. If your device typically feeds off more than 65W SHARGE will likely still charge it, but it will charge it more slowly than a higher-wattage charger would.  Goodbye Silicon, Hello GaN!GaN. You've probably seen this word floating around the internet recently. But what is it exactly?GaN stands for Gallium Nitride, and it is the heart of what makes SHARGE so groundbreaking. With this technology, SHARGE delivers a revolutionary level of performance and efficiency compared to traditional power adapters. Most microchips, like the one inside your computer, are made of silicon. Silicon is relatively inexpensive and easy to manufacture.However, SHARGE’s chips are made of GaN, which produces less heat during operation — 40% less actually — meaning it can run more efficiently and can be significantly smaller than other silicon-based chargers.To put it in a nutshell, GaN allows SHARGE to be smaller, lighter, and more efficient than any other 65W charger out there. Safety FirstWe have obsessed over every detail of SHARGE to ensure it is as safe as possible.We carefully engineered an internal chipset that protects your devices in the event of a power surge or short circuit, and also provides over-temperature protection.SHARGE also has a state-of-the-art fireproof casing, and has passed all required certifications (FCC, ETL, DoE, CEC etc.).   Complimentary Premium Braided Non-Tangle USB-C Cable IncludedNot every USB-C cable is created equally.Almost any USB-C cable can charge a smartphone, as most phones only need around 5W to juice up.However, not every USB-C cable can charge a laptop. A special type of USB-C cable is needed in order to transmit the full 65W needed to charge some notebook computers.This might seem confusing, but fear not — SHARGE has your back. We will throw in a professional-grade, thickly braided, 1.5 meter USB-C to USB-C cable for any and all of your USB-C charging needs. With it’s integrated eMark chip, it can charge anything from your wireless headphones to your MacBook Pro. What if I live outside the US?SHARGE's interchangeable plug heads AU/EU/UK easily slide-in ‘over’ the folded US plug and securely clicks into place.Non-US backers receive one free interchangeable plug with each SHARGE, based on the shipping destination (i.e. Germany = EU plug, New Zealand = AU plug etc.). All backers will have the option to add-on interchangeable plugs as part of the final shipping confirmation survey. But what if my laptop does NOT charge with USB-C?No worries! You're good. Any laptop, so long as it requires no more than 65W, can be charged with SHARGE. All you need is a small USB-C adapter. We offer USB-C to laptop adapters for 18 laptop tips, including Apple Magsafe 1/2 and Microsoft Surface.All laptop to USB-C adapters (18 variations) will be made available to backers as part of the final shipping confirmation survey. Proof of Concept Video 
Project Timeline
We have already completed the final stage of product design and testing, and are now entering the volume production phase. The plastic molds are just about to be completed.
Once the plastic molds pass the Engineering Validation Test (EVT), we will proceed into final sample confirmation, Production Validation Testing (PVT), and finally Final Acceptance Testing (FAT) and volume production. By the end of April 2020, you’ll have SHARGE in your own hands!

It was love at first sight — the brotherly kind ♥️They bonded over two important things they had in common: they were both engineers and avid travelers.During their many treks together in southern China, they always had to lug around their laptops and devices with them just in case projects popped up. Often times, they found that the chargers took up more space than the devices themselves! They knew there must be a better way.In early 2019, Tobe and Zach met William and Pan at an event in Shenzhen. William and Pan together shared years of experience in producing state-of-the-art chargers.And with that, the idea for SHARGE was born.Zach and Tobe brought on board two other people they had met in their prior travels: Jelena, an expert marketer, and Sivash, a graphic design god. Together, the six formed SHARGE, a world-class team with the dream of reinventing how we juice up our digital lives on the go. Over a Year in the MakingOur team — based out of both New York City and Shenzhen, China — have dedicated countless nights to perfecting every detail of this product.We have put together a world-class team of engineers to design this charger to be as small and safe as technologically possible. And thanks to all of this hard work, we now have the smallest 3-port fast charger of its kind. Thank you for your support and backing, and for being part of the charger that will change the way we all juice up our digital lives.

story:
Hello I'm Rosolino

    I have been working with linux for 11 years and I'm very passionate about Technology and the GNU/Linux distribution.  I'm the owner, system administrator, IT Director & web developer of Tortib Shells Web Services.  I think offering premier services to the community of web developers is a great thing.  I have been a web developer myself and I have used many great services and I want to now offer the same great services to small & medium sized businesses.

    The nitty gritty

    You're probably asking yourself "What is this money going to go towards?"  Well, the main point is that I need more servers, primarily backup servers.  I offer small storage allocation for email currently and would like to expand that space to a bigger size.  I would also like to use some of the funding to help pay for advertising costs.  The funds will help build tortib shells into a better service providing better monthly packages for everyone.  I offer a very intuitive control panel which gives you full control of your domain names websites, email, FTP users & Shell Users.  The datacenter is fully equipped with water-cooling systems, generators & redundant gigabit connections.  All the websites hosted on Tortib Shells receive free Anti-DDoS protection, allowing the sites to stay online if another site is attacked, you don't feel the pain of another users website being attacked.  Tortib Shells also offers a great script installation system which allows you to install Content Management Systems (CMS) such as Wordpress, Joomla & Drupal all in 2 clicks of your mouse.  The script installation system also offers other scripts such a forum & gallery scripts, there is over 300 scripts to choose from!  Did I mention it's unlimited bandwidth for any package you purchase?  You can purchase the Static Website plan which is the entry level tier package and your bandwidth will be unlimited.  I also offer any scripting language, PHP, Perl, Python & Ruby all work on my servers.

      The Impact

      I have to admit I'm a very motivated person, so far I have done everything on my own for Tortib Shells.  I have setup the servers, configured the web servers, setup the control panel and developed the website.  Your contribution will help me get to my goal of offering better services at a faster rate.  Instead of offering the services I offer now and waiting for people to purchase services.

        Risks & Challenges

        There are always negatives in this world, it's just the way it is.  But I will do my best to ensure that Tortib Shells stays online 24/7x365.  I have monitoring on my servers to notify me when an issue arises.  Implementing the 24TB backup server may be risky in a way so I will have to overcome that since I have never done it before.  But I assure you with my years of experience I know that I will be able to handle any task that comes my way.

          Other Ways You Can Help

          Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help.  The two things I can suggest Is please make some noise about my services, tell your friends & loved ones about the services.  Spread the words that there is an affordable web service option out there and a plan to meet everyones needs, and please, use your indiegogo share tools!

          That's a wrap!

story:
Hello! My name is Saied Nesbat.  I am the founder and CEO of Exideas, a Silicon Valley software company.  We have invented an innovative text input technology for touchscreen devices that is better, faster and easier than the QWERTY keyboard. Now we need your help in disrupting the way people enter text on their small mobile devices. 

Yes! We really intend to change the world, and we hope you help us do it!

MessagEase, our keyboard, is designed based on many years of scientific research and development. It is based on sound UX design principles and it is optimized for one or two fingers. It really works: see our users ratings and responses below.

The QWERTY keyboard—designed almost 200 years ago—fails when used on a small touchscreen area. Its tiny keys make you error-prone, and dictionary-based autocorrections often miscorrect and embarrass you.

We designed MessagEase with this issue in mind. It has fewer, larger keys making them much easier to target on small touchscreens.

MessagEase's optimal letter assignment uses letter and di-gram frequency data and exhaustive simulation to minimize finger movement and maximize speed.


To accommodate the rest of the characters using only nine large keys, MessagEase places less frequent characters on the sides of the keys; you enter them with a directional drag or slide. Here is MessagEase's complete keyboard design with all the letters, special characters, and additional text-management keys (space, backspace, return, cut, copy, paste, select all, change of language, etc.)


This optimized arrangement, as strange as it may seem at first, is very efficient in entering all letters, special characters, editing commands, and many other text related functions not found on regular QWERTY keyboards. The research work behind this innovative design is published and we have an issued patent (US 6,847,706) to protect it.

MessagEase also includes Ctrl/Alt/Fn keys and an easy way to enter all accented and characters. Furthermore, all drag positions are user-programmable; you can define your own keyboard design, as many of our users have. Please see our user-defined keyboards here.

Here's a short video demonstrating how MessagEase keyboard works:


As the video demonstrates, we have implemented MessagEase and made it available for Android and Windows devices. With more than 100,000 installed users, MessagEase enjoys a growing and enthusiastic number of users. Here's how our users have rated MessagEase on Android's Google Play so far:

An overwhelming number of our users have rated MessagEase with 4, or 5 stars. Most people tell us they would never go back to QWERTY on their touchscreen devices, after using MessagEase for a few days. You can see all our users reviews and ratings here. Here's a sample from Google Play:

Since MessagEase is an innovative keyboard, it may look strange at first and it takes some getting used to. Our users' feedback indicates that it would take from a few minutes to one or two hours to become comfortable, even very proficient with MessagEase. 

Further practice also pays off, as we have users with speeds of above 80 words per minute. Please see our leaderboard. 

To enhance the learning process, we have created several fun typing games that teaches you MessagEase in stages. Balloon Game, Words Game, and Speed Game among the games provided in our MessagEase Game Package for our Android users. 


MessagEase game for Android is available for free on Google Play.

Our Vision and Goals

Our vision is to change the world by providing an easier, faster, and more accurate full-text interface for touch screen devices. 

Our goals:

  • Provide the the easiest touch-screen input for smartphones and tablets.
  • Create the easiest and the most practical means to enter full text on smartwatches.
  • Empower children who will learn how to write on touch screen devices with an input method optimized for speed and accuracy.
  • Create the best one-handed/one-finger input technology for devices that need to be operated with one finger, e.g., smartwatches, smartphones, (Internet) TV remote controllers.
  • Facilitate the use of touch screen devices and computers for people who've never used a computer or a keyboard before.

We Need You Support

If you share our vision—and we hope you do—of bettering the world by making it easier for people to use touchscreen devices, we want you to participate and share our joy in doing so.

So far we have invented, implemented, proved the concept, productized and won the loyalty of a remarkable number of users. To attain our vision, however, we need your generous support so that we bring MessagEase to iPhones, iPad, and smartwatches. We also need to continually update our technology to better match the capabilities of the new devices.

Changing the world is a lofty goal, but with your help and our diligence, we are confident that we can do just that.

What You Receive In Return

By investing in MessagEase you will enable us replace the QWERTY keyboard where it fails. In return, we will include your name in all future versions of MessagEase, on the list of our benefactors. Your name will be seen by everyone using the keyboard at some point as a testament your vision and support for innovation.

As a token of our appreciation and depending on the level of your support we will send you a sweatshirt or a Tshirt with MessagEase’s logo on the front and the phrase “I Support Innovation” on the back to commemorate your generous support.


What's Next

Your contributions will greatly help us in launching and completing several crucial components of our keyboard. First and foremost, we are working on a true keyboard replacement for Apple's iOS8. We also need to upgrade our Android version to improve its compliance with Android 5.0. We also have several Smartwatch projects in our pipeline, one for Android wearable/watches, another for Samsung's Tizen, and yet another one for Apple watch (the specs of which not determined yet). Another important component of our keyboard is its word prediction capability; we need to improve it to be in par of existing QWERTY-based word predictions. Our Windows version needs to be brought up do date and in par with our Android version. We will do this in two phases, as indicated below. We also need to implement the floating capability for our Android version, to make it better suit the larger tablets. Here's the timeline for our work ahead:


Risks & Challenges

Changing user behavior is a formidable challenge, but the QWERTY keyboard is so inadequate for small touchscreen devices that we believe a better method of text entry can succeed. Our belief is supported by our ability to grow a remarkable number of very loyal users.

In the face of change, often manufacturers and software providers of smartphones and smartwatches either cling to the status quo or are immobilized by NIH. Their fear of outside innovation is another challenge. However, we believe that by demonstrating the advantages of MessagEase and by further growing our loyal grass-root users, they will see MessagEase as a competitive advantage and a distinguishing factor for their operation and success.

Our many years of experience of honing and perfecting MessagEase added to our passion for providing the best tool for the future of text entry energize us to overcome these challenges. 

MessagEase in the press

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our project but you can't make a monetary contribution, please help us by sharing the good word about MessagEase with your friends and family. You can do this most easily by using the share buttons under the video. But please also help us by telling others even if you do help us with funds!

MessagEase Is the Unofficial World Record Holder of Speed Texting Without Dictionary Assistant!

Three of our champions so far have typed the official Guinness World Record Text for speed texting in under 20 seconds, with their best record, 19.09 seconds being the equivalent of 100+ Words Per Minute. These records are the fastest times ever achieved without dictionary assistance or word prediction. Please see here for more explanation.

Additional Features of MessagEase for Android

  • Cursor control
  • Macros
  • Word prediction
  • Editing functions (Cut, Copy, Paste, Select All)
  • Voice to Text
  • Customization of shape, size, colors, and placement of characters.
  • Ctrl, Alt, Fn 1-12, combinations and full set of Unicode characters.
  • Support of more than 40 languages

Supported Word Prediction Languages:

(MessagEase already includes keyboards for entering text in all these languages. The following extra modules are only needed to enable word prediction.)

Frequently Asked Questions

MessagEase is already on Apple Store, so why do you need to develop it for iOS?

Our current MessagEase app is not a true keyboard replacement for iOS. Only recently, with the introduction of iOS8, Apple enabled third-party software developers to create true keyboard tools. Our older MessagEase app no longer works under iOS8 and wee need to develop an iOS8 keyboard to replace it.

What’s your business model with your Android app being free?

Our over-arching goal is to get many people to try and experience MessagEase’s superior speed, accuracy and ease of use. We decided that having people pay for it would be counter to this goal and it would reduce MessagEase’s chances of success. Rather, we aim to grow the number of users and supporters of MessagEase to such a large number that the smartphone and smartwatch makers would find it not only indispensible but also competitively advantageous to embed it in their devices.

How long does it takes to learn MessagEase?

Our users tell us that it takes from a few minutes to a couple of hours of interspersed practice to become comfortable, even efficient, with MessagEase. They also tell us that playing our learning games help them climb the learning curve much faster than they expected.

Who We Are

We are very passionate about our technology and quite determined to further develop and evangelize MessagEase, the best input technology for touch screen devices. Our founder and technical guru are both PhDs from Stanford University and our three-member technical team has more than 70 years of software and high-tech experience combined. Similarly our avid business team has more than 40 years of UX, marketing and biz-dev experience. We are very confident  that we have what it takes to change the world and very excited about the prospects of MessagEase’s success.

Changing user behavior is a formidable challenge, but the QWERTY keyboard is so inadequate for small touchscreen devices that we believe a better method of text entry can succeed. Our belief is supported by our ability to grow a remarkable number of very loyal users.
In the face of change, often manufacturers and software providers of smartphones and smartwatches either cling to the status quo or are immobilized by NIH. Their fear of outside innovation is another challenge. However, we believe that by demonstrating the advantages of MessagEase and by further growing our loyal grass-root users, they will see MessagEase as a competitive advantage and a distinguishing factor for their operation and success.
Our many years of experience of honing and perfecting MessagEase added to our passion for providing the best tool for the future of text entry energize us to overcome these challenges. 

MessagEase in the press



 
  Other Ways You Can Help 
If you like our project but you can't make a monetary contribution, please help us by sharing the good word about MessagEase with your friends and family. You can do this most easily by using the share buttons under the video. But please also help us by telling others even if you do help us with funds!

MessagEase Is the Unofficial World Record Holder of Speed Texting Without Dictionary Assistant!
Three of our champions so far have typed the official Guinness World Record Text for speed texting in under 20 seconds, with their best record, 19.09 seconds being the equivalent of 100+ Words Per Minute. These records are the fastest times ever achieved without dictionary assistance or word prediction. Please see here for more explanation.



Additional Features of MessagEase for Android


Cursor control


Macros


Word prediction


Editing functions (Cut, Copy, Paste, Select All)


Voice to Text

Customization of shape, size, colors, and placement of characters.
Ctrl, Alt, Fn 1-12, combinations and full set of Unicode characters.

Support of more than 40 languages







Supported Word Prediction Languages:
(MessagEase already includes keyboards for entering text in all these languages. The following extra modules are only needed to enable word prediction.)

Frequently Asked Questions


MessagEase is already on Apple Store, so why do you need to develop it for iOS?
Our current MessagEase app is not a true keyboard replacement for iOS. Only recently, with the introduction of iOS8, Apple enabled third-party software developers to create true keyboard tools. Our older MessagEase app no longer works under iOS8 and wee need to develop an iOS8 keyboard to replace it.
What’s your business model with your Android app being free?
Our over-arching goal is to get many people to try and experience MessagEase’s superior speed, accuracy and ease of use. We decided that having people pay for it would be counter to this goal and it would reduce MessagEase’s chances of success. Rather, we aim to grow the number of users and supporters of MessagEase to such a large number that the smartphone and smartwatch makers would find it not only indispensible but also competitively advantageous to embed it in their devices.
How long does it takes to learn MessagEase?
Our users tell us that it takes from a few minutes to a couple of hours of interspersed practice to become comfortable, even efficient, with MessagEase. They also tell us that playing our learning games help them climb the learning curve much faster than they expected.

Who We Are




We are very passionate about our technology and quite determined to further develop and evangelize MessagEase, the best input technology for touch screen devices. Our founder and technical guru are both PhDs from Stanford University and our three-member technical team has more than 70 years of software and high-tech experience combined. Similarly our avid business team has more than 40 years of UX, marketing and biz-dev experience. We are very confident  that we have what it takes to change the world and very excited about the prospects of MessagEase’s success.

story:
Short Summary

This project aims to solve the Hotplugging problem with the USB host
driver on the Texas Instruments AM335x processor on the Beaglebone Black.

My name is Ulf Samuelsson, and eMagii is my own company.
In my previous career, I was an application engineer for Atmel, and provided
a lot of patches to the OpenEmbedded project and Buildroot free of charge.

Now I work as a consultant, but would  like to continue to work in these
projects, but beeing self-employed this will not bring any bread to the table.

Selected the USB hotplugging problem as a test, if this is feasible.

What We Need & What You Get

Building Angstrom is quite time consuming, so I have invested in a workstation
allowing me to reduce the buildtime from more than 3 hours, to less than one and a half.
This cost me $3-4k.
Will also pay for engineering time invested in this project.
Normally I can charge $125/hour as a consultant, and hopefully crowdfunding will make commercial sense, as long as I can solve real critical problems.

If this works out OK, then I hope to look into how to configure the Beaglebone
using a WiFi dongle in SoftAP mode.

The Impact

USB and hotplugging is like bread and butter. It is expected to work. Right now,  it doesn’t.

This is my first attempt at crowd-sourcing, but as you can see from the video in the Gallery, it already works on my system!

Other Ways You Can Help

Really, it is Texas Instruments that is is responsible for getting their BSP to work.

Talked to them, and they said they would solve it internally in 3.12-rc1, but according to
people testing 3.12, the problem remains.

Why not ask your local Texas Instruments to get the meta-beaglebone source code
and have them release to the public?

story:
Geek Stream is back! We owe a HUGE "thank you" to everyone on the Geek Force who has been extremely patient with us while we re-tooled, re-tweaked and have finally re-booted the Geek Stream (FKA Geek Wave Model S) campaign. When the Geek Force speaks, we listen. We hope the re-invented Geek Stream is all that you were hoping for and more!

Now onto the geeky goodness!

What is Geek Stream?

Geek Stream takes the cutting edge technology that we've developed for the Geek Out and puts into an ultra portable battery powered, multi-platform unit. Geek Stream allows your headphones to reach their full potential with crisper audio, lower bass notes and a wider sound stage to emulate how your music was designed to be heard.

Geek Stream is a Problem Solver

Problem - If you're a high resolution music lover, a majority of audio devices can't play any higher resolution than standard CD (16/44.1). That sucks!

  • It's a digital to analog converter (DAC). Our ears can't hear anything that's digital; digital signals have to be converted into analog form before we can hear them. DACs are everywhere: in your phone, in your TV, in your laptop or any other audio playing device. The problem with those DACs is this: they suck. Geek Stream's DAC doesn't suck.
  • It's high definition. Geek Stream can play any current or anticipated audio format and decodes digital files with resolutions as high as 32 bit/384 kHz PCM and 1 bit/5.644 MHz (DSD 128).

Problem - Standard headphone output isn't powerful enough! If you're in a crowded place, like a coffee shop, it's often hard to hear-- even with your music cranked to 11.

  • It's a headphone amp. Ever wish you could turn up the volume on your music just a little more? Well, Geek Stream's amplifier is up to 10 times more powerful than the headphone amplifier typically used in audio devices. That means you can really crank this sucker up. Not only is it louder, it's clearer and has dramatically more bass.

Problem - Car audio and home theater sound systems just don't live up to your Hi-Fi expectations.

  • Line out feature. Geek Stream has a line out feature allowing you to simply plug into whatever audio source you desire and instantly hear the difference with higher quality sound and clarity.

Multiple Configurations

Even a one-device audio ninja has multiple katana's. We've designed three configurations of Geek Stream to meet even the most demanding expectations of music aficionados.

  • Geek Stream 160:

    32 bit/382kHz PCM + DSD128 DAC
    3100 mAh lithium ion battery
    160mW headphone amplifier

  • Geek Stream 320:

    32 bit/382kHz PCM + DSD128 DAC
    3100 mAh lithium ion battery
    320mW headphone amplifier

  • Geek Stream 320 Signature Edition:

    32 bit/382kHz PCM + DSD128 DAC
    3100 mAh lithium ion battery
    320mW headphone amplifier
    —3 dB THD Performance Enhancement

Device Compatibility

Geek Stream is the master of adaptability. Keeping true to its name sake, we've designed Geek Stream to be compatible with iOS (with Apple Camera Kit), Android & USB 2.0 audio class compatible devices.

Who Are We?

LH Labs is an amalgamation of audio geeks and engineers who have partnered together with one sole purpose in mind: bringing the sound of high-end audio to the masses.

Based in Northern California, the epicenter of the high-end audio industry, LH Labs was founded on the principal that music lovers deserve something better than just the "usual." We've made it our mission to create the best products possible for both audiophiles and music enthusiasts.

We've earned all kinds of awards, including a CES Innovations Honoree Award, A Publisher's Choice Award from TONEAudio, a Greatest Bits Award from Audio Stream, a Writer's Choice Award from Positive Feedback Online, and a Blue Moon Award from sixmoons.com. We've been featured in Forbes Magazine, Entrepreneur Magazine, The Wall Street Journal, The Los Angeles Times, The Street, Stereophile Magazine, The Absolute Sound, The Business Journals, and The Daily Swarm, among many other publications.

story:
Short Summary

I've developed an application that allows amateur radio operators exchange text message between their APRS* radios or clients and cellular phones. The gateway is in operation today but further development is required.

What We Need & What You Get

While the application works, it is not scalable. It currently interfaces to the SMS world using a single modem with an application written specifically for that modem making it inflexible and non-scalable.

For this application to be truly useful to the HAM community, it needs to have the following attributes:

  • Needs to migrate from using a cellular modem to an SMS gateway service
  • Must support creating aliases for numbers
  • Needs a back-end database to maintain aliases and other data
  • Currently, the gateway will only work with numbers in the U.S. and Canada, but ideally it would support international numbers as well.
In order to continue development, I need a subscription to an SMS provider, such as Clickatell. Using an SMS gateway service will provide the following benefits:
  • The application will no longer be hardware dependent, making it easier to install and use in multiple locations
  • It will make the application easier to port to other platforms (Linux, embedded hardware, etc).
  • It will allow the application to be deployed by Amateur Radio Clubs anywhere, not just in my network.
  • Allow delivery verification in both directions

The funding collected will be used to purchase a subscription with an SMS Gateway service allowing me to complete development of the server-side interface and begin the process of porting the application to other platforms as well as making it generally available to the wider amateur radio community.

How it Works

APRS* users can send messages to SMSGTE with the 10-digit phone number as the first word in the message. The message will be routed via the gateway to the number provided.

The Impact

The application allows us to remove messaging barriers between APRS* and the SMS world. The most compelling use of this gateway is for emergency communications. Even when outside of cellular coverage, a VHF radio can usually reach an APRS* digipeater, allowing it to send and receive messages to cellular users.

The gateway has been under development for over a year, in regular operation for about a month, and further development cannot continue until it is untethered from the modem.

    Risks & Challenges

    The funding I've requested will only cover gateway charges for two years. During this time period, I have to complete the application development and garner enough interest from the greater HAM community to move it from a basement project to an operational tool in the APRS* network throughout the world.

    I am not looking to earn profit from this project, only to deliver a new tool to the amateur community at large.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    I am unable to fund this project myself, which is why I'm turning to the amateur community. I recognize that not everyone will be in a position to contribute, but please help me spread the word to other amateurs. This will be an asset to HAMs everywhere.

    * APRS is a registered trademark Bob Bruninga, WB4APR

    73

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Dean I'm 38yrs old.  I have a brain that just won't stop.  All my life I've had to find a better smarter way to do things. I have never had the means to persue any ideas that have come up. 

Lately I have focused my attention on the internet.  Did research on sites like Facebook, Ebay Corp, and World of Warcraft etc.  Took all the driving factors of these sites and merged them together.

The planned site will bring people together in a new way where even unique skills will be able to be shown off helping out the team.

Trying to get a good idea to the point where investors will even listen is almost impossible.  Having people contribute their own money into something unknown is a big burst of hope for not only myself but the thousands of others that have been this route.

Because of the nature of this game it is specifically designed to be a marketers dream. With players utilizing their interests, hobbies, skills, likes and dislikes etc to play the game the site can directly market to specific people/teams.  It is specifically designed to be very viral and  players will login on a regular basis even if they dont really want to (this is key).

 Predevelopment stage

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking for funding in the $50,000 range. More is always better and can be used just as productive.  Less is ok also as it will give a start to bring back here later or to an investor.

All monies will be going straight to an accredited web develpment business here in my city so I can work directly with them.  You can pay them directly if that's allowed.

All monies will be used to design and program the site.  Extra money will go to more programmimg, hosting, marketing and launching depending on the amount.

Less money will get things started as far as the money lasts.

$75/hr is the going rate here for web develpment but big money jobs might be able to negotiate less.

 

Because of the nature of this game it is specifically designed to be a marketers dream. With players utilizing their interests, hobbies, skills, likes and dislikes etc to play the game the site can directly market to specific people/teams.  It is specifically designed to be very viral and  players will login on a regular basis even if they dont really want to (this is key).

After being shown this site for raising funds I realized I'm not pitching for equity.  I thought long and hard about what people could invest their money in that would be best for them. Consider the fact that pageviews was a priority in the idea so advertising will be worth it.

I hope you like the perks.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you don't feel comfortable giving away your money and are just a bit curious then please show this to someone that might contribute.

If you are a programmer that might be interested in a job after launch email idea@sasktel.net

story:
The Xamen vault holds all your daily use technology and protects it with a fingerprint lock and Bluetooth tracker. It is designed by a European Race Car designer and made of recycled ocean materials. The Vault is intuitive and easy to use. Just plug it into the wall and it will charge all your devices at once.

 

Xamen Vault - Deep Dive

 

  • Designed by a European Race Car Designer
  • Made with Ocean Recycled Plastic
  • Fingerprint Secured Lock
  • Devices Charge Automatically Inside Xamen Vault
  • TSA / FAA Flight Ready
  • Secured with Location Tracker for Extra Safety
  • Intelligent Display- shows the charging % of the gadgets inside 
  • Weight: 150 gram
  • Dimension: 3 x 22 x 9 Cms

 

 

  • 30000 mAh
  • Charge 3 Devices Simultaneously
  • Compatible with Apple, Android Phones & Macbook Pro
  • PD Fast Charging
  • 2 USB - C 60w & 100w
  • 18 W USB ( QC 3.0 Compatible )

 

 

Xamen Thunder - Deep Dive

 

  • Most Powerful Power Bank on Indiegogo
  • Made with Aircraft Grade Aluminium and ABS
  • 30000 Mah Capacity 
  • High-Density Polymer Batteries
  • Charges 3 Devices Simultaneously 
  • USB-PD Support
    • Charge your device up to 70 % faster than standard 5W Charging!
  • Supports Lightning, Micro USB and USB Type C
    • 2 x USB-C Ports: 100W (Input & Output) + 60W (Output)
    • USB A Quick Charge 18 W output, (QC 3.0 Compatible)
  • Intelligent Digital Display 
  • Airline Safe 
  • Weight: 1.1 lbs
  • Charging Capacity Per Device
    • iPhone: 12 times
    • Android: 10 times
    • MacBook: 2.5 times

 

 

Designed with superior Hi-Fi sound and 8-10 hours playtime/call time, the Xamen Soul is the world’s most advanced true wireless earbuds.

 

  • Made with Cutting Edge Qualcomm Semi-Conductor Technology
  • Ergonomic Design
  • Low Latency Bluetooth 5.0
  • Intuitive Touch Sensor
  • Powerful Bass
  • Seamless Pairing
  • Advanced Noise Cancelling
  • Signal Stability

Xamen Soul - Deep Dive

 

  • Uses Cutting Edge Qualcomm Semiconductors
  • IP65 Water-Resistant
  • 8-10-Hour Play/Call Time 
  • Seamless Automatic Pairing
  • Advanced Noise-Cancelling
  • Wireless Charging
    • Automatically Charges Inside Xamen Vault
  • Bluetooth 5.0
  • One-Touch Control
    • Play, Pause, Skip, Stop, Volume, Next Track, Previous Track
    • Digital Assistant Access
    • Hands-Free Calling
  • Weight: 31 grams
  • Dimensions (Case): 5.75 x 3.7 x 2.5 cms

 

 

 

Placed inside the Vault, the Xamen Guide will alert you when you leave your tech behind! You can also attach it to any object or pet so you can find them via the Xamen app. Simply ring a missing item around the house or be notified before leaving things behind.

 

  • Range: 150 ft Indoor / 450 ft Outdoor
  • Last seen location
  • 100 dB Alarm
  • Crowd GPS Compatible
  • 18 Months Replaceable Battery
  • Worldwide usage
  • No monthly fees or expensive sim cards needed

 

Xamen Guide - Deep Dive

 

  • 18 Month Long-Life Battery (Replaceable) 
  • Bluetooth LE 5.0 Long Range
    • Indoor: 50 Meters 
    • Outdoor: 120 Meters
  • 100db Separation Alarm 
  • Last Seen Location
  • One-Touch Find 
  • Locate via Crowd GPS
  • Works as Camera Remote
  • Made with Aircraft Grade Aluminium and ABS
  • No Monthly Fees
  • Weight: 15gm
  • Dimensions: 36 x36 x 5 mm

 

 

The Xamen Stylus is how drawing and taking notes should be precise and intuitive. Ready to use with any touchscreen device and charges wirelessly in the Xamen vault.

 

  • Up to 40  hours of writing time
  • 30-day back-up time
  • Auto shut-off after 30 minutes
  • Polished brass pen head for smooth, accurate and fast writing
  • Ergonomic design for daily use
  • Active capacitor stylus 

 

Xamen Stylus - Deep Dive

 

  • Universal Active Capacitor Technology
  • Compatible with Android and iOS 
  • Polished Brass Head - Smooth, Accurate Writing
    • Anti-Scratch Soft Metal
  • Up to 40 Hours Writing Time
  • State-of-the-Art Inward, Outward Pressure Technology
  • USB Charging
    • Charge within 45 Minutes
  • 30 Day Back-up Power
    • 30 Minute Auto Shut-Off 
  • Made with Aircraft Grade Aluminium and ABS 
  • Automatically Charges Inside Xamen Vault 
  • Weight: 60gm
  • Dimensions: 145 x 9 mm

 

 

 

Hardware on the USB

Compatible with most popular Windows, Mac, iOS, or Android devices and software. Can Store  128GB. The Xamen Preserve can transfer files between devices and computers with no need for an internet connection or any other cables.

  • 128GB Storage
  • USB-C Connector
  • Lightning Connector
  • Micro USB Connector
  • USB-A Connector

Xamen Preserve - Deep Dive

 

  • 4-in-1 Lightning + USB A + Type C + Micro USB Connector 
  • Compatible with Almost All Devices
  • 128GB of storage space
  • Compatibility
    • iOS and OS X
    • Android
    • Windows

We’ve tirelessly worked to bring the Xamen family of products to you at a price that just makes sense! See what we mean, when you compare the price of similar technology.

 

 

The Xamen is direct to the consumer product.

So you get the saving of skipping the middle.

 

 

Xamen is a company that is truly on a mission, made of ordinary people with big hearts. Our mission is to make the world’s most innovative products that solve day-to-day problems, give more time back to users to spend it on things that they love most and make their interaction with technology a pleasant and fun experience.

Back in 2015, two high school friends got together over a cup of coffee in Toronto bouncing ideas and how they wished so many day-to-day challenges could be addressed with technology and how simple design changes in the current offering of gadgets could completely revolutionize and offer much more in value and experience.

Unlike most chit-chats, this was not an ordinary one, something touched both of them deep in the soul, and perhaps they had found the purpose of their lives. In the next two weeks, they both cashed out their savings to start Xamen.  A new baby was born. Gradually, like-minded product designers, App Developers, engineers joined hands to be part of the Xamen Family. Xamen is extremely proud today to have some of the best minds from around the world who have attended top universities in USA, Canada, Europe, and China.

Xamen so far is working on 12 different design projects and applications that are in various stages of development from design board to prototyping, testing and patenting. By December 2020 we project to have 4 products in the retail world that will make lives for our users much more comfortable and enjoyable.

We believe all our users will thoroughly enjoy Xamen Vault as much as we enjoyed developing this beautiful compact 12-1 device made with Ocean Recycled Plastic.

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see the reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship starting in Feb 2020. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

 

Market Test from Rainfactory

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for entrepreneurs & enterprises.

story:
(We will send an email to get your color)

 

OUR STORY

In the Spring of 2018, two friends came together to develop a life-changing, nay, a world-changing product. Collin Clevenger and Jacob Nolley have been best friends since fourth grade. From selling pencil erasers in elementary school to headbands in high school, we have always had a deep passion for entrepreneurship, but with a lack of resources or expertise, we always had a difficult time getting a product sold beyond the borders of our hometown. That is where the inspiration for The Graphite Lab began.

The Graphite Lab is a product development company focused on reducing the barrier to entry for young entrepreneurs with great ideas. We want to give people like ourselves the opportunity to take their products to market regardless of their financial or knowledge base. Once we develop a relationship with the entrepreneur, we will do all of the product development, marketing, financing, etc. in house and sell it through our sales' channels while educating the entrepreneur throughout the whole process. We make money once the product sells.

 

To test this model, we introduce to you our very first product:

 

 

UNLOCK SPECIALTY DESIGNS

Share the campaign with your friends.

The more contributions we have, the more designs you will have to choose from!

100 Contributions - Unlocked

150 Contributions - Unlocked

200 Contributions - Unlocked

250 Contributions - Locked

300 Contributions - Locked

350 Contributions - Locked

 

The GripIt is the most comfortable, carefree, and customizable way to hold your phone. Our patent-pending design allows users a comfortable elastic grip with the freedom to change its design in seconds. By adhering our breakthrough plastic to your phone, you will not only get a piece of mind knowing that your valuable device will not be dropped, you will also get a versatile kickstand that will allow you to rest your phone both vertically and horizontally. We know that most phone accessories add unwanted width to your sleek and slim device. That is why we designed the GripIt to be half the thickness of our biggest competitor. Your phone shouldn't catch on your pocket every time you put it away just because you want an easier way to hold it. Now it doesn't have to. If you help us reach our funding goal, we will not only get to bring GripIts to life, we will also get to start helping other young entrepreneurs make their dreams into realities.

​

 

 

Product Dimensions

 

 

OUR PARTNERS

Thanks to the help of several corporate partners, the Graphite Lab is so much closer to being able to put the GripIt in a store near you. Become one of our corporate partners today by selecting and purchasing the Bronze, Silver, Gold, or Platinum partnership perks.

 

Gold Partners

 

Bronze Partners

 

WHAT WE NEED

We are running a campaign to raise $15,000 to get GripIts to market. This money will be used to buy the mold and the first round of product. Your support will let you become a part of the miracle that is the GripIt and qualify you to receive some of the following perks:

 

 

 

 

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

If you want to help but don't have the funds to purchase a perk, that is okay. You can help us by making as much noice about this campaign as possible. Tell everyone you know to come, check it out, and share it with their friends. Just use the social icon buttons to share on all of the popular social networking sites! Thank you so much for your support and we look forward to bringing the GripIt to life.

story:
FAQS

What phones are the Mue Case made for?
iPhone 6/6s and iPhone 6/6s Plus, iPhone7 and iPhone7Plus

How can I choose case for iphone7Plus?
We are offering same perk price for all iPhone 6/6s and iPhone 6/6s Plus, iPhone7 and iPhone7Plus models and will send you mail to know about your need.

How much extra battery life does the Mue Case provide?
The Mue Case provides an additional 3000mAh battery for iPhone 7 & iPhone 7 Plus, which is equivalent to more than 20 hours extra talk time, 13 hours extra video play, 12 hours extra game time and 12 hours extra internet time.

How do you charge the iPhone and the Mue Case?
There is a single lightning port for charging your Mue Case and your iPhone. The case works on pass-through charging technology, and will charge your iPhone first and then your case.

Can Mue Case protect my phone?
Yes, although Mue Case is thin and elegant, it is very robust. The outer shell bumper and the case will protect your phone from all around, making it shock-proof.

What color options are available?
The Mue Case is available in Black & White color.

How thin is Mue Case?
Mue Case is only 5.5 mm thick. When it is on your iPhone, it feels like it’s just a part of it.

For Customer Support Questions:
If you have any customer support related inquiries, please email us at muecase@gmail.com

story:
5/10 Update: Thanks for all backers' support to NanoSmart. Our campaign has been closed by 5/9. We will begin to dispatch the NanoSmart by 5/13. Thanks again for all your great support.  

3/12 Update: 1. Free shipping for US AND Taiwan, China backers. 2. NEW Feature!! NOW NanoSmart can also support Bluetooth wireless headset, use NanoSmart wirelessly!!

The Origins of WiMe and NanoSmart: 

  • WiMe is a Taiwan-based company specializing in wireless product research, design, and manufacturing. At “WiMe,” short for Wireless Me, we strive to create trendy, portable products. Our goal is use mobile technology to help simplify the lives of our users.
  • While convenient for browsing the internet and watching a video, the founders at WiMe noticed that as smartphone devices grow in size, they're also becoming increasingly difficult to carry around. This inspired WiMe to design the one-stop mobile accessory solution - NanoSmart. Our versatile product can serve as a modern Bluetooth headset and dialer (answer or dial directly using the device), a music a player, as well as a smartwatch (syncs critical data like contacts and calendars instantly from your smart phone). Is that all!?! Of course not! There's one more key feature that really sets NanoSmart apart in the mobile devices and smartwatch market. Simply insert your local SIM card and instantly transform NanoSmart into a hassel-free, stand-alone phone.

 

How Can NanoSmart Help Simply Your Life? 

  • International travel or have more than one SIM. Insert a SIM card directly into the unlocked NanoSmart. With critical data (contacts) synced from your smart phone, NanoSmart functions as the perfect mini-clone of your primary mobile device during your travels or when you need another phone - NanoSmart is ready for use anywhere, anytime!
  • Heading out and don't feel like lugging around a giant smartphone. Leave the excess bulk behind when you want to go for a run or hit the gym! Use this powerful little gadget to tune-in to FM radio or use it as your MP3 player! With your synced contacts, music uploads, and local SIM, you'll be able to venture outdoors while enjoying music and staying connected to your mobile network. 
  • Keep better track of your insane schedule. Don’t miss another business meeting, school pickup, or meal with a friend. Sync NanoSmart to your Google Calendar (Android smart phones only for now) and wear the device as a smart watch to receive reminders about upcoming appointments. 
 
 

 

NanoSmart Specifications:

NanoSmart is currently available in six trendy colors. Additional details about the NanoSmart specifications are provided below:

  • weight: 30 grams
  • dimensions: 2"(H) * 1.5"(W) * 0.4"(D) 
  • screen: resistance touch screen, 1.54" (diagonally), displays 240*240 pixel high resolution, LCD (220.4 pixels/inch) 
  • phone: supports GSM network 850/900/1800/1900, no contract, no SIM lock.
  • features: GSM mobile phone, Bluetooth headset, Bluetooth dialer, watch, MP3/MP4, FM, contact list sync, recorder, USB drive
  • Android 2.3+ capabilities: Google Calendar, Gmail, SMS (NanoSmart App install on smartphone required), phonebook & call log
  • iOS 4.0+ capabilities: phonebook & call log
  • bluetooth: Bluetooth 2.1
  • memory: 4GB internal storage 
  • phonebook capacity: approx. 2000 entries
  • battery life: approx. 3-hr talk time, 70-hr standby & 60-min charge time
  • audio: stereo music performance by codec, FM radio, MP3/MP4 capabilities; voice recorder
  • SIM: standard SIM (micro SIM adapter available upon request) 
  • USB connector: 5 pin micro USB for charging & data transmission (USB drive)
  • anti-lost alarm: alert sounds when > approx. 30' from smart phone 
  • waterproof: daily waterproof. designed for daily use, not for shower, swimming, diving. 
  • NanoSmart need to connect with a headset to make or answer call. 
 
 
 

 

In the Press!

Curious what the critics have been saying or want to see some videos about this product? Here are some more helpful links about NanoSmart:

Recent Reviews:

  • devicemag.com: "Want a James Bond Style watch phone? Here it is... WiMe is a one stop solution for your desire to wear a trendy gadget."
  • geek.com: "it’s not a smartwatch in the same sense as devices like the MotoActv, Sony SmartWatch, or Pebble. The WiMe is actually a full-fledged smartphone scaled all the way down to a mostly wrist-friendly size."
  • geeky-gadgets.com: "Smartphone companion watches or smartwatches as they are sometimes known, are becoming more and more popular as an extension of your smartphone, allowing you to keep track of important notifications from your phone on your wrist."  
  • phonesreview.co.uk:"Recently we have started to see watches that can be parried with our smartphones that offer a variety of fetaures, and today we have news of the WiMe NanoWatch that is a small GSM mobile phone, which we think looks so much nice than the pebble." 
  • ubergizmo.com: "WiMe NanoWatch is definitely not the first of its kind, but will expand the horizons of an Android-powered timepiece."
  • ABC.es: "Se trata de un mini teléfono GSM que también se puede integrar vía Bluetooth a un smartphone. En él se puede recibir notificaciones de Gmail, historial de llamadas, y enviar y recibir SMS"

Featured Videos:

  • Youtube interview by tech blogger, Charbax
  • Instructional Youtube video by WiMe

 

How Indiegogo can Help

Community Awareness: every project begins with spreading the word and at WiMe, we think Indiegogo's trend-setting community is just the place to do it! We want to know what you think about NanoSmart. Any time you have any an idea about a product or feature enhancement (like receiving weather, Facebook, or Twitter notifications), tell us and we'll see what we can do! In fact, if we like your idea, we may even send you a small token of thanks once it's implemented. 

Continual Innovation & Design: several reviews have addressed how NanoSmart is revolutionizing the mobile device industry. At WiMe, we are constantly striving to incorporate more tools to simplify the lives of our users, but this requires R&D investment. We hope this Indiegogo project will help us raise funds to continue our endeavor, allowing us to launch even more trendy and powerful tools in the coming years.

We welcome your suggestions and thank you for your support!

 

Contact us!!

Questions or comments? Visit the WiMe company website or email us.

While convenient for browsing the internet and watching a video, the founders at WiMe noticed that as smartphone devices grow in size, they're also becoming increasingly difficult to carry around. This inspired WiMe to design the one-stop mobile accessory solution - NanoSmart. Our versatile product can serve as a modern Bluetooth headset and dialer (answer or dial directly using the device), a music a player, as well as a smartwatch (syncs critical data like contacts and calendars instantly from your smart phone). Is that all!?! Of course not! There's one more key feature that really sets NanoSmart apart in the mobile devices and smartwatch market. Simply insert your local SIM card and instantly transform NanoSmart into a hassel-free, stand-alone phone.
 
How Can NanoSmart Help Simply Your Life? 


International travel or have more than one SIM. Insert a SIM card directly into the unlocked NanoSmart. With critical data (contacts) synced from your smart phone, NanoSmart functions as the perfect mini-clone of your primary mobile device during your travels or when you need another phone - NanoSmart is ready for use anywhere, anytime!


Heading out and don't feel like lugging around a giant smartphone. Leave the excess bulk behind when you want to go for a run or hit the gym! Use this powerful little gadget to tune-in to FM radio or use it as your MP3 player! With your synced contacts, music uploads, and local SIM, you'll be able to venture outdoors while enjoying music and staying connected to your mobile network. 


Keep better track of your insane schedule. Don’t miss another business meeting, school pickup, or meal with a friend. Sync NanoSmart to your Google Calendar (Android smart phones only for now) and wear the device as a smart watch to receive reminders about upcoming appointments. 


 



 

 
NanoSmart Specifications:


NanoSmart is currently available in six trendy colors. Additional details about the NanoSmart specifications are provided below:

weight: 30 grams
dimensions: 2"(H) * 1.5"(W) * 0.4"(D) 
screen: resistance touch screen, 1.54" (diagonally), displays 240*240 pixel high resolution, LCD (220.4 pixels/inch) 
phone: supports GSM network 850/900/1800/1900, no contract, no SIM lock.
features: GSM mobile phone, Bluetooth headset, Bluetooth dialer, watch, MP3/MP4, FM, contact list sync, recorder, USB drive
Android 2.3+ capabilities: Google Calendar, Gmail, SMS (NanoSmart App install on smartphone required), phonebook & call log
iOS 4.0+ capabilities: phonebook & call log
bluetooth: Bluetooth 2.1
memory: 4GB internal storage 
phonebook capacity: approx. 2000 entries
battery life: approx. 3-hr talk time, 70-hr standby & 60-min charge time
audio: stereo music performance by codec, FM radio, MP3/MP4 capabilities; voice recorder
SIM: standard SIM (micro SIM adapter available upon request) 
USB connector: 5 pin micro USB for charging & data transmission (USB drive)
anti-lost alarm: alert sounds when > approx. 30' from smart phone 
waterproof: daily waterproof. designed for daily use, not for shower, swimming, diving. 
NanoSmart need to connect with a headset to make or answer call. 



 

 



 


 
In the Press!
Curious what the critics have been saying or want to see some videos about this product? Here are some more helpful links about NanoSmart:
Recent Reviews:


devicemag.com: "Want a James Bond Style watch phone? Here it is... WiMe is a one stop solution for your desire to wear a trendy gadget."


geek.com: "it’s not a smartwatch in the same sense as devices like the MotoActv, Sony SmartWatch, or Pebble. The WiMe is actually a full-fledged smartphone scaled all the way down to a mostly wrist-friendly size."


geeky-gadgets.com: "Smartphone companion watches or smartwatches as they are sometimes known, are becoming more and more popular as an extension of your smartphone, allowing you to keep track of important notifications from your phone on your wrist."  


phonesreview.co.uk:"Recently we have started to see watches that can be parried with our smartphones that offer a variety of fetaures, and today we have news of the WiMe NanoWatch that is a small GSM mobile phone, which we think looks so much nice than the pebble." 


ubergizmo.com: "WiMe NanoWatch is definitely not the first of its kind, but will expand the horizons of an Android-powered timepiece."


ABC.es: "Se trata de un mini teléfono GSM que también se puede integrar vía Bluetooth a un smartphone. En él se puede recibir notificaciones de Gmail, historial de llamadas, y enviar y recibir SMS"

Featured Videos:


Youtube interview by tech blogger, Charbax

Instructional Youtube video by WiMe
 
How Indiegogo can Help
Community Awareness: every project begins with spreading the word and at WiMe, we think Indiegogo's trend-setting community is just the place to do it! We want to know what you think about NanoSmart. Any time you have any an idea about a product or feature enhancement (like receiving weather, Facebook, or Twitter notifications), tell us and we'll see what we can do! In fact, if we like your idea, we may even send you a small token of thanks once it's implemented. 
Continual Innovation & Design: several reviews have addressed how NanoSmart is revolutionizing the mobile device industry. At WiMe, we are constantly striving to incorporate more tools to simplify the lives of our users, but this requires R&D investment. We hope this Indiegogo project will help us raise funds to continue our endeavor, allowing us to launch even more trendy and powerful tools in the coming years.
We welcome your suggestions and thank you for your support!
 
Contact us!!
Questions or comments? Visit the WiMe company website or email us.

story:
WHAT´S QUICKHELP?

Quickhelp is a new free collective social network in real time for micro and macro communities. The concept is very simple, we'll use collectivity to fix all kinds of needs that people experience from day to day. This ranges from a coffee date to avoiding a possible rape.

Our social network revolves around our QUICK button. When a user presses this button he will be able to access his needs (company, help, love, money, education, etc), just after a gps signal is sent . This signal will appear on the map of the main page of our website with your problem and your exact location, that way all users around you (or just the ones you choose) can see it and help you out.

For example, when pressing "quickcompany" you can send your location and your need (to watch a movie, take a walk, meet someone, go on a trip) to other users in your comunity  so the`ll be able to see your location and join you.

On the other side you can use the "Quick" button to ask for help in really extreme situations, like if you are beeing robbed, raped, kidnapped, a medical emergency and many others.

This means that if you are home alone and  you break your leg, or you are having a heart attack, you can easily press the "Quick Emergency" button and you will send your location to all your friends, family and authorities in your area.

MAIN CATEGORIES:

Every category can be a potential social network itself, the uses that can be given to QuickHelp are limitless as it covers mainly every aspect of society.

 

Find or offer accommodation at any moment or place. You will send your "quick accomodation" gps signal and people around you will offer their home, hostel, hotel or even a tent. 

 

This category can make a big difference. Using this button you'll send the location where human help is needed. If you can't help at the momment, let your networks take care of it!

 

Imagine you have an awesome idea and you want to start spreading the word and meet potential partners, then this "QuickButton" is for you . Share your idea with the world and make it happen.

 

This will be a really popular button. Let your networks know your need for company to go on a walk, see a movie, do homework, almost everything! Feeling lonely? Never again. 

 

If there's something you want to learn, push this button to find people with the knowledge and contact them throug skype in our website or mobile app, there's a lot you can teach too surely. A World of Knowledge is now in your hands!

 

This is a really important button, it can prevent rape, robbery, bullying, murder or even medical emergencies. If you are in a life or death situation just press this button and your location and problem will immediately show in your networks.

 

This button is really usefull, you can use it to invite your family or friends to dinner or on the other hand you can use it to send a static gps signal to the network worning that there is a homeless family that need's food, so that way any user of QuickHelp can support them.

 

Send this signal if you are alone in a bar, club, or at someone's house party and let people from your choosen networks join you! 

 

A limitless button. you can ask for any kind of help, if your car got stuck, if you want help to move out, if you got lost, or any help you could think of.

 

If you need professional assistance for anything, just tap this button and let people help you, for a reward. You can establish what´s the job that you´re offering and what would be the reward for doing it. Fix the pipes, paint your home, fixing your computer.

 

Find what people are looking for love, sex or foreplay near you. You can establish your preferences and your intention. Think about it. Just send the love signal and enjoy it! 

 

Imagine you are in a strage city and someone steals your wallet. Tap "QuickMoney" and explain your situation to all users around you so they can give you some help. Also you'll be able to fundraise any ideas you have!

 

Do you need a ride? Want to share a car for travelling? Do you need a plane ticket? With this button you can find transportation any time and any place. Let your soul travel!

Users will be able to create their own "quick" buttons and micro communities.

You can have many comunities based on couples, friends, coworkers, your family, cities,  countries or the whole planet.

This kind of social network can change the way we communicate and interact with other people. It's not longer just posting a "status" in your Facebook or Twitter, now you'll be able to really share your feelings and create a whole new reallity like never before.

Basicly, if you are all alone at night and you notice that someone broke into your house and is about to robbe you or something worst, press the "theft" button in your mobile phone, tablet or pc and you'll instantly appear in our map before the authorities, your family, your friends, your whole neigbourhood, country or even the whole world, as you choose, so they can help you, Quickly in real time.

You can set the propper priavacy for the messages you send.

WHO WE ARE?

www.teeknia.com

THANK YOU!!
