story:
We all encounter odor situations while driving that need immediate odor control ... stinky food, sweaty kids from a ball game, people farting, or just simply to freshen up the car before your date.  Now imagine having a device that can easily control any car odor, anytime, "On Demand" with a great aroma.  

Introducing the All New AIRE CONTROL, the ONLY auto fragrance device that allows the driver total ON-DEMAND control of the aroma in your car. 


FEATURES and BENEFITS

AIRE CONTROL LOOKS COOL and is VERY EASY to USE. 

This revolutionary design that is safe and easy to use, Just mount it to any car vent, turn on the air, and squeeze the bottle 1-2 times to energize the internal wicking system (it doesn't spray out and make any mess).  Within seconds, the wonderful Aroma flows out filling the car with a great scent just the way you want it. The scent also lingers for days before you might need it again... And whatever remains in the sealed fragrance bottle doesn't evaporate so it lasts a long time. 

TESTIMONIALS


LONG LASTING PERFORMANCE

Unlike all those "conventional air fresheners" which are typically strong only in the beginning and weaken or dry up quickly and uncontrollably, AIRE CONTROL is super long lasting. over 60 days depending on usage.  

Each fragrance bottle holds 120 shots of concentrated fragrance oil, so if using average 2 shots a day, you have 60 days of usage.  It can last even longer If you don't use your car often (I travel away 1-2 wks at time sometimes) because the fragrance oil bottle is sealed tight so the fragrance oil stays in the bottle and does NOT self-evaporate like all other conventional air fresheners. Best of all,  AIRE CONTROL allows you to control when and how strong you like it... On Demand. 

FRAGRANCE SELECTIONS

EASILY REFILLABLE  (patent pending feature)

Finally, when you're finished with a fragrance bottle, AIRE CONTROL can easily be recharged without throwing the entire unit away which causes land fill waste. You just pull down the empty bottle, and push a new bottle back up! It's that simple. 


REFILL SUBSCRIPTION PROGRAM (COMING SOON)

To make it easy for you to try new fragrance selections, we're creating a Fragrance Refill subscription program right on our website so you'll get the refills delivered to your door when you need them. We will constantly expanding new fragrances to enhance our lifestyles, and we would like you to be a part of our passion for good fragrances in your car forever! Please Stay in touch with our Facebook for the latest news on all our Fragrance developments.... 


YOU CAN HELP US!!!!!!!!! BE A PART OF THE AUTO FRAGRANCE REVOLUTION


We think AIRE Control is truly groundbreaking for the auto enthusiast.  To support us, the money you pledged will help us pay for our tooling and development costs, pay for the first production run and do the right marketing campaigns so we can get these products in your hands as soon as possible. Please share and expose this great new product with a few friends today and start enjoying your drive with a great fragrance you never thought possible in your car.  

Shipping and Handling within the U.S. is included and we are offering Early Bird Deals considering the MSRP is $4.99!  Just think! Receiving AIRE CONTROL right before the Holiday Season...  It can be great Stocking Stuffers for the coming Christmas Holiday. 



PLEDGES AND REWARDS

Please vote which Color T-Shirt You prefer and we will send that to you.

That’s why we developed the AIRE CONTROL Auto Fragrance System. With AIRE CONTROL, we had to think “out of the box”, away from the conventional concepts we see around us. Together with our engineering team, we searched for what has been done and gather what failed and worked, and finally perfected the AIRE CONTROL after over 2 years of developments and improvements. Several unique features has been patented or patent pending to protect our hard work. Features like easy refill, by simply pulling down the bottle and replacing a new one when finished, how simple! Also the Internal Wicking system that is leak proof yet can deliver strong aroma intensity when one desires. Finally, our fragrance lab matches AIRE CONTROL with various quality aromatic oils that are safe and bring joy to your senses…. We love this product and really believe there is nothing better. We hope you will make a pledge to try it and fall in love with it too.

WHY INDIEGOGO

In the world of retail air freshener market, it’s flooded with many products using the same old concepts just in different designs (paper, gel, wicks). It would be extremely difficult for a regular consumer to differentiate how AIRE CONTROL is better among them, it would just be “lost” in the crowd. ( Sure It would be great if our Indiegogo video can be played next to AIRE CONTROL in the shops, but with our America startup trying to swim thru the retail sharks, we really don’t think that’s going to happen anytime soon.)   So that is why we are going directly to YOU, the drivers that want something better for their car! We believe our AIRE CONTROL is very unique, and compelling. And Indiegogo provides the perfect environment for storytelling. We envision our campaign as an event to showcase this unique product to all that need it or wants to try it. In the meantime, we will gather everyone’s enthusiasm and feedback to fully bring this product to the market the right way. So please make a pledge today and help us spread the word on AIRE CONTROL, the On Demand Auto Fragrance You can Control.

SCHEDULE

Since the mold is completed, we are currently in production of our first launch batch scheduled to arrive in October.  Shipments start in November 2014.

This revolutionary design that is safe and easy to use, Just mount it to any car vent, turn on the air, and squeeze the bottle 1-2 times to energize the internal wicking system (it doesn't spray out and make any mess).  Within seconds, the wonderful Aroma flows out filling the car with a great scent just the way you want it. The scent also lingers for days before you might need it again... And whatever remains in the sealed fragrance bottle doesn't evaporate so it lasts a long time.

Unlike all those "conventional air fresheners" which are typically strong only in the beginning and weaken or dry up quickly and uncontrollably, AIRE CONTROL is super long lasting. over 60 days depending on usage.

Best of all,  AIRE CONTROL allows you to control when and how strong you like it... On Demand. 
FRAGRANCE SELECTIONS

 To launch AIRE CONTROL, we selected four of the most popular fragrances for North America. Our NEW CAR SCENT is refreshing, with hints of leather and cologne, VANILLA, rich and dreamy, FRESH LINEN, clean and crisp like laundry just out of the dryer, and CITRUS BREEZE, zesty, fresh and fruity. FRAGRANCE QUALITY AND PERFORMANCEQuality wise, AIRE CONTROL uses the best fragrance oil from around the world to make each unique fragrance offered. We source our fragrance from France, Japan, and America, and quality control production process to ensure they are the best for our senses and yours.
 AIRE CONTROL fragrance oil is sourced from the best fragrance suppliers in France, Japan and USA. Fully tested to ensure performance and reliability. 
EASILY REFILLABLE  (patent pending feature)
Finally, when you're finished with a fragrance bottle, AIRE CONTROL can easily be recharged without throwing the entire unit away which causes land fill waste. You just pull down the empty bottle, and push a new bottle back up! It's that simple. 




REFILL SUBSCRIPTION PROGRAM (COMING SOON)


To make it easy for you to try new fragrance selections, we're creating a Fragrance Refill subscription program right on our website so you'll get the refills delivered to your door when you need them. We will constantly expanding new fragrances to enhance our lifestyles, and we would like you to be a part of our passion for good fragrances in your car forever! Please Stay in touch with our Facebook for the latest news on all our Fragrance developments.... 

YOU CAN HELP US!!!!!!!!! BE A PART OF THE AUTO FRAGRANCE REVOLUTION



We think AIRE Control is truly groundbreaking for the auto enthusiast.  To support us, the money you pledged will help us pay for our tooling and development costs, pay for the first production run and do the right marketing campaigns so we can get these products in your hands as soon as possible. Please share and expose this great new product with a few friends today and start enjoying your drive with a great fragrance you never thought possible in your car.  
Shipping and Handling within the U.S. is included and we are offering Early Bird Deals considering the MSRP is $4.99!  Just think! Receiving AIRE CONTROL right before the Holiday Season...  It can be great Stocking Stuffers for the coming Christmas Holiday. 



PLEDGES AND REWARDS









Please vote which Color T-Shirt You prefer and we will send that to you.










FOUNDER'S STORY

Henry Wu is the founder and CEO of Aromate America Corporation, a start-up auto fragrance company located in Mission Viejo, California. Aromate America is the US subsidiary of Aromate Industries Co. Ltd., a world leading air freshener company with over 18 years experience in manufacturing and global sales of auto fragrance products.Henry was born in Taiwan and immigrated to the United States with his family when he was 10. He lived in Los Angeles during his early teens and later moved to New York City where he attended Forest Hills High School in Queens. Henry attained a BS in Mechanical Engineering from State University of New York in Stony Brook. 
The ambitious Henry started his engineering career in Connecticut as a project engineer before fate sent him back to Taiwan to explore his future endeavors... While there, Henry has worked as a PM in a world renown Industrial PC company, and later becoming the Sales and Marketing Director of Aromate Industries of Taiwan. His engineering experience and marketing savvy greatly contributed to the growth of Aromate Industries over the years. Now moved back to the United States, Henry's aim is to focus on this market with Aromate America. Henry is diversified, in that he is adept at conducting cross-culture business, as well as creating engineering designs, managing manufacturing, sales and marketing on a global scale.


On this AIRE CONTROL launch campaign, Henry has proudly teamed with Chip and Kim McAllister, the Season 5 winners of the CBS Emmy Award Winning television show, THE AMAZING RACE (Google them!) The McAllister's are also the founders of PeopleStar FilmWorks.  This amazing couple and Henry met by fate and the McAllisters enlighten Henry to the world of Social media marketing. Together they collaborated to produce the online pre-order campaign on INDEIGOGO for AIRE CONTROL™ kicking off Monday, September 22nd, 2014.
 Why AIRE CONTROLHaving been in the auto fragrance industry for so long, we’ve seen many fads come and go. With all the fancy air fresheners variations out there (some we produced), we know they really don’t work well when you need them at those “special moments” while driving.  In the market today, there is nothing that lets the drivers control "When" and "How Much" aroma they like in their car anytime, ON DEMAND.  That’s why we developed the AIRE CONTROL Auto Fragrance System. With AIRE CONTROL, we had to think “out of the box”, away from the conventional concepts we see around us. Together with our engineering team, we searched for what has been done and gather what failed and worked, and finally perfected the AIRE CONTROL after over 2 years of developments and improvements. Several unique features has been patented or patent pending to protect our hard work. Features like easy refill, by simply pulling down the bottle and replacing a new one when finished, how simple! Also the Internal Wicking system that is leak proof yet can deliver strong aroma intensity when one desires. Finally, our fragrance lab matches AIRE CONTROL with various quality aromatic oils that are safe and bring joy to your senses…. We love this product and really believe there is nothing better. We hope you will make a pledge to try it and fall in love with it too.
WHY INDIEGOGO

In the world of retail air freshener market, it’s flooded with many products using the same old concepts just in different designs (paper, gel, wicks). It would be extremely difficult for a regular consumer to differentiate how AIRE CONTROL is better among them, it would just be “lost” in the crowd. ( Sure It would be great if our Indiegogo video can be played next to AIRE CONTROL in the shops, but with our America startup trying to swim thru the retail sharks, we really don’t think that’s going to happen anytime soon.)   So that is why we are going directly to YOU, the drivers that want something better for their car! We believe our AIRE CONTROL is very unique, and compelling. And Indiegogo provides the perfect environment for storytelling. We envision our campaign as an event to showcase this unique product to all that need it or wants to try it. In the meantime, we will gather everyone’s enthusiasm and feedback to fully bring this product to the market the right way. So please make a pledge today and help us spread the word on AIRE CONTROL, the On Demand Auto Fragrance You can Control.
SCHEDULE

Since the mold is completed, we are currently in production of our first launch batch scheduled to arrive in October.  Shipments start in November 2014.

Meet Keruo L7

Nowadays more and more people are using their smartphones, tablets and notebooks to enjoy media content. However, due to the limited screen size, it is still not easy to show content to others. The best solution, whether for a business trip, a presentation or a movie, is to have a portable projector. 

Most of pocket projectors on the market couldn't reach a perfect balance between: big screen, long utility time, high image quality and small body. Apart from that, a traditional pico projector still needs a tripod to stand, so it’s not easy to carry around. To provide everyone with a real portable smart projector, that’s why we bring the Keruo L7 to birth. Now everything is different.

 

 

Click here to read an official review by Aptoide TV
 

 

HIGHLIGHTS OF KERUO L7

L7 has an innovative and unique design, which enables an adjustable elevation angle of  15 degrees. At the same time, L7 can do keystone correction automatically, thus we don't need a tripod or other accessories to carry with L7 everywhere. 

  • Designed to be small, L7 won Red Dot Award in 2016.

  • The unique hinge design changes the traditional structure of pico projector. Just get rid of annoying extra accessories.​​

  • Automatic Keystone Correction

 

  • L7 Main Features​

 

SMART SYSTEM OF KERUO L7

  • Android Operating System

Installed with Android 5.1.1 OS, L7 also provides us with original designed UI interface to help us play films and TV. Download any application you love.

  • Multiple Streaming Options​

With built-in WIFI module, L7 can stream content wirelessly from your smart-phone, tablet and desktop through mutiple channels including Airplay, Miracast, MIDI, Chromecast and DLNA. It also has a HDMI port and a USB port. Streaming couldn't be simpler.

 

HIGH QUALITY HARDWARE OF KERUO L7

  • L7 has an LED-based light source (DLP technology) with 30000 hours life time.

  • Built-in 3 Watt speaker delivers sound across a broad frequency range with minimal distortion and excellent bass effect. Or we can simply connect external audio through AUX or bluetooth to enjoy professional surround stereo.

  • L7 provides fluent HD video playing experience with a S905 64-bit 1.5Gh CPU (Quad-core cortex-A53) and  an eight-core graphic processing chip(Mail 450MP6+2).

About Us
story_txt:
中文介绍 | Français | にほんご |русское Введение | 한국어 소개| مقدمة إلى العربية |PortuguêsMeet Keruo L7Nowadays more and more people are using their smartphones, tablets and notebooks to enjoy media content. However, due to the limited screen size, it is still not easy to show content to others. The best solution, whether for a business trip, a presentation or a movie, is to have a portable projector. Most of pocket projectors on the market couldn't reach a perfect balance between: big screen, long utility time, high image quality and small body. Apart from that, a traditional pico projector still needs a tripod to stand, so it’s not easy to carry around. To provide everyone with a real portable smart projector, that’s why we bring the Keruo L7 to birth. Now everything is different.  

Click here to read an official review by Aptoide TV
 
 HIGHLIGHTS OF KERUO L7L7 has an innovative and unique design, which enables an adjustable elevation angle of  15 degrees. At the same time, L7 can do keystone correction automatically, thus we don't need a tripod or other accessories to carry with L7 everywhere. Designed to be small, L7 won Red Dot Award in 2016.The unique hinge design changes the traditional structure of pico projector. Just get rid of annoying extra accessories.​​Automatic Keystone Correction L7 Main Features​ SMART SYSTEM OF KERUO L7Android Operating SystemInstalled with Android 5.1.1 OS, L7 also provides us with original designed UI interface to help us play films and TV. Download any application you love.Multiple Streaming Options​With built-in WIFI module, L7 can stream content wirelessly from your smart-phone, tablet and desktop through mutiple channels including Airplay, Miracast, MIDI, Chromecast and DLNA. It also has a HDMI port and a USB port. Streaming couldn't be simpler. HIGH QUALITY HARDWARE OF KERUO L7L7 has an LED-based light source (DLP technology) with 30000 hours life time.Built-in 3 Watt speaker delivers sound across a broad frequency range with minimal distortion and excellent bass effect. Or we can simply connect external audio through AUX or bluetooth to enjoy professional surround stereo.L7 provides fluent HD video playing experience with a S905 64-bit 1.5Gh CPU (Quad-core cortex-A53) and  an eight-core graphic processing chip(Mail 450MP6+2). Usage Scenario Product Specs How we developed the Keruo L7   Rewards About Us

story:
Short Summary

Whirlybyrd.com is a social media site that is dedicated to the safe interaction between cheerleaders, coaches, recruiters and parents. A place that the industry can come together to talk ideas, compare notes and get advice regarding cheerleading.

Cheerleading is a booming industry and the communications between gyms, cheerleaders, recruiters and parents is done on Facebook now. Storylines are difficult to follow and difficult to find.

Whirlybird brings cheerleaders to the front of the pack with all content directly related to cheer through a free site. Cheerleaders can enter their skills, converse with others, read stories and eventually, shop for cheer related items.


What We Need & What You Get

Over the past 2 years, we have worked with a developer to get our site up and running, spent 10's of thousands of dollars to bring to life this great site. The developer eventually disappeared and the site is left in a stage that is 1/2 complete. Through funding, we will be able to make the necessary changes to the site to make it more efficient and, we will ge bale to get the site onto mobile phones by having the app developed.

This is a free site, something is being developed for the industry for the love of the industry. The only way for the site to make money is through advertising and when ready, fees on shopping purchases by customers.

In order to get the site cleaned up and the Apps developed, we need at minimum $10K. Should we not reach this goal, the money raised will go towards cleaning the site and making improvements of which we can no longer afford to do.

The Impact

Your contribution today will help bring this vision to life. As you can see if you visit the site, this is real, there are currently users however, the cost of enhancements needed on this site outweigh our capabilities at this point due to the actions of our previous developer. We currently maintain the hosting site with fund coming from our personal accounts as, there is no income coming in for the site since, it needs to be enhanced.

We are a small LLC with a daughter in cheer who happen to love the industry and want to change how the community communicates, your assistance will help drive this dream into reality.

Risks & Challenges

With every project there is risk however, in the cheerleading industry, a $3 billion dollar a year industry, there is so much room for success. This site is the first of it's kind and the potential this site holds is amazing.

As with any project failure is always a possibility but, failure in this case does not seem likely. The site is up and running, does have users. We just need to get it to the next level, the level that we should have reached had our developer not disappeared.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help with a financial donation but, have thoughts and ideas about the site, we would love to hear it. We are not a company that mass produces anything. We are a Mom and Pop company who is looking to make a difference.

Please spread the word about this campaign, the more help we can get, the better the site will become.

story:
The Fotokite Phi is designed to get your birds-eye perspectives as painlessly as possible. Lightweight at 12oz (350g) and folding to the size of a thermos, you can throw the Phi into your backpack and bring it anywhere. Take it out, unfold it, point in the direction you'd like it to fly, and it'll fly there like a kite. Capture aerial photos and videos elegantly, safely and quickly, before the moment is gone.


The Fotokite Phi's novel technology allows it to fly itself without any control from you. No piloting skills required - fly immediately without waiting for a GPS lock or having to do calibrations.  Once in the air, our unique smart leash lets you use gestures to adjust the orientation and position of the Fotokite in the sky.


  • Immediate intuitive launch (turn on, point, give it a twist and let go)

  • Easy gesture control via the smart leash. The Phi mirrors the motion of the smart leash. Alternatively, control the Phi from an Android device for precise framing.

  • Unlike conventional drones, any bystander has immediate visual feedback about who is responsible for the Phi, making it a significantly friendlier device.









We built the Phi for the hobby photographer, the action sports enthusiast, the guerrilla journalist and the gadget aficionado. 

Thanks to its small size and foldability, you can take the Fotokite Phi anywhere – whether you’re hiking in the mountains, going to a festival, visiting an archaeological site or sledding.

To explore the Fotokite Phi’s possibilities, we invited some of our friends to take it for a spin: 

Here is a shot from Fotokite at the Burning Man festival in Nevada:

As a photographer, you can capture stunning images of a wedding, as shown here:

Or you are just having some fun with it and go sledding with the Fotokite (we didn't plan this, just happened to have a Fotokite in the right place, at the right moment):



In the coming months, we will be tackling tasks in different parallel workstreams: design, development and production.

We are dedicated to our timeline and will keep you regularly updated on the status of our progress. We are also committed to transparency and keeping our Fotokite Phi fans and Indiegogo backers informed.


Fotokite was born with one mission: making aerial photography accessible to everyone. Our dedicated team combines skills and experience in robotic engineering, electronics and industrial design to build the Fotokite Phi. 

The Fotokite was born at ETH Zurich’s Flying Machine Arena, one of the world's most advanced research lab in aerial robotics. While finishing his PhD, at the Arena, Sergei was struck by the growing power and popularity of drone photography. Frustrated by overly complicated existing systems, he set out to build something more robust, and eventually arrived at using a taut tether to sidestep fundamental drone limitations.

So the Fotokite was born with one mission: making aerial photography accessible to everyone. Specifically, we aspire to solve fundamental drone issues: safety, need piloting skills, lack accountability, complex regulations and limited flight time. 

After a debut at TED2014 (Sergei is now a TED Fellow), the company developed its first product: the Fotokite Pro, a live broadcast aerial camera that can fly for hours thanks to being powered from the ground. The Fotokite Pro was presented for the first time at NAB2015, and has been used for several productions and is being evaluated for more.

Working closely with the broadcasting industry on a professional solution gave Fotokite the experience to start working on a more affordable version: the Fotokite Phi. By being able to shed core drone components such as expensive GPS receivers and by getting rid of an RC controller, we have been able to build what is, to our knowledge, the lightest, friendliest, safest, most portable and most affordable GoPro quadcopter yet.


Read more

Read more

Read more




1. Customer Service

Q: What is your refund policy?

A: Contributors requesting a refund will have to reach out to your team directly (via contact@fotokite.com). We will refund your pledge minus the fees that we paid to IGG/PP which is about 10%. 

Q: What will be the Fotokite Phi’s retail price?

A: We project the Fotokite Phi will retail for around US$500.

Q: What's up with shipping to Switzerland?

A: Shipping to Switzerland is $40, same as EU. While the Phi is developed and designed in Switzerland, final assembly is done elsewhere (most likely Hungary or China), due to pretty clear-cut cost/sourcing constraints. So we have to get the units shipped to Switzerland just like to any other place. Yes, making stuff and shipping it costs something -- we're being upfront with you rather than having one more excuse to not deliver on time later. Perhaps one day these guys will fly themselves to you for free ;-)

2. Product

Q: Why does the Fotokite Phi have a tether?

A: That's how the Fotokite knows where it is: the tether is always taut, and by "seeing" the tension force for Fotokite can maintain a stable position next to you. In addition, the tether solves fundamental interaction and safety problems: more an intelligent kite than a drone, it provides novel interaction (five-minute training) and clear accountability.

Q: Would it have the same effect if I attached a tether to another drone?

A:  No, it wouldn’t, nor would the Fotokite Phi work without the tether - it is core to how the Phi operates: Instead of relying on a GPS or radio signal for localization/control the Phi uses the tension force from the tether to figure out where it is. This means controlled flight no matter where you are: it is a completely self-contained system. 

Q: How long can the Fotokite Phi stay in the air?

A: The current prototypes fly for around 8-10 mins. (We've had to make the prototype batteries smaller as some prototype components, e.g. electronics and frame, are currently heavier than planned). We aim for 15min minimum for production units. Note that flight time may vary depending on conditions (e.g. windy conditions --> generally lower flight time). The batteries are in-field swappable.

Q: How can the Fotokite Phi follow me during flight?

A: Thanks to its embedded sensors, the Fotokite Phi constantly measures the angle of the tether relative to you. The Phi's world is literally centered on its user -- so when you move, it naturally moves with you. 

Q: How does the Fotokite Phi behave in wind or rain?

A: Wind: The Fotokite will not crash; it will fight the wind. However, very windy conditions may affect the stability of the video footage.

Rain: While the Fotokite works in light rain, we would not recommend using the Phi in serious "wet" conditions. The folding mechanism makes splash-proofing difficult, though we're keeping this in mind. We do not recommend operating the Fotokite Phi during rainy weather.

Q: Do you support night filming?

A: The Fotokite Phi is visible in the dark, as it is equipped with flashing LEDs at the front. Therefore, you always know where the Fotokite is in the air and how it is oriented. The definition of night shots will depend on the GoPro camera’s definition and ground luminosity.

Q: How long is the leash?

A: Currently, the Fotokite Phi’s smart leash is 8 meters (26ft) long.

Q: What are its safety features?

A: The tether is the first and most important safety feature: no fly-away scenarios! The system is very lightweight and uses flexible plastic rotor blades, safer than usual propellers. In addition, if one of the four motors stops, they will all stop, preventing the blades from spinning against something. Finally, the entire system is also extremely lightweight (~12oz), reducing the chances of serious accidents.

Q: What happens if the tether is cut / the battery runs out?

A: On empty battery / tether break detect the Phi goes into a "controlled descent" mode, where it comes back to the ground quickly, but gently. 

Q: What are the legal restrictions for flying the Fotokite Phi?

A: We strongly encourage flying responsibly. Thanks to its tether, the Fotokite is welcomed by safety experts as a safe, reliable way to access aerial perspectives, especially near crowds. The Fotokite has been exempted from aviation regulators in both Switzerland and France. However, legal restrictions vary from country to country, so we recommend to always checking your country’s regulations of your country. A good source for flying in the United States is Know Before You Fly.

3. Company

Q: When was your company founded?

A: Perspective Robotics was founded in March 2014. The company grew out of a research team from ETH Zurich, one of the world’s leading universities for technology and natural sciences. The core algorithms for our products were developed and refined over three years of PhD work at the Flying Machine Arena at ETH Zurich, and are protected by a patent application.

Q: What’s your track record in the field of robotics or drones?

A: Our first product, the Fotokite Pro, was developed in 2014. It is designed for professional news broadcasting. Key players in this field have tested and bought our products.

Q: Why are you crowdfunding?

A: We are almost ready to start manufacturing the Fotokite Phi on a commercial scale. But before that, we need to raise funds to generate plastic moulds so we can produce the Fotokite Phi in large quantities at a reasonable price. Your pre-orders will help pay for the moulds and confirm for us that people really do care about simple, safe and affordable aerial photography.

story:
Hey Everyone,

--->I am attempting to make the best computer yet! <--(It deserves that much awesomeness)

If you already know me, you know I am a big computer geek. I also help just about anyone with any computer problems at Edison State College. I work there as an awesome Peer Architect (Mentor). In my quest to learn more about technology to help others with their computer escapades, I am hoping to build a super computer soon.

This is what I have such a passion for, and hope you all might consider helping me fund a small but big stepping stone in my dreams.

Reaching this goal would not only help me but hopefully someone else in the future. With a new, more advanced computer, I plan on making a tutorial video to share with students who aspire to "build" their own computers or who just want to be more comfortable in their own skin with technology. I would also be able to install and learn more advanced software that I may work with in my future career or on other's computers in the future.

I appreciate any help with reaching my goal!

Thanks so much,

Kevinbot

story:
About

Looking for a more exciting PUBG/Fortnite battlefield or shooting skill improvement? Flydigi Stinger is here to help you rule the game!

Do you wish you could take your gaming to the next level? What if you could effortlessly improve aiming accuracy, shoot faster, and have flexible multi-control for mobile games? With Flydigi Stinger, you can enjoy the ultimate mobile gaming experience. It is simple to use, comfortable, and packed with performance that helps you excel with today’s hottest games.

 

 

Stinger utilizes Flydigi’s patented CapAir Mapping technology which:

  • Simulates human hand touch by sending a capacitive signal.
  • Does not require any connection or additional activation steps (e.g. No Bluetooth or wire connection needed).
  • No 3rd-Party App needed. After a simple and quick installation, you’re ready to play.

 

Unlike most mobile gamepads or triggers, Flydigi Stinger supports Auto mode (a faster way to shoot) using a combination of CapAir Mapping technology and built-in lithium active impulses that simulates a touchscreen auto fire of 8 times per second. A simple Long press of your Stinger boosts your fire!

 

The stretchable design fits your phone and locks it securely. You never have to worry about your gaming trigger coming loose from your phone when the battle is about to be won!

Flydigi Stinger is designed for a more user-friendly experience – you don’t have to take off your phone case when using Stinger. Also, connection and control sensitivity will not be affected by screen protectors either!

 

The stretchable design is made to fit phone widths up to 82mm. Adjust the yellow handle until it securely locks your phone, and you’re all set!

 

 

 

You can always use a single unit of Flydigi Stinger for better aiming and more effective shooting, but why not fully gear up your phone with a pair of Stingers to enjoy the ultimate gaming experience, or pair your Stinger with Flydigi Wasp to achieve a wider field of view and flexible multi-control!

 

We set out to design a trigger with a mobile gamers’ perspective in mind. For better comfort and performance, we went beyond what is possible with previous clipping designed mobile triggers. We performed thousands of tests and went through 12 different design optimizations on size, buttons and layout, to create Flydigi Stinger, an ergonomically designed trigger that perfectly fits the hands and provides comfort, secure fit and better gaming feedback.  

A notch is specifically designed to prevent users mistakenly pressing the volume button or lock buttons during gaming. The elastic band helps Stinger fit different phone sizes seamlessly and securely.

 

Running out of battery power when you are close to a win is frustrating to say the least. To avoid this, we upgraded Stinger’s battery life and improved it to 120 hours for those heated battles and long gaming sessions. 

 

Had enough for bulky mobile gamepads? Try Stinger, it’s compact, lightweight and fast. Treat yourself to the best portable mobile gaming gear!

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are a group of gaming enthusiasts who constantly strive to push the limits of product design to elevate the mobile gaming experience. We are passionate about creating better hardware. Our years of R & D experience in the game industry, relentless testing and program research and technology development, drive our dream to deliver better products for gamers.

Help us take Flydigi’s product worldwide so that gamers everywhere can join us and enjoy the ultimate gaming experience.
story_txt:
AboutLooking for a more exciting PUBG/Fortnite battlefield or shooting skill improvement? Flydigi Stinger is here to help you rule the game!Do you wish you could take your gaming to the next level? What if you could effortlessly improve aiming accuracy, shoot faster, and have flexible multi-control for mobile games? With Flydigi Stinger, you can enjoy the ultimate mobile gaming experience. It is simple to use, comfortable, and packed with performance that helps you excel with today’s hottest games.  Stinger utilizes Flydigi’s patented CapAir Mapping technology which:
Simulates human hand touch by sending a capacitive signal.
Does not require any connection or additional activation steps (e.g. No Bluetooth or wire connection needed).
No 3rd-Party App needed. After a simple and quick installation, you’re ready to play.
 Unlike most mobile gamepads or triggers, Flydigi Stinger supports Auto mode (a faster way to shoot) using a combination of CapAir Mapping technology and built-in lithium active impulses that simulates a touchscreen auto fire of 8 times per second. A simple Long press of your Stinger boosts your fire! The stretchable design fits your phone and locks it securely. You never have to worry about your gaming trigger coming loose from your phone when the battle is about to be won!Flydigi Stinger is designed for a more user-friendly experience – you don’t have to take off your phone case when using Stinger. Also, connection and control sensitivity will not be affected by screen protectors either! The stretchable design is made to fit phone widths up to 82mm. Adjust the yellow handle until it securely locks your phone, and you’re all set!   You can always use a single unit of Flydigi Stinger for better aiming and more effective shooting, but why not fully gear up your phone with a pair of Stingers to enjoy the ultimate gaming experience, or pair your Stinger with Flydigi Wasp to achieve a wider field of view and flexible multi-control! We set out to design a trigger with a mobile gamers’ perspective in mind. For better comfort and performance, we went beyond what is possible with previous clipping designed mobile triggers. We performed thousands of tests and went through 12 different design optimizations on size, buttons and layout, to create Flydigi Stinger, an ergonomically designed trigger that perfectly fits the hands and provides comfort, secure fit and better gaming feedback.  A notch is specifically designed to prevent users mistakenly pressing the volume button or lock buttons during gaming. The elastic band helps Stinger fit different phone sizes seamlessly and securely. Running out of battery power when you are close to a win is frustrating to say the least. To avoid this, we upgraded Stinger’s battery life and improved it to 120 hours for those heated battles and long gaming sessions.  Had enough for bulky mobile gamepads? Try Stinger, it’s compact, lightweight and fast. Treat yourself to the best portable mobile gaming gear!      We are a group of gaming enthusiasts who constantly strive to push the limits of product design to elevate the mobile gaming experience. We are passionate about creating better hardware. Our years of R & D experience in the game industry, relentless testing and program research and technology development, drive our dream to deliver better products for gamers.Help us take Flydigi’s product worldwide so that gamers everywhere can join us and enjoy the ultimate gaming experience.

story:
Meet Åtlasfera, Future Social Network about Lifestyles and Travelling

Åtlasfera is a simple social network with friendly interface and a global mission:

-To make the world a cozier place.

-To make everyone realize that they are a fundamental part of our planet.

-To let people show the world the way they live.

By designing a free open platform for showing lifestyles of people we confront xenophobia and social boundaries. Nothing makes one feel cozier in the world, than knowing, that on the other side of the planet someone is riding on a bus to work.


Search page

On our search page in order to find the person you are interested in you'll be able to set both geographical criteria (part of the world, country and town) and personal criteria like occupation, age and gender.


If you type in Europe, United Kingdom and London – you’ll see the profile of the city of London and then the list of the users who live in London.



Personal profile

Once you find someone interesting for you, you can go to their profile page which is designed to give you a complete picture of that person's lifestyle in less than a minute.

There are six default albums (users can neither delete them, nor add new ones)and they cover all aspects of life.

The first thing you see on Åtlasfera profile page is the Way of life album. By scrolling down you'll learn where the person lives, how their room looks, how they commute and so on.

Other albums are about places they visit, their city, events, travel and food.



City profile

Another interesting feature are cities' profiles. They accumlate everything that users who live in that city upload to the city album and what users who travelled there upload to the travel album, so you can see both: the way locals see their hometown and the way different visitors see it.



Selection page

If you don't have a specific request, you can use the selection page, which gives you a completly random photo from someone's Way of life album, you can comment and like on the photo and click next.



Messages

Messages are stored in dialogues and are very easy to work with.



Favourite

Favorite page is divided into 2 sections: Subscription – where there is your news feed made of actions of people you subscribed to and Photos – where all the photos you liked are stored.

story:
The reversible USB connector works in any orientation solving the problem of never getting it plugged in correctly.

We all the know the frustration with connecting  a USB connector. We never seem to get it right the first time. The reversible USB connector solves that problem once and for all and you get it right the first time. The reversible USB connector works with all standard USB ports.

The reversible USB connector is made from quality materials and is available for USB Micro and Lightning connectors. The Lightning cable is MFI certified and we ship all reversible cables free worldwide.


Get a big discount from the estimated retail price and free worldwide shipping.

Works with all standard USB ports.

Works with any phone or tablet with a Micro USB or Lightning connector.


All cables come with a 2 year warranty. If you share this project on facebook or twitter and let us know in the comments you will receive a free protective cover to protect the USB connector and a lifetime guarantee.


Micro USB connector for:

Android phones
Windows phones
Samsung Galaxy
Google Nexus
Amazon Kindle
Amazon Fire
Motorola
Nokia Lumia
HTC
and any other device that has a micro USB port.

Lightning connector for:

iPhone 5/6
iPad
iPod


The reversible USB connector is one of the greatest new innovations to the charging cable so far and one that gadget lovers have been long waiting for.


The Team

Observention is made up of people with many years of experience in the electronics industry. Our team members have experience in product development and working with manufacturers.

We have already built a good relationship with our manufacturers and they are standing by ready to start manufacturing.


Risks & Challenges

Even though we have a functioning prototype, experienced team and manufacturers ready, there can always be unforeseen problems and delays. We will do our best to keep you updated on the progress.


FAQ

Q: Does this work with all USB ports?
A: Yes, the cable will connect to all standard USB ports and there is no adapter required.

Q: When do you deliver?
A: We estimate to start shipping in January 2015.

story:
INTRODUCTION

Acne is the most common skin condition in the United States, affecting more than 40 million Americans annually. Acne is a chronic inflammatory skin condition that is characterized by blackheads, whiteheads, pimples and deeper lumps (cysts or nodules) that occur on the face, neck, chest, back, shoulders and upper arms. Acne often causes significant physical and psychological problems such as permanent scarring, poor self-image, depression and anxiety.

In addition to the embarrassment acne sufferers’ must endure, these are some of the side effects:

·  Swelling

·  Irritated skin

·  Redness of surrounding skin tissue

·  Sensitivity

·  Itchiness

·  Pain

·  Discomfort

All these side effects ultimately leave an acne sufferer desperate to terminate the pimples continued development and prematurely pop the pimple. Unfortunately, there is no existing “at home” products on the market that provide a means to effectively prematurely pop a developing pimple. Therefore, a traditional approach taken by acne sufferers’ to prematurely pop a developing pimple is to forcefully squeeze and pop it. The problem with this approach however is that the force used to prematurely pop the pimple causes the surface skin to be abruptly stretched, and is left torn and mangle. Resulting in acne scars!

                                                WHAT IS ACNESYS?

AcneSys is a “Patent Pending” professional “at home” acne treatment instrument/syringe. With built-in safety features, AcneSys provides a safe and effective means for acne sufferers’ to prematurely pop and extract(release) the build-up of puss from beneath the skin created by a developing pimple. AcneSys utilizes “single-use” disposable cartridges that contains a vented HUB retaining a MICRO SCALPEL TIP below. With AcneSys, an acne sufferer has the ability to place a small superficial incision into the skin directly over the pimple head, thereby creating an “exit point” to extract(release) the build-up of puss, and prevent acne scarring. See full illustrations below..


Scared of the word : Incision? No Need To Fear! A paper-cut at the office hurts more than an incision placed by AcneSys. The micro scalpel tip is less than 1 millimeter wide, and AcneSys has built-in controls that prevent a user from placing an incision deeper than 1/2 a millimeter.

**Incision deep enough just to create an "exit point" to release the puss build-up... 



AcneSys "Disposable Cartridges" are packaged sanitized/sterilized and come with protective foil seals on "front" and "back". The "front seal" is removed prior to use, while the "back seal" is pierced by the plunger during use (never removed).


**Before and after using AcneSys the user must wipe affected skin surface with an antiseptic solution (alcohol wipes). Complete directions for use will be provided in the "Instructional Inserts"..

 

 

 

Photo above is a "3D printed" model of AcneSys.. Amazing technology these days! :-)


            AcneSys Timeline

MARCH/ APRIL   -   Indiegogo Campaign
MAY/JUNE   -   Order Manufacturing Molds
                               Order Packaging/Instructional Insert Printing
                               Order Packaging Blister Packs 
JUNE   -   Pre-Production Approval
JUNE/JULY   -   Full Production
AUGUST   -   Delivery To Early Bird Backers
OCTOBER   -   Delivery To Remaining Backers     

  

**AcneSys does not cure, treat, or prevent the underlining cause of acne. AcneSys only aids to provide relief and alleviate the side-effects caused by a developing pimple, or similar blistery skin condition.

story:
The Campaign is now over, but you can still pre-order your Cricket here:

http://www.b45h.com/


What is The Cricket ?

The stealthiest silent alarm for bikes. When someone as much as touches your bikes, you'll get an instant (as in one tenth of a second instant) notification in your smart phone.

If the worst happens and your bike are stolen, Cricket can hunt down your bikes using it's cloud based system to ensure a swift recovery.

Your first line of defense - a small, lightweight silent alarm for your bikes. When combined with our free iPhone app, it allows you to sit back, enjoy and know your beloved bikes are safe where you left them.

The Cricket uses low-power Bluetooth communications with a range of up to 150 feet and works for years without replacing the battery or switching  the device on/off.

The Cricket will work with your iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C, iPad 3rd and 4th gen, iPad mini, and iPod Touch 5th gen

Each year hundreds of thousands of bikes are stolen across the United States, and each theft leaves the victim stressed and upset on top of their financial loss, we're here to help.

How does it work ?

You simply attach the cricket to your bikes, underneath the seat for instance and download the free app.

That's it, from now on, all you have to do is activate the cricket on your mobile phone.

Specs

Diameter: 30mm (1.2 Inch)
Thickness: 9mm (0.35 Inch)
Weight: Less than 20 grams (less than one Ounce)
Battery Life: At least a year, usually years.
Battery Type: CR2032 Button cell battery
Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.0 (Bluetooth Low Energy)
Device Compatibility: iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C, iPad 3rd and 4th gen, iPad mini, and iPod Touch 5th gen.
Sensor: 3-Axis MEMS Accelerometer.

FAQ

How far can The Cricket work ?

The Cricket has a range of up to 150ft. The application contains a bar showing you the Cricket signal reception, and will also notify you once you get too far.

How big is the Cricket ?

It’s 30mm wide and 9mm thick (1.2 by 0.35 Inch). But if more people join in, size might be smaller.

What kind of battery does the Cricket use?

The Cricket uses an easily replaceable CR2032 coin cell battery. Thanks to the new Bluetooth Low Energy technology and a smart power saving algorithm, this battery lasts at least for a year !

What application does The Cricket work with?

The Cricket works with a proprietary app for IOS.

What phones are compatible with The Cricket?

The Cricket works with iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5C, iPad 3rd and 4th gen, iPad mini, and iPod Touch 5th gen.

What about Android?

We looovvve Androids. Unfortunately, Android’s current support for Bluetooth 4.0 is limited, once there is a bugless solution for using Bluetooth 4.0 on Android, we will build an Android app. Trust us, it will be high on our task list. In the meanwhile, please join our mailing list at www.b45h.com – so you’ll know once we start supporting Androids.

How do I attach the Cricket to my bikes ?

Via the supplied zip tie or Velcro strip.

Where should I install it on my bikes?

The Cricket will work best underneath your seat. It is advisable not to attach the Cricket to metal objects such as your bike frame. You can play with different locations and check for signal strength in the app.

Is it waterproof?

Yes, but don’t go swimming with it.

How long will the Cricket last?

At least a year, usually a lot more, depending on how much you use it.

When will I get my Cricket ?

We will ship the Cricket before spring.

Is the Cricket the ultimate solution against bike theft?

The Cricket is as close as you can get to the ultimate solution without having to sleep with your bike under your pillow.

The Cricket works best at close, over the shoulder distances. People will touch your bike by mistake from time to time, so it is best to use the Cricket when taking a look at your bikes is as easy as looking over your shoulder.

However, if your bikes are gone missing while you are not next to them, the Cricket will become a beacon, notifying you instantly once anyone with the Cricket app is at close range to your stolen bikes.

What happens if someone steals my Cricket ?

We recommend installing the Cricket in a less visible location, such as underneath your bike's seat. We also supply the Cricket with a plastic zip lock, which should make it harder to just grab your Cricket. And don’t forget, the second someone as much as touches your bikes or just starts playing with the Cricket, your app will notify you instantly.

For added protection, we also offer the Cricket embedded within a U-Lock.

Who made your video ?

Hoohah Creative Collective from Israel. You can contact them at orensteinelad@gmail.com, we love these guys.

Which bike brand are you using in your video and images ?

We are mostly using Pitango Bikes http://www.pitangobikes.com go check them out !

How much is shipping ?

Shipping is free, worldwide !

What's been done already ?

We've already designed the cricket, and have used the prototypes ourselves, saving some bikes from theft in the process :-)

We've received a few price quotes from manufacturers, and are ready to make the next move - ordering a large batch of Crickets.

We've also build our iPhone version of the software.


* The Cricket is patent pending.

story:
This campaign ended. Thank you for your support ! With 200% funding, YOU made it possible to finish our project.

Rollin' Eyes controllers, LED rings and strips are now available via our webshop : ErgoMot Shop

You can also find and buy Rollin' Eyes products from our dealers.

for more info : mail : info @ ergomot . be

Translations available :    Deutsch      Nederlands     Français



New Sub Projects.

We first started the Rollin' Eyes project on Honda Goldwing GL1800, but now, we are expanding to different vehicles.

The first one will be Rollin' Eyes on Ford F150, a special halo around HID Projectors and a special halo ring around the Fog Lights.

Our RE halo will be multicolour, high intensity, it can be used legal on the road in "street mode" and off road, in "show mode", like the example YouTube above on a Goldwing cowling.


"Street mode" will be intense White DRL and will become Orange when blinkers are on (left or right). In "show mode" you can customise the show with your smartphone.

    

More vehicles will follow ... eg. Goldwing 1500 :

If you like what you see, make your contribution now, it is 15% to 25% cheaper than the suggested retail price after March 14. Perks are INcluding international shipping.

Ford F150 Perk : click here

Honda GL1500 Perk : click here

Honda GL1800 Perk : click here

Best regards, your Rollin' team.


What are “Rollin' Eyes”?

Frederic, Paul and Nicole, the owners of the company "ErgoMot Belgium", have developed a new spectacular LED product last 6 months: the ErgoMot "Rollin' Eyes".

These will be the automotive LED accent lights of the future. 

Indeed, it will be you who determines what will be shown on your LED's, via your Smartphone. It will be you who can choose what effects will play on your vehicle, in what colors, order, speed, repeat, etc.

Once you will have created your own beautiful light show (99 steps possible) on your phone and uploaded over Bluetooth to your vehicle, you can share your show with your friends, supposed they also have a set of Rollin' Eyes on the vehicle.

Tuning, Light Shows and Lightparades will be totally different.

YOU will expose your own light show, created on the screen of your phone, different from all the others who have standard tiny lights, which everybody already has. That's what we call “Show Mode”.

On the street, while driving, you can use the Rollin' Eyes in "Street Mode". The LED's will be white, ultra bright, strobe white or orange/amber in the front, red, ultra bright strobe red or orange/amber in the back, just following the existing signal lights of your bike, car, truck...

“Street mode” is easy, just connect some wires from the controller to the existing wires on your vehicle (by easy Posi Tap's).

the Android app is already available (free) in the Google Play Store :

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=rollin.eyes.led

The iPhone app will follow in due time.

We now ask for your support! You can help in 2 different ways :

- by sharing with other people who love modern, spectacular LED lights on car, truck or motorcycle.

- by choosing a "Perk" ( a reward ) for your contribution (via PayPal or Credit Card). It is now 15 to 25% cheaper then it will be as from March in the shops. ErgoMot can be trusted, we have been on the market for several years now, with the electric windshield X-Screen and other stuff. We are already sure now, it will be possible to start first delivery by the end of March, even when we do not reach our funding goal.

Why does ErgoMot need your support?

To bring a new LED product to the international market is very expensive and difficult nowadays.

We developed and tested the product, done, it works fine!

But we need some extra tools like better molds and for sure, we need good marketing. One thing in the marketing is better video material.

This product is something really NEW: total control over your LED's on your Bluetooth Smartphone (currently on Android, iPhone in some weeks). That is why ErgoMot introduces the product at a special "launch" price on Indiegogo.

You can already verify the future price in the future webshop: ergomot.be/shop

But for now, buy it from Indiegogo , it saves you a lot of money and gives ErgoMot the funds to market it as a real great product!

Thank you!

   


Both rings and strips come in a variety of sizes.  Absolutely NO technical knowledge is required to install and use!



Let your imagination flow and use them where ever you need special light effects.

Reward Program

You want discount on the Perks?

Or even Perks for FREE?

OK, it IS possible! 

Just follow THIS link and read the easy steps to get Rollin'


Short History

Half a year ago, Frederic had a dream! He wanted some 'spectacular' new lights on his motorcycle and was looking for the well known “Angel Eyes” and “Demon Eyes”, but was not pleased with the result. He also had a look all to the existing LED strips, but was not happy with the stupid little remote control, never doing what he wanted.

So, we started a new project, to give him full satisfaction :-)

Paul started experimenting with Android & microprocessor controlled LED lights … Frederic started tooling and design... Nicole made some funds available and … here is the result you can benefit from!

Quick Facts

2 operation modes

  • street / show

Pre Programmed user selectable light effects

  • currently +- 30 effects ready, number growing every day

User adaptable light effects

  • select what light-effects you want,
  • in the order, orientation, color and speed you want

12 volt power supply (car / bike / battery or 12v power adaptor)

  • 11 to 16 volt will do

Free Android App (Apple app under investigation)

  • Apple development funding is one of the reasons we are on IndieGoGo

Built in Bluetooth module

  • To upload your choice to the LED's from your BT phone or tablet

6 signal tap wires

  • to hook up to blinkers, cruise, brake and tail light
  • if you only need show, no need to connect them

2 plugs for RE ring or strip

  • one at the left,
  • one at the right,
  • but you can use just one

Each plug can drive 2 rings or strips

  • So, you can connect 4 rings / strips to one controller

Each plug can drive 144 LED's in total

  • Gives really very much, intense, bright light !

Rings and strips have many LED's (+- 1,5 led / centimeter or +- 3,75 led / inch)

  • That is the highest density in industry right now

Very easy to use

  • If you can manage your contacts in your phone, it's OK !

Unique features and design

OK, let's be honest, there are thousands of LED lights on the market. A few of them are very interesting with very nice features. But even the best led rings or strips work with a simple remote control, like the one you use for opening your garage door. Every click you give on the remote brings another light effect, but rarely what you want. Nothing to do, you have to click and click again and see all effect you DO NOT like, before you reach some you like, but than it is the wrong color at the wrong speed … annoying … After power down, you have to start again, try to find that one setting you did like, by clicking the remote like hell ...

OK, STOP!

With our Rollin' Eyes, you are in charge! Even before one led lights up, choose what you want, at the speed you want, in the color of your mood … all with the easy of using a smartphone.

And next time you switch on the ignition or the power, forget about those thousand annoying clicks on the remote for which you forgot which of the 4 buttons did what :-)

Yes ! We are aware some things like this already exists, allowing you to switch LED's on and off and change the color via a phone ... But not able to record, play and share your own show.

To make sure your light show or signals will be seen (think about your and others safety) we integrated our own real optical system in the rings.

the free app ?

How to use ?

RE can be used in 2 modes :

  • street mode
  • show mode

Street mode :

Street mode depends on the use of the 6 colored wires coming out of the controller.

The 6 wires are supposed to be connected to your vehicle signals : blinkers left and right, cruise light, tail light and brake light.

The 6th wire can be connected to a simple switch on steering wheel or handle bar (switch not included) or you could connect to eg. the alarm output.

When one of those wires “feels” +12 volt on the vehicle signal, the RE ring / strip will “imitate” the signal. E.g. when the red wire is connected to your brake lights, the RE will light up in bright red and will produce a “Brake Light modulator” effect.

The yellow wires connect to your blinkers left and right. The RE will blink orange or, up to you, will produce a “Mustang” effect, rolling left or right.

Via the app on your phone, you can change what the wires will do (configure in the setup screen).

The 6th wire is intended to be used as a "warning" and you can select via your phone or tablet what light effect it will show.


Show mode :

In our free app, you will find many pre-programmed light effects. It is a list on the top half of your screen.

You select the effects you like, in the order you want. Just tap your finger on the effect name you want.

Each time you tap on a name, it will be added at the bottom of a second list, on the bottom half of your screen. That will become your show.

You can easily customize each effect : color(s), speed, number of repeats, running direction (left / right), etc.

Of course, when you make a mistake, you can delete effects from your choice list, or even insert one if you forgot one.

Once you are satisfied, just connect to the RE controller over Bluetooth and upload your own light-show.

And there you are : your light-show runs and runs again. Even after you cut and reconnect the power, the show will start again. When you make a better version, you can upload it again.

Last bot not least : save your show in a file, share the file with your friends, they can upload in their own RE device!

Share with your friends :

Whenever you made a nice show, you can save it on your phone or tablet, you can give it a file name. That file, you can send to your friends, they can upload it to their own Rollin' Eyes. Ideal if you contribute to events as "Light Parades" or "Light Shows" or "Tuning" events! 

How does it work ?

Inside the controller is a power converter, a micro processor and a bluetooth module. Some simple electronics are added to connect everything and regulate the signals.

The DC-DC switching power converter is making a stable 5 volt out of your +- 12 volt battery or adaptor, without heat. The 5 amp 5 volt drives the led's in your RE ring or strip.

The 12 volt also feeds a quick powerful microprocessor. The microprocessor listens to the Bluetooth module and keeps an eye on the 5 input wires.

Whenever your phone / tablet sends a new program (selected by you in our free app) the microprocessor stores your program in his own, on board permanent memory.

Depending on the commands coming from your phone / tablet and eventually from the signal wires, the microprocessor sends digital data to each individual led, over one single data wire, millions of instructions per second.

Each led in the ring or strip has her own very tiny processor built in and shows the color and the intensity demanded by the master microprocessor.

Sounds all easy :-) but it took us more than 6 months to make it work :-)

Where are we now ?

Ready to go!

UPDATE : Feb. 22nd.

We have completed the industrial design - and spent months of testing, using prototypes and refining Rollin' Eyes from great to delightful.

We are ready to start final production March 15th.

The controller is full functional, some pre production units already run 24hrs a day in test, successfully.

The Android app is ready for 99% and is tested by the team members every day. The Android app is available on the Google Play Store. 

The Apple (IOS) app is done for 65% and will be ready in +- 10 days.

The strips exist in different sizes, some pre production units already run 24hrs a day in test, successfully.

The rings exist in 4 sizes, the pre production units do run 24hrs a day in test, successfully.

What has to be done?

What's the campaign money for?

    UPDATE : Feb. 22nd.

    • Test, test and test again.
    • Finish the app for Apple (iOS).
    • Develop international marketing.
    • Develop specialised shapes fitting more vehicles.

    Installation instructions

    on a vehicle

    Measure very carefully what size of ring / strip you will need. The rings are intended to fit around existing lights (eg. around fog lights).

    Rings do have a outer and a inner diameter, also a “depth” … make sure what you need before choosing your perk.

    Rings have to be put on with silicone gel. Best to use transparent silicone, like for bathroom and plumbing.

    Strips have a self adhesive backing. Clean the surface well before applying the strip (eg. With alcohol).

    Strips and rings have a 3 pin connector. It fits or to the RE controller or to our extension cables.

    Find a suitable dry place for the RE controller and secure it with silicone gel or with tie wraps.

    Route the (extention) cabling from each RE Ring or strip to the controller and click it in one of the free connectors.

    Eventually (when you want to use street mode) connect the thin colored signal wires :

    • yellow wires to the blinkers left and right
    • the orange wire to the tail light
    • the white wire to the cruise lights 
    • the red wire to the brake lights
    • the purple wire to some 'attention' switch or alarm

    Finaly : connect the controller's big RED wire to +12 volt (in a vehicle, over the ignition switch). Connect the big black wire to ground (- 12 volt). If you do not install in a 12 volt vehicle, you will need a power adaptor.

    When there is NO power to one or more of the signal wires : A demo program will start.

    With power to one or more of the signal wires : your rings or strips will start acting to what the controller 'feels' on the wires ...

    Use our free RE app on your smartphone or tablet to change the demo program.

    ATTENTION : connecting / disconnecting the RE ring or strip may only be done when there is NO power to the controller ! Making or braking the connection between controller and ring / strip, while the conroller has power, will PERMANENTLY damage ring or strip!

    ATTENTION : connecting / disconnecting the signal wires may only be done when there is NO power to the controller ! Making or braking the connection between signal wires and vehicle and or switches, while the controller has power, may PERMANENTLY damage the RE controller!

    other applications (no vehicle)

    Follow the 'vehicle' installation instructions. 

    When there is NO 12 volt battery power, make sure you have a good 12 volt DC (NOT AC) power adapter, able to deliver 12 volt DC regulated with minimal 2 amp contineous (better is 5 ampere) current.

    Altough you will not have blinkers, brake lights, etc. , you still can use the 6 wires to connect to various contacts delivering 12 volt on the signal wires. You could eg. have 6 switches connected to the PLUS of your power supply at one side and to one of the signal wires from the orther side. When you press a switch, you will see one of the six effects.

    But ... without vehicle, use the show mode! Your smartphone with our RE app will modify the demo program, make your own light show !

    Anyway : first connect rings or strips to the controller, connect (eventualy) +12 volt lines to the colored wires. 

    When everything connected : connect the controllers big RED wire to PLUS 12 volt . Connect the big black wire to ground (MINUS 12 volt).

    ATTENTION : connecting / disconnecting the RE ring or strip may only be done when there is NO power to the controller ! Making or braking the connection between controller and ring / strip, while the conroller has power, will PERMANENTLY damage ring or strip!

    ATTENTION : connecting / disconnecting the signal wires may only be done when there is NO power to the controller ! Making or braking the connection between signal wires and vehicle and or switches, while the controller has power, may PERMANENTLY damage the RE controller!

    Future Plans.

    After initial design for Honda Goldwing, we will start development for other vehicles. The first one will be on the famous Ford F150.

    The current controller will allow 90 steps in your own light show and has 35 , built in, light effect. You can customize the effects on your phone.

    After the first launch and delivery, we plan a larger version, where you can have +200 steps in your light show and where we can do +- 99 pre programmed light effects.

    We also think future customers will ask for other sizes and shapes! This has already been integrated in our production facility and we will bring what the market asks for.

    We are also investigating the possibility of hooking up 2 controllers, to be controlled over one single bluetooth and inter controller communication.

    How many will you need?

    On a vehicle, typical you can use 1 or 2. The best is to have one controller for the front and one for the rear.

    The front controller can drive rings/strips in the headlights and/or around fog lights, the rear controller could do rings/strips around the blinkers or strips in the bumper or spoiler or ... let your immagination flow ?

    Without vehicle ? Amaze us! Let us know what you will do with our RE, nice applications, we would like it on our website and in YouTube.

    Safe? Legal?

    Safe?

    YES! Been seen is always safe. Electrical safe? YES! Runs primary on 12 volt, rings and strips on 5 volt. No risk in that!

    Legal on a vehicle?

    in "Street Mode" : YES!

    In STREET mode (imitating the signals of your vehicle and acting as daytime running light) there is a great chance nobody will bother about.

    In "Show Mode", for sure, when you choose lighet effects like "US Police" or "EU Police" on your smartphone and you drive along with such effect running ... well, unless you ARE the police, they will not like it. Show mode is intended as SHOW, NOT to drive around with. Be smart, think about your own safety, check local regulations first ...

    As a last remark : when the LED's are OFF, they have a pure white color. It's under power and control they change to those heavy bright colors. So, when OFF, nobody will be able to judge what color was on before.

    When to expect delivery?

    We start shipping out at latest end of March, beginning of April.

    Risks and challenges.

    Update Feb 22nd.

    We are almost funded ...

    Select your Perk in the column at the right, make your contribution now and our project is secured, thanks to you!

    The prototypes are running 24hrs a day, in freezing cold and burning hot environments, it works.

    We are already well known in the Goldwing Motorcycle market (with our electric windshields and running lights) and all customers who have seen the prototypes glowing and blinking and rolling said : "I want that on my bike". So, we think we will start-up quickly.

    IF supporting us with money is NOT possible for you, which we understand, you still can support us by spreading the word on Facebook, Twitter and Google. That also is a great value to us! THANK YOU VERY MUCH for your "like" or "follow" or "+". 

    In conclusion...

    Are you still reading ? Waaaauuuwww :-)

    Thanks for reading on! Yep, I know, it was a long document, but we wanted to be as open as possible.

    If you love Rollin' Eyes, or just love to see our entrepreneurial spirit thrive, please help us get this amazing project off the ground.

    Every €1 helps, and telling people helps too. Every Facebook like, Twitter follower or Google extra PLUS ... you know the drill...

    Thank you for supporting the Rollin' Eyes project. The crazy LED Rings and Strips, showing YOUR light show, not ours.

     

    FAQ

    What happens if you don't raise enough money?

    Why did you choose 'Flexible Funding'? 

    This is not our first project! We started this "Rollin' Eyes" thing as a private project, just to have "amazing" lights on our motorcycles, ourselves. Some customers have seen it in an early stage, when they were in our workshop to have an electric windshield installed. They ecouraged us to make this a public project ... on Indiegogo ...

    We re almost funded! But, please continue to support us? It will make it possible to have a more powerful version.

    That is why we ask YOU to contribute TODAY and to be proud YOU have been one of the people who made this all possible. Thank YOU !


    I'm having trouble making my contribution payment.

    We don't control the checkout process, that's our friends here at Indiegogo who run this site.

    Please note that some of the fields like 'Country' and 'State/Provice/Region' aren't the usual pull-down menu but instead you just start typing to see suggestions.

    It usually works if you are careful and patient. If you you need more please email support@indiegogo.com

    What should I add for shipping?

    Simple. Nothing! 

    Shipping is included.

    We love simple things (like our Rollin' Eyes) and made very good agreements with our Shipping and Handling agent. Everybody at the same price. 

    I can't wait! When will you ship?

    We start shipping out at latest end of March, beginning of April.

    The faster we raise contributions the sooner we can commence the timeline from here to shipping. We have the intention to ship in the same order as the contributions came in. If you want to have one of the first devices : ... don't wait, choose your perk TODAY and make your contribution NOW!

    What if installed on lower part of a vehicle and hit by a stone?

    Both rings and strips are made of high impact material, poly urethane for the lens in the ring, PVC and HIPS for casing and housing. It has to be a BIG stone before you will notice something.


    When will you make one for my vehicle or application? I'd support you today if you did!

    Thank you – that means a LOT to us.

    There will already be different sizes of both rings and strips. With a little immagination, you could find a way to fit it.

    To get a project like this off the ground requires a lot of focus. Even big companies generally start out with a single version of a product, both to keep inventory management managable and to learn what customers really want before expanding.

    We're looking forward to doing many other versions of Rollin' Eyes , please be patient while we get our first version flying. BUT : LET US KNOW WHAT YOU NEED and give us a view to how many other people could use your remark?

    (And if you really love Rollin' Eyes  we'd be very grateful for a contribution even if you don't choose one of the current RE perks right now!)

    I have a great idea for a new light effect.

    Send us a message, describe what you dream about, we will try it!

    I want to be 'dealer' , selling RE to my customers.

    Perfect! No problem, we already have experience with our dealer network for our motorcycle parts! 

    There are several 'dealer' perks ready for you. Have a look at the bottom of the perk column ?

    My question is not in your FAQ!

    No problem, we will be glad to answer you! 

    Please send your question to : info@rollin-eyes.eu and we will try to reply within 24 hrs.
