Whenever your phone / tablet sends a new program (selected by you in our free app) the microprocessor stores your program in his own, on board permanent memory.
Depending on the commands coming from your phone / tablet and eventually from the signal wires, the microprocessor sends digital data to each individual led, over one single data wire, millions of instructions per second.
Each led in the ring or strip has her own very tiny processor built in and shows the color and the intensity demanded by the master microprocessor.
Sounds all easy :-) but it took us more than 6 months to make it work :-)
Where are we now ?
Ready to go!
UPDATE : Feb. 22nd. 

We have completed the industrial design - and spent months of testing, using prototypes and refining Rollin' Eyes from great to delightful.
We are ready to start final production March 15th.
The controller is full functional, some pre production units already run 24hrs a day in test, successfully.
The Android app is ready for 99% and is tested by the team members every day. The Android app is available on the Google Play Store.  
The Apple (IOS) app is done for 65% and will be ready in +- 10 days.
The strips exist in different sizes, some pre production units already run 24hrs a day in test, successfully. 
The rings exist in 4 sizes, the pre production units do run 24hrs a day in test, successfully.
What has to be done?
What's the campaign money for? 

UPDATE : Feb. 22nd.


Test, test and test again.
Finish the app for Apple (iOS).
Develop international marketing.
Develop specialised shapes fitting more vehicles.




Installation instructions 
on a vehicle 
Measure very carefully what size of ring / strip you will need. The rings are intended to fit around existing lights (eg. around fog lights).
Rings do have a outer and a inner diameter, also a “depth” … make sure what you need before choosing your perk.
Rings have to be put on with silicone gel. Best to use transparent silicone, like for bathroom and plumbing.
Strips have a self adhesive backing. Clean the surface well before applying the strip (eg. With alcohol).
Strips and rings have a 3 pin connector. It fits or to the RE controller or to our extension cables.
Find a suitable dry place for the RE controller and secure it with silicone gel or with tie wraps.
Route the (extention) cabling from each RE Ring or strip to the controller and click it in one of the free connectors.
Eventually (when you want to use street mode) connect the thin colored signal wires :

yellow wires to the blinkers left and right 
the orange wire to the tail light 
the white wire to the cruise lights  
the red wire to the brake lights 
the purple wire to some 'attention' switch or alarm

Finaly : connect the controller's big RED wire to +12 volt (in a vehicle, over the ignition switch). Connect the big black wire to ground (- 12 volt). If you do not install in a 12 volt vehicle, you will need a power adaptor.
When there is NO power to one or more of the signal wires : A demo program will start.
With power to one or more of the signal wires : your rings or strips will start acting to what the controller 'feels' on the wires ... 
Use our free RE app on your smartphone or tablet to change the demo program. 
ATTENTION : connecting / disconnecting the RE ring or strip may only be done when there is NO power to the controller ! Making or braking the connection between controller and ring / strip, while the conroller has power, will PERMANENTLY damage ring or strip!
ATTENTION : connecting / disconnecting the signal wires may only be done when there is NO power to the controller ! Making or braking the connection between signal wires and vehicle and or switches, while the controller has power, may PERMANENTLY damage the RE controller!


other applications (no vehicle) 
Follow the 'vehicle' installation instructions. 
When there is NO 12 volt battery power, make sure you have a good 12 volt DC (NOT AC) power adapter, able to deliver 12 volt DC regulated with minimal 2 amp contineous (better is 5 ampere) current.
Altough you will not have blinkers, brake lights, etc. , you still can use the 6 wires to connect to various contacts delivering 12 volt on the signal wires. You could eg. have 6 switches connected to the PLUS of your power supply at one side and to one of the signal wires from the orther side. When you press a switch, you will see one of the six effects.
But ... without vehicle, use the show mode! Your smartphone with our RE app will modify the demo program, make your own light show !
Anyway : first connect rings or strips to the controller, connect (eventualy) +12 volt lines to the colored wires.  
When everything connected : connect the controllers big RED wire to PLUS 12 volt . Connect the big
black wire to ground (MINUS 12 volt). 
ATTENTION : connecting /
disconnecting the RE ring or strip may only be done when there is NO
power to the controller ! Making or braking the connection between
controller and ring / strip, while the conroller has power, will
PERMANENTLY damage ring or strip!
ATTENTION : connecting /
disconnecting the signal wires may only be done when there is NO power
to the controller ! Making or braking the connection between signal
wires and vehicle and or switches, while the controller has power, may
PERMANENTLY damage the RE controller!

Future Plans. 
 

After initial design for Honda Goldwing, we will start development for other vehicles. The first one will be on the famous Ford F150.

The current controller will allow 90 steps in your own light show and has 35 , built in, light effect. You can customize the effects on your phone. 

After the first launch and delivery, we plan a larger version, where you can have +200 steps in your light show and where we can do +- 99 pre programmed light effects. 
We also think future customers will ask for other sizes and shapes! This has already been integrated in our production facility and we will bring what the market asks for.
We are also investigating the possibility of hooking up 2 controllers, to be controlled over one single bluetooth and inter controller communication.
How many will you need? 
 
On a vehicle, typical you can use 1 or 2. The best is to have one controller for the front and one for the rear.
The front controller can drive rings/strips in the headlights and/or around fog lights, the rear controller could do rings/strips around the blinkers or strips in the bumper or spoiler or ... let your immagination flow ?
Without vehicle ? Amaze us! Let us know what you will do with our RE, nice applications, we would like it on our website and in YouTube.
Safe? Legal? 
 
Safe? 


YES! Been seen is always safe. Electrical safe? YES! Runs primary on 12 volt, rings and strips on 5 volt. No risk in that!
Legal on a vehicle? 

in "Street Mode" : YES!
In STREET mode (imitating the signals of your vehicle and acting as daytime running light) there is a great chance nobody will bother about. 

In "Show Mode", for sure, when you choose lighet effects like "US Police" or "EU Police" on your smartphone and you drive along with such effect running ... well, unless you ARE the police, they will not like it. Show mode is intended as SHOW, NOT to drive around with. Be smart, think about your own safety, check local regulations first ...
As a last remark : when the LED's are OFF, they have a pure white color. It's under power and control they change to those heavy bright colors. So, when OFF, nobody will be able to judge what color was on before.
When to expect delivery? 
 
We start shipping out at latest end of March, beginning of April.
Risks and challenges.
 Update Feb 22nd.
We are almost funded ... Select your Perk in the column at the right, make your contribution now and our project is secured, thanks to you!The prototypes are running 24hrs a day, in freezing cold and burning hot environments, it works.

We are already well known in the Goldwing Motorcycle market (with our electric windshields and running lights) and all customers who have seen the prototypes glowing and blinking and rolling said : "I want that on my bike". So, we think we will start-up quickly. 
IF supporting us with money is NOT possible for you, which we understand, you still can support us by spreading the word on Facebook, Twitter and Google. That also is a great value to us! THANK YOU VERY MUCH for your "like" or "follow" or "+". 



In conclusion...
Are you still reading ? Waaaauuuwww :-) 
Thanks for reading on! Yep, I know, it was a long document, but we wanted to be as open as possible.
If you love Rollin' Eyes, or just love to see our entrepreneurial spirit thrive, please help us get this amazing project off the ground.
Every €1 helps, and telling people helps too. Every Facebook like, Twitter follower or Google extra PLUS ... you know the drill...
Thank you for supporting the Rollin' Eyes project. The crazy LED Rings and Strips, showing YOUR light show, not ours.
 
FAQ 
What happens if you don't raise enough money?

Why did you choose 'Flexible Funding'? 

This is not our first project! We started this "Rollin' Eyes" thing as a private project, just to have "amazing" lights on our motorcycles, ourselves. Some customers have seen it in an early stage, when they were in our workshop to have an electric windshield installed. They ecouraged us to make this a public project ... on Indiegogo ...
We re almost funded! But, please continue to support us? It will make it possible to have a more powerful version.
That is why we ask YOU to contribute TODAY and to be proud YOU have been one of the people who made this all possible. Thank YOU ! 
I'm having trouble making my contribution payment.
We don't control the checkout process, that's our friends here at Indiegogo who run this site.
Please
note that some of the fields like 'Country' and 'State/Provice/Region'
aren't the usual pull-down menu but instead you just start typing to see
suggestions.
It usually works if you are careful and patient. If you you need more please email support@indiegogo.com
What should I add for shipping?
Simple. Nothing! 
Shipping is included.
We love simple things (like our Rollin' Eyes) and made very good agreements with our Shipping and Handling agent. Everybody at the same price. 
I can't wait! When will you ship?
We start shipping out at latest end of March, beginning of April. 
The faster we raise contributions the sooner we can commence the timeline from here to shipping. We have the intention to ship in the same order as the contributions came in. If you want to have one of the first devices : ... don't wait, choose your perk TODAY and make your contribution NOW! 

What if installed on lower part of a vehicle and hit by a stone?

Both rings and strips are made of high impact material, poly urethane for the lens in the ring, PVC and HIPS for casing and housing. It has to be a BIG stone before you will notice something.
When will you make one for my vehicle or application? I'd support you today if you did!
Thank you – that means a LOT to us.
There will already be different sizes of both rings and strips. With a little immagination, you could find a way to fit it. 
To
get a project like this off the ground requires a lot of focus. Even
big companies generally start out with a single version of a product,
both to keep inventory management managable and to learn what customers
really want before expanding.
We're looking forward to doing many other versions of Rollin' Eyes , please be patient while we get our first version flying. BUT : LET US KNOW WHAT YOU NEED and give us a view to how many other people could use your remark?
(And if you really love Rollin' Eyes  we'd be very grateful for a contribution even if you don't choose one of the current RE perks right now!)

I have a great idea for a new light effect.
Send us a message, describe what you dream about, we will try it!


I want to be 'dealer' , selling RE to my customers.


Perfect! No problem, we already have experience with our dealer network for our motorcycle parts! 
There are several 'dealer' perks ready for you. Have a look at the bottom of the perk column ?

My question is not in your FAQ!

No problem, we will be glad to answer you! 
Please send your question to : info@rollin-eyes.eu and we will try to reply within 24 hrs.

story:
Short Summary

The *Never Lose* is just that (never lose your phone!) a small, simple, yet incredibly effective and useful product designed to solve the biggest reasons we are replacing our electronics and handheld devices, such as our cell phones, tablets and MP3 players. The Never Lose was designed to protect your property and the information stored in them. It is designed to attach to any variety of handheld devices, not just any one brand in particular. The Never Lose has a permanent peel-off stick-on pad which attaches securely to the back of any device. The other end hooks to a belt loop, purse strap or backpack.

Here are a few of the benefits of the Never Lose

Small electronic devices are left sitting around and lost every day. "I lost it in the car, "I left it back at the restaurant" and "I know it is in this pile of stuff somewhere" are all phrases that the Never Lose eliminates. 

Does your smart phone have a big crack in the screen? Did you buy that thick and expensive case to try and protect your phone and prevent that damage from happening? The Never Lose protects your device from impact; the Never Lose keeps your device from ever hitting the ground in the first place. It avoids costly repairs and the need to replace your damaged device. What's more, you are not having to replace all of the lost data that had been on that device, be it phone contacts, music or other important files.

 

Sadly, we live in a world where crime is a reality. Phones are stolen from our pockets, off the table we are sitting at, and in some cases, right out of our hands as we walk down the street. The Never Lose attaches the phone to your person. Don't let someone run off with your expensive electronics, make sure they stay with you!

Not only will the Never Lose be a huge money saver for consumers when it saves their phone from being lost or damaged, but it will also be an iconic marketing tool in the advertising industry as well as a fashion statement at the same time. The Never Lose has a quarter inch retractable lanyard that is wide enough for there to be a print of your company logo, your favorite sports team, or any number of fashionable designs. This information is printed on your Never Lose lanyard strap for everyone to see every time you use your device with the Never Lose. As well as protecting your property, it clearly and openly advertises what ever you want. In a world where everyone is looking for new forms of advertising, the Never Lose serves both the function of safeguarding your devices as well as advertising your business name when you are on the go. Phone companies such as AT&T, Sprint and T-Mobile could give out a Never Lose with the purchase of a new phone or plan and with a full 1/2" wide retracting leader their message will always come across loud and clear. Other businesses such as Coke, Pepsi, dealerships, fashion brands and more will be able to put their labels on the Never Lose, literally a "walking billboard" even a fashion statement. This product has the potential to be a real game changer, even iconic.

The Never Lose is a one of a kind that has people asking, "Why hasn't this been done before?"  There is no other handheld device leash with these kind of features and benefits!

What We Need & What You Get

Never Lose needs to raise approximately $35,000 in order to start producing this product on a large scale.

$15,000 is needed to begin the production process. The Never Lose will be manufactured and distributed on a large, wide scale map.

Another $15,000 will be needed for the perks program.

The remaining money will be spent on the marketing and advertising of the product. Adding new brands and names to the lanyards as well as placing the product in phone stores and electronic stores.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone can contribute money. There are other ways you can help though!

Please leave a comment... if there's something we can do better let us know!

The link below will take you to our Marketers facebook page where he is constantly posting updates and new videos and images. Just because you can't donate, doesn't mean your friend can't! Help out by "Liking" and "Sharing" the links he posts to help spread the word!

Maybe you'll get a laugh out of some of these videos at the same time.

https://www.facebook.com/codycrumccmarketing

story:
GREAT NEWS!!!


Still haven't get yourself a Sapphire Shieldz?


We are giving a further 30% off on our screen protectors for all supporting models~
Start choosing a promo perk today while it last!!



                                         

Your ultimate device protection

Introducing one of the worlds best Smartphone and Tablet screen protector which gives you the edge in protection and clarity enhancements!!

Smartphones and Tablets have become almost inseparable for most of us in our daily lives. According to comScore Inc, 147.9 million in US owns a Smartphone in the year 2013, which comprises over 62% of the mobile market. This shows that one in every 5 people is a Smartphone user in US.

The screen of these devices is known to be the key parts and also the most vulnerable area. The functionality and cosmetics of the device are likely to be severely affected should no proper or quality protections are provided; not to mention accidents are prone to happen in our daily usage.

 

We are the solution to your problems!!

You will never need to worry that your screen will be scratched, bad touch sensitivity, dust sensitive and many other problems you may think of.


Our premium screen protectors are catered to devices which are most commonly used in the market.


From Smartphones to Tablets across multiple leading brands in the market

 Sapphire Guardz uses high quality materials to come up with a state of the art screen protector. With only .26mm thickness, you will be able to have maximum protection on your device’s screen.

Premium features stated below distinct us from many cheaper products in the market: 

 

 

 How are we different from others?

 

Here lies some of the key differences between Sapphire Shieldz and other normal screen protectors

 

Compatibility List

 

 

Our list does stops here as we will continue our effort to research and develop with the latest technology available in the market, providing you with the best protection on your new devices.

 

 

Why Choose US?

Despite of the interesting features we have to offer from our products, we would also like you to have a bit insight on our company and what we have been doing to guarantee your satisfaction.

 

Product Fabrication

We have successfully established a solid relationship with one of the manufacturers in China. Being more than 10 years of experience in phone accessories and passes the supplier assessment of alibaba through TUV Rheinland, they have given us full confidence to produce the product at its finest quality.

 

Product Development

Working closely with a group of creative directors plus our research and development department has given us the edge to develop our products based on the latest trend and technology in the market.

 

Supply Chain

Cooperation with a 3rd party logistic company under close supervision of our company representatives allows us to manage our inventory and delivery to our most treasured customers in an efficient and timely manner.

 

Your support is our promise to your satisfaction!

Much effort and resources from various people has placed in working towards the company’s objective and the development of the product. Your support will empower us to have substantial recognition in the market and further development of the product in the long run.

 

Together lets ensure success of the product!

story:
James & Rory: " Great idea. Mount my iPhone and placed on my nightstand. Makes for a great alarm clock."
Chipdog: "Incredible stable. I was quite surprised. My wife brought to work and she uses it for demos from her iPad when meeting with clients... she said it was very convenient."
SaratogaSalley: "Fairy cool device. I much prefer it to the one I bought from Apple. I use it to work on my iPad. Very sturdy and very stable."
Juliofromc: "My granddaughter loves the pink."

WE NEED YOUR HELP BRINGING NIA TO THE MARKET:
1. Made from high quality ABS material.
2. Unique design for tablets and cellphones.
3. Tablets and cellphones can be mounted either vertically or horizontally.
4. Scratch resistance.
5. Skid resistance.
6. Adjustable viewing angles.
7. Extremely light and compact.
8. Design to facilitates cooling of personal device.

 

 

REWARDS

story:
Please note that, shipping fees of 15$, is only applied to buyers outside of France. Thank you ! 

In any case the watch will be produced !

VEA has experience with industrialization. Every contributor will have their Buddy !!

March 8th : Dear all, we are happy to announce that the campaign will be one more month.
However, this will have no impact on June / summer shipping for the Vea Buddy.  

Here is the explanation: We’ve had many problems with Paypal Europe (who seems to don't know anything about crownfunding as they were refusing payments and kept on blocking our account for now 4 weeks) so we missed many contributions. For the best interest of Indiegogo (thanks guys for your help on the case), VEA Digital and the contributors, the campaign will go on until April, 30th. 
Many thanks !

 

Bluetooth VEA BUDDY watch

Nowadays, our smartphones are becoming bigger and bigger.That's why we need a secondary screen on our wrist.
The VEA BUDDY is universal as it works with every smartphones and tablets.
The VEA BUDDY vibrates on your wrist to announce you silently all notifications, it also controls and receives information from your smartphone. The advantage is that your big smartphone stays in your pocket/bag.
In fact, with VEA BUDDY you will never miss important notifications.

 

Today Friday Feb 8th, we received our first design prototype !
We are really proud to share these pictures with you :)

What is does and how it does it

Shows displayed notifications on your smartphone.
Allows you to control your smartphone (initiate calls, control music…) 
Receives and displays data from your smartphone (turn by turn navigation…) 
Displays smartphone content (pictures…) as your smartphone and the VEA BUDDY are connected with Bluetooth… 
Easy…    

            

 

Design & Technical Specifications:

Iconic design for all! 
The High-tech fashionable yet classic design suits any circumstance!
Here is a little description of the watch.

Thickness:8 mm 
Screen:tactile, capacitive, 2" ultra high contrast panel
Button: just one, on the left bottom corner
Bluetooth: 4.0
SoC:MTK
Memory:internal 8 GB
Frame:Metal
Band: Elastomer
USB port: at the end of the band USB port 
Battery life: 10 days or 2 weeks standby.
Water-resistant: 3ATM
Shock resistant 
OS Compliant : iOS / Android / Windows Phone

 

Features

The watch is connected to the smartphone with Bluetooth.

 

  • TIME: time taken from the smartphone
  • CALLS: the watch vibrates and shows who is calling(if the caller is in our smartphone phonebook) or shows the caller's phone number. You can accept or refuse the call. If you accept the call, just pick up your smartphone. Received calls, missed calls and calls send lists are displayed as well.Calls can be initiated via Bluetooth.
  • TEXT MESSAGE: when a new message is received, the watch vibrates, and the message can optionally be displayed.
  • MMS: when a new multimedia message is received, the watch vibrates and  the message can optionally be displayed.
  • EMAILS: when a new email is received, the watch vibrates, your inbox is displayed and you can select the email to read it.
  • CALENDAR: When a calendar event is due shortly, the watch vibrates and the event is displayed.
  • PHOTOS: Display the photos from you smartphone gallery.     
  • MUSIC: Remotely control all your smartphone music features.
  • GPS: Display all GPS features from your smartphone.
  • FACEBOOK: Display all notifications from Facebook.
  • TWITTER: Display all notifications.
  • UPDATE: the watch can be updated using the USB port located at the end of the band.

 

Colors

We will begin with Black, Red and White.
Others colors may be added later, depending on requests and fashion trends!



 

 

With you

We have worked very hard to design  the hardware and software for the VEA BUDDY Watch.
With you, we can bring it to real life and mass production!
Let’s make it together!

You can help us by funding this project.
You can also promote it around you.
You can give us your advice on how to improve the watch.
Let’s make the very best product in this market!

 

Retail price after indiegogo campaign : 249 $  .

For the first 200 pieces, it is only components prices that is really very special only  for you .

 

For anyone who wants we have a press kit available here:

VEABUDDY/PRESS KIT 

 

Legal notice: information, facts and figures in this document may be changed without notice. Bluetooth is a trademark or filed by Bluetooth SIG Inc.

Our Company

VEA is a French based company. 
For many years, we have been creating advanced connected watches (RF, Bluetooth, GSM).

We have become leaders in integration and miniaturization.

Our latest creation is the VEA SPORTIVE:
A world first and the most technologically advanced sport phonewatch.
It combines a mobile phone, a GPS cardio watch, a tracker with a dedicated S.O.S. button.an MP3 player and camera with video capability. 
http://youtu.be/h6Pb2oeJ9Zo

www.veadigital.com

Product and interface design by Caiman Design.

story_txt:
Please note that, shipping fees of 15$, is only applied to buyers outside of France. Thank you ! 
In any case the watch will be produced !
VEA has experience with industrialization. Every contributor will have their Buddy !!

March 8th : Dear all, we are happy to announce that the campaign will be one more month. However, this will have no impact on June / summer shipping for the Vea Buddy.  
Here is the explanation: We’ve had many problems with Paypal Europe (who seems to don't know anything about crownfunding as they were refusing payments and kept on blocking our account for now 4 weeks) so we missed many contributions. For the best interest of Indiegogo (thanks guys for your help on the case), VEA Digital and the contributors, the campaign will go on until April, 30th.  Many thanks !
 


Bluetooth VEA BUDDY watch


Nowadays, our smartphones are becoming bigger and bigger.That's why we need a secondary screen on our wrist. The VEA BUDDY is universal as it works with every smartphones and tablets. The VEA BUDDY vibrates on your wrist to announce you silently all notifications, it also controls and receives information from your smartphone. The advantage is that your big smartphone stays in your pocket/bag. In fact, with VEA BUDDY you will never miss important notifications.
 
Today Friday Feb 8th, we received our first design prototype ! We are really proud to share these pictures with you :)

What is does and how it does it
Shows displayed notifications on your smartphone. Allows you to control your smartphone (initiate calls, control music…)  Receives and displays data from your smartphone (turn by turn navigation…)  Displays smartphone content (pictures…) as your smartphone and the VEA BUDDY are connected with Bluetooth…  Easy…    











            

 
Design & Technical Specifications:
Iconic design for all! The High-tech fashionable yet classic design suits any circumstance!Here is a little description of the watch.Thickness:8 mm Screen:tactile, capacitive, 2" ultra high contrast panelButton: just one, on the left bottom cornerBluetooth: 4.0SoC:MTKMemory:internal 8 GBFrame:MetalBand: ElastomerUSB port: at the end of the band USB port Battery life: 10 days or 2 weeks standby.Water-resistant: 3ATMShock resistant OS Compliant : iOS / Android / Windows Phone
 


Features
The watch is connected to the smartphone with Bluetooth.
 


TIME: time taken from the smartphone


CALLS: the watch vibrates and shows who is calling(if the caller is in our smartphone phonebook) or shows the caller's phone number. You can accept or refuse the call. If you accept the call, just pick up your smartphone. Received calls, missed calls and calls send lists are displayed as well.Calls can be initiated via Bluetooth.



TEXT MESSAGE: when a new message is received, the watch vibrates, and the message can optionally be displayed.


MMS: when a new multimedia message is received, the watch vibrates and  the message can optionally be displayed.


EMAILS: when a new email is received, the watch vibrates, your inbox is displayed and you can select the email to read it.

CALENDAR: When a calendar event is due shortly, the watch vibrates and the event is displayed.


PHOTOS: Display the photos from you smartphone gallery.     


MUSIC: Remotely control all your smartphone music features.


GPS: Display all GPS features from your smartphone.


FACEBOOK: Display all notifications from Facebook.


TWITTER: Display all notifications.


UPDATE: the watch can be updated using the USB port located at the end of the band.
 




Colors
We will begin with Black, Red and White. Others colors may be added later, depending on requests and fashion trends!


 


 
With you
We have worked very hard to design  the hardware and software for the VEA BUDDY Watch. With you, we can bring it to real life and mass production! Let’s make it together!
You can help us by funding this project. You can also promote it around you. You can give us your advice on how to improve the watch. Let’s make the very best product in this market!

story:
What is Skate King?

Skate King is a finger skateboarding game for iPad, iPhone and Android devices. The player will control a finger board (one of those old school finger skateboards that all the cool kids played with at school). Players will be able to choose their skateboard deck and whichever pre-made skate park they want to ride in. It will be a top down view so the player can focus on busting out all the tricks they can (you will be looking at the skate board deck and a few feet around the board and all times). We have created several ramps and rails for the player to ride, as well as a half pipe, quarter pipe and swimming pools to ride in.

 

  • Players will be able to maneuver the board as if it were a real skateboard to perform dozens of different flips and grinds on the ramps and rails.
  • Different finger swipes and taps on the board will rotate and flip the board allowing for extreme trick variety.
  • Players will get a score that will let them unlock more decks, trucks, and wheels to customize their board.
  • Players can link multiple tricks together by using ramps and rails to perform long strings of tricks for a huge score.
  • We will have a feature that no other skate game on a mobile device has: We will be creating a skate park editor so a player can make their own park from all the available ramps and rails in the game. They will be able to play in their skate parks as well as post them for their friends to play.
  • There will be a contest every week which will allow players to make a timed run through a skate park. In that 24 hour period that the contest runs, players get a practice run to get a feel for the park then they have 2 runs to attempt to get the highest score they can. The player with the highest score at the end of the day wins the contest and gets a special skate deck as a prize.

 

We currently have licensing agreements with 6 skateboard companies to use their logos (Etnies, Etnies Plus, Emerica, ES Footware, Thirtytwo, and Altamont) and we are in negotiations with several others for their logos as well as some of their skate decks. Some are waiting to sign until they have seen a beta version, but all of them are very interested in the game.

 

Why Indiegogo?

My role in the company is president and C.E.O, but also Art Director as well as the main artist. I have created all the skate park assets and models for the skateboards, as well as placed all the assets into the game engine we are using. We have several skate parks built and the money from Indiegogo will go towards getting a functioning prototype of the skate board controls. Any extra money we get will allow us to add more levels for players to choose from and add different kinds of ramps and different shaped rails from which players can choose to create their own park.

Community Involvement

We are donating 3% of our total game revenue to autism awareness and to http://www.hiramfarm.org/ .  It is an amazing cause and we would love to help out.

story:
Hello and Thanks for checking out my campaign site to raise funds to launch a new era of local radio broadcasting :

                       Monadnock Internet Radio/MIRadiostation.com 

Some of you know that for the past 30 years I worked in the radio business. First, as a music DJ, a news reporter, and as a Talk Show Host. I don’t need to tell you that there have been many changes in radio broadcasting over the years. The most obvious one is the increasing lack of local programming reflecting the needs of the local community and an increasing emphasis and use of nationally syndicated programming, by large corporate radio groups.

The fund raising campaign will allow me to provide another venue or platform for local and regional news, information and conversation here in the Monadnock Region of New Hampshire, with a reach going far beyond the borders, via the internet.  As a contributor to this project, you will not only help raise the needed funds for internet broadcast equipment, you will be giving yourself and your neighbors a choice in how news and information is received in the digital age.

 

What We Need & What You Get 

I have determined a fund raising goal of $6000 .The money raised through contributions will help with the purchase of specific equipment needed for internet broadcasting. Specifically, for the design of a dedicated web site, “MIRadiostation.com.”  audio streaming services enabling live broadcasts, additional computer storage for archived and pre-recorded programs, telephone interface hardware for live phone conversations and interviews, additional microphones, as well as promotional and marketing materials to get the word out. Anything raised beyond the goal will be put toward improving the web site’s functionality and to implement other features to improve the site as well as to pay the costs of regular maintenance.

I view the Monadnock Internet Radio project as a truly local community radio ‘station’ giving listeners a choice for news and information about what’s happening in the Monadnock Region and New Hampshire and presenting topics of local and regional concern and interest. This is the reason why I would like the project to be funded by the local community directly, to spotlight a sense of community and shared involvement in building an honestly local media source.

Monadnock Internet Radio will be your station ! 

 

Perks

Monadnock Internet Radio/MIRadiostation.com  will have a separate web page dedicated to sponsors to permanently thank those who help fund the launch of this project. You can have your name or business logo listed as a founding supporter. Other perks for different levels of contribution are listed on the right column of the “50 Day Challenge for Monadnock Internet Radio” page at indiegogo.com .

 

Other Ways You Can Help 

 

If you just can’t contribute financially right now, you can still help!

-         Help get the word out by telling others about this project. Friends, co-workers,neighbors,political representatives, etc.

-         Use the Indiegogo share tools to encourage others to support this project.

-         Share the campaign for Monadnock Internet Radio on Facebook, Twitter and other social media tools.

story:
Who are we?!

For those who don't know...

 Conoscenza Tech is a company that just started in canada a year ago and we're building, desinging and programming multitouch surface Computers and sell them at the lowest price IN THE WORLD as of right now.

-We have the official specs of the first consumer model (this is a milestone for all of us that worked on the project especially me who started this from just an Idea and TONS of technology studies!)

-We have now tested the first completed model and we've got it's quality certified!

-We have crafted some major updates and optimizations that set us appart from the competition. From comfort to application dev.

Now for the less cool news ...

-We want to send the product to china for production, but we don't quite have the money to do so. We really think our product is a step in the futur of home technology as well as commercial technology - So it's in everybody's advantage to promote said product!

-We need people to send it to, so they can test it out for us and review it ALL ARROUND THE WORLD! Of course we will be DONATING and sending it to them.

-Tomorrow's technology can be just a fingertip away if you support us. Imagine, a computer that tells you who is at the door and asking you if it can activate the door lock for you; using only vocal and-or facial recognition! That would help tons of handicaped or aging loved ones.

 Security is a must, imagine a computer that tells you on your phone that there is noise in your home while you're not there; using your gps location from your phone!

 Imagine a computer that starts playing your favourite jams whenever you tell it to without having to set ANY playlists!

 How amazing would all of this be if it was sent to you and installed for any donation you wish to give!   -Basically your odds of winning depend on how much you donate; for each perks there are different odds of winning a Conos Table that will be delivered straight to your home!

(take note that each of these machine are worth  close to $4 000.00 )

INTERNATIONAL DELIVERY ACCEPTED!

Thank you so much for watching and subscribe for the quickest updates possible on the project;  as well as awesome gameplays and tech videos!

http://www.youtube.com/MyConoscenza

story:
NOCABLE is the best portable wireless charging station specifically designed for your phone. Simply put your phone on the top of NOCABLE and it will soon recognize it and start charging immediately. With large capacity and high charging speed, NOCABLE allows you to charge your phone easily and efficiently. The dual USB ports allow you to charge different devices at the same time. The premium casing material also makes it light, durable and convenient to carry. 

 

            

 

Instead of carrying long and complex cables and worrying about finding the right one to charge, NOCABLE allows you to charge your phone wirelessly. Simply put your phone on the top of the unit and it will soon recognize it and start to charge. With high charging speed and plenty of power, you are able to charge your phone easily and efficiently.

Qi is the universal standard for wirelessly battery operated devices such as cell phones and cameras. Specifically, it means being able to perform wireless charging over distance of 4 cm. NOCABLE meet this standard and you do not need to worry about the charging efficiency. It is compatible with different electronic devices such as iPhone 8/10, Samsung and Google. You can charge your phone wirelessly by using only the NOCABLE. This helps to make your life easier and more convenient.

This helps to keep your phone efficiently charged without worrying about the battery draining.

 

NOCABLE is light, durable and can be carried easily to anywhere you want. No matter you are travelling, working the office, meeting friends in a coffee shop or just staying at home, NOCABLE is always your best assistant to charge all your electronic devices. Just simply put it in your bag and use it  freely whenever and wherever you want.

  • In the car

Use NOCABLE to charge your phone easily while driving without worrying about cables.

  • In the office

Use NOCABLE to charge various devices during a business meeting and continue to send emails and text messages.

  • At home

Put your phone on NOCABLE at night to keep it fully charged.

  • In the airport

Cannot find a power outlet? Take out NOCABLE to charge the phone while using Google Maps.

  • At the cafe

Use NOCABLE to charge the phone while watching videos.

 

Besides charging your phone wirelessly, NOCABLE also has two USB ports that allow you to charge additional electronic devices such as iPad and earphones at the same time. The LCD screen helps to check your battery status clearly anytime you want. When NOCABLE is out of battery, you can even charge it and your phone simultaneously. This allows you to continue use your phone freely and easily.

                             

When NOCABLE is out of battery, you can simply charge it and continue use it to charge other electronic devices simultaneously. This allows you to charge your phone while using it to do anything you want. It also saves your time and makes your life easier and more convenient.

                             

Whether you are in the office, home or shopping mall, you can always use NOCABLE to charge your phone wirelessly. It also features two usb ports to charge two more devices, such as an iPad or earphones  simultaneously.

The LCD display makes it very convenient to see the battery status. This allows you to have a clear understanding of the remaining charging time and charge your NOCABLE in time.

 

NOCABLE helps to keep your phone and other electronic devices fully charged all the time. When putting your phone on the top of NOCABLE, it can soon recognizes the specific type of the phone and detect the optimal charging speed. This helps to charge your phone more quickly and easily. NOCABLE provides up to 3+ full charge circles for smart phones and 1+ for tablets. To ensure a safe charging experience, NOCABLE prevent overheating and overcharging.

The large capacity of NOCABLE helps you to always keep your phone fully charged.  It provides up to 3+ full charge circles for smart phones and 1+ for tablets. This saves you from battery draining and gives you the freedom to do anything you want with your phone and other electronic devices.

NOCABLE is able to automatically recognize and charge different types of phones wirelessly. It then detects the optimal charging speed and helps to charge your phone more quickly. This greatly simplifies the process of looking for the specific cables and plugging into the power supply.

To ensure a safe charging experience, NOCABLE is designed to prevent overheating and overcharging. This helps to reduce dangerous situations such as explosion while maintains a dynamic equilibrium.

 

 

 

 

NOCABLE is a team of engineers with a mission to bring the best portable wireless station to every household. We believe that great products are the result of great engineering, and our products are engineered to provide unbeatable performance, user experience and value. We aim to achieve our mission through leveraging our engineering expertise and supply chain efficiency to create best in-class products that everyone can enjoy.

While we have been manufacturing best-selling electronic products for years, the NOCABLE is our first exclusive product. High-end wireless portable chargers on the market are sold at exorbitant prices, despite a lack of improvements over the years. With a mission to bring the best wireless portable station to every household, our team spent three years researching a developing a wireless charger that provides superior performance, health benefits and value. We are launching the NOCABLE on Indiegogo and look forward to your feedback on our first exclusive product.

 

We are a team of young people who are extremely curious about high-tech products. Fun, breakthrough, and innovation are our tags; Uniqueness is our philosophy. The life improvements and changes that are brought by new technology and products are the greatest pleasure for us. We are willing to be the earliest supporters and participants of creative products. We hope to gather a group of friends who are just like us, so that together we can seek the latest technology products, share the product experience, provide more suggestions for the products before mass production and help the product to become reality.

It also saves your time and makes your life easier and more convenient.                             Whether you are in the office, home or shopping mall, you can always use NOCABLE to charge your phone wirelessly. It also features two usb ports to charge two more devices, such as an iPad or earphones  simultaneously.The LCD display makes it very convenient to see the battery status. This allows you to have a clear understanding of the remaining charging time and charge your NOCABLE in time. NOCABLE helps to keep your phone and other electronic devices fully charged all the time. When putting your phone on the top of NOCABLE, it can soon recognizes the specific type of the phone and detect the optimal charging speed. This helps to charge your phone more quickly and easily. NOCABLE provides up to 3+ full charge circles for smart phones and 1+ for tablets. To ensure a safe charging experience, NOCABLE prevent overheating and overcharging.The large capacity of NOCABLE helps you to always keep your phone fully charged.  It provides up to 3+ full charge circles for smart phones and 1+ for tablets. This saves you from battery draining and gives you the freedom to do anything you want with your phone and other electronic devices.NOCABLE is able to automatically recognize and charge different types of phones wirelessly. It then detects the optimal charging speed and helps to charge your phone more quickly. This greatly simplifies the process of looking for the specific cables and plugging into the power supply.To ensure a safe charging experience, NOCABLE is designed to prevent overheating and overcharging. This helps to reduce dangerous situations such as explosion while maintains a dynamic equilibrium.    NOCABLE is a team of engineers with a mission to bring the best portable wireless station to every household. We believe that great products are the result of great engineering, and our products are engineered to provide unbeatable performance, user experience and value. We aim to achieve our mission through leveraging our engineering expertise and supply chain efficiency to create best in-class products that everyone can enjoy.While we have been manufacturing best-selling electronic products for years, the NOCABLE is our first exclusive product. High-end wireless portable chargers on the market are sold at exorbitant prices, despite a lack of improvements over the years. With a mission to bring the best wireless portable station to every household, our team spent three years researching a developing a wireless charger that provides superior performance, health benefits and value. We are launching the NOCABLE on Indiegogo and look forward to your feedback on our first exclusive product. We are a team of young people who are extremely curious about high-tech products. Fun, breakthrough, and innovation are our tags; Uniqueness is our philosophy. The life improvements and changes that are brought by new technology and products are the greatest pleasure for us. We are willing to be the earliest supporters and participants of creative products. We hope to gather a group of friends who are just like us, so that together we can seek the latest technology products, share the product experience, provide more suggestions for the products before mass production and help the product to become reality.

story:
Watch and Share the NanoHold Video in 20+ Languages CLICK HERE

  

MEET NANOHOLD - NANOSUCTION FOR YOUR PHONE, CASE, AND TABLET



With NanoHold, it's easy to stick your mobile device to many smooth, flat surfaces. NanoHold provides a new dimension in hands-free mobile device usage.


                     

NanoHold is like having another person to hold your phone, allowing you to take better photos and use your mobile device in new and useful ways not possible before. With NanoHold, everyone can be in the picture.


Behind NanoHold's simple appearing exterior are decades of advanced materials design technology. While NanoHolds may look like simple pieces of plastic, they are powerful and can hold hundreds of times their own weight.


NanoHold material has microscopic suction "cups" on its surface. Because they use suction, NanoHolds stick without being sticky. NanoSuction does not leave a residue.

          

                 

      



Each NanoHold is engineered with 5 layers:

NanoHolds have two sides, the top side with nanosuction (blue in the diagram) and the bottom side with adhesion (red in the diagram). The bottom side of each NanoHold holds tightly to your device. NanoHolds are shipped with a protective liner on both sides that must be removed to use the product.

         

WHAT WILL NANOHOLDS STICK ON?

NanoHolds stick on many clean, flat, smooth, dry, non-porous surfaces including: 


WILL NANOHOLD WORK WITH MY DEVICE OR CASE?

NanoHolds work best on devices with flat backs or with flat cases.


CAN I TAKE THE NANOHOLD OFF MY DEVICE ONCE IT HAS BEEN INSTALLED?

Yes. NanoHolds are removable.


WHAT COLOR ARE NANOHOLDS?

NanoHolds come in black or white. You can have any color you like, as long as it is black or white.

                                                 


CAN NANOHOLDS BE USED WITH TABLETS?

Yes. Just use two or more NanoHolds depending on the size of your tablet.

                            


WILL NANOHOLDS WORK ON HORIZONTAL SURFACES TOO?

NanoHolds work like an anti-slip pad when laid flat, to help prevent your device from moving around or falling. By holding tightly to the surface, NanoHolds can also keep toddlers from moving your phone.


HOW DO I TAKE CARE OF MY NANOHOLD?

NanoHolds come with a cover to protect them and extend their life.

Clean and rejuvenate your NanoHold by wiping it with a damp cloth or paper towel and allowing it to dry. You can also use cellophane tape (like Scotch Tape) for a waterless method to clean the surface of NanoHolds.    

                            

                                         

 

CAN I USE MY OWN PROTECTIVE COVER WITH NANOHOLD?                                    

Yes. Choose your favorite object that is the size of a credit card. A laminated, plastic, or glossy object works best. Examples of covers can be ID cards, photos, business cards, etc. Use your imagination and make your NanoHold even more fun. Below is a photo of the double-sided protective cover provided with each NanoHold. One side is black, the other side is white.


CAN I USE NANOHOLDS TO PROMOTE MY BUSINESS OR ORGANIZATION?

CAN YOU PRINT CUSTOM ARTWORK ON THE COVERS? Yes, for order amounts of 250 units or more, we can print custom four color images on the cover. You supply the print ready art. Great for promoting your business or organaization, school fundraising projects and swag giveaways at conventions. There is no better endorsement for your business than to have your image on the back of a customer's smartphone. For larger amounts, contact us at customercare@nanohold.com.

HOW LONG WILL NANOHOLDS LAST?

NanoHolds keep suction power over time when kept clean and undamaged. Cared for NanoHolds will last many months to years. By cleaning your NanoHold with a damp cloth or paper towel, you can repeatedly rejuvenate and indefinitely extend the life of your NanoHold. 


FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. REALLY!!

Yes, really. Free shipping in the USA and Internationally. If you are outside the USA and contribute to perks of up to three NanoHolds, your order will be posted with Global Forever Stamps via United States Postal Service. 

PLEASE NOTE: THERE IS NO TRACKING WITH FREE SHIPPING.

The stamp looks pretty amazing too:

                                              


HAVE A FUN, COOL, OR NEW USE FOR NANOHOLDS? SEND IT TO US. 

Share your NanoHold ideas with us at customercare@nanohold.com. 

POST YOUR NANOHOLD SELFIES TO #NANOHOLDSELFIE        
Share your selfies with us by using #NanoHoldSelfie when posting to your favorite social media. 
   

FAQ:

Will NanoHolds interfere with induction charging, WIFI or other wireless functions?

NanoHolds will not interfere with induction charging, and actually helps by keeping your device from coming off the induction charger accidentally. NanoHolds will not interfere with WIFI, Bluetooth, NFC, or other wireless functions of your device.

Does temperature affect NanoHolds?

NanoHolds work in normal living temperatures from 0° C/32° F to  120° F/50° C. 

What surfaces will not work with NanoHolds?

NanoHolds will not work on wet or oily surfaces or surfaces that are uneven, dirty, or porous. Certain chemicals or solvents can damage NanoHolds. Unsure of your surface or suction contact? Exercise caution before letting go of your device.

What is the "NanoHold" Test"?

Use the “NanoHold Test” to assess the suction contact with a slight pull on the device, like checking a suction cup for suction. The device should adhere tightly to and not come off of the surface. Do not let go of your device if it does not pass the “NanoHold Test” or if there is any doubt about whether there is sufficient suction to hold the device.

Will NanoHold always work?

Test your application. Make sure the condition of the NanoHold, the surface chosen, and the suction contact are sufficient to support the device for the amount of time you plan on NanoHold supporting the device. NanoHolds stick temporarily, and like all suction devices, the duration of suction cannot be predicted. Use NanoHolds responsibly and at your own risk. Be smart and enjoy your NanoHolds safely.

NanoHold is Shipping Now! 


NanoHold Packaging is complete! You can see what a NanoHold Pack looks like and what is inside the package!


Seen below, our staff working hard to package NanoHolds!

Each Package has an instruction card along with the NanoHold and the protective cover! 


MEET US

We are a husband and wife team.

                                        

Together we formed our company, eoseek llc, and created the NanoHold brand.

We have been amazed at the universally positive reaction NanoHolds have received. One of our main goals is to make NanoHolds available to everyone, no matter where they live. We Thank YOU for supporting NanoHold and for sharing NanoHolds on social media. 

Initial Goal Reached - Stretch Goal Reached:

Thank you Indiegogo contributors for pushing NanoHold to goal in JUST 6 DAYS!! Then you helped us reach our Stretch Goal of $15,000, and 500+% of our Goal!

        


CHALLENGES

Sourcing bulk materials, tooling & die cutting, and shipping have all been worked out. Patent and trademark filings have been done. Indiegogo funds will help with materials acquisition in sufficient wholesale quantity so that we can maintain a quality product at a low price with free shipping worldwide. Indiegogo funds will also help us with retail package design, website creation, e-commerce setup, and a streamlined order fulfillment process. Thank you Indiegogo contributors!


EVEN MORE REASONS TO SUPPORT NANOHOLD NOW

story:
PowerClip is a portable multifunction device that can assist you not only in emergency situations, but can help you avoid those stressful situations such as your phone battery dying while on the move or searching around frantically for your car keys.

PowerClip is available in two form factors: the smaller more compact micro and the larger battery / memory capacity PRO.

PowerClip micro contains a custom high-grade 500mAh lithium polymer battery which can give you an extra 20% charge on your smartphone-  essential in those emergency situations. The micro also comes with 4GB of memory space in the DataVault secure file storage system- enough to hold over 1400 8MP photos.


PowerClip PRO contains a custom high-grade 1000mAh lithium polymer battery which can give an extra 40% charge on your smartphone and is available in either 8GB or 32GB space in the DataVault secure file storage system.


Emergency Phone Charger
Charging your phone couldn't be more convenient using our unique slide-out connector- simply slide out and plug in.

The PowerClip micro has a custom internal 500mAh high grade lithium polymer battery which will give your phone an extra 20%* charge level, while the PRO has a 1000mAh battery allowing for an extra 40%* charge level- priceless in those emergency situations.

Key Finder
If you ever misplace your keys, you can easily locate them using the PowerClip smartphone app. The rough distance to the PowerClip will be displayed as well as an option to activate the loud built-in sounder.

Leaving your keys behind will also become a thing of the past with PowerClip. As soon as your phone and keys break a certain pre-set distance, then your phone will be notified immediately, allowing you to quickly return and pick them up before someone else does.

Phone Finder
A misplaced phone is just as easily found with PowerClip. Simply press and hold the multifunctional button, and the PowerClip sends a signal to your smartphone, which will in turn start ringing or vibrating, depending on the app settings. 

Key Drop Alert
The PowerClip's internal accelerometer can sense when you drop your keys and instantly sends a notification to your phone via the app.

Secure DataVault
PowerClip comes with onboard memory that becomes your personal DataVault- a place to store your photos, videos, music and files with powerful encryption and secure access either through a number code or via the fingerprint sensor on your smartphone. (see image above)


Activity Tracker
PowerClip can record each step you take and then wirelessly updates the app to track your progress in steps, distance, colories and more- a fitness tracker on your keys.

Emergency Flashlight
Double pressing the multifunction button in quick succession will turn the LED flashlight both on and off, providing you with a handy emergency light.

ThruCharge
Thrucharge allows you to integrate your PowerClip into your home charging system without any disruption. Simply connect your PowerClip to your phone and insert the micro USB power lead- your phone is given priority and will charge first, and the PowerClip will begin charging once your phone is at full power.

// REWARDS

SINGLE PACKS

DOUBLE PACKS


// WHAT'S IN THE BOX?


// WHY INDIEGOGO?

Crowdfunding is the perfect way to both validate our product, by proving that there is a need for what we are offering, and to raise funding for our first mass production run.

Indiegogo is the most open and creative crowdfunding platform out there and we believe the savvy Indiegogo Backers will see all of the hard work we have put in to PowerClip, and appreciate the design and technology as well as all of the great features.


// RISKS AND CHALLENGES

PROJECT MANAGEMENT

The hardest challenge by far will be to manage the project from the end of the campaign until the final product is fulfilled. The project lead will be our CEO and he will personally oversee the PowerClip production and fulfillment process.

>Manufacturing
Mirai is an MFi (made for Apple) certified developer and we have access to all MFi certified factories. We also have a strong partner network in China, Hong Kong and Japan. Mirai will also involve the backers in key decisions throughout the manufacturing process.

>Cost
We believe that we have set a price level per unit that allows us to manufacture to the highest quality and we will select the manufacturer that best suits the PowerClip, so rest assured your product will be everything we say it will be.

>Delays
We aim to get PowerClips in your hand by the time set out above, but sometimes delays can be unavoidable. By planning our production in December, we will avoid the busy times coming up to Chinese New Year, which should help to expedite production. In the eventuality that there are any delays we will update you as soon as we can. We vow to keep an open communication channel at all times and will be posting regular updates on Twitter @miraipowerclip.

> Fulfilment
We are confident that if we reach our goal we will be able to partner with a professional fulfillment company to make sure every backer gets their PowerClip in perfect condition and in a timely manner.


// FAQ

What devices does PowerClip work on?
The PowerClip is designed to work with your smartphone - either Apple iPhone 5 onwards, or any Android device that utilises the micro USB connection. PowerClip can also charge other devices with micro USB inputs such as Amazon Kindle or Sony Playstation Vita.

How do you charge PowerClip?
PowerClip is charged by plugging the included mUSB lead into the back of the PowerClip. You can charge the USB lead into any device with a USB port such as a wall socket adapter or a laptop/desktop PC.

When will I get my PowerClip?
We plan to get your PowerClip in your hands by Jan/Feb 2016.

Is the keyring loop likely to break?
The PowerClip is made of a string ABS plastic and is unlikely to shatter/break easily. The lobster clasp has full 360 degree rotation, meaning that the key ring loop will never experience enough torque to snap off or crack.

How long does the battery inside the PowerClip last in idle mode?
Due to smart circuit design and high grade batteries and the fact that Bluetooth requires only nano amps to function correctly, we estimate the battery to last around two to three weeks uncharged.

How loud is the sounder inside the PowerClip?
The sounder inside the PowerClip is small but it packs a punch- you will definitely be able to hear it from another room or two away. We will conduct accurate sound tests during the testing phase of production.

What files can you read/write via the Bluetooth connection?
You can currently view photos with our prototype, however we hope to develop this into streaming video and multi-file type viewer during the app development phase.

Does the PowerClip connect with phones that have cases?
The PowerClip is designed to work perfectly with uncased phones, however PowerClip will still connect to phones with very slim profile cases (<1mm).

Why is your campaign is USD when you are based in UK?
We will be manufacturing in an Apple MFi certified factory in China, therefore we will save costs by paying for the production of PowerClips in USD (the international currency). This allows us to deliver the stated price above, protecting our customers from any price fluctuations.

story:
Who We Are:

We are a group of dynamic individuals with backgrounds in herbalism, allopathic, entheogenic and natural medicine. We wish to offer addiction treatment retreats in Ubud, Bali, using iboga as a tool for rapid detox and self-reflection. We all have deeply personal motivations driving us to provide this service; everybody deserves a new beginning.

There is nothing else like this offered to the Australian community; there is a dire need for effective addiction treatment. We have the potential to offer this service and for us to do this at an affordable price we need the support of the global community and contributors like you! 

In a process that is mentally, emotionally and spiritually introspective, one can be 'rapidly detoxed' from many deep rooted addictions with the help of the plant medicine iboga. Mulai Lagi, meaning new beginnings, is an addiction treatment service that we will be based in Bali, aiding the Australasian community in taking control over their recreational and pharmaceutical addictions.


What We Need From You:

To set up such a venture, we are asking for the financial support of $10,000. This will enable us to invest in all the initial start up logistics, including venue hire, flight costs, catering, and medical expenses (nurses, defibrillator hire, drug testing, and cost of iboga medicine).
The staff at Mulai Lagi are currently working as volunteers and personally contributing finances to set up the initial foundations of the organisation. This includes our Facebook page, website, research & training, and investment into iboga root bark. Mulai Lagi are committed to launching in 2015, wether we reach our $10,000 goal or not by this campaign's deadline, all contributions will go towards its establishment.


Our Journey:

We have the social support of the Australian entheogenic community as well as support from various ibogaine treatment services in New Zealand, where ibogaine is already legal as prescription medication from registered doctors. This is not the case here in Australia, where ibogaine remains a restricted compound with no perceived medical value! This is why we are forced to operate abroad, as we are committed to offering this iboga plant medicine as an effective treatment for addiction to the Australasian community. Please show your support for our campaign and contribute financially to make this vision a reality. 


Other Ways To Help:

Other than financial contributions, please show your support by telling your friends and family about us, share us on social media and help promote our campaign.
