story:
See other great cutting edge and new release perks by clicking on the jump links below.

We opened our doors in 2008 and started by installing solar power systems. After about a year, we opened our store and offered the latest in solar energy system components, then added some of the most innovative sustainable products like solar chargers, rechargeable products, clothing and accessories made from recycled or upcycled materials and other cool stuff.

MPOWERD Luci® EMRG Solar Lantern
MPOWERD Luci® Original & EMRG Solar Lantern
Bottle Cutting Inc Kinkajou Bottle Cutter
P3 Kill A Watt Electricity Monitoring Power Strip
Powertraveller Explorer 2
Sunjack Tablet 20 Watts
iCLEBO Arte Robotic Vacuum Cleaner
Powertraveller Expedition Launch Pack
Sierra Wave Solar Link 240
Sierra Wave Solar Link 1000
Sierra Wave Incremental 1500 Watt Energy Center & 2x 500Wh LiFePO4 Batteries
JASPak 300 Portable Solar Generator System
JASPak 520 Portable Solar Generator System


ShopAkari.com offers Do-It-Yourselfers and solar installers a wide selection of some of the most recognized names in solar energy like Construction Specialty Anchors, Enphase Energy, IronRidge, Metal Plus, Midnite Solar, Morningstar, Mr. Long Arm, Outback Power Systems, S-5!, Schneider Electric, SolaDeck, UPG Batteries, Unirac, Wiley Electronics, and the list goes on.

                

And while you're shopping for your solar project, you'll also find some of the most advanced technology in portable power from companies such as Cyclops, JASPak, LED Lenser, MAXSA, MPOWERD, Powertraveller, Sierra Wave, Sunjack, and Xantrex to name a few and other sustainble products from Bottle Cutting Inc., Viatek, and more.

             

We know our customers. We know our products. Our team is a finely tuned team of solar energy and ecommerce pros.  We're crowdsourcing to build inventory and the team that can meet demand here in the U.S. and improve our customer experience, but we're also planning to build inventory in new markets like Canada, Europe, and Japan. Let's put an ecofriendly product in everyone's home!


What Customers Are Saying

"Always a pleasure to do business with, A+++++++++seller"
     - blue*****, March 2015

"I am a repeat customer with Akari because I have received excellent service and quality equipment. This was no exception. I am very pleased and will not hesitate to use this vendor in the future."
      - BH***, February 2015

"Quick shipping, very nice vendor. Would buy again."
      - ***** Cheryl, February 2015

Quality product, super fast shipping. Will do business with this seller again.
      - bac******, February 2015

Thank you for the excellent service and I will use you again. Many thanks.
      - mol******, February 2015


Building Inventory

Crowdfunding Goal


USA     $30,000



If we reach this goal, we can slowly begin to increase our inventory level above 90% and improve our customer's experience.


The Perks

Make a contribution to ShopAkari toward Building Inventory that can be shipped around the world and earn these exciting and innovative perks from featured manufacturers on the cutting edge, some of which have just been launched. We will begin shipping out perks within 15 days of the campaign's completion.


MPOWERD Luci® EMRG Lantern, Flashlight, Emergency, Light All-In-One. With adjustable flashlight lighting and a high-visibility red emergency S.O.S. flasher, Luci EMRG prepares you for everything that might come your way, from hurricanes and tornadoes to power outages and camping trips. Especially compact (weighs 2.5 ounces), the Luci EMRG fits easily into any drawer, pocket, glovebox or toolbox.

  • 4 Settings: Bright, Super Bright, Flashing & S.O.S
  • Functions as 1 Second Timer on Flashing Mode
  • 4 LED's
  • Lightweight & Durable
  • Compact & Sustainable
  • Waterproof & Shatterproof
  • Rechargeable Battery Included
  • 1 Year Warranty
  • Lasts Up to 10 Years!

MPOWERD Luci® Original Solar Lantern. Luci Original weighs only 4 ounces and collapses to one inch thin. Add a solar charged lithium ion battery and a 65 lumen light to the mix and you’ve got a reliable companion for your lighting needs; anywhere, anytime, any weather. Whether it’s for travel, disaster relief or anything in between, Luci always shines bright.

    • Great for Reading, Home Decor, Camping, Water Sports and much more
    • Safe & Reliable For Emergency Relief
    • 10 LED's
    • Lightweight & Collapsible
    • Waterproof & Shatterproof
    • Floats in Water
    • Rechargeable Battery Included
    • 1 Year Warranty

AND

MPOWERD Luci® EMRG Lantern, Flashlight, Emergency, Light All-In-One. With adjustable flashlight lighting and a high-visibility red emergency S.O.S. flasher, Luci EMRG prepares you for everything that might come your way, from hurricanes and tornadoes to power outages and camping trips. Especially compact (weighs 2.5 ounces), the Luci EMRG fits easily into any drawer, pocket, glovebox or toolbox.

  • 4 Settings: Bright, Super Bright, Flashing & S.O.S
  • Functions as 1 Second Timer on Flashing Mode
  • 4 LED's
  • Lightweight & Durable
  • Compact & Sustainable
  • Waterproof & Shatterproof
  • Rechargeable Battery Included
  • 1 Year Warranty
  • Lasts Up to 10 Years!




The color available is Deep Black. Kit includes:
  • 1 Kinkajou Bottlecutter
  • 2 silicone separation rings (fits all bottle sizes)
  • 1 glass finishing tool
  • 3 pieces of silicon carbide sandpaper (80 grit)


Now you can protect your valuable electronics and find out what they are actually costing you. Simply connect these appliances into the Kill A Watt® PS-10, and it will assess how efficient they are while the built-in surge protection keeps them safe. Advanced features such as over current, over voltage, and no load detection provide clean, safe power to your expensive equipment.

Check the quality of your power by monitoring Voltage, Line Frequency, Amperage, KWH, Current Leakage and more. Now you’ll know how much power your entire computer or home theater system is using. With the innovative Kill A Watt® PS-10 you’ll have peace of mind in more ways than one.

  • Advanced Surge Protection Circuitry
  • Soft Power-Up
  • Displays Max/Min Volts, Amps, Watts, PF, & Leakage Current
  • 6 Foot Cord with Low Profile Plug
  • Light-Up Power Switch
  • Backlit LCD Display
  • Ten Grounded Outlets
  • EMI Filter reduces noise


Choose your color. As the need for off-grid power continues to grow, travelers, adventurers and outdoor professionals alike are looking for more efficient, space-conscious ways in which to charge their devices. With the powermonkey explorer 2, Powertraveller gives users the ability to generate their own power from a small, compact unit, whatever situation they find themselves in.

The unit houses a powerful, dual-core, 6000mAh lithium-ion battery, capable of recharging an iPhone 5 up to three times, a GoPro Hero3+ four times and a Garmin Edge 1000 four times.  It is also compatible with a plethora of other 5V devices such as tablets (including iPad), iPods, digital cameras, sat phones and more.

Works With

  • iPhones/Smart Phones
  • Mobile Phone
  • iPods/MP3/MP4

Will Also Work With

  • iPads/Tablets
  • PSP/Hand-held/Games Consoles
  • Sat-Navs/GPS
  • Head Torches



SunJack® helps mobile users stay charged on the go anywhere the sun shines. The SunJack® is able to fully charge its internal battery pack in about five hours of direct sunlight, or directly power any USB device. When the sun isn’t shining, users can still energize their devices from the powerful SunJack® battery, which holds enough charge to power up to four iPhones. Portable power is valued by campers, boaters, travelers, survivalists, hunters, rock climbers, and working professionals.
  • Uses a triple CPU system with camera vision, power management & device control for one of the best & smartest robotic technologies in its class
  • Advanced navigation system detects ambient environment 200 times per second & does a rigorous 10,800 times per second movement analysis for superior cleaning
  • Built-in camera recognition vision mapping provides intelligent obstacle detection
  • 3.5" tall
  • Lightweight
  • Li-Ion rechargeable battery delivers 120 min of usage time
  • 2:1 vacuum & mopping with infrared remote
  • Washable cartridge filter
  • Wet or dry cleaning
  • Picks up pet hair
  • Easy-empty dirt container
  • Dual HEPA media filters
  • Includes brush cleaning tool, extra filter & home charging base

Powertraveller has developed a world-first in off-grid power generation.  The powermonkey expedition is a revolution in portable charging technology, bringing together multiple ways in which to naturally, yet efficiently generate power - all housed in strong, aluminium, waterproof casing.

The waterproof (IP65 rated) powermonkey expedition houses a 10,500mAh lithium polymer battery which can be charged in three ways; via hand-powered crank, solar or via the international AC mains charger.


The Solar Link 240 is a 240-Watt portable power center that is capable of providing power to a variety of tools and appliances in several ways. Power is distributed through the USB, 12V DC, or 120V AC power outlets. It features a lightweight 240 watt hour (12v, 20Ah) LiFePO4 battery that will charge in 6 to 12 hours using the optional Sierra Wave 30-Watt Solar Collector or using the included AC wall charger or 12V DC charger.

Easily charges:

  • Cell phones
  • Smart phones
  • eReaders
  • Tablet computers
  • Cameras
  • GPS
  • Gaming devices
  • Laptops
Applications:  home, farm, cabin, or camping


 


The Sierra Wave® Solar Link® 1000 is a 1000-Watt portable power center that is capable of providing over 1000 watt-hours of portable power to a variety of tools and appliances. Power is distributed through 120V, 12V or USB power outputs.  It features a 1000 watt pure sine wave inverter and a relatively lightweight LiFePo4 battery, compared to AGM batteries.  This power storage and distribution center also features a state-of-the-art battery management technology making it the most, reliable, powerful and ligthweight power system on the market.  MADE IN USA!

Easily charges:

  • Laptops
  • 12V Vehicle batteries
  • Rechargeable tools
  • Fans
  • TVs
  • DVDs
  • Speakers
  • Small appliances (AC)
  • Refrigerator
  • Freezer
  • Max Burton 12V products

Applications:  home, farm, cabin, camping, or work site


A unique portable power center, or generator, that can be customized by incrementally adding additional battery packs as your power needs increase. The base unit includes a 500Wh LiFePO4 battery and up to 2 optional 500Wh battery packs can be added (included) for a full 1500Wh of power! Scale it to fit your budget or need.

Our strength is in the quality of the details! This unit features a LiFePO4 battery system that not only lasts longer than AGM batteries, but is also safer and significantly lighter - 62 lbs. fully loaded vs. 100+ lbs. for a similar AGM style unit.

Charge it with the included 120V AC charger or pair it with our 120W Solar Collector for truly off-grid operation.  Solar Collector not included.

  • LiFePO4 battery system (lithium iron phosphate)
  • Sustains 1500+ charges
  • Accessory 500Wh battery packs slide in like a DVD (included)
  • 2 - 120V AC outputs
  • 2 - 12V DC outputs
  • 2 - 5V USB 3.0 ports
  • Charging:
    • Using the included 120V AC wall charger - charges in 3-5 hours (base unit) 11-14 hours (fully loaded with 2 battery packs)
    • Using a 120W Solar Collector (sold separately) - charges in 6-7 hours (base unit) or 18-20 hours (fully loaded with 2 battery packs)
  • Battery meters show the power available in each battery
  • Power key turns the entire system off for safety and security

Specifications:

  • Battery: LiFePO4 12.8V/40Ah, 500Wh
  • Inverter:  Pure sine wave 1500W/peak surge 3000W/continuous power 1350W
  • Dimensions: 12" x 19.25" x 15"
  • Weight:
    • Base Unit 32 lbs.
    • 500Wh Battery Pack 15 lbs.
    • Fully loaded with 2 battery packs 62 lbs.

Applications:  home, farm, cabin, camping, or work site




The JASPak 300 is JASPak's core solar generation system. Designed as a reliable backup power source for your refrigerator and other common household items requiring electricity. Every JASPak 300 Solar Generator System comes complete with:

-153 Amp-Hour AGM Battery
-300 watt, 72 cell, mono-crystalline solar panel
-Solar panel mobility kit with wheels and full tilt for tracking the sun
-1100 watt, Pure Sine Wave inverter
-30amp MPPT Solar Charge Controller
-Home charger and battery maintainer to keep your JASPak 100% ready at all times
-Battery capacity and charge status monitor
-Both generator and solar panel are on wheels and set up in minutes
-1 year warranty
-American made components built with American pride!


The JASPak 520 is our premium generator system. Designed to recharge your battery in just a few hours - even while in use! The JASPak 520 Generator System is what a large family with higher power demands need when the light s go out! Every JASPak 520 Solar Generator System comes complete with:

-153 Amp-Hour AGM Battery
-520 watts of solar with two 60 cell, mono-crystalline solar panels
-Solar panel mobility kit with wheels and full tilt for tracking the sun
-1100 watt, Pure Sine Wave inverter
-30amp MPPT Solar Charge Controller
-Home charger and battery maintainer to keep your JASPak 100% ready at all times
-Battery capacity and charge status monitor
-Both generator and solar panel are on wheels and set up in minutes
-1 year warranty
-American made components built with American pride!

PLUS Two 10 Watt LED Tripod Lights with 10' Cord



Shipping

Contiguous United States
Shipping is FREE for perks delivered to the 48 contiguous United States.

International Orders
It is the contributor’s responsibility to ensure items can be legally imported to their country. Import duties, customs/VAT taxes, or other clearance fees are not included in the contribution amount and are the contributor's responsibility. Rates vary and you can calculate them using online tools, such as DutyCalculator. Please check with your country's customs office to determine for certain what these additional costs will be.

For contributions already made
If you need to add shipping charges and have already made your contribution, you can add shipping for your perk by:

1) Scrolling to the top of the page, go to "Select a contribution amount below:" above the "Contribute Now" button and select the button with a blank box.
2) Type in the amount from the chart below based on your country and contribution amount
3) Click the button "Contribute Now"
4) On the next screen, click the button "Continue to Payment"
5) On the next screen, enter your payment information
6) Use the same email address used in your original contribution so that we can match it up
For new contributions
If you adding your shipping charges while selecting you perk, you can add shipping for your perk by:
1) Choose your perk
2) On the next page, select "Custom"
3) Type in the amount from the chart below based on your country and contribution amount
4) Enter your "Shipping Information"
5) Click the button "Continue to Payment"

If your country is not listed in the Shipping Charges chart shown above, this chart will give you an idea of what your shipping charges will be. For countries not listed here, contact us for an exact quote.

Share With Friends and Get the Word Out

Share with your friends when you login into Indiegogo and use Indiegogo's share tools and earn these great perks! When their contributions total the amount shown, you'll win that perk.  If you don't already have an Indiegogo account, signing up is easy. Just click "Sign up" at the top of the page.

Share with your friends when you login into Indiegogo and use Indiegogo's share tools.  When their contributions total $500, you'll win a free MPOWERD Luci® Outdoor Solar Lantern.

Luci Outdoor is the perfect companion for camping, boating, hiking and more. It’s lightweight, waterproof, durable and can withstand any weather. Luci Outdoor is the same great light as Luci Original, but packaged for the outdoor enthusiast. Including an emergency flashing setting, Luci Outdoor a safe and reliable source of light for your next adventure!

  • 10 LED's
  • Safe & Rechargeable
  • Waterproof & Durable
  • Lightweight & Collapsible
  • Works In Any Weather
  • Rechargeable Battery Included
  • 1 Year Warranty

Share with your friends when you login into Indiegogo and use Indiegogo's share tools.  When their contributions total $1000, you'll win a free MAXSA Comfy Cruise 12V Heated Travel Blanket.

The Comfy Cruise Heated Travel Blanket warms up in minutes. Its large 42" x 58" size comfortably covers 2 people. Plugs into 12V cigarette lighter socket. Luxurious 100% polyester fleece. 30 or 45 minute timer with automatic temperature control. Extra-long 7-foot cord reaches back seats. Energy-saving 4-amp power usage. Ideal for cars, trucks, SUVs, RVs, convertibles and boats.

PLUS




Share with your friends when you login into Indiegogo and use Indiegogo's share tools.  When their contributions total $2500, you'll win a free Pyle Retro Belt-Driven Turn Table.

Pyle Retro Belt-Driven Turn Table with USB-to-PC Connection and Rechargeable Battery. Share with your friends when you login into IndieGogo and use IndieGogo's share tools.  When their contributions total $2500, you'll win a free Pyle Retro Belt-Driven Turn Table.

The PVTT2U is a unique record player that incorporates compact and stylish form with versatile function. This multifunction turntable plays 33, 45, and 78 RPM records and lets you turn your vinyl records into digital music files using your PC. The unit's USB port allows you to connect this turntable to your computer and digitize your music using the included Audacity audio editing software. This unit also has a built-in rechargeable battery that uses the USB port to charge - connect it to your computer or use an AC-USB adapter (not included). Inside, on the front-end you'll find two stereo speakers for audio playback. Stereo RCA output allows you to connect this turntable to your home audio system for even bigger sound while your record spins. It's all packed into an elegant and portable briefcase-style design that is sure to add some style to your sound.

PLUS

PLUS




Share with your friends when you login into IndieGogo and use IndieGogo's share tools.  When their contributions total $4000, you'll win a free GraceDigital ECOSTONE in a color of your choice (red, orange, blue, black, and camo).

ECOSTONE, by Grace Digital is part of the ECOXGEAR line of products. This is the worlds toughest and most reliable portable Bluetooth stereo system.  Built to military specifications, ECOSTONE takes whatever life throws at it, and it just keeps on playing the music. Whether its subjected to a violent sandstorm, exposed to 140 degree heat, or submersed in up to three feet of water, ECOSTONE won’t let you down.

Featuring an integrated digital amplifier and two 3.5″, broad range speakers for crystal clear sound, ECOSTONE puts out serious sound.  You won’t believe how much volume comes out of such a compact package.

PLUS

PLUS

PLUS


Frequently Asked Questions

Can I contribute more than once?
Yes, you may contribute as often as you like and receive a perk for each contribution.

Can I change my perk after I've made a contribution?
Once a contribution is made, you can only receive the perk associated with that contribution.

Do your products come with a warranty?
All manufacturer's warranties apply.

How much is shipping?
Shipping is included in your perk!

Will I pay import duties, taxes, or customs clearance fees?
It is the contributor’s responsibility to ensure items can be legally imported to their country. Import duties, customs/VAT taxes, or other clearance fees are not included in the contribution amount and are the contributor's responsibility. Rates vary and you can calculate them using online tools, such as DutyCalculator. Please check with your country's customs office to determine for certain what these additional costs will be.

What value will you declare on customs forms?
We will declare the lesser of the Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP) or your contribution amount on customs forms.

Are refunds allowed?
IndieGoGo Refund Policy


Ecofriendly products are so popular today, that with your contribution we're one step closing to making sure everyone has the sustainable product they're looking for. Not to mention how good it feels to offer products that make the world a better place to live.

We're really glad you came to our crowdfunding page and hope you enjoyed your visit.  We can't wait to see you in our store; and when you click on that "Add to Cart" button and make your first purchase, let us know you saw us on Indiegogo and we'll give you a 5% discount and open the door and blow a kiss that should land on you within a week or so depending on the weather.  Cheers!

Check the quality of your power by monitoring Voltage, Line Frequency, Amperage, KWH, Current Leakage and more. Now you’ll know how much power your entire computer or home theater system is using. With the innovative Kill A Watt® PS-10 you’ll have peace of mind in more ways than one.

Advanced Surge Protection Circuitry
Soft Power-Up
Displays Max/Min Volts, Amps, Watts, PF, & Leakage Current
6 Foot Cord with Low Profile Plug
Light-Up Power Switch
Backlit LCD Display
Ten Grounded Outlets
EMI Filter reduces noise

As the need for off-grid power continues to grow, travelers, adventurers and outdoor professionals alike are looking for more efficient, space-conscious ways in which to charge their devices. With the powermonkey explorer 2, Powertraveller gives users the ability to generate their own power from a small, compact unit, whatever situation they find themselves in.
The unit houses a powerful, dual-core, 6000mAh lithium-ion battery, capable of recharging an iPhone 5 up to three times, a GoPro Hero3+ four times and a Garmin Edge 1000 four times.  It is also compatible with a plethora of other 5V devices such as tablets (including iPad), iPods, digital cameras, sat phones and more.
Works With

iPhones/Smart Phones

Mobile Phone

iPods/MP3/MP4

Will Also Work With

iPads/Tablets

PSP/Hand-held/Games Consoles

Sat-Navs/GPS

Head Torches










SunJack® helps mobile users stay charged on the go anywhere the sun shines. The SunJack® is able to fully charge its internal battery pack in about five hours of direct sunlight, or directly power any USB device. When the sun isn’t shining, users can still energize their devices from the powerful SunJack® battery, which holds enough charge to power up to four iPhones. Portable power is valued by campers, boaters, travelers, survivalists, hunters, rock climbers, and working professionals.










Uses a triple CPU system with camera vision, power management & device control for one of the best & smartest robotic technologies in its class
Advanced navigation system detects ambient environment 200 times per second & does a rigorous 10,800 times per second movement analysis for superior cleaning
Built-in camera recognition vision mapping provides intelligent obstacle detection
3.5" tall
Lightweight
Li-Ion rechargeable battery delivers 120 min of usage time
2:1 vacuum & mopping with infrared remote
Washable cartridge filter
Wet or dry cleaning
Picks up pet hair
Easy-empty dirt container
Dual HEPA media filters
Includes brush cleaning tool, extra filter & home charging base




Powertraveller has developed a world-first in off-grid power generation.  The powermonkey expedition is a revolution in portable charging technology, bringing together multiple ways in which to naturally, yet efficiently generate power - all housed in strong, aluminium, waterproof casing.
The waterproof (IP65 rated) powermonkey expedition houses a 10,500mAh lithium polymer battery which can be charged in three ways; via hand-powered crank, solar or via the international AC mains charger.










The Solar Link 240 is a 240-Watt portable power center that is capable of providing power to a variety of tools and appliances in several ways. Power is distributed through the USB, 12V DC, or 120V AC power outlets. It features a lightweight 240 watt hour (12v, 20Ah) LiFePO4 battery that will charge in 6 to 12 hours using the optional Sierra Wave 30-Watt Solar Collector or using the included AC wall charger or 12V DC charger.

Easily charges:

Cell phones
Smart phones
eReaders
Tablet computers
Cameras
GPS
Gaming devices
Laptops

The Sierra Wave® Solar Link® 1000 is a 1000-Watt portable power center that is capable of providing over 1000 watt-hours of portable power to a variety of tools and appliances. Power is distributed through 120V, 12V or USB power outputs.  It features a 1000 watt pure sine wave inverter and a relatively lightweight LiFePo4 battery, compared to AGM batteries.  This power storage and distribution center also features a state-of-the-art battery management technology making it the most, reliable, powerful and ligthweight power system on the market.  MADE IN USA!
Easily charges:

Laptops
12V Vehicle batteries
Rechargeable tools
Fans
TVs
DVDs
Speakers
Small appliances (AC)
Refrigerator
Freezer
Max Burton 12V products

Applications:  home, farm, cabin, camping, or work site







A unique portable power center, or generator, that can be customized by incrementally adding additional battery packs as your power needs increase. The base unit includes a 500Wh LiFePO4 battery and up to 2 optional 500Wh battery packs can be added (included) for a full 1500Wh of power! Scale it to fit your budget or need.
Our strength is in the quality of the details! This unit features a LiFePO4 battery system that not only lasts longer than AGM batteries, but is also safer and significantly lighter - 62 lbs. fully loaded vs. 100+ lbs. for a similar AGM style unit.
Charge it with the included 120V AC charger or pair it with our 120W Solar Collector for truly off-grid operation.  Solar Collector not included.


LiFePO4 battery system (lithium iron phosphate)
Sustains 1500+ charges

Accessory 500Wh battery packs slide in like a DVD (included)

2 - 120V AC outputs
2 - 12V DC outputs
2 - 5V USB 3.0 ports
Charging:Using the included 120V AC wall charger - charges in 3-5 hours (base unit) 11-14 hours (fully loaded with 2 battery packs)
Using a 120W Solar Collector (sold separately) - charges in 6-7 hours (base unit) or 18-20 hours (fully loaded with 2 battery packs)

Battery meters show the power available in each battery
Power key turns the entire system off for safety and security

Battery: LiFePO4 12.8V/40Ah, 500Wh

Inverter:  Pure sine wave 1500W/peak surge 3000W/continuous power 1350W

Base Unit 32 lbs.
500Wh Battery Pack 15 lbs.
Fully loaded with 2 battery packs 62 lbs.

Frequently Asked Questions


Can I contribute more than once?
Yes, you may contribute as often as you like and receive a perk for each contribution.
Can I change my perk after I've made a contribution?
Once a contribution is made, you can only receive the perk associated with that contribution.
Do your products come with a warranty?
All manufacturer's warranties apply.


How much is shipping?
Shipping is included in your perk!
Will I pay import duties, taxes, or customs clearance fees?
It is the contributor’s responsibility to ensure items can be legally imported to their country. Import duties, customs/VAT taxes, or other clearance fees are not included in the contribution amount and are the contributor's responsibility. Rates vary and you can calculate them using online tools, such as DutyCalculator. Please check with your country's customs office to determine for certain what these additional costs will be.
What value will you declare on customs forms?
We will declare the lesser of the Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP) or your contribution amount on customs forms.
Are refunds allowed?
IndieGoGo Refund Policy

story:
I've been a developer for 4 years on XDA but this product requires development experience beyond my capabilities. The product is a smartphone keyboard which allows a user to flip additional rows up or down or entire keypads which flips like a rotating cube as shown in the wireframe diagram. 

The additional features are to bring the common input fields of web browsers, text message apps, and Google search, Nav app addresses, and text suggestions to the thumb region on the screen. 

75% of the users only commit their thumb and really don't want to commit two hands or thumbs to use the smartphone most of the time. This app is designed to accomadate one hand or thumb use. 

It will deliver the fastest typing experience on any smartphone which includes Apple iPhone and Android but more important it will make typing fun and cool.

I plan to use the funds to launch a website which aims to host the final and beta test builds of the FlipKey smartphone apps for Android and iPhone's. 

The website is an important first step to delivery of the app and it's already under development see http://www.unifi-mobile.com
I've identified three companies who have development staff to qualified to create the product for both Android and Apple platforms. This is a software app (not hardware) for smartphones and it's current state of development is alpha, meaning no code has started until we get funded.

The picture may lead pledge supporters to think the drawing is a smartphone it's only an app which gets installed on any smartphone. 

The diagram can appear to some that it's part of a hardware design but it's just a demonstration of how it would work capturing the keypad flipping forward to reveal those other less used keys or what part of the software keyboard (middle rows only) will rotate when swipe gestures are invoked during use of the app.

The projected costs for each part of the project is as follows.Website for direct download of the finished product is estimated to cost $5500.00 this part has been started but is only 60% complete.

Android version of Flipkey development costs average $110,000 for a staff of six developers and in order for this product to work smooth and stable with no lag will require more complex programming than that of common apps built using the Android SDK and Java. 

C+ and other more complex languages will be needed to complete the product development for the Android platform.

Apple version of Flipkey development costs average $130,000 for the same number of developers but has increased costs due to the certification process Apple requires which accounts for added steps needed to certify and possibly rewrite some of the code to become approved by Apple when publishing on their app store.

The app will be called FlipKey which will allow a user to tailor the layout of their keyboard and give them unprecedented rapid access to the less common keys making the other keys and keypads rapidly available making it possible for the typist to flip back and forth between keypads to accomplish faster performance in creating messages, emails, website address or anything that requires text input on a smartphone..

There will be four versions of this app' standard, deluxe, premium and elite editions.
The screen layout will consist of cube sections which rotate up or down by either single row at a time or whole screens (keypads) at a time to reveal access to a specific keypad and associated keys; normally access to these sub-keypads requires the user to press a small button off to the left of their phone or tablet keyboard which reveals additional screens.

XDA has over 4.5 million subscribers and all of them are very excited by the possibility of this app, I feel this will be the biggest apps of all time as the input device is the most used and critical part of smartphones. Elegant hardware designs should be married to elegant and innovative software features. 

This app will be huge!!

Extreme criticism and scrutiny will be part of the development requirements as quality and smooth performance are mandatory for this product and no shortcuts or exceptions/compromises will be allowed period.

The standard edition will allow the keyboard screen to be accessible with swipe up and swipe down gestures. This will allow for the user to be able to type on the main screen and when special keys or when punctuation is needed instead of tapping a single key to expose/reveal the other characters from the sub-key pads the user can quickly and simply swipe up or down to access the additional keys and the associated keypads. 

The deluxe edition adds the ability for the user to define/customize which sub-screen keypads which appear based "tab order" after a swipe gestures of up or down occurs to facilitate greater speed and efficiency.

The premium edition adds added functionality for example of a swipe up or down reveals auto suggest, mirrored input fields to internet browser and sms/text message, google search, recipient send to: and numbers fields docked right on the keyboard.

 This facilitates one hand use and ease of operation.

The elite edition adds customizing all of the keys on the keypads in addition to the swipe order of keypads themselves and also adds a nav address input field and allows for a large key option making the keys themselves bigger. 

Full language support will be included in this edition as well.

The high degree of affection people have for their smartphones drive innovative ideas like this one to have greater impact on the lacking user experience today. 

While many advances have been made to hands-free use many users still prefer to use the keyboard because of the perceived high error rate for input by voice commands or swipe style input.

There is a high frustration factor users experience which can be eliminated with an input device that gives the user more control over their daily input activities. 

These improvements aim to make the greatest advances to the user experience when it comes to virtual keyboards ever created and the critical daily input activities people engage in will be second to none.

The company has plans to launch other awesome apps which promote one handed/thumb functions and we call this ergonomic usability, ergonomically correct layouts where information is placed at the top of the screen and access controls are at the bottom of the screen. 

Intelligent use of what users call effects or animations use more meaningful purposes verses just looking cool.

We plan to drive future innovation by dedicating a section on our website to meet the maker and or meet the developer where users of our products or services can connect to the person behind a feature or service and suggest changes to improve the next version or iteration. 

By leveraging social media services like YouTube we can make this a reimbursable activity as the company grows by monetizing the video content taking events which might have created expenses turning them instead into a profitable endeavors while building rapport and close relationships with our customers at the same time.

These efforts aim to create stronger relationships putting exclusive focus on the customer and what they want to deliver on their exact desires. 

Customer Driven Design (Future Versions Inspired By Customers)

We believe this will create sustainable success because our future products and services will always be driven by customer suggestion presenting a more effective means in collecting feedback than focus groups or static surveys ever could. 

The funding amount will cover basic minimum costs to build a basic version without all of the other features, but the project will be somewhere in the area of $250,000 for all features to be completed. 

The wire-frame diagram may be different than what is shown in the picture depending on the level of funding I am able to get. If there is any difference it will be lacking the font options, the keyboard key remapping, and broader language support.

The product will be built using the development companies I've selected and the wire-frame design which reflects the static prototype will be retooled to update the progress until we have something installable to publish. 

We will do the project in phases and deliver beta 1 within 3 months of development and these will be released to those customers who wish to download and test the beta releases and will also be available on the website provided above. 

The feedback collected over the course of 4 weeks will be used to finish the development to produce the final software deliverable.

Pictures and frequent video updates will be published as progress is made once there is something to reveal in live form. 

I will be posting to the level allowed and on the website.The risks we might face will be in cross platform compatibility, there are many versions of Android in the market and iPhone as well. 

Each of these require different SDK and Java versions not to mention other programming languages needed to make the product work buttery smooth in operation for all smartphones which complicates the development according to meetings I've had with the development companies.

The efforts to build the FlipKey product are not mine alone in addition to my development experience with smartphones I plan to hire and delegate sub-tasks to other expert developers to assist in remediation of these expected issues. 

Sometimes there are bugs identified in software development kits or tools and fixes are always issued to reduce security risks which may need to be addressed. 

The common way to address this is with new versions or patches.This can require code changes and if events like this occur additional resources may be procured to address the unknown issues. 

To keep the milestones on track and get the project finished by it's published deadline we may delegate complex issues if they are encountered to the suitable subject matter experts we can find.

I have 26 years of IT experience and have run my own company once before and the secret to keeping projects on track is choosing the right resources and tools for the job and having contingency plans and resources to mitigate risks if they occur. 

Having more than a quarter century of experience I know how to gauge who is most capable and who is not when it comes to achieving a critical milestone and what's needed to achieve final delivery a project by it's deadline.

For production testing I plan to recruit XDA developer community beta testers which I've used in the past when I've done other development work to iron out the bugs encountered during the beta build releases, they are trusted resources I;ve worked with over the year who commit great lengths of their personal time out of passion to assure a quality and timely release of FlipKey.

I have over 10 thousand friends on XDA and having been a developer out for since 2010 they will assure the success of the final product.

I started by career in IT (Information Technology) I've always felt I needed to be a business owner coming from a family of business owners who seeks to make the dreams of others come true. 

All I want for myself is the same thing I want for everyone.

So can we make a single promise come true together?

changes and if events like this occur additional resources may be procured to address the unknown issues. To keep the milestones on track and get the project finished by it's published deadline we may delegate complex issues if they are encountered to the suitable subject matter experts we can find.I have 26 years of IT experience and have run my own company once before and the secret to keeping projects on track is choosing the right resources and tools for the job and having contingency plans and resources to mitigate risks if they occur. Having more than a quarter century of experience I know how to gauge who is most capable and who is not when it comes to achieving a critical milestone and what's needed to achieve final delivery a project by it's deadline.For production testing I plan to recruit XDA developer community beta testers which I've used in the past when I've done other development work to iron out the bugs encountered during the beta build releases, they are trusted resources I;ve worked with over the year who commit great lengths of their personal time out of passion to assure a quality and timely release of FlipKey.I have over 10 thousand friends on XDA and having been a developer out for since 2010 they will assure the success of the final product.I started by career in IT (Information Technology) I've always felt I needed to be a business owner coming from a family of business owners who seeks to make the dreams of others come true. All I want for myself is the same thing I want for everyone.So can we make a single promise come true together?

story:
"Sownds" brings you so much more than just Sounds!


The iOS app was downloaded over 2.000 times within the first 72 hours. These numbers are incredible but there's one problem: Up to now only iPhone and iPad users can take advantage of "Sownds" on their mobile device.

The goal is to make this unique user experience available to as many people as possible.

Converting the iOS app to Android would undoubtedly be the largest step forwards in the history of "Sownds". But it's not only about converting a working system to a completely new environment. It's about transferring the same feeling and user experience from one platform to another. This is where your help is needed:

Other than the iPhone, Android phones come in so many different sizes and screen resolutions. Every device is unique in it's own way. The challenge is no to simply create one user interface and scale it up or down, depending what screen resolution is required.  It's about making the app look and feel great on any device out there.

But doing this means a lot of work and a huge amount of challenges in a new unfamiliar system, different frameworks and development libraries.

With your help we can develop, test and create an amazing Android version of "Sownds" within the next one or two months. Thank you for your precious contribution!


"Sownds" bringt dir so viel mehr als nur Sounds!


Die iOS App wurde in den ersten 72 Stunden über 2.000 mal heruntergeladen. Diese Zahlen sind der Wahnsinn, aber es gibt ein großes Problem: Bisher können nur iPhone und iPad Nutzer die Vorteile von "Sownds" genießen.

Das Ziel ist dieses einmalige Nutzererlebnis so vielen Menschen wie möglich zugänglich zu machen.

Die iOS Version auf Android zu konvertieren wäre sicher der größte Schritt nach Vorne in der noch kurzen Geschichte von "Sownds". Aber es geht nicht nur darum ein funktionierendes System in eine komplett neue Software Umgebung zu portieren. Es geht darum das gleiche 'feeling' und Nutzererlebnis von einer Plattform zu einer anderen zu übertragen. Und das ist wo wir deine Hilfe brauchen:

Anders wie beim iPhone, gibt es Android Geräte in den verschiedensten Ausführungen und Display Größen. Jedes Gerät ist auf eine bestimmte Art einzigartig. Die Herausforderung ist nicht einfach ein einziges User Interface zu bauen und dieses ja nach Bildschirmauflösung hoch- oder runter zu skalieren. Wir möchten, dass sich die App auf jeden Gerät klasse aussieht und sich gleich anfühlt.

Dies zu erreichen bedeutet viel Arbeit und einige Hindernisse in einem noch ungewohnten System, anderen 'frameworks' and Entwickler 'libraries'.

Mit deiner Hilfe können wir in den nächsten 1 bis 2 Monaten die Android Version entwickeln, testen und herausbringen. Vielen Dank für eure Unterstützung!

story:
Skiva SmartQuad is back! Yes you guessed it right, we are back on Indiegogo after a successful run on Kickstarter but you must be thinking why?

Well due to overwhelming response and suggestions on Kickstarter, we decided to do a second run on Indiegogo for those who missed out on this amazing opportunity last time. That’s not all, this time we are offering SmartQuad with Bundle Packs and a huge reduction in International Shipping from $25 to $15.

When you have an offer such as this, why miss out on it!


Why SmartQuad is best travel charger in World?

  • Compact, lightweight & easy to carry.
  • Charges up to 4 devices at fastest possible speed. (4 x2.4 Amps Ports)
  • Can charge virtually any smartphone, tablet, Bluetooth headset, GPS or any other USB based device irrespective of manufacturer.
  • Safe and quiet. (fan-less)
  • Built on solid experience of a highly successful Kickstarter project.(OctoFire)

Why we designed it?

With increasing personal & professional needs, now everyone needs multiple gadgets like smartphones, tablets or PC etc. We do purchase those gadgets to satisfy our needs but keeping all of them charged is a chore, especially during travel. Carrying multiple chargers is no fun and limited AC sockets can be annoying when multiple devices need to be charged.

There are many other chargers present in the market but they are not as smart. SmartQuad is unique because it can detect connected devices and output the optimal amount of current.

We listened to our OctoFire Kickstarter backers and designed SmartQuad based on their feedback. Below are the key differences from OctoFire:

  • AC/DC adapter & charger unit are merged into a single unit to make it travel friendly.
  • Ports have been reduced from 8 to 4 to make it more affordable, lightweight and compact.
  • Per port current has been increased from 2.1 Amps to 2.4 Amps.


We started out by experimenting with intelligent detection of devices to optimized charge current. We also designed AC to DC unit as efficient as possible taking advantage of latest power IC technology. This enabled us to make a design that does not need a fan to cool it even at peak loads.

We are in the final stages of production of our first batch of SmartQuad to fulfill the rewards of our Kickstarter SmartQuad backers.

Below shows the evolution of SmartQuad PCB design:

Concept drawings of SmartQuad:

Fully functional prototype:

Engineer debugging prototype:

With our past experience of delivering OctoFire successfully and as we are near to shipping the first batch of SmartQuad, we are very confident to mass produce second batch of SmartQuad by November 2014. We have already confirmed with our supplier for the availability of components. Below is our timeline of production:


(Feel Free to Skip this Section)

We have not found a single USB chargeable device as of yet that does not charge with our charger. So you can be confident that even though your device is not mentioned in the list below, it will be supported for sure.

Acer: Liquid E (S100), S300

Amazon: Kindle Wireless Reading Device (6"), Kindle fire 7-inch

Apple: iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPhone 4s, iPhone 4, iPad Air, iPad 4, iPad 3, iPad 2, iPad mini, iPad mini with Retina, iPod Touch

ASUS: Padfone Station (A66), Nexus 7, Eeepad Memo ME171, EEEPAD TF201-1B013A 32G, Padphone(Phone), Padfone 2(Phone), 

Blackberry: 9300 Dell: Streak 10 Pro (Mini 5),

Fujistsu: LTE F-01D, Go Pro Hero 3, 

GoPro: Hero3

HP: TouchPad Wi-fi 16GB 9.7inch Tablet,

HTC: 7 Mozart T8698, DESIRE (A8181), Desire S (S510e), Desire VC T328d, Droid Incredible, HD7 T9292, Sensation XE with Beats Audio Z715e, Incredible HD (HTC ThunderBolt 4G)(ADR6400L), Incredible S (S710e), ONE X (S720e), Salsa (C510e), Sensation (Z710e), Wildfire (A3333), Flyer P510e,

Huawei: U8860, Lenovo: A780, LePad A1-07(LepadA107LWFTI36222G512), THINKPAD TABLET 1838CTO,

LG: GT540, KT878, LG-P500, LG-P970 (Optimus Black), Optimus 4X HD P880, P930, P990, VS740 ALLY ANDROID, 

Motorola: Defy (MB525), Milestone 2 (A953), MILESTONE 3 (ME863), RAZR MAXX (XT910), XT720,

Nokia: E5, N8, N900,

Samsung: Galaxy Note, Galaxy Note 2, Galaxy Note 3, Galaxy S5, Galaxy S4, Galaxy S3, Epic 4G (SPH-D700), GALAXY Beam (GT-I8530), Galaxy mini2 (GT-S6500D), GALAXY NEXUS (GT-I9250), GALAXY NOTE (GT-N7000), GALAXY R (GT-I9103), Galaxy SIII S3 (GT-I9300), Galaxy S2, GOOGLE NEXUS S (GT-I9023), GT-S3350 (Ch@t 335), P7300, Galaxy Tab 10.1 (WiFi), Sharp: SH-12C,

Sony Ericsson: W100i SPIRO, XPERIA ARC (LT15i), Xperia Neo (MT15i), xperia play R800i, XPERIA PRO (MK16i),

Sony: XPERIA S (LT26i), Xperia neo L (MT25i), PRS-900BC, ViewSonic: ViewPad7, ZTE: ZTE-T U880

story:
MAGQI magnetic wireless power bank is thin and light with the capacity of 6000mAh. Owe to the inbuilt magnet, your phone will find the the charging spot automatically not matter it is put on the top horizontally or vertically. all you need to do is just  "Put ,Charge and Go". You'll see what a easy and convenient life MAGQI brings to you.

Looking back, Have you ever be troubled by the situations below?

  

Have to find the cable you need from a mess of cables?

Hurry to go but the phone is still linked by a cable powerbank? 

Hooked by other things while holding the long cables in your hand?

Have to gather the cables in order to get the right cable soon next time?

It doesn't have to be like this, MAGQI is now offering you a better choice

  • MAGQI has a simple appearance catering for most of people. It's also very light and thin with the size of 147*74*11 mm and weight of 250 g so that it will be comfortable for you to hold both the phone and the power bank in hand.

  • Inbuilt magnet will hold your phone firmly and securely. Your phone won't separate from the the power bank if they're put into the pocket or bag when you're on the move, therefore efficient charging is always guaranteed.

  • Also Owe to the inbuilt magnets, the phone will find the charging spot automatically whether it's placed horizontally or vertically on the top of the power bank.

  • Compatible with all QI-enabled smartphones. All models of QI enabled mobile phone can be charged by MAGQI with the help of our magnetic patches. (We only offer patches for iPhone and phone with inbuilt receiver)

  • Charge two devices simultaneously. There is an extra USB port in our power bank so you can charge one device wirelessly and charge another device with cables.

  • Works as pass-through wireless charger. MAGQI can charge your phone while it is getting charged itself. Get the phone and power bank charged together at night, you 'll wake up to see the two devices fully charged in the next morning.

The whole set includes one power bank, one magnetic patch and one USB cable.

You just need to put the patch between your phone and the phone case

Then  charging will start when you put your phone on the power bank.

 

We offer two types of patches to realize the magnetic function

  • Magnetic Patch for phones with inbuilt wireless receiver, such as Samsung Galaxy S8 / S8 plus / Note 8 / S7 / S7 Edge / S6 Edge plus / Note 5, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, Google Nexus 4/5/6/7, LG G3, Motorola Droid 5, HTC Droid DNA/8X, Nokia Lumia 920/930/820/1020/1520/icon929/822. (included in the whole set of MAGQI)

​

  • Magnetic Wireless Receiver for iPhone 5 /6/7 series.（separate purchase）

​

 

Light display of MAGQI power bank

 

Press the button on the power bank to start the charging, and the light of the button will also tells how much power is left.

 

With MAGQI magnetic wireless power bank, wireless charging can be anywhere in your life

Use MAGQI in the office

Use MAGQI  in the outside

Use MAGQI on the move

We're a group of like-minded professionals who has been in the electronics industry with more than 10 years of experiences collectively from all over the world. The company is currently based out of Shenzhen, China. The sales forces of the company are professionals from multinational FMCG companies around the world.

1, When will MAGQI be shipped out?

We will ship it out to all backers at the end of December.

2, What is the capacity of MAGQI ?

The capacity is 6000 mAh, with the efficiency over 74%

3, What does the package include?

It includes one power bank, one magnet sticker(patch) for phones with inbuilt wireless receiver  and one micro USB cable.

4, I am a wholesaler, who should I speak to if we want to distribute MAGQI?

You can simply send an email to marketing@magqi.cc, we will take care of it. 

marketing@magqi.cc

story:
Why ECHO!?

Because bad things do sometimes happen—even to good people. Be prepared!

  • Natural Disasters
  • Crime
  • Medical Emergencies
  • Living Alone
  • Stranded 
  • Urgent Rescue

Pro-Active Personal Safety is our passion!  Every time we read about a disaster—whether natural or caused by man—we reflect upon what could have been done to either prevent or limit the human suffering that invariably followed.

A similar passion resulted in the creation of the Baby Alert ChildMinder® System, a child safety system designed to prevent cases of children inadvertently being left alone in a vehicle.  Then, we quickly came to realize that adults, as well as children worldwide, suffer an equal vulnerability in this fast paced and often dangerous world.

We believe that for every problem, there is an equal algorithmic solution. After three years of R&D and  field testing, we now present ECHO!

  • A Single Purpose device – similar to the common pepper spray canister that some Users place upon their key ring "For Emergency Use Only!"
  • Simple – No learning curve ...  as simple as adding a canister of pepper spray to your key ring and pressing one button
  • Readily available – Small and always with you, wear it or place it on your key ring 
  • No Maintenance – 7 year standby
  • Performance – Operates on or off platform; location lock via GPS, GLONASS, Triangulation and Bluetooth; may also work in tandem with your smart phone
  • Life proof – Water proof, drop proof, extreme weather operating. 
  • Privacy – Relax, your location is only disclosed upon your request for assistance. Until you press the Echo alert button for assistance, not even our server can know your whereabouts
  • Affordable – $149.95 retail and $5.95 monthly subscription.

ECHO!  Dedicated to personal safety. 

With the tremendous daily demands placed upon the smart phone, coupled with its fragile nature, the smart phone is over tasked as a very reliable candidate for most unexpected emergencies. 

Although we all realize the necessity for dedicated security systems for our homes, our automobiles, office, and even our personal items (e.g., Bluetooth tracking buttons). However, for our most valued asset, our own personal security, at best we may use a shared part-time smart phone tracking App. 

Unfortunately, life does not provide conveniently scheduled emergencies to occur only when we're at home, at the office, or while in our automobiles. Emergencies can occur while  jogging, walking to/from the office to your automobile, even while on vacation.

Bottom-line, we do not have any personal security protocols in place..


Who need ECHO! Urgent Messenger?

We all do!

The ECHO! Urgent Messenger is so small, convenient and practical,  yet so powerful. Simply place it on your key ring or wear it around your neck. It is always with you when you need it.

In times of a crises, it's like initiating your own personal AMBER Alert™—family, friends and emergency personnel are placed on high alert with your exact location within 5 feet.

ECHO! the only consumer telecommunication product designated "For Emergency Use Only!"

Be Prepared!


Where? 

Wherever life takes you.

The ECHO! Urgent Messenger is a global product.  Emergencies are not geographically constrained and neither should your personal security device—if you can travel there, so can your ECHO!.

ECHO! is always ready to assist with life's emergencies. 


World Emergency Phone with Rescue Assist:
    • GPS/GLONASS, A-GPS, HTTP, Quad Band, GSM/GPRS, Bluetooth
    • Talk time — 5 hours
    • Real time tracking
    • ECHO! Alert — Rescue Assist
    • Waterproof — IP67
    • Power: Dual L92 (AAA) Batteries (Standby up to 7 years) 
    • Low Battery — Email and SMS alerts. 
    • Self preparedness tests
    • Privacy Assured — we respect your need for security and right to privacy. Until you deploy an ECHO!, your location is Not discoverable.
    • Lifeproof — Drop proof
    • Dimensions: L: 62mm (2.25in), W: 32mm (1.10in), H: 20mm (0.5in)
    • Weight: 55g
UrgentCare Staff managed systems:
    • Listen-in function
    • Two-way voice talking
    • Geo-fencing


How ECHO! works...

Register

  • Simply complete profile data prior to purchase.

Activate

  • Return to online profile and depress the ECHO! button when prompted,

In Emergency

  • Depress ECHO! button.
  • ECHO! device transmit to our server.
  • Server sends distress message to our Urgent Care Staff and to all of User's online listed profile contacts (Facebook, email, phone contacts, etc.—there is no contacts limitaton).
  • When User has also downloaded our optional free FFC Personal Locator App, the server will request that User's mobile  update its location to our Urgent Care Staff.
  • Next the User's location is locked by GPS, GLONASS and Cell Tower Triangulation and sent to server.
  • Server sends User's location to our Urgent Care Staff and to all of User's  authorized listed profile contacts (Facebook, email, phone contacts, etc.—there is no limit).
  • Our Urgent Care Staff  may now command and manage ECHO! and User's mobile phone until the emergency has been resolved.

What makes our product unique?

First and Only Key Fob Emergency Mobile Phone:

  • First and ONLY mobile phone to use dual AAA Batteries
  • Smallest mobile phone which supports GPS/GLONASS/AGPS
  • Only consumer electronic designated; "For Emergency Use Only"
  • Smallest Quad Band Phone
  • First and ONLY locator to support Braille
  • Standby up to 7 years
  • First  Eco Personal security System


Use Of Funds

  • App UI update
  • Production Tooling
  • Partner with national home securty monitoring centers
  • Global SIM Finalization
  • Firmware Refinement
  • Certifications - FCC, CE, Bluetooth


Our other passion:

The International Centre for Missing & Exploited Children is leading a global movement to protect children from sexual exploitation and abduction. 

A percentage of any funds raised here and from future production of this project will be donated to support this most valuable organization.


Help us protect our humanity by pre-ordering your ECHO! now!


Other Ways You Can Help

We really need your help in spreading the word about our campaign. We truly believe that the work that we are doing is helping people with their safety in a time of crisis. Please share our campaign on Facebook with your friends and family.
story_txt:
Why ECHO!?Because bad things do sometimes happen—even to good people. Be prepared! 

Natural Disasters
Crime
Medical Emergencies
Living Alone
Stranded 
Urgent Rescue
Pro-Active Personal Safety is our passion!  Every time we read about a disaster—whether natural or caused by man—we reflect upon what could have been done to either prevent or limit the human suffering that invariably followed. A similar passion resulted in the creation of the Baby Alert ChildMinder® System, a child safety system designed to prevent cases of children inadvertently being left alone in a vehicle.  Then, we quickly came to realize that adults, as well as children worldwide, suffer an equal vulnerability in this fast paced and often dangerous world. We believe that for every problem, there is an equal algorithmic solution. After three years of R&D and  field testing, we now present ECHO!

A Single Purpose device – similar to the common pepper spray canister that some Users place upon their key ring "For Emergency Use Only!"


Simple – No learning curve ...  as simple as adding a canister of pepper spray to your key ring and pressing one button

Readily available – Small and always with you, wear it or place it on your key ring 

No Maintenance – 7 year standby

Performance – Operates on or off platform; location lock via GPS, GLONASS, Triangulation and Bluetooth; may also work in tandem with your smart phone

Life proof – Water proof, drop proof, extreme weather operating. 

Privacy – Relax, your location is only disclosed upon your request for assistance. Until you press the Echo alert button for assistance, not even our server can know your whereabouts

Affordable – $149.95 retail and $5.95 monthly subscription.

ECHO!  Dedicated to personal safety. 
With the tremendous daily demands placed upon the smart phone, coupled with its fragile nature, the smart phone is over tasked as a very reliable candidate for most unexpected emergencies. Although we all realize the necessity for dedicated security systems for our homes, our automobiles, office, and even our personal items (e.g., Bluetooth tracking buttons). However, for our most valued asset, our own personal security, at best we may use a shared part-time smart phone tracking App. Unfortunately, life does not provide conveniently scheduled emergencies to occur only when we're at home, at the office, or while in our automobiles. Emergencies can occur while  jogging, walking to/from the office to your automobile, even while on vacation.Bottom-line, we do not have any personal security protocols in place..Who need ECHO! Urgent Messenger?We all do!The ECHO! Urgent Messenger is so small, convenient and practical,  yet so powerful. Simply place it on your key ring or wear it around your neck. It is always with you when you need it.In times of a crises, it's like initiating your own personal AMBER Alert™—family, friends and emergency personnel are placed on high alert with your exact location within 5 feet.ECHO! the only consumer telecommunication product designated "For Emergency Use Only!"Be Prepared!Where? Wherever life takes you.The ECHO! Urgent Messenger is a global product.  Emergencies are not geographically constrained and neither should your personal security device—if you can travel there, so can your ECHO!.ECHO! is always ready to assist with life's emergencies. World Emergency Phone with Rescue Assist:
GPS/GLONASS, A-GPS, HTTP, Quad Band, GSM/GPRS, Bluetooth
Talk time — 5 hours
Real time tracking
ECHO! Alert — Rescue Assist
Waterproof — IP67
Power: Dual L92 (AAA) Batteries (Standby up to 7 years) 
Low Battery — Email and SMS alerts. 
Self preparedness tests
Privacy Assured — we respect your need for security and right to privacy. Until you deploy an ECHO!, your location is Not discoverable.

Lifeproof — Drop proof

Dimensions: L: 62mm (2.25in), W: 32mm (1.10in), H: 20mm (0.5in)

Weight: 55g
UrgentCare Staff managed systems:
Listen-in function
Two-way voice talking
Geo-fencing

story:
Ultimate assistant in your daily tasks.

Multitasking has never been so easy, just take Halo wherever you go and enjoy your experience with our phone stand.

 

 

 

 

 Two types of HALO

  • HALO DESK
  • HALO WIRELESS with built-in Qi wireless charger

Halo is painted with natural oil finishes which allows us to experiment with various colours starting from wood shaving brown to charcoal black.

Precision of machinery and craftsmanship excellency were combined to create next generation phone holder. Each Halo is one of a kind. Wood patterns create geometrical masterpiece and represent the origin of tree.

 

Solid wood - Each Halo is created from a piece of solid wood and covered with natural oil finishes.

Micro-USB Cable - Halo Desk wireless charger works with micro-USB cable which transfers power to Qi wireless charger.

Nano-suction Technology - Nano suction ring ensures strong grip with any flat surface thanks to millions of nano-size air bubbles, which creates vacuum between your phone and Halo.

Wireless Charging - Built-in Qi wireless charger (charging voltage 5V, 1A) is the most popular and growing technology supported by various phone giants such as Iphone, Samsung, Microsoft and more.

Built-in and External Receivers - Halo supports both built-in Qi wireless charging devices such as Iphone 8 and Samsung Galaxy S7 and external wireless receiver modules, which can be added to majority of smartphones like Iphone 7, Iphone 6, Google Pixel and more.

Power LED Lights - Red & blue led lights show level of power and connectivity between Halo wireless charger and phone built-in or external wireless receiver.

 

 

Halo Sustainability

For every purchased Halophone stand, we promise to plant a tree, an acorn to be exact. It’s the cycle of life that we want to put in Halo - give back to nature what we haven taken, to give you a new kind of gadget. A gadget that in a world full of plastics creates real experience. The experience of Halo.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  This packaging will protect HALO for in its long journey to you.

Halo = Group of friends and professionals

We crossed our paths to create something we all stand for -
thoughtful, affordable & high-quality design.

story:
Imagine the possibilities and everyday usage with Mstick?

Mstick is a LED light stick. Controlled from featured modular application, Mstick operates various functional lights. The user can choose categories from ready to use and settings and customize the light depending on their situation. 

We are already in the mass production stage. Here is the picture of mass production T2 &Housing of Mstick. We keep working hard on upgrading of main PCB and LED Strip PCB for the better quality. We always consider how the users can use our product longer and safer with best quality.


Controlling Mstick is easy-to-use and its various functions are suitable for daily usage. Write down the text or emoji into the “After Effect” category and enjoy the festival in various ways. Riding a bicycle or running at night? Mstick can keep you safe and make your experience more enjoyable. Just click the “Sports Light” of the app. Choose animation and change colorsto fit your taste. Additionally, some of other major functions of Mstick are music visualiser, concept selfie, alarm, mood light, weather forecast. There are so many!


Whenever you are riding a bike or stopped to rest, Mstick notices your movements with G-sensor. Mstick automatically changes color and animation when it recognizes change in your movement. This allows for more safe riding as the light turns red when you are stopped and turns back to white when you begin riding. Please check the 'Prototype Review' video for more details.

Currently developed LED modes are ‘Power on/off’, ‘Color Changes’, ‘Control each LEDs’, ‘Sound Visualiser’, ‘Tilt by G-sensor’, ‘Sports Light’, ‘LED Animations’, ‘Power animation’, ‘Air Display by P.O.V’. Even after we launch Mstick, our efforts will be put to develop softwares and share the updates with the users through modular application.

Mstick modular application is easy to use in all situations.

Mstick application is modular to suit all functions. Controlling the Mstick is simple and user friendly.

Lighting control and changing color is easy with Mstick app. Also, you can use your smartwatch for simple taskssuch as on/off and modes change function. Mstick app supports iPhone 5 and above, Galaxy S4 and above, and Nexus 5 and above with Bluetooth 4.1.

We designed the Mstick to be simple, convenient and durable for heavy outdoor usage. 

1. Stick Body

1-1. Simple and beautiful stick shaped body is suitable for all types of environments. Gently press the button located at the top of body to turn on and off Mstick and change modes that are set in the app. So, you can simply turn on and off or change modes without touching your phone. You can also easily connect with your smart phone by pressing the Bluetooth Pairing button.

1-2. At the bottom of the Mstick body has a universal camera hole mount. It can be compatible with any types of camera accessories.

2. Leather Strap

Leather Strap: Mstick comes with Leather Strap which makes Mstick to hang or loop anywhere easily.

3. Link Part

Link Parts: Link Parts help you to fix the strap bolt stably when Stick Body is connected with Leather Strap.


4. Cable Holder

Recharge Mstick with Micro 5pin USB Port. Insert your USB cable to Cable Holder and stick to Cable Holder to Iron Plate. Magnetic Cable Holder makes your room mess free.

 

5. Iron Plate

Mstick comes with built-in magnet. Mstick can be easily attached to wherever it is magnetic. If Mstick should be attached on other than steel material, you can install the Iron Plate manually by tape or screw. 

Three Colors for Mstick

Mstick comes with following 3 colors.  Cream White, Turquoise and Midnight Blue.

Dimension 

  • Stick Body : 160(H) x 24.5(W) x 17.5(D) mm

Hardware Specification 

  • RGB LED x 16 ea : 120 Lumen
  • RGB LED brightness :Red(~420mcd), Green(~720mcd),Blue(~200mcd)
  • Bluetooth 4.1 2.4Ghz
  • G-Sensor (3 Axis Gyro+ 3 Axis Accelerometer )
  • Lithium Polymer Battery : 1800mAh
  • Lithium Polymer Battery Time : Min 7 hours (Max brightness) Max 7 days (Low Brightness)
  • Micro 5pin USB Charging Port

Mstick comes in a handy and classy packaging, making it ideal gift for your loved ones. It also comes with a strap, so hanging or carrying is easy. 

Timeline

  • 2016 FEB
    -BETA Build and Test
  • 2016 MAR
    -ALPHA Build
    -Product Certification
  • 2016 APR
    -Pilot Build
    -Start Mass Production
    -Start Shipping to Backers!

We designed bike mount for the Sports Light function. We considered the environment when used for riding a bike came up with most functional design.  

Risks and chanllenges

Technical Challenge:

MOLT Team faced numerous challenges due to technical difficulty to make all desired functions into reality. Technologies involved in each function are complex and difficult to realize. However, we are pursuing to utilize all functions for Mstick with smart phone and make life simpler for end users.

We spent more time than we initially expected during the R&D stage thus technical bugs are mostly eliminated and functions are ready for our backers.

MOLT Team is made up of specialists from different sectors with deep experience in developing and designing products. We love what we do and we are all very proud of our work.

Design: 
Mstick is created to keep the product user friendly. Therefore, Mstick fits in any interior settings and outdoor environment. The size of Mstick is optimal for all settings and usability and brightness of the LED light has been maximized.

Delivery: 
We expect to release the product by the end of April. The release date would be obeyed unless severe technical or logistical issue.

International Logistics: 
We are aware of issues of international delivery from other projects in Indiegogo. Our expert logistic staffs will proactively assist recipients to eliminate potential delays or missing products during transportation. Unfortunately, some countries impose duties, fees and taxes which will be recipients' responsibility.
