story:
Creating a better work environment


The OMBEE transforms any regular desk into a standing desk in just two minutes,and does two things that no other stand up desk does. It turns into a slick carrying case and provides essential lower body movement while standing. 

Why do we need to stand?

1. Keeps you healthy

If you stand 3 or 4 more hours 5 days a week, over the course of a year, it's equivalent to running 10 marathons

2. Relieves back pain

Up to 90% more pressure is applied on your lower back when sitting instead of standing. By simply breaking up sitting with standing throughout your day, you can drastically reduce lower back pain.

3. Boosts productivity

Research shows that standing may lead to a  10% increase in worker productivity. Standing with motion offers benefits such as higher energy levels, improved concentration, and fewer headaches.



WHAT PEOPLE THINK ABOUT OMBEE ?

« The OMBEE desk keeps the brain more active during work. » - Dr. Geoffrey Pfeifer, PH. D. Neurophysiology

« I feel more energetic after trying it for 20 seconds. » - Tech Crunch Conference attendee

« Some studies have show that frequent exercises throughout the day, even small ones, can improve blood circulation, which will lower blood pressure, promote weight loss, and even improve blood sugar control. The OMBEE desk system allows the users to move their legs and with minimal impact on their work. » - Grace Huang, D.O. Interventional Cardiologist


AS SEEN IN


« The built-in movement allows users to increase blood-flow to the rest of their body while also maintaining “ideal” posture. » - 9TO5Toys

« The OMBEE portable modular standing desk provides a compact easy-to-use way of transforming any desk into your personal standing workstation and includes everything you need for a healthier working space. The portable standing desk collapses down into a convenient briefcase which allows you to carry everything with you when required. » - Geeky Gadget



FIT FOR YOU & YOUR WORK STYLE

We've designed OMBEE to be the perfect fit for you and your work style! By combining sleek aesthetics with durable materials, we're giving you the versatility you want and need. Whether you're going in a co-working space, at school or want to change your actual sitting desk into a stand-up desk, you can bring OMBEE anywhere, anytime. 


PORTABLE : MOVE WITH YOU EASILY





CONVENIENT : SET UP WITHIN 2 MINUTES





LIGHTWEIGHT : LESS THAN 13 POUNDS 

OMBEE is so lightweight you will want to bring it everywhere all the time.


ADJUSTABLE : 6, 12, 15 AND 18 INCH LIFT

At OMBEE, we like everyone. That's why we've designed a great adjustable stand-up desk so smaller & taller person can share the same desk.





MOVEMENT : KEEPS YOUR LOWER BODY MOVING



POSTURE : HELP YOU STAND UP STRAIGHT


PERSONALIZE YOUR OMBEE & CHOOSE BETWEEN DIFFERENT COLORS! 




How do we choose our OMBEE desk type (Laptop &Monitor) Body color and panel color? 

Go to this Google form --> Click here <--  and fill out all the questions, before we ship out to your address we will do a final check on this info.

Why do we need to stand?

1. Keeps you healthy

If you stand 3 or 4 more hours 5 days a week, over the course of a year, it's equivalent to running 10 marathons

2. Relieves back pain

Up to 90% more pressure is applied on your lower back when sitting instead of standing. By simply breaking up sitting with standing throughout your day, you can drastically reduce lower back pain.

3. Boosts productivity

Research shows that standing may lead to a  10% increase in worker productivity. Standing with motion offers benefits such as higher energy levels, improved concentration, and fewer headaches.


When will I get my OMBEE Desk?

We are aiming to make our first delivery's to Indiegogo Backers December 2016. Once all backers have thier OMBEE products we will begin sellling the desks on AMAZON Prime. 


What is your return policy?

If you find a factory defect out of the box ,we will replace the unit at no cost to you. Just send the product back in its original box with all pieces that were included.  If the unit shows signs of damage instead of factory defect, there may be a repair fee.


How high will the OMBEE raise my workspace over a regular desk?

The OMBEE is designed to go on top of a regular 30-inch high office desk. The OMBEE set with 8 legs can raise your desk 6, 12, 15 and 18 inches off a regular desk.  You particular office desk may be slightly taller or shorter than 30 inches.


Warranty

We built the OMBEE to be tough. If you do happen to unintentionally break the product, just email us here at info@ombeesystems.com. If you receive a defective product and it breaks because of the defect, we will replace it. If, however, you put the OMBEE in situations where the weight, temperature, or drop height (6 ft) is exceeded, we cannot replace the product.  However, you can purchase replacement parts from us. For more info call 818-748-7776, 9AM-5PM Pacific Standard Time 7 days a week.


How much weight can the OMBEE Desk hold?

The laptop stand is designed to hold a 17-inch (or smaller) Apple, Dell, HP or LG laptop that has a slim profile. Large and thick 17-inch gamer laptops (Alienware) will not fit into the laptop stand and we would recommend getting the monitor version. The OMBEE Desk set for monitor stand is design to hold a 27-inch LCD/LED computer monitor. We recommend the total weight put on the OMBEE desk to not exceed 30 lbs.  However, we have tested the OMBEE system with much more weight.

I have a laptop but sometimes I may put a monitor on it , which OMBEE set should I choose? 

If you think you may be putting a laptop and monitor on the OMBEE Desk from time to time then get the Monitor Version seen below.

Is the plastic used in the OMBEE Desk entirely BPA free? Is it safe to be around all day in an office with limited airflow? 

Yes, the following information is from our production facility with over 25 years of experience with plastics.

"Polypropylene plastic. BPAs are usually found in polycarbonate plastics in the resin so there wouldn't be any in your product. BPAs used to be in a lot of blow molded bottles but now a days they have moved onto better plastics.

Polycarbonate is a good material and only affects the human if you heat cycle it and ingest it...

http://www.livestrong.com/article/158674-which-plastic-containers-can-i-safely-use/

Check out the read above. Notice #5 is safe!"




If you only have a laptop and want to get the best ergonomic position then get the Laptop version shown below. It will hold your laptop at near eye level. 


What are the measurements of the OMBEE Case?
The case is 26x6x13 inches closed up.
How much working area will I have when it's set up on my desk? 
 Fully opened up with panels extended the working area of the desk is 44x26 inches which is 7.94 sq ft, (.737 sq m) of working space 
If I get the monitor version of the OMBEE Desk how much space to I have on that top platform? 
The monitor platform is 26x10x1 inches 

Can I get multiple perks?

Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want.


Can I change my perk?

Unfortunately, not during the campaign. But before we send you your desk, we'll send you an email with a link to a system that will help you manage your perk, input your shipping information, and purchase add-ons if you choose.


Why is this better than and adjustable sit/stand workstation?

1. It's easier to transport. Try moving other sit/stand workstations for outside use on a sunny day or taking it on a road trip!

2. The OMBEE set provides lower body movement.  Others make you buy an additional piece of equipment, if available at all.

3. It's a case for your computer, mouse, and keyboard also.  Most laptops should fit into the case even with the regular complement of OMBEE components.

4. It does not encourage you to sit! We think a standing desk that easily lets you sit defeats the purpose of a standing desk. Once set up, the OMBEE does not switch to sitting mode easily because we just don't want you to sit! You sit enough already elsewhere.  If you really need to sit, pull up a stool or take a 5-minute sitting break.

5. You can put a padlock on it to secure the valuables inside.

6. It's got a cool hexagon design where you can click in our future accessories such as smartphone and tablet holders and our split keyboards.


Why are you building the OMBEE system in the USA? 

1. Quality control - the founders will be on site for the initial production of the OMBEE Desks on a daily basis.

2. Cost - Once you factor in flying to Asia ten times, cost of production delays, and shipping costs, making the product initially in California makes financial sense.

3. On-site machine shop - for quick changes/repairs/improvements to the molds.

4. Proximity - 15 minutes from both founders' homes.

5. Track record - We have working relationship for 10 years building other plastic  products with our injection molder.
story_txt:
Creating a better work environment
The OMBEE transforms any regular desk into a standing desk in just two minutes,and does two things that no other stand up desk does. It turns into a slick carrying case and provides essential lower body movement while standing. Why do we need to stand?1. Keeps you healthyIf you stand 3 or 4 more hours 5 days a week, over the course of a year, it's equivalent to running 10 marathons2. Relieves back painUp to 90% more pressure is applied on your lower back when sitting instead of standing. By simply breaking up sitting with standing throughout your day, you can drastically reduce lower back pain.3. Boosts productivityResearch shows that standing may lead to a  10% increase in worker productivity. Standing with motion offers benefits such as higher energy levels, improved concentration, and fewer headaches.WHAT PEOPLE THINK ABOUT OMBEE ?« The OMBEE desk keeps the brain more active during work. » - Dr. Geoffrey Pfeifer, PH. D. Neurophysiology« I feel more energetic after trying it for 20 seconds. » - Tech Crunch Conference attendee« Some studies have show that frequent exercises throughout the day, even small ones, can improve blood circulation, which will lower blood pressure, promote weight loss, and even improve blood sugar control. The OMBEE desk system allows the users to move their legs and with minimal impact on their work. » - Grace Huang, D.O. Interventional CardiologistAS SEEN IN
« The built-in movement allows users to increase blood-flow to the rest of their body while also maintaining “ideal” posture. » - 9TO5Toys
« The OMBEE portable modular standing desk provides a compact easy-to-use way of transforming any desk into your personal standing workstation and includes everything you need for a healthier working space. The portable standing desk collapses down into a convenient briefcase which allows you to carry everything with you when required. » - Geeky Gadget

FIT FOR YOU & YOUR WORK STYLEWe've designed OMBEE to be the perfect fit for you and your work style! By combining sleek aesthetics with durable materials, we're giving you the versatility you want and need. Whether you're going in a co-working space, at school or want to change your actual sitting desk into a stand-up desk, you can bring OMBEE anywhere, anytime. PORTABLE : MOVE WITH YOU EASILYCONVENIENT : SET UP WITHIN 2 MINUTESLIGHTWEIGHT : LESS THAN 13 POUNDS OMBEE is so lightweight you will want to bring it everywhere all the time.ADJUSTABLE : 6, 12, 15 AND 18 INCH LIFTAt OMBEE, we like everyone. That's why we've designed a great adjustable stand-up desk so smaller & taller person can share the same desk.





MOVEMENT : KEEPS YOUR LOWER BODY MOVING





POSTURE : HELP YOU STAND UP STRAIGHT








PERSONALIZE YOUR OMBEE & CHOOSE BETWEEN DIFFERENT COLORS! 






















How do we choose our OMBEE desk type (Laptop &Monitor) Body color and panel color? 
Go to this Google form --> Click here <--  and fill out all the questions, before we ship out to your address we will do a final check on this info.
Why do we need to stand?
1. Keeps you healthy
If you stand 3 or 4 more hours 5 days a week, over the course of a year, it's equivalent to running 10 marathons
2. Relieves back pain
Up to 90% more pressure is applied on your lower back when sitting instead of standing. By simply breaking up sitting with standing throughout your day, you can drastically reduce lower back pain.
3. Boosts productivity
Research shows that standing may lead to a  10% increase in worker productivity. Standing with motion offers benefits such as higher energy levels, improved concentration, and fewer headaches.
When will I get my OMBEE Desk?
We are aiming to make our first delivery's to Indiegogo Backers December 2016. Once all backers have thier OMBEE products we will begin sellling the desks on AMAZON Prime. 
What is your return policy?
If you find a factory defect out of the box ,we will replace the unit at no cost to you. Just send the product back in its original box with all pieces that were included.  If the unit shows signs of damage instead of factory defect, there may be a repair fee.
How high will the OMBEE raise my workspace over a regular desk?
The OMBEE is designed to go on top of a regular 30-inch high office desk. The OMBEE set with 8 legs can raise your desk 6, 12, 15 and 18 inches off a regular desk.  You particular office desk may be slightly taller or shorter than 30 inches.
Warranty
We built the OMBEE to be tough. If you do happen to unintentionally break the product, just email us here at info@ombeesystems.com. If you receive a defective product and it breaks because of the defect, we will replace it. If, however, you put the OMBEE in situations where the weight, temperature, or drop height (6 ft) is exceeded, we cannot replace the product.  However, you can purchase replacement parts from us. For more info call 818-748-7776, 9AM-5PM Pacific Standard Time 7 days a week.
How much weight can the OMBEE Desk hold?
The laptop stand is designed to hold a 17-inch (or smaller) Apple, Dell, HP or LG laptop that has a slim profile. Large and thick 17-inch gamer laptops (Alienware) will not fit into the laptop stand and we would recommend getting the monitor version. The OMBEE Desk set for monitor stand is design to hold a 27-inch LCD/LED computer monitor. We recommend the total weight put on the OMBEE desk to not exceed 30 lbs.  However, we have tested the OMBEE system with much more weight.
I have a laptop but sometimes I may put a monitor on it , which OMBEE set should I choose? 
If you think you may be putting a laptop and monitor on the OMBEE Desk from time to time then get the Monitor Version seen below.
Is the plastic used in the OMBEE Desk entirely BPA free? Is it safe to be around all day in an office with limited airflow? 
Yes, the following information is from our production facility with over 25 years of experience with plastics.

"Polypropylene plastic. BPAs are usually found in polycarbonate plastics in the resin so there wouldn't be any in your product. BPAs used to be in a lot of blow molded bottles but now a days they have moved onto better plastics.


Polycarbonate is a good material and only affects the human if you heat cycle it and ingest it...


http://www.livestrong.com/article/158674-which-plastic-containers-can-i-safely-use/


Check out the read above. Notice #5 is safe!"




If you only have a laptop and want to get the best ergonomic position then get the Laptop version shown below. It will hold your laptop at near eye level. 




What are the measurements of the OMBEE Case?

The case is 26x6x13 inches closed up.
How much working area will I have when it's set up on my desk? 
 Fully opened up with panels extended the working area of the desk is 44x26 inches which is 7.94 sq ft, (.737 sq m) of working space 
If I get the monitor version of the OMBEE Desk how much space to I have on that top platform? 
The monitor platform is 26x10x1 inches 
Can I get multiple perks?
Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want.
Can I change my perk?
Unfortunately, not during the campaign. But before we send you your desk, we'll send you an email with a link to a system that will help you manage your perk, input your shipping information, and purchase add-ons if you choose.
Why is this better than and adjustable sit/stand workstation?
1. It's easier to transport. Try moving other sit/stand workstations for outside use on a sunny day or taking it on a road trip!
2. The OMBEE set provides lower body movement.  Others make you buy an additional piece of equipment, if available at all.
3. It's a case for your computer, mouse, and keyboard also.  Most laptops should fit into the case even with the regular complement of OMBEE components.
4. It does not encourage you to sit! We think a standing desk that easily lets you sit defeats the purpose of a standing desk. Once set up, the OMBEE does not switch to sitting mode easily because we just don't want you to sit! You sit enough already elsewhere.  If you really need to sit, pull up a stool or take a 5-minute sitting break.
5. You can put a padlock on it to secure the valuables inside.
6. It's got a cool hexagon design where you can click in our future accessories such as smartphone and tablet holders and our split keyboards.

Why are you building the OMBEE system in the USA? 
1. Quality control - the founders will be on site for the initial production of the OMBEE Desks on a daily basis.
2. Cost - Once you factor in flying to Asia ten times, cost of production delays, and shipping costs, making the product initially in California makes financial sense.
3. On-site machine shop - for quick changes/repairs/improvements to the molds.
4. Proximity - 15 minutes from both founders' homes.
5. Track record - We have working relationship for 10 years building other plastic  products with our injection molder.

story:
We have worked on Bluetooth products since 2002, and the idea of Bluetooth is to transfer information between devices without wire and using less energy. Now the technology is getting mature to the next level that even no more wire between earpieces of a Bluetooth stereo headphone. By adapting the True Wireless Stereo(TWS) technology, we proudly presents our latest new product called FreeStereo Twins.

Key Features


True Wireless Stereo

True wireless stereo speaker has been available in market for more than a year but its size is not good to carry around for personal leisure. 

We now have the solution which can shrink to the size that can be worn on ears with battery power that can last for at least 2 hours in use.


Charging cradle

To make the earpiece smaller, we decided to use customized charging design with dedicated charging cradle. And to have more time to enjoy true wireless, we also come up with a portable charging function in the cradle, so that it can extend the usage time of FreeStereo Twins for 2 times more.

Sweat protection

With the experience of wearing consumer electronic gadget on the body, sweat is always the biggest challenge to us. Since 2013, we have used the advanced Liquipel Watersafe nano coating technology (Please visit Liquipel website for more information on their Nanocoating technology - http://www.lqpasia.com)  onto a number of our products. We have confidence to deploy this technology into FreeStereo Twins to protect it against sweat attack.


Apart from all these considerations, we want our customers - you, to enjoy this true wireless stereo experience, we decided not to add on other gadget features which you may not use at all. So that we can shorten the development time while keeping its reliability and product quality. And most importantly, we would like to bring FreeStereo Twins to market for Christmas seasons this year with more affordable price.

Easy pairing design

Simple to use is the rule of thumb for all consumer electronics. When you first get the FreeStereo Twins, just follow the two steps below and you are good to go and enjoy your favourite music:

1) First hold the multi-functional button of both earbuds for 8 seconds to activate the pairing mode. The LED indicator in the earbuds will flash with red and blue colour alternatively

2) Go to the Bluetooth control menu in your smartphone and search for "FreeStereo Twins" and select it for pairing. Once the connection is confirmed from your smartphone, you can then enjoy your favourite entertainment

Production Timeline




About our team

1. A global brand with multi excellent awards.

2. Design driven and “know-how” on materials use &  finishing on product.

3. Proprietary technology and comprehensive product development capability.

4. Specializes in the use of different raw materials and product packaging

5. Best-in-class product quality for key operators and private labeling partnership.

i.Tech management team have engaged in the consumer electronic and wireless communications products for over 15 years. The comprehensive experience significantly contributes to i.Tech success and the way forward.


Risks and challenges

We are aiming for making a product with latest technology while with competitive pricing that the target customer would be willing to afford. We spent a lot of time

To develop and produce high-end products requires to overcome lots of challenges on design, performance, assembly and testing. However, we are confident that we can resolves all those issues.

Schedule is always a topic that we need to tackle every day and we are working hard to meet our committed date per perk stated.

story:
Our Story

Though only an episode into Timedancer, the road to where we are has been eventful and wrought with decisions and unexpected turns. The idea for the app came about in early 2010 and production of the first episode began in June of 2010. Initially, Timedancer was envisioned as an iPhone/iPad application, until we happened upon the Windows Phone and found the baseline specifications are terrific, and its standard screen resolutions means that we can optimize our video files and produce an app that works well across the board. We shot the first episode with DSLR cameras; for episode 2, we had a full crew and locked down amazing locations to film over a two-day period. Check out our blog posts about filming episode 2 HERE.


The move up from DSLR to full crew and professional equipment means that our budget has also increased, and in order to ensure the completion of the first season of Timedancer, we need your help! We've already finished production on Episodes 1 & 2 which are NOW available in the Marketplace for Windows 7. We're looking to lock down the budget for episode 3 and episode 4. And this is where YOU come in!!


We'd love to hear your thoughts on Timedancer. You can check out the screencast for episode 1, which showcases some of the features of the app here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_profilepage&v=qfuBpBMlAd8. 


For those of you who don't have a Windows Phone 7, worry not – plans are in the works to have Timedancer available on other platforms later on this year. And all backers who pledge more than $20 will get a link to an exclusive computer version of Timedancer once the project is fully funded.


The creators of Timedancer are screenwriter/director Arivind Abraham and programmer Ali Maggs, both from Chaos Created, a creative media development shop based in Bristol, UK. Writer and “marketing wizard” Stephanie Morillo is running this campaign on behalf of the Chaos Created and Timedancer folks. For more information about the app, visit the Timedancer Official Website.

About the App

Timedancer is a new interactive experience which marries great episodic television with the thrill of “point and click” gaming and puzzle solving. Imagine the television show Lost with games and multiple scenarios which offer alternate endings, and you have Timedancer.


Set in the near future, Timedancer chronicles the lives of Tempus, Vivien, Ben, Kazuo and Adam, each of whom have their own agendas, but whose fates are intertwined across the fabric of time and space by the mysterious Timedancer Corporation.


Vivien is a time traveler employed by the Timedancer Corporation, which is headed up by the illusive Tempus. Under the guise of using time travel for philanthropic reasons, Tempus is acquiring information to eventually monetize and politicize time travel technology for his own profit and means. With the help of a woman named Kazuo and the Alpha Timedancer named Adam, Vivien has gone rogue, hoping to finally discover the truth about Tempus and the Timedancer Corporation and eventually to take it down.


The first episode of Timedancer was released late in 2010 and was featured as one of Microsoft's Recommended Apps on January 5, 2011. It is currently available for download on Windows Phone 7. We are also working towards having Timedancer available on a range of platforms (Windows 8 tablets, PC, Mac and Xbox) later this year.

 

What We Need

We’re looking to raise a total of $20,000 for post-production costs on episode 3 as well as covering the costs for episode 4. The cost of producing each episode are roughly $9,000 to produce which include the following:

  •         Salaries for cast and crew and post-production staff time.
  •         Renting video equipment.
  •         Renting locations throughout London.
  •         Catering.

The remainder of the funds will be used for the following:
  •         IndieGoGo fees (4% for each product that is fully funded; 9% for projects that are not fully funded by the deadline).
  •        Printing promotional materials and costs of shipping items to backers of our IndieGoGo campaign.
  •    Costs associated with renting a space and catering for the cast and crew party in London and the private screenings in London, NYC and Kuala Lumpur.
  • Starting work on porting to Windows 8 tablets, PC, Mac and Xbox 360.

What happens if we aren’t fully funded by the deadline? We will port Episode 1 & 2 to PC & Mac by the end of the year, and all backers who pledged more than $50 will receive the gifts listed under the $50 backer level.

What You Get

Rewards include signed T-shirts and posters, a free download of the official Timedancer soundtrack, an invite to a private screening in London, NYC and Kuala Lumpur, a computer demo of Timedancer, partying with the cast and crew of Timedancer in London, access to a private production and cast blog, having your content included in a Timedancer episode, getting executive producer credits for episode three and even being an extra in an episode! Check out the list on the right for more details.**

Other Ways You Can Help

Once you’ve pledged, please tell your friends on Twitter, Facebook and any other social networks you use! Please follow us on Twitter and like us on Facebook.

Windows Phone 7 users, Episode 1 is now completely free on the Marketplace and Episode 2 was just made available on the Marketplace for £0.99/$1.29

If you guys have any questions, please feel free to send us a message and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible!


Cheers,

Arivind, Ali, and Steph

 

**Note: Chaos Created will not cover nor reimburse backers for any costs incurred for flights, accommodation and other expenses to travel to London, NYC, or Kuala Lumpur. Backers are responsible for funding and making their own travel arrangements.

story:
Who we are

I'm a business man and habitual inventor who has teamed up with a  clothing designer friend that has 30+ years of needle trade experience. 

What we created

We've created a tee shirt with a super useful and discreet pocket to carry your smart phone,  glasses, or anything you like!

 We've turned  the regular pocket 60 degrees sideways, deepened it and made it wider to make it really useful.  With the smart-pocket tee you get a strong, long wearing tee shirt with an anti-spill pocket.

This tee is ready for production.  The design and sample phases are completed.  As soon as the campaign ends we begin production.

FREE Shipping in the USA

Who is it for?

This ingenious tee shirt is for everyone.  From runners to office and construction workers, techies and jocks.  For any one who needs something within easy reach for their phone or other things they need safe.  The tee is unisex. Suitable for women or men of all ages, the dimensions are based on a man's regular tee.  [See sizing, below].

At the close of the campaign we will send you an email asking for the size(s) and color(s) you want based on your perk.  We expect to ship in early February 2016. 


The smart phone "carry" problem...

The idea started on a day at the gym. I noticed that the guys working near me had no place to put their phones. They didn't like them in their shorts pockets  because:

  1. It reduced range of motion.
  2. Was awkward to reach when sitting.
  3.  Made their pants sag.
Then I started noticing similar problems in cafes and just about everywhere.  Nobody could figure out where to put their phones. The U.S. "Consumer Reports" indicates that in 2013,  1.4 million phones were lost and never recovered, and 3.1 million were stolen in America.    [http://www.consumerreports.org/cro/news/2014/04...]

Features

  • Anti-spill design. Angled at 60 degrees. You can bend over and touch your toes and your phone or other objects stay in place.
  •  Discrete design. The patch is sewn onto the inside of the shirt for a clean, inconspicuous look. 
  • No more dangling wires or disappearing ear-buds!  A buttonhole on the inside of the pocket feeds wires up to a tab at the center-front of the shirt.
  • You don't feel anything! The location at an angle on your chest means that the contents don't move around.

  • Hardly noticeable! Under a polo,  dress shirt or a sweater, whatever is in the pocket is barely visible.
  • So easy to get at!  Angled back from the center of the tee shirt, just undo one button to have instant access to your phone.
  • Perfect fit for your smartphone! The pocket will comfortably hold phones up to  3 inches wide x  5.6 inches long.  Of average thickness. 

  • Slightly heavier preshrunk 100% cotton to carry the weight without sagging.

  • Will last for years!
  • Shoulder seams have been adjusted forward to help distribute the weight.
  • Super secure.  By itself or under another shirt, way more secure than a back pocket!  And no more butt dialing your loved ones.


What the campaign is for

We are raising money to  help finance the first production run.  The money will pay for the perks offered, some inventory for our online store and to finance further designs and materials.

The initial production is in Asia, we plan to bring some production back to the USA as soon as possible.

Product sizing:

  1. The tee is unisex. For men and women. The dimensions are based on a man's traditional regular fit tee shirt. Available in Medium to XXL.
    There just isn't enough room on a size small for this innovative pocket.
  2. Do you need XXXL (width size 27-29)? Please drop us an email and we'll add you to our notification list.  If numbers warrant we will add this size.

Every brand has slightly different dimensions for a "regular fit".  To find the right size for you:  Take a favorite comfortable, previously washed  tee shirt.  Place the shirt down flat, measure the full width, one inch down from the below the armpit.  The measure will correspond to one of the sizes below:

Body Width in inches (middle of chest)    M 19-20   L 21-22  XL 23-24   XXL  25-26

Body Length in inches (Neck to bottom Edge)    M 29   L 30   XL 31   XXL 32

How and When do I get my smart-pocket tees.

The Indiegogo campaign finishes December 30th. 


I`m excited.  I hope you'll get as much use out of your smart-pocket tee as I do.
story_txt:
Who we areI'm a business man and habitual inventor who has teamed up with a  clothing designer friend that has 30+ years of needle trade experience.  What we createdWe've created a tee shirt with a super useful and discreet pocket to carry your smart phone,  glasses, or anything you like!  We've turned  the regular pocket 60 degrees sideways, deepened it and made it wider to make it really useful.  With the smart-pocket tee you get a strong, long wearing tee shirt with an anti-spill pocket. This tee is ready for production.  The design and sample phases are completed.  As soon as the campaign ends we begin production.
FREE Shipping in the USA
Who is it for?This ingenious tee shirt is for everyone.  From runners to office and construction workers, techies and jocks.  For any one who needs something within easy reach for their phone or other things they need safe.  The tee is unisex. Suitable for women or men of all ages, the dimensions are based on a man's regular tee.  [See sizing, below].
At the close of the campaign we will send you an email asking for the
 size(s) and color(s) you want based on your perk.  We expect to ship 
in early February 2016.  
The smart phone "carry" problem...The idea started on a day at the gym. I noticed that the guys working near me had no place to put their phones. They didn't like them in their shorts pockets  because:
 It reduced range of motion. 

Was awkward to reach when sitting. 

 Made their pants sag.

Then I started noticing similar problems in cafes and just about everywhere.  Nobody could figure out where to put their phones. The U.S. "Consumer Reports" indicates that in 2013,  1.4 million phones were lost and never recovered, and 3.1 million were stolen in America.    [http://www.consumerreports.org/cro/news/2014/04...]Features
Anti-spill design. Angled at
60 degrees. You can bend over and touch your toes and your phone or other
objects stay in place. Discrete design. The patch is sewn onto the inside of
the shirt for a clean, inconspicuous look. 
No more dangling wires or disappearing
ear-buds!  A buttonhole on the inside of the pocket feeds wires up to a
tab at the center-front of the shirt. 


You don't feel anything! The
location at an angle on your chest means that the contents don't move around.

Hardly noticeable! Under a polo,  dress
shirt or a sweater, whatever is in the pocket is barely visible. 

So easy to get at!  Angled back from the center of the tee shirt, just undo one button to
have instant access to your phone.

Perfect fit for your smartphone! The pocket will comfortably hold phones up to  3 inches wide x  5.6 inches long.  Of average thickness.  


Slightly heavier preshrunk 100% cotton
to carry the weight without sagging.

Will last for years!


Shoulder seams have been adjusted forward to
help distribute the weight.

Super secure.  By itself or under another shirt, way more secure than a back pocket!  And no more butt dialing your loved ones.

What the campaign is forWe are raising money to  help finance the first production run.  The money will pay for the perks offered, some inventory for our online store and to finance further designs and materials.The initial production is in Asia, we plan to bring some production back to the USA as soon as possible.
Product sizing:

The tee is unisex. For men and women. The
dimensions are based on a man's traditional regular fit tee shirt.
Available in Medium to XXL. There just isn't enough room on a size small for this innovative
pocket.
Do you need XXXL (width size 27-29)? Please drop us an email and we'll add you to our notification list.  If numbers warrant we will add this size.


Every brand has slightly different dimensions for a "regular fit".  To find the right size for you:  Take a favorite comfortable, previously washed  tee shirt.  Place the shirt down flat, measure the full width, one inch down from the below the armpit.  The measure will correspond to one of the sizes below:
Body Width in inches (middle of chest)    M 19-20
  L 21-22  XL 23-24
  XXL  25-26
Body Length in inches (Neck to bottom Edge)    M 29   L 30   XL 31   XXL 32How and When do I get my smart-pocket tees.The Indiegogo campaign finishes December 30th.  I`m excited.  I hope you'll get as much use out of your smart-pocket tee as I do.

story:
We have developed a special patent pending jack button that works directly with a security app on iPhone and Android smartphones. A smartphone is the perfect device for your personal security, as it knows your precise GPS position at all times – and,

Our early testing prototypes:

Our latest prototype is even smaller and better, but we are still working on perfection and, of course, a mass production schedule.

Our goal is to be the global provider of an affordable personal security system to every smartphone user and, while we hope that our customers will never need to use zafeOn, we recognise that, almost whoever you are and wherever you go, there are risks to your personal safety and that of your family and friends. Risks which should never be ignored. 


Challenges

Our main challenge, we believe, is complacency out there in the market. Our concern is that not enough people will recognise that the need for personal security is increasing. If we can overcome the ‘it won’t ever happen to me’ attitude, then zafeOn has a bright future – especially now that children from the age of 4-5 upwards have phones and a very good understanding of how to use them.

Our technical challenge prior to delivery primarily lies in completing a design and fit that will be comfortable for the widest spectrum of users, young and old. 
We have mitigated most of the manufacturing challenges by establishing production arrangements with suppliers that can ramp up production volumes at the drop of a hat. This means we have deep connections with producers across the planet and strong confidence that the zafeOn button will ship prior to Christmas this year.

Thus, the technical and production challenges are well known to us – and each day’s work brings us closer to fulfilment. Consumer acceptance is the biggest challenge of all – and that is up to you, and your family, friends and colleagues.

With kinds regards

zafeOn team:

story:
If you do donate, make sure to leave a username for a sign and possible contact info!

Why is this?

Hello and first of all, thank you for reading this! Now you might be asking; Glis, why is this? Why am I looking at this page?

Well, the answer is simple. As you might know, my computer is in a very bad state at the moment, it is very close to break and I fear that this day will be very soon. The past months I have been trying to gather some cash to be able to buy a computer, but I simply can't do it. That's where you guys come in!

Since I am against asking for donations, I decided to set up this page. This way you guys will get something in return if you decide to help me out.

So before you read on, take a moment to look at the perks!

Stream?!

As a extra to the perks, I will also do a stream after I get my new computer. The length of the stream will be up to you guys! I will put this in a simple list.

  • Starting at 0 hours
  • Every 100 dollar = 2 hours added
  • Maximum of 20 hours
  • KaoshKraft, Hypixel and building
  • Special guests
  • First stream ever!

And extra!

As a small extra to the top contributor, I will give you multiple things:

  • All of the perks you donated for
  • A day whitelisted on the KoashKraft server
  • A episode recorded with you in it
  • Caving with the KaoshKraft members available that day
  • A teamspeak/skype call with me for the biggest part of the day
  • A piece of artwork from the lovely TerasHD

How can you help?

A bit of a strange question is it? Well, it isn't! First of all, you can help by chipping in and donating a small amount, even a euro is a good start!

Ofcourse, I understand that not everyone is able to donate money to a guy on the interwebz. That's not a issue, you can still help me! Go spread the word about this, and you already help me greatly!


Thank you for taking the time to read this

                                       Glis/Gilles

story:
The Ultimate & All-In-One Charger and Speaker Designed by Richard Orlinkski

 

Originally an interior architect and designer, Richard Orlinski went into contemporary art in 2002, thus following a passion that he was nourishing since he was 18 years old. His first art pieces saw the day in 2004 after working for two years and it was an instant success : he’s now exhibited in galleries around the world. 

 

 

The Wild Kong is Richard Orlinski’s most iconic pieces. It was developed and exhibited in many countries. Sharon Stone and Pharrell Williams are part of the first celebrities to trust him and contributed to his sculptures’ fame. All his pieces are displayed in his gallery in Paris and in 80 other countries around the world.

KiwiBox, FRENCH-TECH company offering universal smartphone accessories in 23 countries was born in 2014 thanks to entrepreneur Guillaume Guttin who wanted to create innovative and universal charging solutions for smartphones. The brand today equips meeting rooms for prestigious clients such as Havas, Euronews, Deloitte or luxury hotel rooms from Hayatt to Marriott and Four Seasons in over 20 countries. The brand is also distributed in multiple Highstreet stores in Europe, the United States and in the Middle-East.

 

 A Product Reuniting Innovation Technology and Contemporary Art.

Kiwi Kong, wireless charger paired to three speakers : a product that answers all the family’s needs. An iconic piece signed by Richard ORLINSKI, one of the French artists having sold the most artwork worldwide.

 

Prototype photo not does represent final product colour - Official release colour : Red Silver

 

 
 

Technical Spécification 

 

Universal charging solution, The Ultimate & All-In-One Charger and Speaker Designed by Richard Orlinkski

Qi Wireless Charging Pad 10 W, fast charge, Universal Wireless Charger for iPhone XR, XS, XS Max/Samsung Galaxy S9, S9+, Note9/LG, Sony and more...

Smart Station : Stops charging when an individual device is fully charged / night mode - sleep mode.

2 USB ports in back for cable charging tablets or other mobile devices, camera, head phone.....

Charging up to 3 devices simultaneously

Bluetooth 5.0 and 3 Speakers, 2 X 10 W in front / 1 Bass passive in back 

 

 

 From Concept to Working/Final Product

So we can progress and deliver rapidly on this unique opportunity. Listening and cherishing their needs to improve the product and develop a future range KiwiKong. 

 

First direction 3D Mold in June 2018

 

Speaker dévlopment September 2018

Prototype 1 in November 2018

 

Calibration for Speaker positionning

 

Gold Color Testing January 2019

 

                                                           Testing Sound Speakers

 

 

 

We're counting on each backer to support us in this project

 

We're looking for $30,000 to create the product molds and initial production costs.  

Making available to the general public an iconic art piece, with a unique design and technological functionalities. Firstly, making expensive artwork accessible and secondly responding to smartphone users' needs thanks to fast-charging, data transfer and a home speaker.  

If we don't reach our target, we will stay the course and aim to launch the product no matter the total amount.

Take advantage of our exclusive early-bird prices! Up to 61% off!

Transforming a standard day to day charging speaker into an artistic decoration alternative for design lovers. Mixing innovation with contemporary art.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

In terms of risks, we are working with technologies that we already control and that have become an expertise. Whether it’s Bluetooth, Qi charging or USB memory, these are relatively simple functionalities that we’ve already perfected and integrated in our own products sold in 24 countries.

However, Art is conceptual and doesn’t necessarily please everyone’s tastes. This will be one of our main challenges when launching the project.

We are fully willing to adapt to our contributors’ requests, for different colors, designs and technological tweaks along the way.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Let us know what you think about our packaging design

For Kiwikong QI Charger Bluetooth Speaker 

For Kiwikong USB 32 GB 

First Price for backers KiwiKong USB 32 GB 

If you can’t contribute, no problem! We’re seeking as much feedback and opinions as possible, from your family, friends and entourage.

There are many ways you can share our project and ideas directly using the Indiegogo tools available: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter… we need all the help we can get!

story:
Let’s Talk About National Secrets

Here’s how it works right now: American history is being kept secret, then shredded, without ever seeing the light of day. Potentially important documents are lost before we ever knew they existed, simply because it’s too much trouble to keep them, much less read each one to figure out if releasing it might endanger national security. Only a fraction of the massive archive of classified documents gets any kind of attention at all before it’s lost forever.

Introducing The Declassification Engine

A group of historians, computer scientists, and statisticians at Columbia University is trying to fix this by building The Declassification Engine [http://www.declassification-engine.org/index.py...]. This groundbreaking partnership aims to create an intelligent virtual archive of our nation’s former secrets.

The Declassification Engine discovers patterns in government documents and cables using natural language processing and machine learning. When millions of documents are archived and processed, The Declassification Engine uncovers stories never before seen by the public.

 

How Can We Use the Declassification Engine?

There are several real-world applications of the Engine, which will come in handy for journalists, historians, Hollywood screenwriters, and anyone else who’s interested in mining our nation's history for hidden nuggets.

For instance, we can track the number of secret diplomatic cables sent day-by-day, hour-by-hour, looking especially for spikes that show when history starts to accelerate. More than a month before the helicopters started to lift off the roof of the American embassy in Saigon, a burst of cables signalled the oncoming crisis. We can also discover events that have been largely unknown until now. Using The Declassification Engine, we can find what terms are predictive of a document being withdrawn from the files so researchers cannot see it. A single word, “Boulder,” keeps showing up in the subject line of still-secret documents.

What is Boulder?  Turns out, “Operation Boulder” was a covert operation under Nixon to investigate Arabs applying for US visas. It usually takes historians many years of combing through archives to make these kinds of discoveries. The Declassification Engine pulled this needle out of the haystack instantly.

There are plenty of other useful things we can do when we have a huge archive of declassified textual data to work from. One of the coolest: we believe we’ll be able to predict the content of blacked-out, redacted text in declassified documents. We can literally put the secrets back in, and even identify anonymous authors.  

The best part about The Declassification Engine: It will be free, online, and open to all. You’ll be able to analyze documents yourself, or help the archive by submitting your own documents to be analyzed by our algorithms.

 

Why do we need it? 

 

Why should I contribute?

If your house caught fire, you’d rush to grab photo albums and keepsakes, to save the invaluable and irreplaceable first. We’re fighting for what’s invaluable to us and to future generations. There are thousands of stories waiting to be told, and The Declassification Engine will work to bring these stories to the people.  

Our aim is to help the U.S. government become more accessible, accountable, and transparent. Our goal is not to expose every official secret (we’re not WikiLeaks), but to automate the process of identifying what really does need to be safeguarded. In essence, The Declassification Engine will work to preserve our nation’s heritage.

 

How Will My Contribution Be Used?

The funding will go to support student researchers who have been working to develop The Declassification Engine and get it ready for public release. This includes funding for research, site design/UX, web development, and hosting fees. This will be a free service, open to all, funded by your generous donations with additional grants from Columbia University.

Because every dollar counts on this project, we’re keeping perks to a minimum: T-shirts for all donors from $50 and up. As you donate, please specify your T-shirt size in the Notes field. And thank you so much!

 

How Else Can I Get Involved?

The team behind The Declassification Engine will be hosting a conference at the Columbia School of Journalism May 10, bringing together some of the country’s leading historians, data scientists, and transparency advocates. You can register for the conference at www.declassification-engine.org and join the conversation. The website will also host some of the tools we are starting to develop, like the (De)Classifier, the (De)Sanitizer, and the Sphere of Influence, an interactive visualization of more than a million State Department cables. Help us test these tools and tell us how we can improve them. And if you have skills in NLP or designing web apps, and would like to develop new tools, write to us about your background and how you can pitch in. When we have a prototype ready to launch, we will also ask all of those who have declassified documents or have the time to analyze and annotate them to contribute to our virtual archive. This is the fuel that will feed The Declassification Engine and make it more powerful.

You can also learn more about the state of secret documents in the US in this presentation:

 

PR provided pro-bono by Knock Twice, LLC

story:
ATTENTION TRAVELERS TO EUROPE!

HAVE YOU GOT YOUR HOPES ON A NEW ADVENTURE? TRAVELING IS FUN, EXCITING BUT IT DOES CAUSE SOME SERIOUS ROAMING CHARGES! UNTIL NOW!

 

 

Stay in contact when you travel to Europe and reduce your roaming charges by up to 100% with the Shark Sim! Here's why Shark Sim is your traveling companion:

 

  • Save up to 100% on international roaming charges
  • Unlimited Mobile Data
  • Free international voice, video calls and messaging using Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber and WeChat
  • Google Maps navigation without any data limitations
  • Unlimited browsing and uploading for Facebook and Instagram

 

What is SharkSim?

SharkSim is new to the world of technologies, never before has anyone ever created a data compacted sim card, that uses unlimited megabytes. Yes, you read that correctly. SharkSim is a sim card that contains unlimited megabytes, which allows you to access your favourite cell phone apps. These include: Facebook, Messenger, Google Maps, Viber, WhatsApp, WeChat and Instagram.


With this sim card, all you need to do is put it into your cell phone. From there SharkSim allows you to have constant connection with these applications, using cell phone internet. Without touching your cells contract, minutes or data allowance.

 

SHARK SIM works with you along your traveling extravaganza! We know that every now and then you need to touch base with a relative or even update your Facebook profile picture of you feeding a lion. This is why Shark Sim eat the roaming charges and works by setting up a perfect holiday package for your mobile phone!
 

 

Have you ever noticed an increase in your monthly phone bill, but all you’ve been using is your social media apps while traveling?

 

Our team member Edward experienced this when he went off exploring in the Spanish Islands. After a hefty phone bill of around $300 he had to cut back on his traveling experience. Unfortunately for Edward by using the Facebook app on his phone, he was unaware of the tremendous charges he was being induced to. That’s when we decided, it’s about time we take charge of roaming charges!

 

Here’s how we plan to say goodbye to roaming charges FOREVER

 

We’ve incorporated a data compression technology into mobile apps, which is available for Facebook, Instagram, Google Maps, WhatsApp and many more! We compressed the data by 4 times the original amount. This fantastic result has pushed our technology further as now we can share this technology with the rest of the world. We then partnered up with mobile broadband providers. Out of the codes and data, Shark Sim was born! This small sim card allows you to have unlimited broadband in Europe for selected periods of time. Great news to the worldwide travelers coming into Europe!

 

Free international calls and messaging from Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber and WeChat!

As there's no limitation on mobile data you can call and message to your friends and family without worrying about how much data you use! Stay connected with your beloved ones!

 

 

 

 

 

Shark Sim is compatible with iOS (Apple iPhone, iPad), Google Android, BlackBerry, Windows Phone smartphones and tablets. Once activated you can start using your apps without limitations or using expensive mobile data. Working in Europe, this sim does not limit the amount of data you use over a certain period of time, for example 7 days (depending on the package you opt for).

Currently, our data compression technology supports:
 

   and more apps are coming soon...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Stay connected with regular updates of your journey on Facebook and Instagram without worrying about using data.

  • Need a guide? Google Maps will point you in the right direction! No need to use offline maps as there's no caps for your data.

  • Stay in touch with relatives and friends by using WhatsApp, Viber or WeChat without being cut off!

  • Is your son or daughter planning on traveling into Europe? Keep in touch with them with Messenger, WhatsApp, Viber or WeChat. You won’t need to worry about the charges as they have the data!



    •  

    Are you traveling to Europe? Shark Sim is perfect for those who:

     

     

     

     

     

    • Want to have regular access to the most popular social media apps without limitations.

    • Need to stay in contact with loved ones using Facebook Messenger without limitations.

    • Need some guidance at the click of an app. Google Maps will keep you on track without limitations.

    • Cannot wait to show your family a photo of the Eiffel Tower? Why not share it on Instagram, Facebook or send it to your relatives and friends! Without limitations, you can always stay connected.

    • And did we mention, there are no limitations?

      Does this sound like you? Then it’s time to look at Shark Sim’s amazing perks…If you cannot get involved in our perks, then please share our Indiegogo page and tell all your friends as we want to eat roaming charges for good!

       

       

      Our stretch goals:

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

      40 years of combined experience, 2 countries, 4+ people!

       

       

      Edward Zarkovas

      Co-Founder, Operations & Marketing

      Edward has traveled to England to start up a career in Information Technology and Computing. In 2013 he graduated from Southampton University with a BA Hons in IT in Organisations. Alongside two international IT businesses, Edward and his team were ready for a new computing adventure. After a lot of research, crunching numbers and many more meetings, Edward and his business partner Sam, launched Shark Sim.
       
      Sam Masiulis

      Co-Founder, Product Researcher & Developer

      Since Sam can remember, he has always been fascinated by computing technologies. From the age of 14, he was programming on a regular basis. Having studied IT Engineering and Business Management at university, he was ready for a career within IT. From his early twenties, Sam threw himself into a programming career and worked at many major telecommunications companies. From there Sam worked alongside Edward as business partners for their two international IT businesses. Their passion and determination brought the idea of Shark Sim, and alongside their team of experts, they developed the new sim.
       
      Justin Piliukaitis

      Product Developer & Software Engineer

      Justin has a detailed background in IT and programming. At the age of 12-years-old Justin was renowned for his programming skills. Justin studied IT engineering at University and has always worked within the computing world. Justin worked as the technical mind behind the production of Shark Sim, by compressing the data together he developed the functionalities of the sim.
       
      Anton Selyanko

      Product Developer, Designer and User Interface Management

      Anton is known for his artistic flare and online working knowledge. Graduating from the State University with a BA Hons in Graphic Design, he began to study about online marketing. He has worked within design and website development and has recently found solace in Shark Sim. Alongside the team, his passion and determination finely tested Shark Sim and checked it was ready to be dispatched. 
       
      ----

       

      WE NEED YOUR HELP!
      If you would like to help us, please donate to this campaign. 

      HELP SPREAD THE WORD!

      After you complete your transaction, Indiegogo will give you the option to send a message to your friends and followers on Facebook and Twitter.

      This message will inform your friends that you just backed “Shark Sim” and will include a link to our campaign page (you'll be able to edit the text). Please send these messages! It only takes a second and it'll be a huge help!

      ***THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!*** 

       

      • What are the European countries that I can use Shark Sim in?

        • Currently, Shark Sim works in the following European countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

      • Will Shark Sim work with a BlackBerry or a Windows Phone?

        • Shark Sim supports Android (Google), iOS (Apple), Blackberry and Windows Phone devices (smartphones and tablets).

      • How about "Sim Locked" devices?

        • Unfortunately, you may experience issues with "Sim Locked" devices due to they are locked to your current mobile provider.

      • How will I receive my very own Shark Sim?

        • We ship worldwide and it will be delivered to your home.

      • Are there any limits on the amount of data I use?

        • Perks #1, #2, #3 has unlimited data which means that there’s no limit to the data you download using the apps listed in them, however, there’s a download speed cap we have to use to make sure that every user has a great experience without service interference. The speed cap means downloading speeds will be reduced once the cap is reached. Currently, they are set as follows:

          • Perk #1 - 3 days - 300 MB

          • Perk #2 - 7 days - 1000 MB

          • Perk #3 - 14 days - 2000 MB

        • The speed cap won’t cut the mobile internet off, but it will decrease the download/upload speed.

        • What is the validity of the sim card? What do I do when I've used my days?

          • The SharkSim is active for one year. If you've used your days pack you can always top it up. If SharkSim is not used (or topped up) for 12 months then it becomes inactive and you might need to order another SharkSim.

      •  

        • Does it have a phone number attached to it or is it just a data sim?
          • There is a number attached to sim card. If you wish to use SharkSim to make regular GSM calls you can activate this feature, although, SharkSim was designed to give you Unlimited Data with mobile apps so you might consider whether it's worth to pay for regular calls or use FREE UNLIMITED MEGABYTES and call using apps!
      --
      SharkSim on the web: http://sharksim.com
      SharkSim on Twitter: https://twitter.com/sharksimeu
      SharkSim on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sharksim/
      --
      General enquiries: info@sharksim.com
      Press enquiries: press@sharksim.com

story:
Why TinyJuice? 

Currently, there are a lot of cable chargers but they are extremely inconvenient. There are only a few portable wireless chargers, but they are actually not as convenient as they seem because they can't stick to your phone, hindering their charging capabilities.

But, TinyJuice is a revolutionary product that fixes all of these problems!

 

 

It is a pocket-sized wireless charging power bank; its NANO-Suction surface will stick to the back of the phone, so you don’t need to worry about losing the connection between the phone and the charger. It also functions as a phone stand and a finger ring for added convenience. What’s more, it has a sleek design and comes in at an affordable price! 

 

 

 

 

TinyJuice supports fast wireless QI charging. Developed by the Wireless Power Consortium, QI is the industry standard, which defines wireless power transfer using inductive charging over distances of up to 1.6 inches.

If your device supports wireless charging, it works with Qi. That is, TinyJuice works with any device which supports wireless charging! For example, the following models are QI-enabled:

Apple iPhone: 8, 8 Plus, X, XR, XS, XS MAX

Samsung Galaxy: Note 9, S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 Edge (Plus more devices)

Google Nexus: 4, 5, 6, 7 (2013) Pixel series

Sony: Xperia XZ3, Xperia XZ2 Premium, Xperia XZ2 (Plus more devices)

and more...

 

 

 
TinyJuice’s battery has a high conversion rate and a high power 5v output, which means it can charge your device fast and safely.
 
 

Most iPhone models have around 2900mAh of internal battery capacity. TinyJuice has a 3000mAh battery, which means TinyJuice can double your battery life with a single charge, anytime anywhere.

Also, TinyJuice is small and compact, but using innovative battery technology, it fits a full-sized 3000mAh battery into the casing.

 

 

 
The surface of the TinyJuice is embedded with NANO-Suction technology. With this technology, your phone will easily and securely stick to the surface. This means that while charging, you won’t have to worry about the connection between TinyJuice and the phone coming loose and losing your charge. Also, as long as you stick TinyJuice to the back of your phone, charging starts immediately.
 
 
 
Even though the surface is super sticky, you can still remove TinyJuice from your phone quickly and easily without leaving behind any residue.
 
 
 
TinyJuice weighs only 105g, which is less than half the weight of the iPhone XS Max and 60% the weight of the iPhone XS. TinyJuice measures 2.5 inch width and 3 inch height, which is smaller than the width of iPhone XS, making this one of the lightest and smallest wireless chargers on the market.
 
 
 
 
Even with a case on your phone, you’ll still be able to receive the full power of TinyJuice’s charging abilities. The device sticks to cases and functions just as flawlessly.
 
 
TinyJuice is the first wireless power bank with an included 180° finger ring stand. The ring functions as a phone stand and also a convenient and secure way to hold your phone, and the 180° rotation allows you to adjust the angle to your preference. 
 
 
 
Using TinyJuice, you can stand your phone on a table while watching a movie, and at the same time charge your phone.
 
 
 
The phone ring also keeps your phone safe on-the-go, with your finger in the ring, you will never drop your phone again. No other charger features this built-in function, and phone rings alone cost about $8 on Amazon, and we include it plus the other features for only CA$25 (KS Early Bird). 
 
 
 
TinyJuice is available in two colors: black and white.
 
 
Throughout the funding process, we kept receiving suggestions from our backers regarding adding a protection case to the charger. Now, everyone will get an FREE additional protection case!
 
 
 
 

About Us

How convenient is TinyJuice? We're proud to say that all of our team members are using TinyJuice, everyday everywhere. 

We are the TinyJuice Team, a group of tech lovers dedicated to creating innovative tech gadgets that we ourselves also love to use. Bringing awesome products which enhance charging experience in a fashion way is what we are mainly doing now, and will keep doing in the future.

We set out to create a power bank different from the current products on the market, which integrates multiple useful features in a tiny product. With this mission, we designed and created TinyJuice, a wireless, pocket-sized, and easy-to-use power bank, that also functions as a phone stand and finger ring.

 

Sample Test

We've built a working sample for TinyJuice. Here's the video that shows you how this sample works exactly as we described in the story above.

 

Perks

 

Tech Specs

 

Timeline

Sample Test

story:
Get Active at Work … and Play … with activeLife TrainerTM


Most of us spend way too much time sitting still at work… and at home.

Imagine the health benefits of going for nice long walks during all the hours that you are now sitting still.

Impossible? You would never have the time?

With activeLife TrainerTM, Adults and kids can do healthy, low intensity physical activity – while safely seated – and still get work done …or play.

 

activeLife TrainerTMworks with your iPhone or Android!

activeLife TrainerTM has Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) so you can track and share your workouts on your BLE enabled smart phone or tablet*.


activeLife TrainerTM is compatible with dozens of sports and exercise apps including Wahoo Fitness, Nike+, Stava, MapMyFitness, and others. These apps allow users to set and track specific activity goals and share on Facebook, Twitter, and / or for medical or corporate wellness purposes.

Why activeLife TrainerTM?

Applying the "Optimal Defaults" concept pioneered at Yale, Dr. Chris Leonhard, a Professor of Clinical Psychology, has spearheaded the development of activeLifeTrainerTM and the underlying Active Motion Seating technology over the past four years. Research from independent labs in Europe and the US** has shown this technology doubles caloric consumption even at low intensity. And without causing sweating. Large scale studies*** have proven low intensity exercise has similar health benefits to aerobic exercise.

But will I actually use it???

activeLife TrainerTM has an elliptical foot motion that’s just like walking. This natural way of moving your legs quickly becomes second nature without interfering with your daily work. If you can walk and talk at the same time, you can use activeLife TrainerTM. Many users immediately get hooked and actually tell us: “Moving my legs keeps me focused!”


To use activeLifeTrainerTM, at work, place it under your desk or table and roll your office chair into the connector. During exercise, your feet are raised about an inch off the floor, so if you have that much clearance under your table, you’re in business! Or you can use it at home in front of an armchair while you watch TV or play computer games. Resistance is adjustable in 8 easy steps from ‘super light’ to ‘almost athletic’. activeLifeTrainerTMcan also be safely used by children.

Worried you might sweat? If you can slowly stroll through a shopping mall without sweating, you can use activeLife TrainerTM without breathing hard or perspiring. Once you try it, you’ll be hooked!

Why are you on Indiegogo? How can I help?

Right now, we are scheduling the first production run of activeLifeTrainerTM and we need help to pay for the upfront cost of manufacturing.
….you can help us with a $ 25 or $ 100 donation - in exchange for a copy of our US patent****

Or you can help us AND yourself by pre-purchasing activeLifeTrainerTM for $ 479 for one or $ 950 for two units. Your activeLife TrainerTM should arrive in time for Christmas …. or to help you with your New Year’s Resolutions :-)  .... see 'perks' for details.

… do you know anyone else that should be more active but doesn’t have the time? Please send them our way!

Going forward, our hope is to help America and the world break the cycle of physical inactivity which causes so very many serious health problems …. to get all of us moving throughout the day - at work … and play!

__________

* activeLife TrainerTM works with Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) devices including iPhone 4S or better, iPad 3rdgen or better, and Android 4.3 or better. Compatible apps may have additional hardware requirements.

**Carr, LJ, Luther, B, Rider, P, Leonhard, CL. (2013) Comparing the Physical, Cognitive and Work Performance Effects of Using an Active Elliptical Machine Desk versus a Standard Desk. Annals of Behavioral Medicine. 45(S2):B159

Botter, J, Burford, EM, Commissaris D, et al. (2013) The Biomechanical and Physiological Effect of Two Dynamic Workstations. HCI (23): 196-204

*** Williams PT, Thompson PD. (2013) Walking versus running for hypertension, cholesterol, and diabetes mellitus risk reduction. Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol. May; 33(5):1085-91

**** activeLife TrainerTM is protected by US Patent 8,485,945. Additional US and international patents are pending.

activeLife
TrainerTM is compatible
with dozens of sports and exercise apps including Wahoo Fitness, Nike+, Stava,
MapMyFitness, and others. These apps allow users to set and track specific
activity goals and
share  on Facebook, Twitter, and / or for medical or corporate wellness
purposes.

Why activeLife TrainerTM?
Applying the "Optimal Defaults" concept pioneered at Yale, Dr. Chris Leonhard, a Professor of Clinical Psychology, has spearheaded the development of activeLifeTrainerTM
and the underlying Active Motion Seating technology
over the past four years. Research from independent labs in Europe and the US** has shown this technology doubles caloric consumption even at low
intensity. And without causing sweating. Large scale studies*** have proven
low intensity exercise has similar health benefits to aerobic exercise. 
But will I actually use it???
activeLife TrainerTM has
an elliptical foot motion that’s just like walking. This natural way of moving
your legs quickly becomes second nature without interfering with your daily
work. If you can walk and talk at the same time, you can use activeLife
TrainerTM. Many users immediately get hooked and actually
tell us: “Moving my legs keeps me focused!” 




To use activeLifeTrainerTM,
at work, place it under your desk or table and roll your office chair into the
connector. During exercise, your feet are raised about an inch off the floor,
so if you have that much clearance under your table, you’re in business! Or you
can use it at home in front of an armchair while you watch TV or play computer
games. Resistance is adjustable in 8 easy steps from ‘super light’ to ‘almost
athletic’. activeLifeTrainerTMcan
also be safely used by children. 


Worried you might sweat? If you can
slowly stroll through a shopping mall without sweating, you can use activeLife
TrainerTM without breathing hard or perspiring. Once you try
it, you’ll be hooked!

Why are you on Indiegogo? How can I
help?
Right now, we are scheduling the first production run of activeLifeTrainerTM
and we need help to pay for the upfront cost of manufacturing. 
….you can help us with a $ 25 or $ 100 donation - in exchange for a copy of our
US patent****
Or you can help us AND yourself by
pre-purchasing activeLifeTrainerTM for $ 479 for one
or $ 950 for two units. Your activeLife TrainerTM should
arrive in time for Christmas …. or to help you with your New Year’s Resolutions
:-)  .... see 'perks' for details.
… do you know anyone else that
should be more active but doesn’t have the time? Please send them our way!
Going forward, our hope is to help
America and the world break the cycle of physical inactivity which causes so
very many serious health problems …. to get all of us moving throughout the day - at work … and play!
__________
* activeLife TrainerTM works
with Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) devices including iPhone 4S or better, iPad 3rdgen or
better, and Android 4.3 or better. Compatible apps may have additional hardware
requirements.
**Carr, LJ,
Luther, B, Rider, P, Leonhard, CL. (2013) Comparing the Physical, Cognitive and
Work Performance Effects of Using an Active Elliptical Machine Desk versus a
Standard Desk. Annals of Behavioral Medicine. 45(S2):B159 
Botter, J, Burford, EM, Commissaris D, et al. (2013) The Biomechanical
and Physiological Effect of Two Dynamic Workstations. HCI (23): 196-204
*** Williams PT, Thompson PD. (2013) Walking
versus running for hypertension, cholesterol, and diabetes mellitus risk
reduction. Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol. May; 33(5):1085-91
**** activeLife TrainerTM is
protected by US Patent 8,485,945. Additional US and international patents are
pending.

story:
Exchange data with devices from Smartphones by USB or BLE - even for phones with no BLE. 

We will develop open source developer's kit.

POGO stands for "Press Once and GO!" has been developed to a pre-production prototype by Aseptika Ltd.

POGO is designed to solve a particular problem: How do the users of our fitness and medical devices, get their data into the Cloud?

Many customers have Smartphones with no Bluetooth LE and so cannot sync with the latest devices being developed.  Many perfectly good devices do not have wireless capability and only connect to PCs (Windows or iOS) by USB. But consumers are abandoning PCs in favour of Smartphones and Tablets as these do all that they need, without the support burden and complexity of maintaining a PC, which is understandable.

For us, CE marking as a medical device is ultra expensive and adding BLE means recertification.  POGO solves this problem.  It acts as a USB host and a Bluetooth LE communication device.

So we thought, wouldn't it be great if we found a way to let other App developers connect devices to their Apps using POGO.  But we need a Software Development Kit to make this possible and we are seeking support to develop this project and we need £5,000 to develop and test this software which we will make open source thereafter.

In return for supporting this Open Source software development project, we will provide you with a production version of the POGO device as your development platform and a copy of the SDK.  You will be free to use the code, incorporate the code and commercialize the code within your own products and apps without further license or royalties.

Risks and challenges

Risks are inherent in any new software development project: 
1. POGO production units may be delayed and this will delay shipment of the SDK and development platform. 
2. The SDK development may be delayed. 
3. There may be some USB and BLE devices which will not work with the POGO and these technical issues are insoluble (although we will make all reasonable efforts to solve them with you). 
4. Many of the lower-end Android tablets do not have a headset jack which supports an external microphone. This is a requirement for use of the POGO. So the POGO may be limited to Smartphones, iPads (all versions) and those Android/Windows 8 Tablets which support external microphones.
