story:
What can you do to protect your Lightning cables?

Most Lightning cables get worn out after 6-8 months and the cable starts to tear open at the base of the connector. The cable might still work, but exposed internal wires are considered a safety hazard, and unless you want wrap it up with electrical tape, you’ll have to buy a new Lightning cable. Tests show that the damage risks are increased by 41% if Lightning cables are carried around.

Look Cooler or Last Longer?

The iPhone and iPad Lightning cable creators opted out of the SR design. While a clean and sleek design is attractive, cable protection is in jeopardy. The following graph shows what choices have been made between beauty and durability.



                  [ DIY solutions ]

tapes、carbon wires、spring


 
really?.....or


                  [ Lightning Saver ]



Two-Click Solution: Broken Lightning Cables are a Thing of the Past

It’s the protective gear that your Lightning cables have always dreamed of. Lightning Saver is tiny but effective, simple but strong, to protect your cables against twists and turns. With Lightning Saver, your cable will last longer and be safer.



Tiny Savers, Huge Savings

Due to frequent usage, many Lightning cables are worn and wires exposed. Tests show damage risks are increased by 41% if Lightning cables are carried around all the time. People have tried several methods to support frayed charging cables, but they are never a stylish fit. Lightning Saver comes in eight colors and perfectly encloses your Lightning cable, so you don’t have to buy a new one.


Minimum Expense, Maximum Defense

The industrial rubber inner layer absorbs impacts and prevents harmful twists and bends. The hard outer layer stands against damage and securely keeps the unit in position. Combined, Lightning Saver is your strongest choice for your worn Lightning cables, or to keep your new cables from getting frayed.


Meticulous Design, over 500,000 Units Sold

With their past experience in iPhone design and the manufacturing industry, our production team attends to various features. Lightning Saver is compatible with all Lightning cables. Previously launched locally in Taiwan, the last version sold over 500,000 units in just a few months. In the latest version, we are working with component manufacturers who also serve the global luggage brand Samsonite, in order to ensure world-class quality. Lightning Savers are all proudly made in Taiwan.



                  [ Magsafe Saver ]



For comprehensive protection, your MacBook should not lag behind. Charging cables deserve the same care as your mobile devices. Magsafe Saver is designed with absolute attention to detail and strength, so your charging cables are always well-protected, wherever you go.




Based on customer feedback and popular demand, we designed a new Magsafe Saver for MacBook users. The same two-click mechanism provides comprehensive supports to all your Apple devices. Five-color options assure consistent style.



                [ EarPods Keeper ]

This campaign sits at over $100,000 funded with no signs of slowing down and we want you to know that it was all possible because of your support. We are going to bring a new product to every backer of this project by using the fund we raised.

EarPods Keeper - the first cord keeper in the world that you will never lose!

EarPods Keeper is a user-friendly and stylish accessory to carry with you wherever you go, I mean, wherever your EarPods goes. 

EarPods Keeper has been in the works for over 2 months. After several working prototypes built and tested, we believe we've settled on an most easy-to-use design. It is time to launch, and , YES, EarPods Keeper will be shipped with your order together if you select the early bird perk.

Last but not least, EarPods Keeper - early bird is a 2,000 backers limited offer, claim it before it's sold out!


                       [ REWARDS ]

Choose your perk set and don't forget to help your friends avoid broken Lightning cables in the future.

2015.02.20 update : this project has about 2850 backers so far, and we have received hundreds of requests asking for an additional order. The most common reasons are "My friends would like to have one also".  Therefore, it's suggested that you go for a higher perk than what you want now. We believe that your friends will definitely want Lightning Savers when they see your new gadget! Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

It’s the perfect present to all fellow Apple lovers, family and friends. [Note: Each cable needs two Lightning Savers for both ends.]





Founded in September 2013 by a group of seven, LimitStyle is committed to overcoming daily challenges with stylish design and affordable prices. With years of experiences in marketing, sales, design and data analytics, the team can identify solutions with consumers in mind. Founder Zac Lu was involved with iPhone 4S and iPhone 5 design and manufacturing during his time in Foxconn. Sales manager Posen Huang contributes his expertise after five years in Panasonic. Before Lightning Saver, previous bestsellers by LimitStyle include ladder-style soap holder and antimicrobial toothbrush holder, among others.

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have  money right now, you can help us turn our campaign  into a reality by sharing it with your family and friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons( up near the video) and  let the world know about our awesome project. Thank you!

story:
Our Story

We started off with a simple social discovery app called “Loopd”. The app enables attendees at business events to connect and build strong professional networks.

Our story is about empowering people – you and me by enhancing devices already in our lives (smartphones).


IMPROVE Social Discovery

How often do you leave a business party, networking event or meeting feeling like you missed opportunities to exchange contact information or tell your personal story?  For the first time, your phone can help you network successfully with new contacts.

Our new Loopd app uses a peer-to-peer Bluetooth technology that allows your smartphone to connect with people within hyper-proximity of you – and not on the other side of town.  We are Bluetooth advocates who believe recent advances, such as less demand on batteries and ability to run in the background on your smartphone, make it the friendliest short-range wireless technology on Earth.

As result, you can knowingly, securely, and quickly build mutually meaningful relationships and quality networks in a crowded room. Social discovery can happen automatically with your device tucked away in your pocket. To help you put each new acquaintance into context, the Loopd app identifies the location, time, and date of every interaction. Loopd also takes care of the little details like exchanging telephone numbers, email addresses and Linkedin profiles (if you wish) so you can spend more time having really genuine conversations.

Our Motto:

“Live in the moment. Let Loopd do the work for you!”

Features at a Glance

Loopd improves your networking at business events by:

Identifying the location, time, and date of every interaction

Instantly searching and connecting with people within 10 to 15 feet of you

Running with full functionality even if your smartphone is in your pocket

Adapting to your behavior so that you don’t have to learn any new habits

Messaging, note taking, curating lists, and exporting capabilities 

Giving you the option of customizing appearance with color schemes, compelling visuals, social content, and more

Redefining the way you use your smartphone


Now We are Thinking Big!

Resulting from our success with this first Bluetooth-inspired social discovery app, we want to expand our technology and experience to optimize social discovery and relationship nurturing in other social events - not just business professional.


Potential Use Cases

Music Festivals

Use our discovery platform to find your friends at a crowded festival. Celebrate and enjoy your favorite music with those who are closest to you and also like the same artist.

Smart Homes

Have your lights and music turn on and adjust to your preferences as you walk into a room! Now every environment will be perfect for you at all times.

Restaurants

Receive recommendations for a restaurant based on who you are with. You will never have trouble finding the right atmosphere, food, and service for a group of friends again.

Bars

Send automatic advance notifications of your arrival at a bar, so that the bartender has a drink ready for you. Don’t waste time waiting for a seat, ordering, and paying.

Sports Arenas

Find other fans who share your love of your favorite team and who you can cheer with. Share your pride and excitement with groups, and enhance every pastime experience.

We would like to implement these new features and others based on your feedback!


Why Not Dream Even Bigger?

Our vision at Loopd is to enable you to use your smartphone in completely new and creative ways. Loopd can be used for much more than connecting with other people. Our apps actually do not discover people per se, but discover ‘nearby’ smartphones and other hardware devices through Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) peer-to-peer connectivity.

Let’s Connect to Wearable Devices

The Loopd event app led us to realize that your smartphone is the Ultimate Social Discovery Machine.

Want to use all the Loopd Bluetooth apps with your Pebble or Jawbone UP? Support us -- and we can integrate the Loopd App for as many types of hardware devices as possible. 

Going Beyond Discovery

Our vision at Loopd is to enable you to use your smartphone in completely new and creative ways. Loopd can be used for a lot more than just finding new personal connections, since our apps will discover other hardware devices that are also nearby. Help us discover exciting new ways to use our amazing technology.


What Features Do You Want? Let Us Know!

When you pledge for a perk, you can also vote in the Indiegogo Comment area for one of the proposed Use Case features -- or suggest another feature idea to benefit you and your friends. 


Current Progress

Phase 1: Our first app for social discovery at networking events is currently available on iOS and will be released on Android in the coming weeks. 

Phase 2: The Loopd Application is undergoing improvements and is nearly complete for new feature requests.  We are ready for crowdsourced feedback to determine what four new features should be released first. 


Accessibility

Loopd is device agnostic, and will work on any new smartphone that supports Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). However tech-savvy you are, the Loopd App Development Platform can help you take advantage of any environment. There are no barriers for users, and our Loopd team aspires to help every user learn how to easily experience full functionality.

Platform Support

Each crowdsourced app will be released first on iOS and subsequently will be released on Android. If there is enough interest, we can also put Loopd apps on other smartphones such as Windows Phones and BlackBerrys. Let us know if you're interested!

Roadmap For Development

Upcoming projects include:

1) Android beta release of our app focused on business events.

2) iOS and Android beta release of music festivals, sports arenas, bars, and other requested applications for new environments.

Remember! If you want to use Loopd on your Pebble or Jawbone UP, support us -- and we can integrate the Loopd app with wearable devices and other amazing hardware.


$20,000 Goal for Our Project

We want to spend some time researching the best use cases for our discovery technology by engaging with you (our supporters) and industry leaders.

We also want to hire a team of software developers to develop exciting new features and test new use cases.

Bonus - Beyond Our $20,000 Goal

An additional $30,000 will allow our team to fully support integration of Wearable Technology and the Internet of Things (IoT).

It is our dream to have every environment and device adapt to you based on your personal preferences. 

By supporting the Loopd Project, you will in turn make history. And you will be forever remembered as one of our supporters who made it all possible.

Backstory

Loopd was inspired by a project at Draper University of Heroes: invent a better way to build and maintain relationships. This university and incubator in San Mateo, CA, was started by legendary VC Tim Draper.

The emergence of Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and the prevalence of smartphones encouraged us to reinvent this common human experience and make it even more simplistic. 

Within the first five minutes of the project, our team talked about how frustrating everyone felt it was to exchange business cards and otherwise collect professional contact information with context at networking events.  We also agreed it was tough to build relationships with important people, and even tougher to sustain a high quality network over time. So we decided to focus first on releasing an app focused on business events that could change the way people approach professional networking. 

Team

Brian Friedman, CEO at Loopd

He is currently pursuing his B.S. in Materials Science and Engineering at Lehigh University, and is also the Main Organizer for the Bay Area Wearable Technology Startup Meetup. 

Sambhav Galada, Head Engineer at Loopd

He is currently pursuing his M.S. in Electrical Engineering from Texas A&M. Sambhav has implemented and designed an ARM low power chip for wearable technology that enables users to get feedback on their personal fitness analytics. 

Allen Houng, Head Developer at Loopd

He is currently pursuing his M.B.A. from National Taiwan University. Allen has been featured on TechCrunch and StartUp Weekend Blog for his startup called Drimmit, which he built by himself from the ground up full stack. 

Connect With Us

Perks


Partners

Buckets Academy

A Prestigious Basketball Club and clothing company exclusively for the Young & Driven. BA provides the youth with the knowledge and key resources to increase their chances of success in basketball and, most importantly, in life.


Findables

Findables offers the world's first app-enabled social media phone case, allowing the user to instantly share all of his social media accounts (i.e. Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) and contact information with friends when the unique QR code imprinted on the back of the phone case is scanned.  


URB-E

URB-E is the world’s most compact electric vehicle. It has a 20 mile range on a single charge, a top speed of 15mph, and can fold small enough to fit next to you on a train or bus. It takes only one second to convert the URB-E from something the size of carry on luggage to a ‘go anywhere’ personal e-vehicle!


It is very important to us that we are working closely and transparently with all of our followers and supporters. As a result, we will be providing frequent updates and feedback to you. We are one big team -- and together you can help us make the process as fast, fun and productive as possible.

Let’s make an amazing future together, and change the way smartphone technology is used!


Announcement: Bitcoin

We are excited to be one of the first Indiegogo Campaigns to accept Bitcoin for contributions.

How does it work?

Step 1: Click on the link here to fill out the form

Step 2: Transfer your Bitcoin to our wallet (address provided in the form)

Step 3: Once the Bitcoin is transferred we will make a donation to the campaign under your name


That's it!

are no barriers for users, and our Loopd team aspires to help every user
learn how to easily experience full functionality.


Platform Support


Each crowdsourced app will be released first on iOS and
subsequently will be released on Android. If there is enough interest, we can
also put Loopd apps on other smartphones such as Windows Phones and
BlackBerrys. Let us know if you're interested!

Roadmap For Development



Upcoming projects include:
1) Android beta release of our app focused on business
events.
2) iOS and Android beta release of music
festivals, sports arenas, bars, and other requested applications for new
environments.




Remember! If you want to use Loopd on your Pebble or Jawbone UP,
support us -- and we can integrate the Loopd app with wearable devices and other amazing hardware.







$20,000
Goal for Our Project
We want to spend some time researching the best use cases
for our discovery technology by engaging with you (our supporters) and industry
leaders. 

We also want to hire a team
of software developers to develop exciting new features and test new use cases.

Bonus - Beyond Our $20,000 Goal



An additional $30,000 will allow our team to fully support integration of Wearable Technology and the Internet
of Things (IoT).
It is our dream to have every environment and device adapt to
you based on your personal preferences. 

By supporting the Loopd Project, you will in turn make history. And
you will be forever remembered as one of our supporters who made it all
possible.
Backstory


Loopd was inspired by a project at Draper University of Heroes: invent a better way to build and maintain relationships. This university and incubator in San Mateo, CA, was started by legendary VC Tim Draper.


The emergence of Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and the prevalence of smartphones encouraged us to reinvent this common human experience and make it even more simplistic. 
Within the first five minutes of the project, our team talked about how frustrating everyone felt it was to exchange business cards and otherwise collect professional contact information with context at networking events.  We also agreed it was tough to build relationships with important people, and even tougher to sustain a high quality network over time. So we decided to focus first on releasing an app focused on business events that could change the way people approach professional networking. 

Team










Brian Friedman, CEO at Loopd


He is currently pursuing his B.S. in Materials Science and Engineering at Lehigh University, and is also the Main Organizer for the Bay Area Wearable Technology Startup Meetup. 


Sambhav Galada, Head Engineer at Loopd


He is currently pursuing his M.S. in Electrical Engineering from Texas A&M. Sambhav has implemented and designed an ARM low power chip for wearable technology that enables users to get feedback on their personal fitness analytics. 
Allen Houng, Head Developer at Loopd


He is currently pursuing his M.B.A. from National Taiwan University. Allen has been featured on TechCrunch and StartUp Weekend Blog for his startup called Drimmit, which he built by himself from the ground up full stack. 
Connect With Us




Perks





Partners
Buckets Academy


A Prestigious Basketball Club and clothing company exclusively for the Young & Driven. BA provides the youth with the knowledge and key resources to increase their chances of success in basketball and, most importantly, in life.





Findables

Findables offers the world's first app-enabled social media phone case, allowing the user to instantly share all of his social media accounts (i.e. Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) and contact information with friends when the unique QR code imprinted on the back of the phone case is scanned.  



URB-E
URB-E is the world’s most compact electric vehicle. It has a 20 mile range on a single charge, a top speed of 15mph, and can fold small enough to fit next to you on a train or bus. It takes only one second to convert the URB-E from something the size of carry on luggage to a ‘go anywhere’ personal e-vehicle!




It is very important to us that we are working closely and transparently with all of our followers and supporters. As a result, we will be providing frequent updates and feedback to you. We are one big team -- and together you can help us make the process as fast, fun and productive as possible.
Let’s make an amazing future together, and change the way smartphone technology is used!


Announcement: Bitcoin
We are excited to be one of the first Indiegogo Campaigns to accept Bitcoin for contributions.

How does it work?
Step 1: Click on the link here to fill out the form
Step 2: Transfer your Bitcoin to our wallet (address provided in the form)
Step 3: Once the Bitcoin is transferred we will make a donation to the campaign under your nameThat's it!

story:
To place an order Now: WWW.HALOBAND.ME


Due to the huge backer demand in the last week of our Kickstarter campaign, we setup this Indiegogo campaign for any backers who missed out on pre-ordering a Haloband.

We are not using Indiegogo to fund development of Haloband, instead it's place to continue taking orders as an e-shop.



As Featured on:

TechCrunch：Haloband Lets You Control Your Smartphone With A Tap On Your Wrist

Engadget：Haloband Provides Shortcuts to Smartphone through NFC

MSN：“Cool new inventions for the New Year”

Techable: スマホの操作を簡単にするリストバンド「Haloband」、タップだけで撮影やチェックインが可能に

TUXBOARD：Top 6 des projets Kickstarter qui verront le jour en 2014



MEET HALOBAND!

Social, Smart, Security！

Smartphones usually require complicated operations. Many of your favorite functions would cost you 8 seconds or even more to make them happen.

Then what about Haloband? Haloband is a simple wristband merged with many phone control functions. With your HALOband, when you want to reach for a function of your smartphone, you just need to tap on the band with your phone. BANG! It comes! No need touching the screen or keys.

Here is what you can do by just tapping on band in two seconds:

Haloband is connected with your phone by NFC connection. Waterproof,.no battery. no security risk. Except for above use, it can also play a role in security check and social info exchange. You can swap HALOband to unlock a door or use your phone to tap on other’s HALOband to get information.

Haloband is the first NFC wearable device including a online cloud account all over the world！

Customize your move!  

Haloband comes with just an app with which you can customize your favorite mobile functions on the band. Now we already have the 6.0 edition software as below. However, we are still in progress improving that, in hope it can be more friendly, conveniently and comprehensively.

HALOBAND APP: 

Easily set HALOband App

There are three sections on HALOband: A, B and Cloud Zone which is for identity authentication and information exchange. We usually use the A & B sections for move set.  

   USE INSTRUCTIONS ：

  • Launch HALOband app to add move  
  • Select move type. There are six kinds of move types for you to choose from  
  • Select tap sequence (to launch task)  
  • Tap HALOband using the move you just chose

SET DONE! Enjoy your trip with HALOband! 


APP Setting

One tip: There is no need keeping the app open when you're using the band for all kinds of function. The App is just for writein use.

Another: For beginners, we have prepared a set of default basic functions in the App.


What's inside?

We adopt three pieces of NFC chips inside of the band. These are core of the loop, so we use a kind of covering technique to protect them. Besides, also for protecting them, we choose a kind of stretchy, surgical-grade silicone for outside use. 



 Prototype Tech Specs:  

 IC: NTAG203/NTAG213 

 Band: medical grade silicone  

 Water resistant construction  

 Weight: 10 - 15g, 0.35 - 0.5oz  

Stress Test. We can make sure of its ductility and durability.

The three pieces of chips inside will work in conjunction to perform different functions, much more comprehensive than a single one. The material for outside use is comfortable even for allergic skin. Also, it’s waterproof. You can wear it taking a bath or playing basketball, or even swimming in pool!

We prepare three sizes for your choice. You can choose form forms shown below.  

We suggest you click the link below and take this measure way:

How to measure

Available colours: Black, Purple, Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, White

The HALO Story

Everyone has trouble in locking and unlocking smartphones. The frequency usually hurts phones' screen and keys, as well as our hearts. So we decide it's time to do something. 

As an I.T. team focusing on NFC tech, we start out with a NFC wearable device idea, as it is the best way avoiding direct operations on phone. And we would like to see it more powerful than smart watch with a more sharp outlook than Iphone. 

After trying out hundred kinds of possible method, we get our first 3D-printed prototype in August. After a few days of trial, we found it perfectly matched with our initial goal, saving time and effort. We would like to share this fantastic little invention with public. Fortunately, we have been cooperating with a supplier who provides bands for Nike, thus it didn’t cost us too much time producing the first real prototype.

3D-printed prototype in different colors

All of the designs we have tried


Package design


However, when HALOband comes to mass production, tooling and assembly cost become the most serious problem, So we come to kickstarter looking for your help. During preparation, we improved HALOband by adding another chip as a cloud account. You can store anything in the account, and drag them to your phone by just tapping on your cloud zone. 

We hope you will like our design. Next form is the whole procedure of our production.  

Meet us！

A team in crazy love for NFC tech! from Shanghai. We have master from New York University and engineer from Intel. We know each other from college and are all I.T. fans. Our designer's biggest interest is to collect all kinds of interesting collections from all over the world. Our app developer is a real geek. He has written million lines of codes.These are all source of  the design.

We started this project about one year ago, in hope we can actually change people's life a little through bringing in interesting and useful stuff to every detail of daily life. We aim to make smart simple, so that every one can use smart device without worrying about complicated operations.


What's Next?

At present, we are still improving our App, adding more useful and interesting functions onto it. So would like to know what kind of functions you want to see on HALOband? We will be very glad if you can write to tell us: halo@haloband.me

Also, we are perfecting Cloud service. There are many stretchy goals on our plan list. We prepare to open API to geekers and authorize you to develop all kinds of cool app. Besides, you can exchange any information through cloud, such as your smart door key, shopping mall vote, and facebook twitter updates. For example, when you get involved in a swimming pool party which is not convenient for mobile phones, you can use HALOband to check in the party, you can swap HALOband to get in or share information with others or tap any local device to update your facebook! We even think of adding payment functions on cloud service, which is possible through NFC. 

Here is two examples we are planning to add to cloud service：

IFTTT PLAN


IFTTT.COM, a clever service which puts the internet to work for you. 

There’s so many creative ways you could connect HALOband with IFTTT:

  • Tap to turn off lights when I leave for work.
  • Tap to call you, out of a boring meeting.
  • Tap to unlock your SmartThings lock.


PARTY PLAN

Swap HALOband to get in or share information with others or tap any local device to update your facebook!


FAQ


1. Do I need to have a rooted phone in order to use Haloband?

No.


2. Is this iOS compatible?

We are not releasing an iOS app for HALOband at this moment. However, if iphone carries NFC function in next general, we will definitely release an edition for IOS or iphone. At this stage, you can still use HALOband to share information with others. After all, pledge for such a pretty wristband is worthy:)


3. Will my phone work with HALOband?

HALOband now can work with Android NFC phones and tablets. Such as:

Samsung -- Note3, S4, Note2, S3, Galaxy Round 

HTC -- One Max, One, One X, Butterfly 

Google -- Nexus7, Nexus5, Nexus4, Galaxy Nexus, Nexus S 

Motorola -- Moto X, Razr D3, Droid Maxx, Droid Ultra 

Sony -- Xperia Z1, Xperia M, Xperia ZR 

LG -- G Flex, G2, Optimus G, Mach 

...

For more, you can check if your phone or tablets carries NFC from this list, http://www.nfcworld.com/nfc-phones-list/ .

Or check your phone setting, there will be an NFC switch in NFC phone, just like: 

http://www.haloband.me/will-my-phone-work-with-haloband/

How will you know my choice of size, color and my address?

We now offer five sizes and seven colors. We will send you a survey on the size and color choice and your address after successfully achieving goal on Kickstarter.


4. Do I have to keep the app running when using the band?

No. The app is just for setting the band. It's unnecessary for you to launch the app when you're using the band.


5. Does it require battery? Do I need to recharge it?

NO.


6. How to know my size?

http://www.haloband.me/measure/


7. Will it drain my battery if I always keep NFC on?

Definitely No. You will hardly notice the difference when you keep NFC on.

story:
No Key. No Problem.

Last year, we introduced you to the Noke Padlock. Your support made Noke a huge success and caused the tech world to take notice. Noke went on to win the CES Design and Engineering Award and Engadget's Insert Coin people's choice award. 

So we thought it was time to bring you the next member of the Noke family. 

The Noke U-Lock incorporates all the awesome features that make the padlock so amazing and encases them inside a virtually indestructible steel alloy housing. In case that wasn't enough, we added an integrated alarm that will send would-be intruders running for cover.

Strong, water resistant, attractive, included bike mount, the Noke U-Lock has it all.

How It Works

Using your phone's Bluetooth Smart connection and the Noke app (iOS, Android, or Windows Phone) you can effortlessly open your Noke U-Lock with the push of a button. Your smartphone replaces your keys forever.

At the press of a button, Noke wakes up and searches for your phone or a shared phone. If the phone is within a few feet, Noke instantly unlocks so you can be on your way. No need to re-launch the app or remove your phone from your pocket or purse. It even works when your phone is asleep.

If you'd like to add an extra layer of security, you can disable the auto-unlock feature and require the press of a button in the app to open Noke.

Compatible with Apple Watch and Other Smart Watches

The Noke app gives you the option to turn off auto-unlock. By deactivating auto-unlock, you need to press the unlock button on the app to open Noke. If you’d rather not pull your phone out of your pocket, you can unlock Noke with your Apple Watch.

We are also planning to make the app compatible with other smart watches (Pebble and Android watches) as their Bluetooth protocols are finalized.

Alarm

We made the Noke U-Lock exceptionally strong, but we think an extra layer of protection can give you some peace of mind. So, we added an alarm to the Noke U-Lock. Just like the alarm on your car, you arm it when you want it and it automatically disarms each time you open it with the app or the quick-click code.

When a would-be intruder shakes your Noke for more than 3 seconds, a shrieking alarm goes off. This will definitely send him running and get the attention of anyone within about 50 meters. Yes, it's that loud.

In addition, if an intruder attempts to enter the quick-click code more than 3 times, the alarm will sound to send them away.

*Setting the alarm activates an internal accelerometer to detect motion. The accelerometer will reduce battery life but you will still get several months (5-6 months) of constant use with the alarm enabled. When the battery gets down to 20% you will receive a notification in the app.

Sharing

We know you love to share your bike. The Noke app makes it safe and easy. You can give one-time access, or custom access based on specific days and times. Even better, you can revoke access instantly instead of needing to chase down keys.

GPS Tracking

Maybe you forgot where you locked your bike. With the Noke app, it's no problem. Each time you lock the Noke U-Lock, it is marked so you can always find your bike.

 Bike Mount Included

We know some of you have some crazy ways to transport your locks. But, for those who want a simple and attractive method to transport your Noke U-Lock, we've included a custom designed mount that showcases Noke's beautiful design and gives you effortless docking and undocking.

Quick-Click Access

What if you forget your phone or your battery dies? With Noke, it's no problem. Our patent-pending Quick-Click technology allows you to create a custom access code. If you're ever without your phone, simply key in those clicks and your Noke will instantly unlock for you. You'll never worry about being stranded again.

Optional Bluetooth Key Fob

If you're the type who doesn't like to ride your bike with your smartphone or you don't like smartphones at all, you can purchase the optional Bluetooth key fob for only $24.99. The key fob allows you to open your Noke U-Lock exactly the same as you would with a smartphone. You don't even need to remove it from your pocket or purse.

*The Bluetooth key fob is optional. Noke is designed to open with your Bluetooth 4.0 enabled smartphone. However, the Bluetooth key fob provides an additional way for you to open Noke without your smartphone or the quick-click code.

 Design

Attractive. We designed the Noke U-Lock to be the most attractive U-Lock you've ever seen.

Strong. While the Noke U-Lock is an incredibly attractive device, we also made it strong. Using advanced steel alloys, Noke will stand up to the toughest environments.

Water Resistant. You're sure to use Noke in places where it may get wet, so we added a few silicone gaskets to keep the water out.

Long-Lasting Special Lithium AA Battery. All these features would be useless if you had to worry about the battery. So we packed Noke with a long-life battery that will last several years between charges. When the battery gets low, the Noke app will give you a warning to make sure you have plenty of time to replace your battery.

*Setting the alarm activates an internal accelerometer to detect motion. The accelerometer will reduce battery life but you will still get several months (5-6 months) of constant use with the alarm enabled. When the battery gets down to 20% you will receive a notification in the app to remind you to charge it.

Secure Communication. Noke uses Bluetooth 4.0, which has 128bit AES encryption which encrypts all communication to and from your smartphone. We have added another 128 Bit layer of encryption on top of that. We also have a custom protocol for communicating with the lock on top of all the encryption that includes unique session ID's, session keys and a digital key that is unique for every lock. All of which are required for a valid unlock command to be accepted. In addition, Noke rejects sniffing attempts by disconnecting any unauthorized communication.

Dimensions

Supported Devices

Compatible with iOS devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running iOS 7.0 or later (including iPhone 4s or newer, iPod Touch 5G or newer, iPad 3G or newer, iPad minis).

Compatible with Android devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and  running the Jelly Bean (4.3) or Kit Kat (4.4) or higher versions of the Android operating system (including Samsung Galaxy S4 or newer, HTC One or newer, and several more).

Compatible with Windows Phone devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running Windows Phone 8.1 or newer. 

About Us

Each time you lock the Noke U-Lock, it is marked so you can always find your bike. Bike Mount IncludedWe know some of you have some crazy ways to transport your locks. But, for those who want a simple and attractive method to transport your Noke U-Lock, we've included a custom designed mount that showcases Noke's beautiful design and gives you effortless docking and undocking.Quick-Click AccessWhat if you forget your phone or your battery dies? With Noke, it's no problem. Our patent-pending Quick-Click technology allows you to create a custom access code. If you're ever without your phone, simply key in those clicks and your Noke will instantly unlock for you. You'll never worry about being stranded again.Optional Bluetooth Key Fob
If you're the type who doesn't like to ride your bike with your smartphone or you don't like smartphones at all, you can purchase the optional Bluetooth key fob for only $24.99. The key fob allows you to open your Noke U-Lock exactly the same as you would with a smartphone. You don't even need to remove it from your pocket or purse.
*The Bluetooth key fob is optional. Noke is designed to open with your Bluetooth 4.0 enabled smartphone. However, the Bluetooth key fob provides an additional way for you to open Noke without your smartphone or the quick-click code. DesignAttractive. We designed the Noke U-Lock to be the most attractive U-Lock you've ever seen.Strong. While the Noke U-Lock is an incredibly attractive device, we also made it strong. Using advanced steel alloys, Noke will stand up to the toughest environments.Water Resistant. You're sure to use Noke in places where it may get wet, so we added a few silicone gaskets to keep the water out.Long-Lasting Special Lithium AA Battery. All these features would be useless if you had to worry about the battery. So we packed Noke with a long-life battery that will last several years between charges. When the battery gets low, the Noke app will give you a warning to make sure you have plenty of time to replace your battery.*Setting the alarm activates an internal accelerometer to detect motion. The accelerometer will reduce battery life but you will still get several months (5-6 months) of constant use with the alarm enabled. When the battery gets down to 20% you will receive a notification in the app to remind you to charge it.Secure Communication. Noke uses Bluetooth 4.0, which has 128bit AES encryption which encrypts all communication to and from your smartphone. We have added another 128 Bit layer of encryption on top of that. We also have a custom protocol for communicating with the lock on top of all the encryption that includes unique session ID's, session keys and a digital key that is unique for every lock. All of which are required for a valid unlock command to be accepted. In addition, Noke rejects sniffing attempts by disconnecting any unauthorized communication.DimensionsWeight approximately 3 pounds or 1.4kgSupported DevicesCompatible with iOS devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running iOS 7.0 or later (including iPhone 4s or newer, iPod Touch 5G or newer, iPad 3G or newer, iPad minis).Compatible with Android devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and  running the Jelly Bean (4.3) or Kit Kat (4.4) or higher versions of the Android operating system (including Samsung Galaxy S4 or newer, HTC One or newer, and several more).Compatible with Windows Phone devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running Windows Phone 8.1 or newer. About UsNoke is aimed toward innovating smart-locks of every kind, making locks an asset to consumers rather than a hindrance. The Noke team works to make securing, sharing and tracking locks a seamless and convenient user experience.

story:
TheGlobalYogi.com is a website that profiles yoga people and places worldwide via three channels:

  • The YOGAZINE : http://yogazine.theglobalyogi.com
  • a monthly E-DIGEST : http://www.theglobalyogi.com
  • The EVENT CALENDAR: http://calendar.theglobalyogi.com

The Global Yogi has now been online nearly three years (we launched on March 4th 2011) and brings its nearly 1000 subscribers and website readers around the world a new edition each month, accompanied by a monthly Email Digest with all of the upcoming yoga and spirit based events around the world.

If you love The Global Yogi - this is your chance to contribute to the website that brings you great yoga news and events from around the world for free!

If half of our subscribers gave us $2 each, we could fund this campaign successfully :).

Global Yogi is an independent media production founded and run my me (Michelle Taffe), with the help of Global Yogi Editors and writers around the world. The writers don't receive any payment and the global Editors are only paid if they recruit a new business member.

Producing the Global Yogi website is a full time job, but the site does not yet generate enough revenue to fund a full time salary or to pay contributors.

This is why we need your help to cover costs for the programming of our fabulous new redesign for the Global Yogi Event Calendar.

The design is already done, we just need to raise the money to get the programming done.

The new Event Calendar design includes the following improvements:

  • All the relevant event details will be on the right side instead of below event info.
  • We have brought back the MAKE AN ENQUIRY button.
  • We have introduced an event BOOKING facility.
  • The Event List page is much improved (see pic 2 below).
  • The Event Grid page is also improved with better category navigation.
  • All-in-all, the redesign makes the Event Calendar much more aesthetically attractive and also more user friendly.

BACKSTORY

I have been working full time on the Global Yogi website now for three years. It is still an uphill battle financially as am not able to cover my living expenses or extra costs (like this programming update) with what I earn from Global Yogi. I want to continue building up the website and providing the readers and the international yoga community with great, up-to-date information about fantastic places to do yoga around the world, and to improve on it, so hence this campaign to get the Global Yogi reader community involved.

If you'd like to see the Global Yogi website continue, and to grow into a truly global portal for yoga / wellness & spiritual travel experiences, donate to this campaign and be a part of it!

And if you run a yoga / wellness business, there are a many perks which will directly help your business - either by connecting it with Global Yogi readers, or via an online marketing consultation with me.

Thanks!


There are quite a few different 'perks' available to our wonderful funders, including:

  • A fantastic boost to your lifetime's store of positive karma :-)
  • A hand written thank you note (sent via email)
  • A copy of the Becoming a Global Yogi Ebook.
  • An event on the Calendar (of course!)
  • An email review of your web presence
  • A Skype review of your web presence
  • Global Yogi Digest advertising
  • Global Yogi Membership packages

If you aren't able to give us money for the campaign, it would be fantabulistic if you are able to help us spread the word about this project via:

  • Social Media: facebook, Twitter and email.
  • Via the automated share tools available here on the Indiegogo campaign page
  • And by telling your friends and teachers at your local yoga school or retreat centre!

Thanks so much and we really look forward to re-launching the fabulous new event calendar soon with your help!

story:
antsle™: Your Code, Your Data, Your Rules 

Simple hosting + full data ownership + save money = freedom

 

 

 

 

Check out what our first users have been saying: Customer Feedback
 

Update Jan 8: Make money with antsle - 10% for all referrals!

 

Over 250 people have already shared our IndieGoGo page, thank you for that. And because you like sharing so much, we’ve decided to start an antsle Referral Program.

All you have to do is share the campaign link via social media, email etc. and send it to friends, family and everybody you know. You will receive 10% on all purchases of the many perks on our IndieGoGo page here coming from successful new referrals. This can quickly add up to a few hundred dollars!

 

2 Easy Steps to Make Your Referral

1. Log in to IndieGoGo or create an account by signing up here. Then, visit the antsle IndieGoGo page again and look around the main video to share and copy your unique URL. 

 

 

2. Share!

Paste that link in an email to your buddies, post it on Facebook and Twitter, etc. When people click through your unique link, they will be directed to the page and their activity will be registered under your referral.  If they contribute, we’ll know that it’s coming from you.

You can track your referrals via your IndieGoGo account. Once the campaign has ended, we will be in touch!

 

Update: All perks now shipping February 25, 2016. That's two months earlier than the original plan!

Today, only 5 companies collect 70% of all online revenue. Worse still, only 50 companies control about 80% of the servers that together make up the Internet. Without antsle, we have no choice but to confide our personal information and code to Google, Amazon etc. and expose ourselves to a continually centralized Internet.
antsle's mission is to change that! To give back freedom, independence and 100% data ownership to you. To make it easy for everyone to run and control a server, an important piece of the Internet.

 

antsle is the first user-friendly turn-key solution to host apps & data at home:
  1. The antsle™ home server, a beautiful and powerful device with an aluminum case. The antsle has no fans, no vent holes and no movable parts. It’s SSD-based, absolutely silent (0dB), secure and super energy-efficient. Up to 8 TB raw storage capacity (internal).
  2. antsleOS™ enables more than 100 virtual servers to run on a single antsle.
  3. The absolute highlight is antman™, our management software for VMs / virtual servers. Get your virtual servers up and running in one minute. Install server-side apps with our one-click installers.
antsle is just like the cloud, but with an important difference: Only you decide if and when your data leaves your home!

--------------------------

 

As seen on:

 

 

--------------------------

Why We Developed antsle

What made the Internet great in the first place was freedom. Suddenly, everyone could participate in something that worked on a global scale. That fact was responsible for the Internet's unbelievable growth we've witnessed over the course of the past few decades.

We feel that this freedom got lost. Yes, everybody can still participate, but under the rules that are imposed on us by just a few. We're mutating more and more into targets for unwanted advertising or - frankly - spam. We're being intentionally blocked from using cool stuff that's technically possible - only to serve the commercial interests of those who dominate the Internet. On too many occasions, we're being spied on.

 

 

  • If you are not paying for it, you're not the customer. You're the product being sold.  -- Andrew Lewis
It's time for transformation. We at antsle set out to make web hosting from home, on your own server, as easy as 1-2-3. Plus, it saves you a ton of money compared to cloud hosting and cloud services.

 

Also, we've made our solution powerful, beautiful, and 100% silent. And we're doing all that for a reason. If it's not easy, you simply won't use it. If it's noisy, you won't use it in your home. If it looks crappy, you won't proudly show it off to your friends and family.

Learn some more about our motivations to start antsle in this video:

 

There are about 700 million websites today, hosted on about 80 million servers. However only 50 companies control 80% of them! That's 0.000007% of the total number of websites. The internet's control structures are broken.

With antsle, you finally have the means to control your data, your code and the access to it. And that's how it should be. We want you to be a part of the Home Hosting movement and shift power back to where it belongs:
To you.
Watch here how it works:

 

 

 

The Perks

 

 
 

How We Do It - Our Design Goals 

Given our motivation, our cause and raison d'être, it was easy to come up with our design goals:

 

  • Make antsle a turn-key solution. If you need to find the right the right components yourself and make it all work together, we won't make an impact to the Internet and the world.
  • Make it dead-simple and easy to create virtual servers and install apps in them.
  • 0dB noise. Period.
  • Super energy-efficient.
  • Security from the ground up.
  • Enough power to host hundreds of virtual servers in one antsle.
  • Appealing, beautiful case.
  • Fault-tolerance: never lose your data, not even through power fails.

 

 Steve Jobs once famously re-quoted Alan Kay: 

"People who are really serious about software should make their own hardware"

 

The Product

 

antsle one & antsle one Pro

 

 

The antsle™ home server is a beautiful and powerful device, enclosed in an aluminum case that acts as the heatsink. There are no fans, no vent holes and no movable parts. It’s 100% silent (0.0 dB) so perfectly suited for the living room!

 

You can run hundreds of virtual servers on your antsle at the same time and it holds all your data. You decide if and when any data leaves your home. So you’re in total control of your personal information that has become so valuable to Google, Amazon and others.

An antsle is not just the piece of hardware in a beautiful case. Instead, it's a turn-key solution for web hosting from home, consisting of three components:

 

  1. The antsle™ home server, a beautiful and powerful device with an aluminum case. The antsle has no fans, no vent holes and no movable parts. It’s absolutely silent (0dB).
  2. antsleOS™ enables more than 100 virtual servers to run on a single antsle.
  3. The absolute highlight is antman™, our management software for VMs / virtual servers. Get your virtual servers up and running in one minute. Install server-side apps with our one-click installers.
It's important to us that under no circumstances you will lose any data. That's why we're using ZFS, the world's most fault-tolerant file system. ZFS has been designed by Sun Microsystems with an important design: never allow any event to create an inconsistent state on the disk.

We have at least two SSDs in every antsle. If one of them fails, you still have your data on the other one. And you might ask: What if my RAM has a bit error? These things happen, and they matter. RAM bit errors can get written to disk and ruin your data. That's why we built error-correcting (ECC) RAM into each an every antsle.

Best of all: You don't need to worry about these things. We've built ZFS, mirroring and ECC into our antsleOS. It will be automatically there, in each and every virtual server that you create on your antsle, without you having to care about it in any way. Given our role as the pioneer of home hosting, we thought that's what we owe you.

Here are the details:

 

 

 

 

The antsle is extremely energy efficient. Even at full load of all eight CPU core around the clock, every day, it'll add a mere $2 to your monthly electricity bill. That number is based on a US average of $0.10 / kWh.
 

The Software

 

antsle comes with several layers of software.

First, there is antsleOS. That's our "hypervisor". It's the underlying technology that "slices" your antsle into several, "virtual" servers. So you buy one antsle, and you can then use it to run hundreds of virtual servers, each of which would cost you $20 or so per month with Amazon EC2. We call each of our virtual servers an antlet. Each antlet can either be based on LXC container virtualization for extreme performance, or it can be based KVM hardware-level virtualization in case you want to run an OS other than Linux in your antlet. In a single antsle, you can run Windows in one antlet, SmartOS in another antlet, FreeBSD in a third and a different version of Windows in a fourth antlet.

Then, on top of antsleOS, we have antman™. The word stands for "antlet manager", and it does pretty much what it says: it enables you create and manage your antlets in a super-easy way. If you're familiar with digitalocean: antman works in a very similar way. What do you do with your antlets? If you know how to do it, you can ssh into your antlet and install whatever server-side software you want.

And here's the highlight: Even if you're not familiar with managing a server with ssh and the command line, you can still use your antsle for fascinating things by using our one-click installers.

Here's a screenshot of antman:

 

There are no limits on what you can install in each of your antlets. Examples include:
  • Host your own home-based email server. That's right, just as Hillary did! ;-)
  • Manage your contacts and calendars. From your home, rather than with iCloud or google. Access (and change) your antsle-based contacts and appointments from your iPhone, Android, iPad, ...
  • Have your own "drive" to share files just like Dropbox, but with full data ownership in your home.
  • Run a basecamp-like team collaboration tool from your home.
  • Run a CRM system.
  • Run your own URL shortener, just like bit.ly or t.co, but under YOUR control, and with much shorter URL because you're not sharing URLs with millions of people.
  • Run gitlab and host 10,000 or so git repositories which would cost you a fortune with github.
  • Much, much more.
Just one app, that you can easily install in one of your antlets with our one-click installer, is OX App Suite. That apps lets you handle your email, contacts, calendar and Drive on your antsle. It's a piece of freedom - everything's under your own control. We've included a few screenshots of OX App Suite, which is open source software by Open Xchange:
 

Email

 

 

 

Contacts

 

 

Calendar

 

 

Drive

 

 

 

Slash Your Cost by 90%

 

Most fees for hosting, cloud services etc. are paid on a monthly basis. They sound low. Compare that to antsle: The only thing you pay for is the hardware. You can easily use it for two or even four years.

Over that period, the monthly fees you used to pay before you owned the antsle are really adding up.

We’ve prepared some sample calculations to illustrate that effect.

Of course, every person is different. We’ve created two fictitious individuals, Harry and Sally. Harry is someone that works in a technology environment, and uses hosting services for side projects or on a semi-professional basis. He can’t afford to lose files when someone who he shares a Dropbox folder with accidentally deletes something. So he uses DropBox Pro and Dropbox extended history for himself and someone he works with on a regular basis, such as a VPA or his spouse. He pays github to host a few (private) repositories.

See how the cost breaks down in this table:

 

 

With antsle, in contrast, he pays only for the antsle itself. Everything else is either included or available for a free open-source download. So his new cost structure looks simple:

 

 

Here’s the before/after comparison:

 

 

Quite impressive, huh?

Our next fictitious user is Sally. She is a freelance developer, and collaborates with three other people on a regular basis . She has several clients. See her cost breakdown here:

 

 

And again, the new cost structure with an antsle. In contrast to Harry, Sally is using and antsle Pro, as well as a RAM Upgrade and an HDD add-on.

 

 

Here’s the before/after comparison for Sally:

So with antsle, you’re not only reclaiming 100% data ownership, freedom and autonomy. You’re not only getting a beautiful and 100% silent device. You’re also saving an enormous amount of money!

 

Where we are today:

antsle is already functional today. We have developed, tried and tested our hardware to ensure bare-metal performance with zero noise. The software prototype is also working smoothly but our vision is much bigger than what we are able to accomplish alone. That is exactly what the proceeds of our IndieGoGo campaign will be for:
  • Your contributions will directly go towards the development of the software that makes the platform great
  • With your antsle purchase through our campaign, you will receive your very own antsle with free life-time software updates
  • AND you are directly contributing to the product you will be using for years to come
We need the $15,000 funding goal in order to purchase the minimum order volume of the antsle aluminum cases from our supplier.
This will be an open campaign so your contributions will directly feed into further development of the platform, no matter how much we raise. We have already seen considerable interest from outside investors but part of what we are trying to create is an independent platform with only YOU in control. We've been working on antsle since August 2015 full-time and will continue to do so.
 
Risks & Challenges

 

  • antman, including a set of six one-click installers, is in a "working prototype" stage. Until delivery of the antsle, we will finish development of antman. This imposes the standard software development risks.
  • antsle relies on a core team of three. Should one of them cease to work on the team, it can have negative impacts on antsle's time line.

 

 

The Team

Bernd 'Bernie' Blume

 

 

Bernie is CEO and Founder of antsle. He started his career at IBM and later ran his own venture-backed company “Xionet”. After that, he has been working in various interim management positions. He moved to the US in 2014 to further pursue his idea to create the home hosting movement. At antsle, Bernie leads the company strategy and oversees all day-to-day operations.
 

 

 

Kurt Neumann

 

 

 

Kurt Neumann is a seasoned cyber security professional. In the course of his career, he has worked for large enterprises such as Intuit, Time Warner and Cisco. Kurt also co-founded PacketSled, a successful and venture-backed security company. At antsle, Kurt is responsible for the technology and cyber security behind both software and hardware.

 

Ask Us Anything!

Whatever question you might have, ask us!
     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please make sure you like and follow us, so as many people as possible can find us:

    Facebook

    Twitter

    LinkedIn
